1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA san+ni pa ta rat+na ke tu d+hA ra Ni nA ma ma hA yA na sUtra
1b2(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen
1b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i mdo/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa
2a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ bdud kyi
2a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di sbyor bar bgyis/ bdag gi rig sngags 'di grub
2a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur cig/ oM 'di lta ste/ A bA ma/ A bA me/ AM bA re/ AM bA re/ pa ri kuny+dzA/ nA da
2a4(rgyud 'bum): nA da/ puska ra bA ha/ dza lu khA/ me khA ya/ i li/ mi li/ ki li mi li/ kirti pa ra mu de/
2b1(rgyud 'bum): mu dra/ mu khe swA hA/ oM 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i
2b2(rgyud 'bum): tshal bya ka lan te ke gnas pa na/ dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dag
2b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par
2b4(rgyud 'bum): grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
2b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu spor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag
3a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa
3a2(rgyud 'bum): sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/ lhun
3a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i rtse 'dzin blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang po'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
3a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'od kyi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
3a5(rgyud 'bum): glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thub dka' gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha gzhon
3a6(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pa dang / dri ma med pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs
3b1(rgyud 'bum): pa byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad kyang bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/
3b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ thabs
3b3(rgyud 'bum): shes la mkhas pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ kun tu rgyu mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi
3b4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa/ g.yog lnga brgya pa gcig gi ming ni nye rgyal/ gcig gi ming ni bang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de/ tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can de gnyis phan tshun
3b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar bdag cag las gang gis thog mar bdud rtsi thob pa des gcig la gcig sbran to zhes dam tshig byas so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos bgos
3b6(rgyud 'bum): lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod yul du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab
3b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar dge slong 'di'i spyod lam mdzes pa de lta bu ni bdag gis sngan chad dge sbyong
4a1(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ bram ze 'am/ mir gyur pa gzhan su la'ang gang yang sngon ma mthong na/ bdag de'i gan du song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/ gang las rab tu byung
4a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gi chos la dga' zhes dri'o snyam nas/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba
4a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston
4a4(rgyud 'bum): pa gang / gang las rab tu byung / gang gi chos la dga'/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// shAkya'i sras po brtul zhugs dka' thub chen po kun gyi
4a5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa dbang ldan pa/ / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin cing grol la de bzhin 'gro ba 'gro la mdzad pa// sangs rgyas shes bya sang mdzad mi mnyam sdug bsngal mcho bskams da ltar 'di ni yod// dri ma med
4a6(rgyud 'bum): pa de yi skyabs su nga song nga ni de yi chos la dga'/ / nye rgyal gyis smras pa// khyod kyi ston pa ji skad smra/ ji skad ston/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa legs par rab tu nyon
4a7(rgyud 'bum): la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ / ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang
4b1(rgyud 'bum): drung pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/ / thar pa'i mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ chos rnams la chos
4b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la nyon mongs pa med pa skyes te/ des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kyis ni shin tu rnyed dka'
4b3(rgyud 'bum): thob gter bdud rtsi'i chos bshad pa/ / 'di ni rtag tu skye ba'i 'bab chu skems par bden par khong du chud// de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste// lam 'di dam pa shes rab
4b4(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams skosgom pa mi mnyam byed pa yin/ / de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
4b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ ral pa
4b6(rgyud 'bum): can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ bdag gis grogs po'i mchog dang slob ma'i 'khor la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das
4b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi thad du rab tu 'byung ngo / / de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te slar song nas/ kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes
5a1(rgyud 'bum): ga la ba der song ba dang / kun tu rgyu bang nas skyes kyis/ san N+Da d+hu nye rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyu la la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
5a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dngas/ bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni kun tu dkar ba las na/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed // nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
5a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa de de bzhin te/ kho bos bdud rtsi rnyed kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / kho bos ci rnyed pa khyod la bshad do// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan
5a4(rgyud 'bum): las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so// gang
5a5(rgyud 'bum): gis srid gsum rgya mtsho myur rgal zhing / / phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba// mya ngan med zhi lam de shod cig dang // yang 'byung med pa'i lam du 'jug par bya// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis 'di
5a6(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang / las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i
5a7(rgyud 'bum): sprul bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/ / thar pa mchog de sba ba'i khru mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma med pa zhi ba'i chos/
5b1(rgyud 'bum): / nyon mongs lta ngan nas pa thams cad ni byed mi shes gcod pa dang // 'di ni 'dus byas gsog gso ba de phyir stong pa slu bar grub pas gsungs// de thosa'i ba reg 'gyur drim med pa'i tshig de rjes sa
5b2(rgyud 'bum): te rgyal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i
5b3(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/ / thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis de nyid du chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
5b4(rgyud 'bum): cing dri ma dang bral la/ nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par sbyangs te/ des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 'di skad ces smras so// yang dag spyod pa 'di ni chu bo sgrol ba zhi pa mgyogs pa gzings//
5b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum po zhi byed 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro// 'di ni yongs su shes na nyon mongs phung po 'joms shing bdud 'dul 'gyur// thar pa 'di ni dgra dang 'thab mo bsal cing
5b6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems/ / pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/ nye rgyal gyis smras pa/
5b7(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po
6a1(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes thos na/ bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngam/ pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin te/ bdag
6a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi 'khor la bltas la rab tu 'byung ngo / / de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ bdud sdig can gyis
6a3(rgyud 'bum): yul ang glu ma g+ha d+ha na mkhas shing snyan pa dang / brjod pa dang / grags par ldan pa/ skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu
6a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'dod do zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge slong go'u ta ma'i slob mar gyur na/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul stongs par byed kyis/ bdag der song ste skyes bu
6a5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa de gnyis rab tu byung ba las bzlog la/ sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du gzhug go snyam ste/ de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam la bdud sdig can myur du bdag gi khang pa nas mi snang bar byas te/ tsha
6a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bsgyur nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na lam kar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log
6a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges pa bgam par bya ba'i phyir// smras pa de dag thams cad don yod ma yin 'di la rgyu yang med// dge dang mi dge'i las de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la
6b1(rgyud 'bum): yod/ / myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod rtsed mo byos// skye rgan 'chi med cing sdug bsngal med de 'jig rten pha rol med// bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las bskyed
6b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras med rgyu dang byed pa med/ / rnyed phyir 'dir ni shAkya'i bu yis smras kyis dad pas ma 'gro zhig/ de nas nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bdud sdig can bdag cag rab tu
6b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba las bzlog pa'i phyir 'ongs so snyam nas/ de nas nye rgyal rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas/ rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod nyon cig 'khor ba'i skyon//
6b4(rgyud 'bum): dran par gyis la 'jig rten rga ba yis// gzir cing 'chi bdag gis ni rab bskor ba// de gnyis spang phyir rab byung legs par zung // de nas pang nas skyes kyis bdud la slar smras pa// mkhas/
6b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gsum mthar 'byin mchog chos rnams kun shes kyis// rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros 'di las skyod nus su yang med// srid pa rangab zhi bya phyir bdag cag
6b6(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bad/ / seng ge'i gzugs can wa yi tshig gis nged kyi blo gros ma sbyar cig/ bden pa mthong ba'i lha gang dag nam mkha' la 'dug pa de dag gis/ skyes bu dam pa
6b7(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par 'phags
7a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lam yin te/ lam 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o// lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa'o// 'di lta ste/ rab tu
7a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo// de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/
7a3(rgyud 'bum): yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dag nged ni rga
7a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa las rab tu 'byung bar yang dag par chas kyi/ khyed kyis shes par gyis shig/ khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das
7a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni 'di nas phyir log cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis cung zad shes pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthun/
7a6(rgyud 'bum): khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na/ khyed gang las rab tu byung ba de las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa/
7a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gyis rig nas/ ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i gan du 'gro mi nus par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi
7b1(rgyud 'bum): logs su g.yang sa chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgya pa zhig sprul to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ ci nas kun tu rgyu te rgyal
7b2(rgyud 'bum): dang kha ra nas skyes gnyis g.yang sa chen po de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do/ / yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du ri chen po brtan pa/ sra ba/ mi rnyil ba/ sul med pa/ gcig
7b3(rgyud 'bum): tu stug por gyur pa/ mkhregs pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa zhig mngon par sprul te/ seng ge khro zhing gdug la gtum pa/ sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das
7b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri de'ang ma mthong / seng ge'ang ma mthong / seng ge'i skad kyang ma thos te/ lam drang por bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
7b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor mang po brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
7b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag khyed skyes bu dam pa tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
7b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis g.yog dang bcas te nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas/ gcig ni nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gcig ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog
8a1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur ro/ / de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// skyes bu mkhas pa g.yog ldan 'di gnyis ni// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan shes rab 'jig
8a2(rgyud 'bum): med par/ / mi mchog phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te// bdag gis de gnyis bsti stang bskyed nas bsu// de nas dge slong de stan las langs nas/ dge slong mang po khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu
8a3(rgyud 'bum): byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsu nas bsnyen bkur byas so/ / de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
8a4(rgyud 'bum): bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par
8a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis
8a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi ming ci nye rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bdag ni bram ze nye rgyal gyi bu lags te/ nye rgyal zhes bgyi/ bdag gi ma'i ming ni shA ri'i ka ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni shA ri'i bu zhes
8a7(rgyud 'bum): btags so/ / bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so// pang nas skyes kyis gsol pa/ bdag gi pa'i ming ni ko'u di n+ya zhes bgyi/ bdag gi ma'i ming ni mo'u 'gal zhes bgyi ste/
8b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i sdang du bdag gi ming ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes btags so// bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang
8b2(rgyud 'bum): mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga'i thang du g.yog dang bcas te/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nyid kyis de gnyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po
8b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par/ bdud sdig can dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'ang
8b4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / gang dag bstan bcos don sbyong mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol song // de kun nga yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pa nga // go'u ta ma slob ma 'khor bcas ngal deng pUr sbubs tshol
8b5(rgyud 'bum): cig/ mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam 'di khyod la bshad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la ma 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror 'dren cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed//
8b6(rgyud 'bum): nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa// 'chal pa 'dzem pa med cing mu cor smra ba wa skad nga yang ci zhig zer// khyod ni bcom zin bdud kyis nga la da yang 'dir ni
8b7(rgyud 'bum): gnod gang byed mi nus/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas/ tshangs pa'i cha byang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so//
9a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs srid pa'i myu gu rab tu bsal// de yi slan chad thub pa ci slad sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro// gtso bo 'gro ba
9a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di na khyod kyi snod gyur skye bo gang na'ang ma mchis te/ / 'dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur mi 'da'// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dul gang 'khod
9a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can mtshungs med gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ / ngas mthong de dag nga yis snying rjes thar par bya ba yin// 'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na// de nas mya ngan 'da' yis blo gros ngan pa
9a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yos ci bskul/ / de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug
9a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khor po'i sems can kun phan tshun 'di skad du/ ci'o rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug pa su'ang mi shes so zhes 'dra'o// de
9a6(rgyud 'bum): nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang / lhab lhub kyi bdag cag rgyan
9a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i sil snyan byas te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis glu len gar byed cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil snyan dag byas nas/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang
9b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas bos so// sgra ma byed sgra ma byed ces de skad ces smras pa dang / yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi
9b2(rgyud 'bum): zer bar 'khod do/ / yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yabs te bos so// lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang / gar dang /
9b3(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang / yang de bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas 'bod cing / sgra ma byed sgra ma byed ces zer ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag cang
9b4(rgyud 'bum): mi zer bar 'khod de/ de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs stan glog ces bya bas/ bdud sdig can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btung nas 'di skad ces smras so// gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir shi 'phos
9b5(rgyud 'bum): ltas zhig gzigs sam ci/ / 'on tam ci zhig de ring 'gro ba shugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam// 'on te 'di na khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam// ci yi slad du khyod ni dgyes
9b6(rgyud 'bum): par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad/ / bdud kyis smras pa/ nga la dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul ba// sa steng shAkya'i bu pho'i sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo// de ni ci nas gal te brlag par
9b7(rgyud 'bum): ma gyur na/ / de yis nga yi 'dod khams 'di ni stongs par byed// lha'i bu mos smras pa/ gtso bo srid gsum bcings sred rgya mtsho mtha' rings la// zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su
10a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig mchis/ / bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang // de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis// bdud kyis smras pa/ sbyin dang brtul zhugs
10a2(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i zhags pa can/ / stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te// 'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang 'thun gyur nas// srid pa ma lus bzlog pa
10a3(rgyud 'bum): nye bar bstan pa byed pa po/ / de yi slob ma bsam gtan la ni mngon par brtson yid kyis// dben par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad par bya phyir 'khor zug tu// cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong
10a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri yi sman ljongs rnams na gnas// rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang snying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa yi// dam pa nye rgyal bang nas skyes gnyis thub pas brtul bar gyur//
10a5(rgyud 'bum): rab dul chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du brtul// des ni nga yi 'dod khams 'di dag stongs par byed par 'gyur// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bdud sdig can las/ bcom ldan
10a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang bral ba'i glog ces bya ba thob bo/ / de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/ bcom ldan
10a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i sil snyan dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / srung ba dang / rgyan de dag bcom ldan
10b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang / lha'i me tog dang sil snyan nas/ rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal du bab par gyur to// bdud kyi bu mo re dag kya
10b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / / de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes par gyur to// gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi
10b3(rgyud 'bum): ra ba/ dge slong de dag be com skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shA bu dang / oMT 'gal kyi bu ga'ig dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngomatshar da
10b4(rgyud 'bum): rmang du drung brgyan po sngon ma mthong ma dzes pa'i matog kyi char chen po rabatu bab lags sas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu ci lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral
10b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyisabum yin / bdang sa na rgyag mas mo la brgya man gyis bdang kyi yang bden pa la mthong ba bya ba'i phyir/ 'dis bu mthos gi chen panas rgyan tu
10b6(rgyud 'bum): ga/ sa nga ba ma thasam pa mas pa'i byang chu mags yang
10b7(rgyud 'bum): m as btsam ldan 'das kyi gsang nga 'dzad pa'i byangs babacom ldan 'das la dbas thangs thades pa ma pa phreng tshu
11a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal
11a2(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// srang chu ma lus skems pa 'gro ba'i mig gcig pa// mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la
11a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas ni/ / khyod kyis lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro ba sgrol// thub pa bdag cag ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha dang mis mchod don dam gsung ba bcom ldan 'das// bdag cag 'thun
11a4(rgyud 'bum): par bud med smad pa nyid spangs nas/ / blo mchog khyod kyi 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni// mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung nyan to// bdag med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom
11a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das/ / byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med nor gsung sbron// mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la// da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol// de nas
11a6(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi bu mo de dag stan las langs te mgrin gcig tu/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po mi g.yo ba'i// dpal rnyed ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la sngang
11a7(rgyud 'bum): par sems/ / dregs pas gos nas skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis// lus kun gtses te mi bzang gnas su nye bar song // de ltar khro ba spangs te rgyal la dad par gyis// 'khor ba'i nyes
11b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dregs pa'i 'dam las thar pa'i bdag/ 'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen// thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gis myur du bzhud// de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i yid dang
11b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di 'dra'i 'dud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la/ gang g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te/ 'di nas
11b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlog la 'gro mi nus par bya'o snyam pa dang / bdud des de dag bcing ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro//
11b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud sdig can gyi drung nas dong ba dang / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag
11b5(rgyud 'bum): bopo dran par byas te/ ci nas bdag cag gi g.yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad 'khrul nas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam
11b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'di dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rlung nag po chen pos kun khyab par bya'o snyam na'ang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed mi nus
11b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / than gA'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na mang du lta ci smos/ de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te/ yid mi bde zhing yid la gcags nas ngu zhing sang chen pos
12a1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor la bos te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang bar byas so// sdug pa'i bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur shog cig/ nga ni bdag yul rang
12a2(rgyud 'bum): gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams/ / shAkya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g.yon can ngag 'jam la// khong nas rang bzhin dug sdong 'dra bar 'dir skyes so// de nas sgra des bdud kyi g.yog mo dang / bdud kyi bu
12a3(rgyud 'bum): mo de dag thams cad dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas/ bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / 'khor de'i nang
12a4(rgyud 'bum): nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ / ci slad thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes// sreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas khyod ma
12a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phos/ / 'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma mchis na// khyod ni rmongs par gyur tam ci slang gzhan du dgongs// bdud kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i bu pho dmangs phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong
12a6(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ / ci phyir 'din khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra med smras// stobs cig ldan pa g.yon can de yis thams cad rnam pa du mar bslus// bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar ba dang bcas
12a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi me yis bsregs/ / 'jig rten 'di ni skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags pa// mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dngags mang po byed brtson 'thun par myur bar yang // chos kyi kyob bang
12b1(rgyud 'bum): gis drangs te shAkya'i bu 'di'i sbubs der song / / lus mdzes g.yon can blo gros ldan 'ding yi dgrar ni rab tu gnang // rab tu sdug pa'i g.yog mo de dag snying rje med pas bor te// ngal dpa
12b2(rgyud 'bum): btsugs nas ni de ring dge sbyong de yi skyabs su dong / / gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs chen 'di dang thal bar ma byas na// g.yo dang sgyu yis srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stongs par byed/
12b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar bgyi'o// bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs kyi yul gyi mthu dang / rnam par
12b4(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te/ shAkya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid nus pa lta na ni legs/ de ltar ma nus na ni de'i skyabs su mchi'o// yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ gang bdag cag
12b5(rgyud 'bum): sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba/ sngar shAkya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na/ da g.yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos/ bdud sdig can gyis
12b6(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag deng la/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di dag gsod nus na slar shog cig/ ci ste ma nus na yang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrungs kyis slar shog cig/ bdud rtsi
12b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor nga khrigs phrag bcu gnyis po de dag de nas 'phags te/ de nas steng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bkang nas/ de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po bstan te/ gang gling
13a1(rgyud 'bum): bani pa'i nam mtha' thams cad dz+nyAn nag pa can pa dang / rlung nag pa chen po dang / skar mangs bkang nas/ ra'i rgyal po ri rab la'ang lag gis brdabs /
13a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas nas/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin to// de dag gis klu dang / klu chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dag gis sa chen po
13a3(rgyud 'bum): brag dang ring bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang g.yos par rig/ mtsho dang / mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / chu bran dang / 'bad chu chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen
13a4(rgyud 'bum): po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do// bdud kyi 'khor de dag ni ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas/ dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char mngon par sprul te/ nam mkha'
13a5(rgyud 'bum): las kun tu 'bebs so/ / ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / rdo ba dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / ste'u kha ma dang / lugs mnga' dang / spu gri dang / spu gri lta bu dang / dgra
13a6(rgyud 'bum): sta dang / ste'u so dang / kha rang rong can dang / kha shin tu rang ro can sra ba/ drag pa/ rtsub pa/ rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te kun tu phab bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor
13a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gang rdo dang mtshon cha de dag thams cad lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mnang
13b1(rgyud 'bum): ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ yul aM g+ha maM g+ha d+har skar mnga' ltung ba ni spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ sgra de dag ni rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs
13b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i
13b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang / bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar byin gyis brlabs so// rdul dang mun
13b4(rgyud 'bum): nag dang / rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o// gling bzhi pa 'di na rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / sa dang / brag dang / ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad rin
13b5(rgyud 'bum): po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so/ / bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor ltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re las kyang 'di
13b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha dang / ku dpa / gnod sbyin dang /
13b7(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang
14a1(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang /
14a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa sa dang nam mkha' la 'khor ba brgya stong mang pos ni me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so// sems can
14a3(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni dran pa rnyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa dran nas/ sangs rgyas
14a4(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas te/ ngan song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skyes so// bdud kyi sde de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po
14a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta bu mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
14a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// ye shes rgya mchog ser gyi lhun po 'dra// grags pa 'jig rten gsum na lam me ba// mgon
14a7(rgyud 'bum): po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi/ / rab tu lam stor rnam par mi gzums la// khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma'i nyi ma 'dra// gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig/ ded dpon khyod la skyabs su rab tu
14b1(rgyud 'bum): mchi/ / shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor pa'i mdzod// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs// thugs rje'i bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung // don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs
14b2(rgyud 'bum): su mchi/ / 'khor ba dgon pa las kyang khyod thar mdzod// tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston// byams la gnas shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen// thugs rje'i gnas pa'i skyabs su rab tu mchi//
14b3(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yis// srid pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags// mi shes nad sel 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon// sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi// chu bo bzhi dbus zam par
14b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa khyod/ / nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba// yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po// thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do// blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol//
14b5(rgyud 'bum): khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod bsams pa// mgon po dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol// khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso// bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te/
14b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer// bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi// ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin spyod par// bdag
14b7(rgyud 'bum): cag rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston/ / gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dang // ldan na byang chub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor ba// phyogs kun tu
15a1(rgyud 'bum): yang de dag gdugs gyur te/ / dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni// rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang / bdud kyi bu
15a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang / me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus pang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya
15a3(rgyud 'bum): stong gi bye ma las 'das pa'i me tog gi gdugs kun tu 'dug par gyur te/ me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad kyi dbu'i
15a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug go/ / bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang so so nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med
15a5(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang 'chang ba 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa'i dbu'i
15a6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa/ rtags mtshungs pa// gzugs
15a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng ge'i khri tha dad cing / 'khor tha dad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa nyi tshe tha dad par nathong ste/
15b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni mthos so// bdud kyi 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas// mchog tu
15b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang mos pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabra la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu
15b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir log nas/ bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud sdig can la rgya cher bzlas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhig ma nus na/ gsad par lta ci smos
15b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i steng du nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do/ / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te/ des 'di skad
15b5(rgyud 'bum): ces smras so/ / shAkya'i bu 'di ji srid brlag par ma byas pa// de srid bar du nga yi dpal song slar mi 'ong // shAkya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring bsad snyam ste// bdag cag gzhan la yid
15b6(rgyud 'bum): mi rtog cing mi smra 'dug/ de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ bdud sra bkong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//
15b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu bo tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'di lta bu'i
16a1(rgyud 'bum): theg pa dang / ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / snying rje dang / thabs dang / spobs pa 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa
16a2(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na/ skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi mchi zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
16a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'di la skyes bu gang zag la la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
16a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhin bzang dag 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin cing / chos gang yang mi 'dzin/ mi gtong / khas mi len/
16a5(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas/ nye bar mi len/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi gtong / mi 'dzin/ khas mi len/ nye bar mi len
16a6(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du spyod pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de sems can du
16a7(rgyud 'bum): smra ba ma yin/ srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gso bar smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/ sems can gyi khams la yid kyis mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o//
16b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag
16b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de khams gsum dang / dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung ba
16b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / skye ba thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa'i gnas kyi lus thams cad la
16b4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzang dag chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa yin te/ sba/
16b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ yi ge med pa/ smon pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ chags pa med pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ bstan du med pa
16b6(rgyud 'bum): dben pa/ bdag med pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ skad cig pa/ nye bar zhi ba/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gnas med pa/ yul med pa/ dbang po med pa/ phyogs
16b7(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ bsam du med pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ ser sna med pa/ spros pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ cha shas med pa/ ci'ang med pa/ byed pa po med pa
17a1(rgyud 'bum): tshor ba po med pa/ rten med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ so sor snang ba med pa/ skad cig pa ma yin pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag thams cad
17a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid bas dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i
17a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/ / bzhin bzang dag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
17a4(rgyud 'bum): / chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bzhin bzang dag gang la la yul thams cad la chags pa'i lus kyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na/
17a5(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis la chags pa yin te// de gnyis la chags pa'i yid kyi brnag pa ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu bar byed do// de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
17a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams la mtshan nyid du rnam par spyod pas gnas pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa de ni gnyis te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slu ba'o// sbyong ba'i gnas dang / 'bras bu la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so//
17a7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dang / srid pa dang / len pa dang / sems can gyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// bshad pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / gdams pa dang / tshig gi lam dang / sgra dang skad kyi gnas la
17b1(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/ / rtag pa dang chang ba la rnam par lta ba'i shes pa dang / shes bya'i gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang /
17b2(rgyud 'bum): gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// gang pha rol dang / tshu rol dang / rtog pa dang // sel ba la gnas shing
17b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so/ / bzhin bzang dag skyes bu gang zag su la la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba de dus gsum du ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang /
17b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gog par rnam par dpyod pa la gnas shing kun tu rtog ste mchog tu 'dzin na/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'di ni gnyis so// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig me 'dod pa
17b5(rgyud 'bum): lasa'i ngos la nyug pa dang / skom 'dod pa la me dang / zas 'dod pa la rdo dang / me tog 'dod pa la gos dang / spos 'dod pa la mi ro bam pa dang / gos 'dod pa la dur khrod dang / byug pa
17b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa la nam mkha' la nyug pa de bzhin du/ bzhin bzang dag gang spyod pa'i gnas la chags shing rnam par spyod pa'i lus gnyis kyi gnas kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na/ de'i 'bad pa
17b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras su med pa yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su'a'am
18a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba btung de 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang brjod du ma mchis pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
18a2(rgyud 'bum): gang brjod du med par shes pa de nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
18a3(rgyud 'bum): ming thob par 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ gal te mchis shes bgyi na ni rtag par 'gyur/ ci ste ma mchis shes bgyi na ni chad par 'gyur ro//
18a4(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma'i lam ni dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so// gang ma chags/ mi skye/ mi 'gog/ tshad ma mchis grangs ma
18a5(rgyud 'bum): mchis/ dpe ma mchis/ snang ba ma mchis pa de la 'tshal ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' glog gi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
18a6(rgyud 'bum): gang la'ang 'gro ba'ang ma mchis/ 'ong ba'ang ma mchis pa de lta bu shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis
18a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang na thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/ ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis// mngon du bgyi ba'ang ma mchis/ zhi ba'ang
18b1(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis/ rab tu zhi ba'ang ma mchis/ dus gsum yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/ smon lam dang mnyam pa'i rlom sems kyang ma mchis pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs pa
18b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang khams gsum yang ma mchis/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang ma mchis/ rig pa gsum
18b3(rgyud 'bum): yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rtog pa'ang ma mchis/ rnam par rtog pa'ang ma mchis/ bri ba'ang ma mchis/ 'phel ba'im
18b4(rgyud 'bum): mchis la mnyam par yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje blo gros kyis gsol pa/ gang so so'i skye bo'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i
18b5(rgyud 'bum): chos dang / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ mnyam par mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par
18b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ gang bden pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la rnam par dpyod cing mngon par mi zhen pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs
18b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshan nyid
19a1(rgyud 'bum): thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsol pa
19a2(rgyud 'bum): gang khams gsum la rnam par dpyod cing sems nyid sems la 'jug par bgyid de/ sems gnyis ka la sems kyis rnam par dpyad nas mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//
19a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal gyis gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad la mi chags/ rjes su mi chags/ btang snyoms su mi bgyid/ khong khro bar mi bgyid/ 'dod par mi
19a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyid/ mi smod/ mi 'dzin/ mi gtong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i snying pos gsol pa/ gang bsod nams dang sdig pa la mi chags
19a5(rgyud 'bum): shing / zab mo la bzod pa'i tshul la 'jug pas/ ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ gang chos
19a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad chu zla dang mtshungs par rab tu 'tshal cing / chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid sogs pa dang 'bri bar yang mi mthong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i blo/
19a7(rgyud 'bum): gros gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ gang gi sems dang sems las byung ba la mun pa dang / snang ba dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba thams cad mi 'byung ba 'di ni mngon
19b1(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ gang gnas pa la gnas pa na/ khams gsum pa la gnas pa'i tshangs pa la mi dmigs/ mnyam par mi
19b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa/ gang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
19b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis rab tu goms par bgyid cing mi chags mi skyo ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la mi chags
19b4(rgyud 'bum): mi skyo zhing chos zab mo'i tshul yang rab tu 'tshal te/ gang rab tu 'tshal ba'ang mi len/ mi 'dor/ sdud par mi bgyid/ bral bar mi bgyid cing / chos gang la'ang sogs pa 'am/ 'bri ba 'am
19b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba'ang mi skyed la/ dngos po dag la rnam par mi rtog pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni mngon par
19b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/ tshul gcig pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/ 'jam
19b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul 'di ltar zab mo stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshul 'di gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/ kun tu sbyor ba dang rab tu sbyor
20a1(rgyud 'bum): ba cir dgos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lta ba mi zad pa dang bral zhing yang dag pa'i lta bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / drang por sgro 'dogs
20a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral zhing bla ma la ri mo bya bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / bka' blo bde bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /
20a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang bral bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sems can thams cad la khro ba dang snying rje bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sdom pa gsum du sgo 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /
20a4(rgyud 'bum): mi slu ba dge ba'i chos su sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / rnam par ma zhi bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang // dam pa'i chos srung bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi
20a5(rgyud 'bum): gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sems nyam chung ba stobs la rab tu 'god par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /
20a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i skyabs mi 'jigs par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams nan tan la gzud par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / bzod pa dang nges par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med
20a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'dzin pa thams cad la chags pa'i mtshan nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / rdul dang mun pa'i phung po thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sngo ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa
20b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba nyi shu ste/ yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / smra ba dang / brjod pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba
20b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba'o/ / gzhan mu stegs can gyi tshig gi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la
20b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / bsod nams thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / len pa dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la
20b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang / gnas dang / rgyu dang / las dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad shes nas/ thams cad
20b5(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ nam chos zab mo'i tshul 'di rtogs pa de'i tshe/ chos gang
20b6(rgyud 'bum): ston pa dang / gang la ston pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gang dag gis ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa'i chos de gang yang mi mthong ste/ gang rab tu spong ba dang / gang sgom pa dang / gang kun
20b7(rgyud 'bum): shes par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i tshul gyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug ste/ des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
21a1(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu tshul gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa de khyod kyis legs par smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad
21a2(rgyud 'bum): la chags pa med pa'i dngos po yin pas chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / mi 'jig pa'i mtha' can dang / ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mi skye ba'i yang
21a3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i mtha' can dang / nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' can dang / chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i mtha' can dang / sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu yin pa dang / chos
21a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can dang / dus gsum dang / khams gsum dang / phung po thams cad ni ci'ang med pa'i mtha' can dang / 'du byed gsum ni stong pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang /
21a5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phung po dang / rnam par smin pa'i phung po dang / sogs pa dang / bri ba'i phung po ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can du yongs su brjod do// stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang
21a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod du med pa'i don dang / / chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug go// thams cad
21a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ lus rag pa spangs nas yid
21b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi lus rnyed do/ / gzhan yang nyi khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang / ting nge
21b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyi khri bo de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor/
21b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'i dbang gis/ sems can rnams
21b4(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams thams cad sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la mi bgyid pa la gzigasu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
21b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir sngon byung ba 'di gsungs so/ / rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po dpag tu med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i
21b6(rgyud 'bum): dus na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du snang ba 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo drug khri brgyad stong thub ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang
21b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
22a1(rgyud 'bum): byung ste/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gyur pa na/ 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur
22a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang / dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te/ de bzhin gsheg
22a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cing / sil snyan sna tshogs
22a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bdug pa sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su
22a5(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / lha dang klu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis// mngon par rab bstod nyes pa mang sel ba// nor bdun gyis ni 'gro la phan mdzad pa// gang gi blo gros zhi ba dang
22a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan par gsungs/ / 'gro ba'i mun sel zhi ba'i sgron ma mdzad// shi 'pho na 'chi skye ba mya ngan 'joms// 'gro ba ngan 'gro lam las rab bzlog pa// gang gis bdud kyi lam las thar par gsungs//
22a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong zhi spos snang dpal des/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
22b1(rgyud 'bum): zhib pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la snying rje ba dang / ma lta bur sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang
22b2(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad la srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / tha dad du dbyer med cing yongs su rtog pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
22b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' blo gros zhib pa yin no/ / rgyal po chen po gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin no// gsum gang zhe na/
22b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la mi khro zhing klan ka mi tshol ba yin/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyin gnas su 'du shes pa yani/ chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu yongs su rtog ste
22b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing bcos su med pa/ tha dad pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang
22b6(rgyud 'bum): bral bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin no//
22b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang
23a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol
23a2(rgyud 'bum): to/ / mi mnyam yon tan 'dzin par rab rib med mdzad pa// ji ltar bud med las ni ngan song spangs pa yin// skyes pa 'dir 'gyur 'chi 'pho sel ba bka' stsol rig/ rab mchog phan pa
23a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa rab tu yid kyang thul/ / dam pa'i 'gros bzhud bder gshegs rab zhi dga' mdzad pa// bcom ldan ji lta bur na bud med skyes par 'gyur// 'dul mchog gzhan la phan mdzad myur
23a4(rgyud 'bum): du bshad par gsol/ / bdag gi blo gros thibs po 'dir ni bsal du gsol// 'jig rten dag na mi mnyam mnyam pa dge sbyong mchog/ rab grags yon tan mang po dran dang 'dul ba 'dzin// ci nas
23a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid du ni skyes par bdag 'gyur bar/ / rab rib mi mnga' bde 'gro 'chi med lam myur gsungs// rigs kyi bu de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des/ btsun
23a6(rgyud 'bum): mo dam pa lha mdzes la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / che zhe rnam grangs gang gis bud med dag bud med kyi dngos po myur du brjes te/ sngon 'phangs pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par
23a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par bud med du skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do// che zhe de la rnam grangs gang gis bud med
23b1(rgyud 'bum): myur du skyes par 'gyur zhing / sngon 'phangs pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs gang zhe na/ che zhe de la rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzu 'phrul chen mo/
23b2(rgyud 'bum): phan yon chen mo/ mthu chen mo 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi dngos po thams rung zad par byed cing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gnas ngan len gyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa ma lus par zad par byed do//
23b3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi dngos po ma lus par 'gyur te/ bud med kyi dbang po mi snang zhing skyes pa'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur/ skyes pa gzugs bzang
23b4(rgyud 'bum): po yan lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur/ dran zhing zhib pa la mkhas par 'gyur/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan zhing legs par spyad pa spyod pa
23b5(rgyud 'bum): dang dgra thams cang thul bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe 'di dang tshe rabs phyi ma la/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de
23b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag ma gtogs par/ de dag gi bud med kyi dngos po'i lhag ma lus pade
23b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid la yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len gyi rnam par smin pa tshe gzhan la bud med kyi dngos po grub par byed pa'i sa bon sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa myong
24a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i sa bon gyi rgyu 'thun pa ri rab tsam yang sa lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal
24a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
24a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/ / gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes so// mngon par bstod do// bsngags so// rab tu bsngags so// da ltar phyogs bcu nad
24a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
24a5(rgyud 'bum): dag na sems can rnams kyis nyes par byas pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad de/ rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad do//
24a6(rgyud 'bum): gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang / sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par
24a7(rgyud 'bum): smin pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad par 'gyur te/ rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad par 'gyur ro// da ltar rin po che tog gi/
24b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di 'chad de/ phyogs bcu nang ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad pa rnams la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo // bsngags so// rab tu bsngags so// che zhe rgyal po rgyal
24b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba skye bo'i nang na mthu dang dbang thob pa gang la las rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i snyan pa dang /
24b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa phyogs pa cur rgya cher grags par 'gyur te/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi bar du sgra dang snyan pa chen pos gang bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
24b4(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas so//
24b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i yul thams cad du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i nyes pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
24b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / seng ge dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / spyang ki ma rungs pa thams cad kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/ dug dang / kha dang / tsha ba dang / snum med pa dang / ro med pa dang / rtsub pa'i
24b7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal ba reg na mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog thams cad kyang rab tu skyes shing rnam
25a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'phel te/ snum pa dang ro zhim par 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs
25a2(rgyud 'bum): ba ma rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs nas/ rgyal po rgyal rig spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thub par 'gyur ro// de ste rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du zhugs pa
25a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ka rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs na/ / de gnyis gcig la gcig dga' zhing 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i yon
25a4(rgyud 'bum): tan dang phan yon mang po grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal la lar mi 'am/ rkang bzhi pa dag na 'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'am/ gnod pa zhig byung na/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam
25a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i yo byad rgya cher sbyar te bzhag la/ shin tu khrus byas shing lus rab tu byugs te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas tshangs par spyad de/ seng ge'i khri me tig sna tshogs kyis gtor ba/ dri sna tshogs kyis bdug
25a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba la 'dug pa der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs pa ma bklags na/ der nad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// der 'jig shing spu zing /
25a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes byed pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la bu 'dod pa des khrus byas te gos gsar pa bgos la tshangs par spyad de/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang
25b1(rgyud 'bum): spos dang / byug pas glegs bam de la mchod la/ bdag nyid kyang stan me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor ba/ dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba la 'dug nas/ rin po che tog gi
25b2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di bklags na des bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / de bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de nyid de'i bud med du
25b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'i tha ma yin no/ / che zho rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di las za na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gang la la'i rna lam du grags na/ tha na ri dgas dang bya'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
25b4(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong sa la reg par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs
25b5(rgyud 'bum): pa shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu dag gi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
25b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams shin tu skrag pa skyes par
25b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad kyang snang bar rgya cher khyab par gyur te/ lag mthil lta bur mnyam par 'dug cing / de'i tshe na ri dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang /
26a1(rgyud 'bum): ri rab dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po'ang mi snang bar gyur to// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin de dag kyang sa g.yos pa dang snang ba des skrag pa skyes par gyur te
26a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / de dag thams cad kyis mda' rgyang gang tsam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas
26a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lta'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi
26a4(rgyud 'bum): spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong sa la reg pa na'ang 'di bzhin du de'i tshe sa g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par 'dug/ de bzhin
26a5(rgyud 'bum): du snang ba dang sa g.yo bas skrag pa skyes te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad phyogs bzhir lta zhing mda' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de mthong nas thal mo sbyar te/ rigs
26a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu dag de'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di gsungs so/ / oM 'di lta ste/ dza lo ke/ dza lo ka/ mu ke/ dza li dza la/ dza li ni/ dza la pra de/
26a7(rgyud 'bum): dza hi li/ ba ra bu ru Sha lak+Sha Na/ sa mA ru h+ya/ a ma me/ a ma me/ wa ma me/ wa ma me/ a ha me/ a ha me/ dza ha me/ dza ha me/ dza ha me kha/ wa ra me/ wa ra me/ ba ba d+he/ ba ba d+he/ baM ga d+ha/
26b1(rgyud 'bum): baM ga d+he/ ban+du d+he/ ba ra ta la rA/ dza la me Sha/ wa ra la/ a la dza hi khi/ dzan+d+ha le/ dzan+tu mu khe/ ba ha ra ba ha ra/ sid+d+ha pra p+te/ dan+ti lA/ dan+ti lA/ sU R+sha bi ha ga/ tsan+d+ra bi ha ga/ tsuk+Shur dz+yo ti sa bi ca ga/
26b2(rgyud 'bum): tsA bak+Sha ya/ sti tA su ra bi ha ga/ dza kha ga dza kha ga/ su ra kha ga/ bi ha ma/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i la/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/
26b3(rgyud 'bum): a mr-i kha/ bya bats+tshed kam/ du ne du ne/ ut+pA da bya la ts+tshe da dz+nyA na krita/ a nut+pA pA da/ kha ga nen+d+ra ka/ ung+ku le/ pang+ku le/ bi wa ku le/ ku la ha/ in+d+ri ba ri bI ba ha/ bya bats+tshed/ gar b+hU/ ba p+pa tI/
26b4(rgyud 'bum): ba pra ti/ a mo ha/ daR+sha ne/ pa ri kIr+ha b+hUSh+ya/ kha saM ma kri ta dz+yo ti/ kha gardza hi/ dza hai/ dz+yo ti/ niSh+ma b+hI ra sa/ b+hI ra sa/ b+hI ra sa/ b+hI ra dza/ mA tri grA ma/ b+hA ba kri ga/ mat+sa kri ba/ he li/ hi tsi le
26b5(rgyud 'bum): A u na pra te/ sa ma yi naSh+pe/ da ma dA na/ d+h+ye na/ a pa rA mr-i She/ pha la kuN+Da la khe tsa ni brta/ iSh+Ta b+hA ba karma Sha ya/ pra dur b+hA ba/ pu ru Sha tAM/ ma sa ma sa ma se ma sa/ bi d+hi dzA ta thA ga ta sA hA/
26b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang sa chen po ga yos so// bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu
26b7(rgyud 'bum): mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te/ de pho mtshan skyes so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' snying dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
27a1(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dag gi bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur to// pho mtshan
27a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ thams cad kyang ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma
27a3(rgyud 'bum): lus par byang nas/ bud med de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing skad chen por 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa
27a4(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngo mtshar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po gang gis bdag cag da ltar bud med kyi dngos po
27a5(rgyud 'bum): mi gda' bar gyur cing / rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i skyes bu'i dngos por gyur pa'i sngon byung ba 'di rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang / cho 'phrul dang / skyob pas bdag cag bla na ma
27a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'di lha dang mi dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams dbang du 'gyur bar bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
27a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngon byung ba 'di bshad pa ni/ bzhin bzang dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i thad nas rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lnga
27b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas pas/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos te/ thos ma thag tu btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes dang bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te
27b2(rgyud 'bum): pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas/ mi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i
27b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po skyes te/ bud med de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang ngo // gang gi tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha
27b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa phor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong des bu thu bo gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang sgyur bas dbang sgyur te/ bu stong du gcig gis ma
27b5(rgyud 'bum): tshang ba dang / skyes bu chen po lha mdzes dang bcas/ lha mdzes kyang skyes bu chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas/ gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri nyis stong dang bcas te khyim nas byung nas// de bzhin
27b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'od zhi smos snang dpal de'i thad du skra dang kha spu bregs/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim du med par rab tu byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kha ton la dga' zhing
27b7(rgyud 'bum): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson par gyur to/ / de nas de na srog chags bye ba mang po 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rab tu byung snyam nas/ de dag phan tshun 'di skad smra'o//
28a1(rgyud 'bum): dge sbyong 'di ni bdud kyi las la brtson pa ste/ g.yon can sgyu ma bdud kyi las dang ldan pas chos 'di ston cing / la la ni pho mtshan med par byas// la la ni mo mtshan med par byas//
28a2(rgyud 'bum): la la ni skra dang kha spu bregs/ la la ni gos tshon can bskon/ la la ni gos dkar po bskon/ la la ni lhar skye bar chos ston/ la la ni mir skye bar/ la la ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar/ la la ni
28a3(rgyud 'bum): yi dag su skye bar/ la la ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar/ la la ni shi 'pho dang skye ba med par bya bar chos ston te/ bdud kyi las kyi lam la brtson zhing bud med bsgyur ba'i sgyu dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong 'od zhi
28a4(rgyud 'bum): spos snang dpal de dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu slu ba yin gyis/ bdag rug 'di nas dong ste de'i gzugs dang rtags 'dzin pa'ang mi mthong ba dang / de'i tshig kyang cung zad kyang mi thos par 'dod
28a5(rgyud 'bum): ngo / / de nas de nyid na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba zhig yod pa des tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo'i chung ma dang / g.yog mo dang / bu mo gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / dge sbyong ma rungs
28a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dis mo mtshan med par byas te/ skyes pa'i dbang por sprul nas/ thams cad kyi mgo bregs te/ gos tshon can bskon nas/ kho bo gcig pu mya ngan gyis non te/ tha na bdag cag thams cad 'dus la gang
28a7(rgyud 'bum): du dge sbyong ma rungs pa/ dge sbyong sgyu ma bdud kyi zhags pa la brtson pa 'di'i sgra dang skad kyang mi thos na/ mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i ri khrod nyam nga bar 'dong gis/ tshur shog ces byas pa dang / de dag
28b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dga' ste de bzhin no zhes zer ro/ / de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul dang the tsom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po lhan cig tu de nas dong ste/ yul mtha' 'khob ri khrod nyam nga
28b2(rgyud 'bum): bar drang srong gi cha byad kyis spyad pa spyod cing / sems can de dag la 'di skad ces chos ston to// 'khor ba las thar pa'ang med/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin
28b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang med na/ der chad par smra ba'i dge sbyong bdud kyi las la brtson pa zhig byung gis/ gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang / gang dag gus par smra ba dang / gang dag de'i chos nyan pa de dag sems g.yengs
28b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ de dag mgo bregs/ khyim nas byung / gos tshon can bskon/ dur khrod du spung pa spyod du bcug/ slong mo pa'i spyod pa la btsud/ zan za gcig par byed/ lta ba mi bzad pa'i yid dang ldan pa
28b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rtag tu yid 'byung bar byed/ dben par gnas pa la dga' ba dang / gnas khang du bcug/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba glu gar dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab
28b6(rgyud 'bum): lbub dang / 'khrig pa'i chos dang / chang dang / ra ro bar 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs shing smra ba nyung bar byed/ de lta bur dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis chad par smra ba bdud kyi las la brtson pa de
28b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa zhig byung ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i byed pa ni sngon ma thos ma mthong ba yin pa kho bos rtogs so// zhes de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang
29a1(rgyud 'bum): po de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du bcug go/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gis thos pa/ gshed kyi ri khrod na kha cig bdag nyid kyang lam
29a2(rgyud 'bum): ngan par zhugs shing gzhan yang lta ba mi bzad pa 'dzin du bcug ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mi snyan pa sgrog go zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis sems can 'di dag sdig pa'i lta
29a3(rgyud 'bum): bar song ba las yongs su thar par ma byas shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la ma bkod na/ bdag dge sbyong du gyur pa don med do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ldongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten du bdag ji ltar bla na med pa
29a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ ji ltar rab tu nyam thag par gyur pa bdud bzhi'i zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams yongs su 'grol bar nus snyam
29a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de nas dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong brtul ba che zhing brtan pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la zhus te/ srog chags brgya stong du mas bskor cing
29a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du bdar nas/ mtha' 'khob kyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ri dang / ri brag nyam nga ba'i gnas de dang de dag na spyad pa spyod cing / de dang de dag tu sems can de dag la ci nas sems
29a7(rgyud 'bum): can de dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la btsud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/ gzhan la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la smon
29b1(rgyud 'bum): la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la/ la la ni 'bras bu la bkod/ la la ni rab tu phyung / la la ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la/ la la ni za gcig pa la/ la la ni skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la/ bkod pa
29b2(rgyud 'bum): de lta bur chos ston to/ / bud med dag ni rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad de/ bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur nas skyes pa la bkod do// srog chags mang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la
