29b3(rgyud 'bum): the tsom du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las bzlog ste/ nyes pa 'chags su bcug nas bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub la bkod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong zhi spos snang
29b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal de nyid la phul nas rab tu phyung ngo / / shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul ni ma gtogs te/ des 'di ltar ut+pa la'i gdong 'dis bdag gi 'khor rnams bslus te khrid kyis/ bdag gis kyang 'di bla na med pa
29b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud byas te/ 'di ltar mngal na 'dug pa tshun chad 'di la rnam par gtse'o// de nas phyis btsas nas kyang
29b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu rtsed mo byed pa dang / bzo'i las kyi mtha' dang / klog cing 'dug pa dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar
29b7(rgyud 'bum): du skrag par bya'o/ / bgegs bya'o// byang chub thob nas kyang bstan pa gzhig par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gis/ shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul gyis smon
30a1(rgyud 'bum): lam de ltar brtul te 'atab pa la/ mthu chen po dang 'bad pa drag pos dad par byas te/ sdig pa'i lta ba'i thibs po de las bzlog nas nyes pa 'chags su bcug ste/ bla na med pa
30a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug go/ / de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul rab tu dul zhing dad pa skyes nas/ 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod gang gi tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag
30a3(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe byang chub thob nas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol zhes smon lam btab bo// bzhin
30a4(rgyud 'bum): bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang rim gro rnam pa du ma byas nas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas te/
30a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par byung nas rab tu byung zhing / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste theg pa gsum la bkod/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni 'bras bu la bkod/
30a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa ni skyes pa thob par byas pa'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyed the tsom mam/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar
30a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur te/ ngas de lta bu'i skyes bu'i mthu byas so// bzhin
30b1(rgyud 'bum): bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba gang gis dge sbyong thob par gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyed the tsom mam/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/
30b2(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na the tsom du gyur pa'i srog chags
30b3(rgyud 'bum): bye ba mang po dang bcas/ sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa'i bar du zer ba shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du khyed the tsom mam/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o//
30b4(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang de'i tshe ngas de'i 'khor rab tu phyung bas de'i phyir nga la sems rab tu khro ba bskyed nas/ phyis smon lam
30b5(rgyud 'bum): btab ste/ khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig ces byas so//
30b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de la ma dad cing ma bsdams pa'i tshig smras te/ sdig pa'i lta bar song ba bzung nas/ ngas khyed sdig pa'i lta
30b7(rgyud 'bum): bar song ba de las kun thar par byas te rab tu phyung bas/ de tshun chad khyed kyis sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de dag la mchod pa dang rim gro byas/ de dag las chos mnyan te/
31a1(rgyud 'bum): smon lam btab nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug sbyang ngo // khyed lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyad ba'i las des sngon bskal pa du mar ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong ngo //
31a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis da ltar bdud sdig can gyi gnas su skyes so// rin po che tog gi gzungs sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa na/ bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam
31a3(rgyud 'bum): de dag bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i dngos por gyur te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can bye ba
31a4(rgyud 'bum): khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
31a5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha dang mi'i bu mo grangs
31a6(rgyud 'bum): med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po rnyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ sngon byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
31a7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rgya cher snang bas khyab par
31b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yod pa de dag na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud bye ba phrag brgya gang dag bdud byed pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dogs pa skyes te/ snang ba
31b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di gang nas byung zhes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la lta zhing / bdud sdig can zhes bya ba gang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa de bdag cag pas stobs che zhing dbang che la
31b3(rgyud 'bum): mthu chen po 'di de'i mthu 'am snyam nas/ de nas bdud de dag gis bltas na/ bdud sdig can de mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug cing yid rab tu mi dga' ba de mthong ngo // de nas bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de
31b4(rgyud 'bum): dag gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ga la ba dang / bdud sdig can gyi khang pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ci'i phyir thams
31b5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/ khyod mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug/ de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyag gis/ bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag la rgyas par
31b6(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ shAkya'i rigs las shin tu g.yo dang sgyur ldan pa'i dge sbyong zhig 'dir skyes te/ de skyes ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang
31b7(rgyud 'bum): bar byas/ rab tu g.yos par byas/ 'khrug par byas te spangs par byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa 'di na mkhas pa gang su tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin
32a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po nas/ gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
32a2(rgyud 'bum): bar du mkhas pa su'ang rung / de nas thams cad de la mchod pa'i phyir dong ngo // lo drug gi bar du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'dug ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs
32a3(rgyud 'bum): pas kho bos kyang rang gi stobs kun bstan par 'dod na/ sde dang g.yog bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang / de'i drung du dong ste kun tu bskor nas bdud kyi stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /
32a4(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa thams cad bstan kyang de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang sngangs shing 'jig par bya ma nus na/ stan de las bskyod pa lta ci smos/ bgegs gzhan bya bar ga la nus te/
32a5(rgyud 'bum): mdangs sum des de lta bu'i sgra shin tu bstan cing sa g.yo bar byas pas/ kho bo sde dang bcas te pham nas shing bcad pa bzhin du sa'i steng du lhung ngo // de der 'dug ste de 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma
32a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs nas/ 'di ltar bdud kyi yul thams cad zil gyis mnan te rigs pa bsgrubs nas stan de las langs te/ sems can rnams la rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems
32a7(rgyud 'bum): can su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyu mas 'dun par byas te/ de dag gi sems dang / 'gro ba drug tu skye ba dang / 'gro ba'ang kho bos ma shes so// gang dag de la skyabs su dong ba de dag
32b1(rgyud 'bum): gi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam yang sngangs pa dang 'khrug par kho bos byed mi nus na/ de las slu ba 'am bskyod par lta ga la nus/ deng kho bo'i g.yog mo lnga brgya dang / bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong
32b2(rgyud 'bum): go'u ta ma mdangs de la skyabs su dong nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do// kho bos de dag dang dpral ma nus so// de'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ dbang phyug dang ldan pa
32b3(rgyud 'bum): khyed kho bo'i grogs gyis shig/ shAkya'i bu mdangs de srog dang phral lo// de la sems can gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams rud kyang rnam par gzhig par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo sgyu can nag po'i phyogs
32b4(rgyud 'bum): pham par byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la/ de phyin chad bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de nas bdud me 'od ces bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing
32b5(rgyud 'bum): chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang / de nas bdud me 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong / sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa thos so// thos nas de spu zing zhes byed cing sngangs par gyur te/
32b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas des bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// ma lus zhing na 'di ni gzugs bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes pas ring nas gnas gtsang ste/ nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun ring lon//
32b7(rgyud 'bum): srid pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las thar// khyod kyang mi rigs khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro// gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum na skyabs// 'di la zhe sdang cung zad sus bskyed pa// de ni rmongs shing
33a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba nyams par 'gyur/ / de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// de ni 'phrul chen bsod nams rab kyi mtshan/
33a2(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu thar// sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa// bdud brgya kun gyis gtse bar bya mi nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ nga yi skye bo dag la dbang byas te//
33a3(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro// de yis ring por mi thogs yul stongs byed// yu bu cag kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras
33a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / khyod ni rab tu 'byor par 'gyur ba'i tshe// de nas khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan// de na rab tu dpung nyams chad na// de ring ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen la sngo// bdud ral gri zla
33a5(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / de ni su la'ang yid kyis khro ba med// mi gnas de ni bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang // khams gsum dag las thar cing 'gro bar rgyu// de la gzhan
33a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis gsad par mi nus so/ / sdig can gyis smras pa// 'dod khams 'di na sems can gang 'khod pa// 'dod la chags shing nga rgyal dregs pas myos// de dag gang phyir rtag 'brang
33a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag brnyan te/ / de dag tshogs pas ci phyir de mi song // de nas bdung sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar// dngos po kun shes srid pa rnam
33b1(rgyud 'bum): bar btul/ / srid par ma chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur// sdig can gyis smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na de yang yod// bza' btung zhim po
33b2(rgyud 'bum): sman dang gos bsnyen cing / / tshor ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod// ci'i phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus// bdud sred spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can lto 'phye chen po
33b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis ni/ / rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul ni ci yod pa// don grub 'phrul la cha shas mi reg na// de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ ngas ni de la zan bcad byas//
33b4(rgyud 'bum): de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod// bdud shes mig ces bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyis gang tshe de la bgegs byas
33b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni khros pas cung zad 'tshig pa'am/ / khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam// de las khyod kyi tshig ngan mngon thos sam// sdig can gyis smras pa// de ni so sor brtags pas rtag
33b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bzod/ / 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral// de ni sems can kun la byams sems ldan// 'dre bar spyod pa la yang de rtag go// bdud thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// kun
33b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa/ / de la bdag cag nan tan bgegs bya mod// des ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs// de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/
34a1(rgyud 'bum): stobs thob khyed cag nga yi grogs yin te// khyed rnams bag yod byos la de re chos// thams cad phyogs su ri yi 'phreng ba dang // sa 'di ma lus byin gyis chur brlab bo// mkha'
34a2(rgyud 'bum): las mi bzang stug pa'i brag char dang / / lcags kyi bye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab// lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' bo che// de lus phye mar brlag cing dbab par bya// kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang // mdung
34a3(rgyud 'bum): thung ral gri thob rnams phab la/ / 'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gis// shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya// de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so// de nas bdud de dag
34a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ / de bzhin 'dong bar bgyi'o// rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos la/ sde dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dong ngo // bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang stobs kyi yul de dag
34a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bstan par ni bya na/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de rtsal ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te/ khyed rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud bye ba rang gi gnas su dong nas/ go bgos te bdud bye ba re re zhing yang
34a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yog stong stong ya lad rnam pa mang po gyon pa/ lag cha sna tshogs pa/ go rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dang chas te/ de'i nub mo 'das nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyin te/ yul aM g+ha maM g+ha d+ya'i drang thad kyi nam
34a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la 'khod nas/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang
34b1(rgyud 'bum): grul du ma gang dag bcom ldan 'das la sems ma dad cing gus par bya bar yid la byed pa med par 'gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom
34b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das dgrongs su bcug nas/ de dag kyang lag cha dang / go cha sna tshogs chas te de nyid na 'khod do// bdud sdig cani dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang
34b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi pha rol tu son pa/ g.yog lnga brgya yod pa/ gangs kyi ri'i ngos la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces
34b4(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / go'u ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog/ mkhas shing mngon par shes pa dag la gnas// aM g+ha maM g+ha d+ha na de 'dug de ring ni// rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod// brtan por
34b5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis/ / de dang khyod du lhan cig smra bar byos// der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang // gdon mi za ba rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can
34b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba/ ngas deng mi mtshungs blo bsam rtsi 'dra nga las khyed nyon cig/ bdud
34b7(rgyud 'bum): yul bdud kyi dregs chen 'joms pa'i rgyu de mi ston par/ / rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra// de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la bu la ma byams bzhin// de yi slob ma rgyags spangs
35a1(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za bar snga dro ni/ / grong khyer dag tu g.yeng ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na/ de dag glu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzung // de thos shAkya'i khyu mchog ci nas yid
35a2(rgyud 'bum): spro med par bya/ / bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ glang chen rnga mo seng ge ma he stag gtum sgra drag dbyar dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong de'i phyi rol myur sprul te// bdag cag lag cha mtshon
35a3(rgyud 'bum): thogs gdug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum des mthong na/ / bslad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nas tha dad phyogs su 'gro// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ lam srang bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong mangs
35a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khod/ / sna tshogs mtshon rnon mnga' chen mda' zhags bla dgas ral gri thogs// nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra drag sbyin las lce yang 'babs// de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du
35a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs 'gyur/ / bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang / rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen
35a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ bdud kyi sgra'ang mi 'byin/ phyogs bzhin me dang ri'ang med/ sprin nag po'ang med/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang
35a7(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis klu gang yang tha na char thigs pa gcig tsam yang mi 'bebs so/ / yang de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyor chen por
35b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dngal
35b2(rgyud 'bum): bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i cha byad 'dra ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing shin tu rgyug ste/ de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas/ srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i
35b3(rgyud 'bum): bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig/ bdud gzhon nu de dag thams
35b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis gcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dpyad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// skye mched dag gis shin tu chog/ skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus// skye mched dag ni gsod
35b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / skye mched dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // phung po byas pas shin tu chog/ phung po byas pas bdag cag bslus// phung po byas pas gsod pa ste// phung po byas pas ngas mthar dbyung // 'di lta ste/
35b6(rgyud 'bum): ba ha ra/ ba ha ra/ b+ha ra bA ha/ mi r-i dI ba ha/ sa t+ya ba ha/ A ma pa ha swA hA/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras
35b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// mgon po bdag cag de ring bzod par gsol// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog
36a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod de/ / phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshad// bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud bzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis/ srang gi dbus der tshe dang
36a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas mo'u 'gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
36a3(rgyud 'bum): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas/ glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// khams nyid dag gis shin tu chog/ khams nyid dag gis bdag
36a4(rgyud 'bum): cag bslus/ / khams 'di dag ni gsod pa ste// khams nyid dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ tshor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// tshor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/
36a5(rgyud 'bum): tshor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/ sems pa dag gis bdag cag bslus// sems pa dag ni gsod pa ste// sems pa dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'du
36a6(rgyud 'bum): shes byas pas shin tu chog/ 'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus// 'du shes byas pas gsong ba ste// 'du shes byas pas mthar dbyung ngo // 'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ 'khor ba
36a7(rgyud 'bum): dag gis bdag cag bsdus/ / 'khor ba dag gis gsod pa ste// 'khor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'di lta ste/ a ma ba a ma ba/ A ra dza/ ra na dza ha/ shaM mya thA/ shaM mya thA/ ga ga na ba
36b1(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu
36b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phrul ldan sbas pa 'phags la ma thub dbang sras// 'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam lta chos kyi sgron// sdig spangs bdag cag ri mo gus pa
36b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ / sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun dang skyabs song // bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag
36b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /
36b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas/ glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// reg pa byas pas shin tu chog/ reg pa byas pas bdag cag bslus// reg pa byas pas gsod pa
36b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ reg bya bdag gis mthar du dbyung ngo // bdag po dag gis shin tu chog/ bdag po dag gis bdag cag bsdus// bdag po dag ni gsod pa ste// bdag po bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo //
36b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste// 'khor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // srid pa kun gyis shin tu chog/ srid
37a1(rgyud 'bum): pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus/ / srid pa kun ni gsod pa ste// srid pa kun ni ngas mthar dbyung // 'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tu chog/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas bdag
37a2(rgyud 'bum): cag bslus/ / 'dod pa'i dga' bas gsod pa ste// 'dod pa'i dga' ba ngas mthar dbyung // grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi
37a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pas myos/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mkhas sgra yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas dri yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas ro yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas reg gi dregs pas myos//
37a4(rgyud 'bum): grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas chos kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas phung po'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas khams kyi
37a5(rgyud 'bum): dregs pas myos/ / mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pas myos// mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos// grogs ngag tshe
37a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di myur 'gro ste/ / ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas kun gyi dregs pas myos// 'di lta ste/ kharga ba/ kha rga ba/ kharga ba/ mud dzI ni/ a barba/
37a7(rgyud 'bum): bi brta/ kha ba te/ pra mAH/ dz+yo tir brta swA hA/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig
37b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// khams rnams sgyu ma'i smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // tshor ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas
37b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / / zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis legs par bstan// mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan
37b3(rgyud 'bum): pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan po'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
37b4(rgyud 'bum): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i bu'i cha byad 'chang ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gi lag pa
37b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis
37b6(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig/ de dag gis gcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so//
37b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin// 'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med// smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la zer zug med// chos kun myur du 'jigs par blo dang
38a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas shes/ / sdug sngal chos gzir byams pa thams cad gar chags pa// reg kun sdug bsngal khur yin tshor ba dag kyang med// ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam sgom bstan
38a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du shes spangs pa dge/ bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/ srog dang gso ba
38a3(rgyud 'bum): gang zag dang ni byed pa med/ / bdud kyi g.yo dag thong la sems ni byang chub sngos// nam mkha' glog bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung // reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de
38a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin/ / byis pa'i sde rnams bsdus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug/ phung po thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med// yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing
38a5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' rnams kun dang bral/ / byang chub lam spyod des ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyes// rmongs byed chos 'di nyid ni chos su skyob pas gsungs// 'di lta ste/ su mun+de/ suny+dzin/ si li si li
38a6(rgyud 'bum): si li a ba ha si li/ ta pa tA si li/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ si li swA hA/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang
38a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos// gti mug mi shes rmongs pas sdig las ci
38b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa/ / rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag mngon sum deng bshags nas// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/
38b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/
38b3(rgyud 'bum): srangs de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ gang po ni lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ rab 'byor ni shar phyogs su
38b4(rgyud 'bum): bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad phyed phyed tsam na 'khod do/ / nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na/ khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad+ma chu ba ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ 'dab ma
38b5(rgyud 'bum): ni bai DUR+Ya sngon po/ ze ba ni dpal gyi snying po/ snying po ni mu tig/ dri ni lha'i spos pas lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de las snang ba byung ngo // snang
38b6(rgyud 'bum): bdes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar te/ srang de na pad+ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga
38b7(rgyud 'bum): par snang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad brgya par snang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang ngo // pad+ma de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang
39a1(rgyud 'bum): don dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems can gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir gang
39a2(rgyud 'bum): zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa/ / gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhin par bcas pa bcom// sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nyag gcig 'gro ba
39a3(rgyud 'bum): ngag la phan phyir byon par the tsom mang / / mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos don thar 'dod pa// tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas brtul// 'gro ba kun la
39a4(rgyud 'bum): phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsungs pa chen/ / thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa de ring gshegs// dus su gshegs pa ston pa dge slong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang // tshad
39a5(rgyud 'bum): med chos ston rig pa lha dang mir bcas 'gro ba skyo ba/ / 'jig rten don dang phan spong mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron// dam pa gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'di kun ston// sdug bsngal
39a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing / / 'jig rten don srung mi bsnyel blo gros mnga' bas spyad// ma rig pa yis bsgribs pa'i mig can dag la yang // dam pa'i chos kyi mig ni ji bzhin
39a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyin/ / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshigs gyur kyis// don gyi dam pa gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la// stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa//
39b1(rgyud 'bum): smra ba'i seng ge ring po mi thoms 'dir gshegs so// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs na ni// dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing // mngon par shes pa drug
39b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba/ / de ni chos kyi rnga chen rdung du yang dag gshegs// dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa// don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po/
39b3(rgyud 'bum): pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir// drug gi sa bon smra ba'i seng ge 'dis gshegs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung
39b4(rgyud 'bum): ngo / / khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' ba spyod// bag med sems pa sred dang rgyags pas bsgribs// rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos// bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi
39b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / 'dod pa mi rtag chu yi zla ba bzhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra// dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar pa// nams kyang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bag med zhi
39b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir mi 'gyur/ / dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam// rga dang na 'chi 'jig pas kun zin cing // khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs// sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la// rten cig/
39b7(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang bsrungs// 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la// bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar deng // song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon// legs bshad de ni
40a1(rgyud 'bum): khyed kyi don chen te/ / shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i chos ldan mnyam pa don chen no// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma'i 'dab ma las tshogs
40a2(rgyud 'bum): su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag phyung ngo / / mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med// rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par sgoms// ma 'khrul sems dang rnam par thar 'dod pas// zhe sdang rab tu
40a3(rgyud 'bum): spang ba'i blo gyis shig/ rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi// bzod pa mchog la rnam par sgom bgyis// des ni na dang rga las thar pa yi// shin tu rnam thar myur du thob par 'gyur// gang rnams gzugs
40a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam rtog sogs la chags/ / ther thug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por blta// de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyud mi 'chad// de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu 'bab// rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing //
40a5(rgyud 'bum): byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa// de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur// skye dang 'jig 'grol chos 'di thams cad la// nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams
40a6(rgyud 'bum): sgom byed pa/ / de dag 'chi med rga med na ba'ang med// ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med// gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags// lam de mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin// da ltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin
40a7(rgyud 'bum): du/ / bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par bcom par 'gyur// gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spangs phyir// ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa// tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams de dag la ni/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): lam mchog 'di bshad do// bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur pa// chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su// smon pa spangs na bla na med pa yin// byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur//
40b2(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i don gyi tshig chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/
40b3(rgyud 'bum): la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byang du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu
40b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum pa'i cha byang du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byang du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung
40b5(rgyud 'bum): gi cha byang du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyi ma'i cha byang du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha byang du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byang du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nam mkha'
40b6(rgyud 'bum): lding gi cha byang du/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/
40b7(rgyud 'bum): la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byang du/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byang du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byang du
41a1(rgyud 'bum): la la ni glang po che sa srungs kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs ldan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha
41a2(rgyud 'bum): byang du/ la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la/ byang phrul dang rgyan dkar pos brgyan par
41a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing / 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi
41a4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/ / la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ phyang phrul dang sbud pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ser po dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs
41a5(rgyud 'bum): shing 'khod do/ / la la ni le brgan kha dog le brgan la/ gser gyi gos dang / phyang phrul dang / lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthing kha thogs shing 'khod do//
41a6(rgyud 'bum): la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon
41a7(rgyud 'bum): par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'babs so//
41b1(rgyud 'bum): la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te/ sa la chag chag 'debs so// la la ni mching bu nag
41b2(rgyud 'bum): po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par byed do// la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin no// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
41b3(rgyud 'bum): logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do/ / bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni// bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
41b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i phyir rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so/ / la la ni srang dang / khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang
41b5(rgyud 'bum): khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo khang dang / shing khang dang / gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis
41b6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te/ skrag cing srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor bar 'dug go// 'og min gyi
41b7(rgyud 'bum): lha grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor yug tu 'khod do/ / bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas kun tu bltas na/ rgyal po'i khab
42a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad ba dag byung ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar
42a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khod par mthong ngo / / de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas tham cad na'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma
42a3(rgyud 'bum): de 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo / / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yi de la gcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing lus rdul te/ lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing
42a4(rgyud 'bum): skad chen pos bos te/ bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig la nyon// nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med// mthu stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de//
42a5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo bstan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'jug go// lha mi dga' ba'i pad+ma 'dir byung ste// 'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong // bder gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'// yon tan rab mchog zhi
42a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lam du 'gro/ / 'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgyu yin te// lha mi mang po thams cad yid gcig pad+ma 'khor bar 'dug/ da ni 'jigs pa'i skad phyung myur du ri yi char phab ste// ci nas
42a7(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir brlag gyis/ / de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyi chos rig na// bdag sde
42b1(rgyud 'bum): brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro/ / bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dpal gzugs mthong bas bdag cag myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med// de
42b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchog tu khros pas non pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa// bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'ang mi shes
42b3(rgyud 'bum): sam/ / 'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sngo ba// ngo mi tsha'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am// bdag cag stobs ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa// pad+ma'i drung du nye bar der
42b4(rgyud 'bum): dong ste/ / chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin tu dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// lus ni dri nga stobs dang brtson 'grus stor// ji tsam skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa// de yi
42b5(rgyud 'bum): bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong / / de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig byed dga'// sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i
42b6(rgyud 'bum): phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog/ grong khyer 'dir byin bdag cag myur du dga' zhing dang bas blta// 'jig rten gsum mchod srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dong // de nas nam mkha' de
42b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyed kun tshogs pas gus shing dga' ldan pa yi tshig nyon cig/ sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud ngag yid 'thun
43a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod de/ / khro spangs rab dga' thub pa'i gsungs mchog la yang dga' dang skyed// sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs de de ring gus par mchod// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud
43a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ bdud la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das
43a3(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do/ / la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha
43a4(rgyud 'bum): byang du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes
43a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byang du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyi ma'i cha byang du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha byang du/ la la ni
43a6(rgyud 'bum): skar ma'i cha byang du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni na mkha' lding gi cha byud du/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du// la la ni
43a7(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/
43b1(rgyud 'bum): la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni glang po che sa srungs kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni bud med rin po
43b2(rgyud 'bum): che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngol
43b3(rgyud 'bum): phyang phrul dang rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing
43b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/ / la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ phyang phrul dang skud pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ser po dang /
43b5(rgyud 'bum): mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni le brgan kha dog le brgan la/ gser gyi gos dang / phyang phrul dang / lha ba lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthing kha thogs
43b6(rgyud 'bum): shing 'khod do/ / la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu tig dmar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu
43b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna
44a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi char 'bebs so/ / la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu'i kha dog gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te sa la chag
44a2(rgyud 'bum): chag 'debs so/ / la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par byed do// la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to// la la ni kha dog
44a3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs
44a4(rgyud 'bum): su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so// la la ni srang dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang /
44a5(rgyud 'bum): bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo khang dang / gzhal med khang sna tshogs su 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la
44a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rab tu 'khrugs
44a7(rgyud 'bum): te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag la phyin chad grogs med de// bdag gi dpal deng thams cad stor// bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams// brtson 'grus
44b1(rgyud 'bum): tha ma brtsam par bya/ / bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba bcad// pad+ma bcad dang kun 'khrugs te// de nas sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro// de na tha ma'i stobs yin no// bdud sdig can gyis
44b2(rgyud 'bum): de ltar bsams nas/ rlung lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/ srang gi pad+ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma gcad par 'dod
44b3(rgyud 'bum): na de dag kyang ma mthong / / pad+ma'i snying po la lag pas brdab par 'dod na de'ang ma dmigs te/ dper na glog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa
44b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du pad+ma de'ang snang mod kyi mi dmigs so/ / gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad rab tu spangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing
44b5(rgyud 'bum): che la 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de'ang ma nus so/ / yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rab tu bskyod par 'dod na reg par yang ma nus te mi dmigs so//
44b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing mi dmigs nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems
44b7(rgyud 'bum): can 'dug pa rnams brtags te/ sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o snyam na/ sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par ma rung ngo // de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing / sangs rgyas kyi
45a1(rgyud 'bum): mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te/ gdong mchi ma can phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong gi ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas// 'di ltar bdag ni
45a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dun 'dir slad bzhin skad cig myos par song / / yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad// der bskrang brlag par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro// bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod
45a3(rgyud 'bum): na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/ de rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de/ bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong // dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog
45a4(rgyud 'bum): zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi phyi rol tu
45a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na/ 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis mthong bar rab tu khros
45a6(rgyud 'bum): shing skrag ste/ skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro// de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor
45a7(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba'i cha byang du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir khyod deng mya ngan yid kyis du gdong sgra cher 'bod// 'gro ba kun gtse thub mchog skyabs su
45b1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'jigs myur du song / / 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba// 'di la bsnyen bkur zhing 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud sdig
45b2(rgyud 'bum): can 'di snyam du bdag nyid tshig snyan pas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i skyabs su song la/ bcings pa 'di las bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du sems te/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na/
45b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las rab tu thar par mdzad pa de la phyag
45b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub mgon myur du 'jigs chen mi bzang bcings pa 'di las khrol// de ring slan chang bde gshegs gtso
45b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog skyabs su bdag mchi ste/ / gti mug gis ni bdag ljongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen bgyis// mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyis// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can tshig snyan pas//
45b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ba de'i tshe na/ bdag grol ba snyam du shes so// gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe yang mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings pa bdag gis shes te
45b7(rgyud 'bum): gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro ma nus pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang skyabs su sems bskyed nas/ yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so// lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol ba shes te de nyid na
46a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug go/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ bdud btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/ nyan thos
46a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba/ bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas
46a3(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so//
46a4(rgyud 'bum): skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi de dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi
46a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ / chos kyi kha lo sgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang // rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te// nyan thos de dag la ni kyal
46a6(rgyud 'bum): ka deng byas pa/ / 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
46a7(rgyud 'bum): srin bu bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas// bcom ldan
46b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ / bstan pa'i cho ga srungs slad du// kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste// bzhon dpung bcas
46b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdud btul la/ / skye bo mang po thams cad kyang // mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya// de nas de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs shig/
46b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis
46b4(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na 'di la
46b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs bzhin du/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa dang / lta ba'i rgya mtsho dral ba dang /
46b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can
46b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga la gsod par
47a1(rgyud 'bum): gshom yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang gnod pa mi nus so/ / ngas ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang gdul bar nus te/ bdud
47a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so/ / yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi
47a3(rgyud 'bum): rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar byas te yongs su spyad do// de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i
47a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro/ / ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tsha la srung ba'i lha mo mdzes zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad
47a5(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams// re re yang ni shin tu ma rungs pa// bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor zhing mchis// zhe sdang
47a6(rgyud 'bum): rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te/ / khyod dgrongs slad du 'khrug pa'i sems kyis gnas// mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs// 'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par ma bzhud cig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan
47a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das gdan las bzhengs pa de'i tshe/ gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig can dag ni lnga
47b1(rgyud 'bum): stong po/ / mtshon char bcas te mchis pa ni/ bsam med de dag khyod la sngo// thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/ sman gyi lha mo
47b2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na// kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing // chos kyi tshul ni
47b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgyal chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yon can gdug pas shin tu gtams// sa 'dir
47b4(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rung gyur pa lags/ / ji ltar shin tu dbyung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis// khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang po dag/ sdig pa'i chos can ral gri
47b5(rgyud 'bum): sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten srung slad bdag gi tshig gson te// stobs bcu grub par bzhud pa de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
47b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang / de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje ba snying rje bar du zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad don
47b7(rgyud 'bum): grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni/ / mgon po khams gsum 'di dag thams cad de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur// nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyis rked bcings rno ba'i mda' dang
48a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshon thogs shing / / khyod dgrongs srad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis da ni der ma gshegs// de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher ngu zhing / bcom ldan
48a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po// mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje
48a3(rgyud 'bum): med par lta/ / gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams// khyod dgrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo
48a4(rgyud 'bum): khang du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung ba'i lha mo ta la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher ngu zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
48a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan shul 'di seng ge rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bskor// dge sbyong rnams la brtse spang bdud kyi rnam mang gnod par
48a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid/ / sa 'dir ston pa khyod dgrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson// sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse slad du ma gshegs shig/ bcom ldan bdud thul khyod kyi bstan pa rnam zhig
48a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sgyu ma bgyid pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas// lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams// kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs// dam chos cher zhig pa dang
48b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'khrugs 'gyur drang / / nam mkha' skar ma 'od stor nyi zla gyur mthong nas// 'gro mchog kye ma mi bzad klad pa deng drag rdob// bder gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hung mchi//
48b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di 'od nyams shing // chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'grongs par brlag/ chos kyi chu yang bsdam par 'gyur// dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du// ma rung
48b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar nye gnas tshe/ / mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang // 'di dag kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas/ gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad
48b4(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol// sgra mchog de ring brlag par ma bzhud cig/ bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi//
48b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog/ bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud// sems can thug brtse'i slad du 'dir gzhes te// sems can skye bas gtses pas 'jigs thar mdzod//
48b6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa brnyes nas sgrol ba rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs// sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs// srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig/ sku
48b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs/ / kye ma 'dod la chags shing byis pa'i sde// de rnams zhi bgyi slad du chos lam shod// skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong // de nas bcom ldan 'das
49a1(rgyud 'bum): sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / de nas sa'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig sgra gzhig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug
49a2(rgyud 'bum): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni// rgya mtsho bzhi bltams pa yi khrag stsal cing // dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam// spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma snyed stsal to//
49a3(rgyud 'bum): sngon ni rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta// gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom dang // de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal// rang byung mchog rab la ni
49a4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa mdzad/ / khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen// phar 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no// bya bar dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas
49a5(rgyud 'bum): spyad/ / sems can du ma nyon mongs thar par mdzad// gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni// lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig/ chu bo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral// 'jig
49a6(rgyud 'bum): rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te/ / sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bskam par bya// sems can mang po grangs med grong khyer gzung // sems can de dag dgongs pa yongs rdzogs shing // byang chub dam
49a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni shin tu khod/ / 'di ni lam bor sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par bzod// 'di dag sgrol cig dam bcas dgongs su gsol// bskal pa bye ba mang
49b1(rgyud 'bum): bor chos ston te/ / mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol// 'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi chu yi khrus// mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis//
49b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag dgrol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzod// srid gsum rgya mtsho nas kyang 'gro ba sgrol// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig/ rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol//
49b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis
49b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag cag rnams kyis bder gshegs sngon mthong ba// zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul// chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na// de la 'di lta bu yi bgegs
49b5(rgyud 'bum): ma byung / / ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus ngan la// rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te// thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du// 'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing //
49b6(rgyud 'bum): smra ba'i seng ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du// sdig can dag ni bye ba skyong mang po// 'di ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jigs par byed// sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs// de nas lha mo
49b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa// de dag yul gcig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa// 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor// de nas ma rung
50a1(rgyud 'bum): bar ni gyur ta re/ / de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad// shin tu sems can don mdzad spyad// de ni de ring grong khyer
50a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dir/ / brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong
50a3(rgyud 'bum): mchi ma zag cing ngo 'dzum gnag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ la la ni skra 'bal/ la la ni rgyan
50a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la/ la la ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan snyol/ la la ni bdag gi lus sa la rdob/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ la la ni shin tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni
50a5(rgyud 'bum): lag pas brang rdung / la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gre ldog/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni bcom
50a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gos dang / phyang phrul dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro// de nas lha
50a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'jig rten don spang 'di bas mang ba yi// bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu sbyad // zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes kyis//
50b1(rgyud 'bum): btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol// sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad// lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung // shin tu yun ring chos rnams
50b2(rgyud 'bum): ston cing khyod bzhugs la/ / srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol// dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te// bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la// khyod kyis thug
50b3(rgyud 'bum): rje bskyed de so sor rab ston la/ / chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag sgrol bar mdzod// 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i dbus son 'khyams gyur cing // 'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba// de dag la na
50b4(rgyud 'bum): lam mchog so sor ston/ / 'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba// de ni khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad// rlabs chen thugs mnga'
50b5(rgyud 'bum): ring du bzhugs su gsol/ / 'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig/ de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam 'dren brgya lam ma rung gyur na ni// 'jig rten 'di ni
50b6(rgyud 'bum): ma lus ldongs par 'gyur/ / yan lag brgyad ldan rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu// 'dir ni yong ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur// ngag lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag/ bdag cag bag yod
50b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas 'dir btab ste/ / de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung gnas 'di brlag ma gyur cig/ yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du
51a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang // thub pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni// ma rung mi 'gyur khyod
51a2(rgyud 'bum): cag ma 'jigs shig/ dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur// dpag tshad sum cu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas rab tu bskor// rna sbrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgra mang
51a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde/ / byang chub snying por lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag 'gyur na// da ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de la ga la bgegs shig byed// de nas lha mo
51a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ / sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che// 'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde ste shin tu dpung che bas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa
51a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs/ / de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin tu snang med 'khyam par 'ong // de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
51a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te// dge ba bzhugs shig gtso bo thugs rje can// lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs// de la
51a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi bcud kyis dgator cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs
51b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / deng khyed ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag cig/ bdud rnams thams cad bzhon bcas cig car du// tshogs kyang sdug cig skrag par mi nus na// nga yi lus kun lan
51b2(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste// nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos bshad do// lam rnams stor ba la ni nga nyid kyis// dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan bya// ngas sngon bya bar
51b3(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba mang po byas/ / zas dang skom dag shin tu rgya chen byin// gnas dang sman yang mi nyung sbyin byin pas// nga la deng su gnod pa byed par nus// ngas ni rta dang glang chen shing rta dang // lhab lhub
51b4(rgyud 'bum): phyang phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang / / bran pho bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang // nga la su zhig gnod pa byed par nus// chung ma bu pho bu mo bran mang dang // yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal srid
51b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin gyis// nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur// mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang // lus dang pags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas// nga yi srog
51b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang lus can rnams la btang / / su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus// ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mngal// gus ldan bdag gis lag nas shin tu mchod// rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang
51b7(rgyud 'bum): bzod la dga'/ / ngal su zhig rlag par byed par nus// ngas sngon shin tu bya dka' mang po rnams// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas// lus kun bcad kyang ngal 'khrug med na/
52a1(rgyud 'bum): nga la rnam par 'tshe bar su zhig nus// nyon mongs ngas btul nges parang sangs rgyas// sems can thams cad la ni byams sems ldan// khro med phrag dog tha ba ngal med// ngami
52a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun na de ring su zhig nus/ / ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul// ngas ni bdud pham bye ba pham par byas// khyed kun rnam par thar pa nges par bya// grong du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig/
52a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na// sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun nas bsogs// zhing
52a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bye/ / bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya// sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas// sangs rgyas dag gis dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i tshe/
52a5(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med
52a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo mtshar chen po rmad du
52a7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo //
52b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do// sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to// sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil lo//
52b2(rgyud 'bum): skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do// 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlags so// ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal to// gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad pa bsgyur to// chu bo bzhi bskams so// chos kyi
52b3(rgyud 'bum): sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do/ / byang chub kyi lam bstan to// bzod pa dang nges pa la btsud do// bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par
52b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to// sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do//
52b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha dang mi de dag gis bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas// bcom ldan 'das
52b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyir lam de phyag bdar byas so/ / lha'i gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so// lha'i me tog man dar dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru
52b7(rgyud 'bum): sha ka chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / badras kun tu g.yogs so// gang du
53a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi skabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lamado ngos gnyis su ltar rin po rgyu sna bdun gyi zhing ljon pa mngon pa smras te/ lha'i ras bcos dra dang / rtswa tig gi'i phreng ba dang /
53a2(rgyud 'bum): lag rgyan da / rtswa rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to// shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bre zang zhing zhim pa'i chu dang zhing rnyog pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba
53a3(rgyud 'bum): khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang ngag sprul te/ bar snang la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgyul mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skung pa dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba bzang
53a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing gser gyi bye ma dag gi char yang phab bo/ / dngul dang / bain+daR+Ya'i phye ma dang / A ka ru dang / rgya gros dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu bab bo// gor shisha
53a5(rgyud 'bum): dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char yang lam der phab bo/ / lha'i rkyen sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to//
53a6(rgyud 'bum): grothong khyer gyi phyi rol na'ang lha dang mi rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do// grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la
53a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
53b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du lam nas gshegs so/ / yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de nas sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing
53b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs pa mthong ba nas/ gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred med kyi bus
53b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang dag khams kyi rgya la phran gyis
53b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang // gang dag seng ges 'dul
53b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis/ bcom
53b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ngo // sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
53b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te zham ring du 'brang zhing dong ngo //
54a1(rgyud 'bum): yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa'i drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/ de g.yog lnga brgya dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo drung
54a2(rgyud 'bum): na sdod pas/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam de nas gshegs shing /
54a3(rgyud 'bum): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so// bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang
54a4(rgyud 'bum): mis mchod par snang ngo / / 'di ni lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so// bdag cag gnyis gang rgan gang mkhas pa de la
54a5(rgyud 'bum): ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas 'di ltar bdag gis bsu la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so// de nas drang srong skar ma la
54a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang // ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod
54a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di lam rab mkhyen/ / khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor// yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i leg bshad mnyan// de nas bram ze'i khye'u
54b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/ / de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
54b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / khyod su zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dA ni bram ze'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyi gdung dus
54b3(rgyud 'bum): ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni go'u ta ma'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo// gsol
54b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid la spyod do// gsol pa/ khyod kyis rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/ bka' stsal pa/
54b5(rgyud 'bum): ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa/ nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no// gsol pa/ drang srong chen po skar ma bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rigs pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das
54b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyis shes pa ste/ de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams
54b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang nyi ma la rten cing rjes rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad
55a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa 'di dag go/ / de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis mchis par rig par bgyi'o// klang ba'i spyi bo la mdzub gang
55a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang dang badzub bcu bzhi ste/ skar ma rnams kyi gnas so// gang de dag na gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la btsas pa de dang de na gda' 'o//
55a3(rgyud 'bum): de'ang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyis/ thub pa chen po gson cig/ smin drug la ni su btsas pa// de yi gdong gi sor bzhin// g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis// spu can gnag la
55a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog kyang dmar/ / longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan// mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te// smin drug la ni skyes pa yi// mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so// gang zhig la ni sor bzhin//
55a5(rgyud 'bum): sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de// snar ma la ni skyes pa ste// shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'// mkhas shing longs spyod phun sum tshogs// rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun
55a6(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs/ / dgra rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms// mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na// gang la tshig pa 'dra ganga' ba// de ni mgo la skyes pa ste// dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o//
55a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub kyi phyeng po gnyis pa la// g.yon la sme ba gang mchis pa// lag la skyes pa khro ba ste// de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog/ mtshan khung g.yon na sme nag mchis// nab so la na skyes
55b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / nor dang 'bru yang 'byor par 'gyur// de ni shes pa'i rgya yang chung // ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes// mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'// phyag gi mthil ni 'khor lo ni// nyi ma
55b2(rgyud 'bum): lta bur rab tu mdzes/ / dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang // gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis// sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis nyon mongs thul// tshig 'dra gang gi snying
55b3(rgyud 'bum): ga mchis/ / skag la skyes te thal mo sred// tshul khrims 'chal cing 'grogs mi bde// de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o// 'og gam brang ngam rgyab gcig na// gang la byi sran 'dra gda' ba//
55b4(rgyud 'bum): mchul skyes te nor dang ldan// btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi// lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na// gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni// de ni gre la skyes pa ste// ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung //
55b5(rgyud 'bum): lte ba man chad sor bzhin// gang la rmi rab gda' ba ni// nga bo la de skyes longs spyod can// khrims ldan 'chi 'phos mtho ris mchis// me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag/ sme ba dmar po chu bo ganga'//
55b6(rgyud 'bum): rku zhing g.yo ngan sgyu ma ste// bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan// gang gi mtshan na sme ba ni// gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang // nag pa la ni skyes pa ste// 'dod chags rtag tu glu gar gda'//
55b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gyi 'og game steng na ni// sme ba ser po rab tu gda'// sa ri la ni de skyes te// mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang // brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na// sme ba dmar po de bzhin te// sa ga
56a1(rgyud 'bum): la ste shor ba mchog/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor// mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul// rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste// ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan//
56a2(rgyud 'bum): shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub don// gang la byi sran 'dra gda' ba// lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can// chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o// gang gi brla 'og gnyis
56a3(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ / sme ba gda' ba snron la skyes// mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal// dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so// pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni// gang la rma chung gda' ba de// snrubs la skyes te dbang thang
