56a4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid// chu stong la ni skyes pa dag/ sle ba pus mo'i lha nga na// sbyin pa bgyid cing chos lam 'tshal// 'chi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// chu smad la ni su skyes pa// dga'ang
56a5(rgyud 'bum): la ni sme ba mchis/ / de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams// sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni// gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad med sems can byam//
56a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// sme ba nag po rje ngar la// gda' ba mon grur skyes pa ste// de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung // longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// rje ngar la ni mdzub don// sme ba
56a7(rgyud 'bum): nag po rab tu gda'/ / mon grel skyes blun pa ste// de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur// rdzi ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na// rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stong la// blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid// de ni dbul
56b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing rkun po bgyid/ / gang la sme ba mdzub gang na// khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang // shes rab 'jig med snying rjer ldan// gang gi rkang pa gnyis ka la//
56b2(rgyud 'bum): ba phra mo ganga' ba ni// nam gru skyes pa ma rabs te// 'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag par yang // sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni// rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis//
56b3(rgyud 'bum): tha skar la ni de skyes te// rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni// bra nye la ste snying brtse med// gsod ma gshed ma'i ngang tshul can// shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi// gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba ni// skar
56b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags/ / 'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis// sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pa gang la
56b5(rgyud 'bum): chags 'dus pa/ / de ni byis pa'i rmongs pa ste// sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas// khyi dang sbrul dang rus sbal dang // srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po// skar ma rgyal la gang
56b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa/ / de dag bde la rten ma yin// ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang // thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin// nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na// ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri// de nas drang srong skar
56b7(rgyud 'bum): ma la dga' bas/ / bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas/ yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni// mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gda'// khyod kyi
57a1(rgyud 'bum): gdung rus ma 'tshal na/ / lha 'am 'on te khyod mi lags// gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni// tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'// sbyong ba'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni// sngon gyi
57a2(rgyud 'bum): drang srong rnams dang 'dra/ / thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs// 'di sngon ma mthong ma thos nas// khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra// khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
57a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing // mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings// de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin// pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus// bram ze mngon shes drug dang
57a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing // dbang po drug ni rnam par gzhig/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum// byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa// de ni nga ni rab
57a5(rgyud 'bum): tu byung / / mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs// mtshan ma med par rab tu bsgoms// sems can med cing srog med pa// bdag med stong par sngon sangs rgyas// tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum//
57a6(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms// nga yi ye shes pha rol song // nga yi tshig 'di mtshungs pa med// gang dag mkhas bzhin ma chags par// byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa// de dag bzod
57a7(rgyud 'bum): stobs phun sum tshogs/ / ye shes 'di 'dra 'thob par 'gyur// chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa 'dod med la// de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed// de dag byang chub rnyed
57b1(rgyud 'bum): mi dka'/ / chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing // pha rol tshu rol mi brten par// yang dag mtha' ni 'dir bsgoms na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang
57b2(rgyud 'bum): med/ / dmigs pa dag ni rnam par spangs// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la// rang gi sems la the tsom spongs//
57b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su// nga 'drar sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog
57b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bzhugs par mthong nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga'
57b5(rgyud 'bum): bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par
57b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ byang chub sems ngaba'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas drang srong skur ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/ bcom
57b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa// khyod kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten
58a1(rgyud 'bum): kun snang mdzad/ / rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa// sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal// gser
58a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur pa'i/ / yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri
58a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams bcom par gyur/ / tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to// sman pa chen pos sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa// sems can snying po sangs rgyas
58a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/ bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mo bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi// ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i mi yi dam pas lung bstan gsol// sdug bsngal
58a5(rgyud 'bum): / chu bos bdas pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho
58a6(rgyud 'bum): lta bu dag/ de dag bdag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi// drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun// dus gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus
58a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des/ / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun// sangs rgyas kyis ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'da' bar shog/ sems can thams
58b1(rgyud 'bum): cad nad zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams par shog/ ngo bo nyid kyis ye shes dbang po snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams// de dag
58b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar par shog/ sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thong gyur cig/ shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog
58b3(rgyud 'bum): de dag sdig pa rnams spangs lta ba mnyam pa nyid du sten gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skye ba dran zhing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/ sems can de kun chos grub srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig/ thams
58b4(rgyud 'bum): cad chos kyis pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog/ bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char yang 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru
58b5(rgyud 'bum): bar shog/ bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags// bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la la
58b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog/ bdag gi bsod nam cung zad ci mchis dang nas byang chub bsngo bar bgyi//
58b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can tshad du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzud par bgyi// bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya
59a1(rgyud 'bum): mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi/ / gang du byang chub reg 'gyur zhing yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/
59a2(rgyud 'bum): smra ba'i seng ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog/ 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pas lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos
59a3(rgyud 'bum): kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ / me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig/ sa rnams
59a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang / me tog de dag thams cad
59a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bas tshim
59a6(rgyud 'bum): pa skyes par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// drang song chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
59a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa
59b1(rgyud 'bum): gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang / yid mi skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to// gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni/ bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid
59b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar gyur cing / drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang / sa g.yos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan
59b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ / gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to//
59b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas/ zang zing med cing mchog tu dga'
59b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' phyang phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa de dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
59b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon// byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsungs// mnyam pa med pa'i mthus nis g.yos shing // nam
59b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug/ khyod ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po// rkang gnyis dag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su// bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshang mnyam pa// khams
60a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum snying por 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du bdag
60a2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog
60a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang
60a4(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
60a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur te/ khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi
60a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su gyur te/ khyod kyang de na theg
60a7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor ji snyed lhag pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba lung bstan pa de mthong nas/ bcom
60b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson par gyur to/ / bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ bla na med pa
60b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba thob bo// 'dus pa chen po rin
60b3(rgyud 'bum): po che tog gi gzungs las/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang /
60b4(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang nas gshegs pa'i sgo de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas
60b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyis kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ji lta
60b6(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
60b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs so/ / bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du/ bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bkod pa'i mchog
61a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to//
61a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la dag ni tshangs pa'i cha byang lta bu nas/ drang srong chen po'i cha byang lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khu
61a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rta babs dang / ba ga ma dang / skyed shing gi nang na me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang
61a4(rgyud 'bum): ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol nas/ bstod pa dang yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan
61a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das la mchod pa byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/
61a6(rgyud 'bum): zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa de la reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
61a7(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dab
61b1(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po
61b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/ sems can gzi brjid che ba
61b3(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing / me tog dang spos dus
61b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab
61b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams su/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang
61b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos// byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod// khyod kyis 'khor ba'i
61b7(rgyud 'bum): gcong rong 'khyams pa yi/ / 'jig rten thams cad ngag ni bsgral bar byos// yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis// g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la// 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos/
62a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med// 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs// bdud stong bye ba rang gis pha ma mdzad de/
62a2(rgyud 'bum): de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du skor// grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag smyon pa mdzad// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas// byang chub tu ni de ring
62a3(rgyud 'bum): lung yang ston/ / rang byung mya ngan med pa'i grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la// de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab ltos te// rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos// yang
62a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
62a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan
62a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas me tog dang phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
62a7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
62b1(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed pa
62b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu/ yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dang / me tog dang phye ma'i char 'di'ang ga las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
62b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste/ ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ sangs
62b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
62b5(rgyud 'bum): la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu snang ste/ 'di lta
62b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing // rdul bsags pa med ces bya bar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di
62b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtsigs pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du'ang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
63a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas shin tu lham me/ lhan ne// lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'a
63a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug
63a3(rgyud 'bum): par mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du
63a4(rgyud 'bum): sems te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkong ba de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la'ang blta ba dang /
63a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo // der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyogs bcu'i
63a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus
63a7(rgyud 'bum): rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang / byang chub sems
63b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma lus
63b2(rgyud 'bum): par gang bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyis rgyu mthun pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
63b3(rgyud 'bum): pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
63b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so/ / la la dag gis ni mu tig gi char phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni gser
63b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / gor shi sha dang / tsan dan sbal gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas
63b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni lhab lhub dang / phyang phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos ma sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das
63b7(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs sbreng ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la ngag gis ni spos sna tshogs
64a1(rgyud 'bum): @kyis bdugs so/ / la la dag gis ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to// la la ngag gis ni sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol lo// la la dag gis ni glu dang
64a2(rgyud 'bum): gar dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to// la la dag gis ni sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo// la la dag gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang
64a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs
64a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / la la dag gis ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'phang bstod de thogs so// la la dag gis ni bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i
64a5(rgyud 'bum): cha byang du mngon par sprul te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'khod pa nas/ rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no// la la dag gis ni seng ge'i cha byang du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das
64a6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thag thogs
64a7(rgyud 'bum): med do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang // yang dag par spong ba dang /
64b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang // dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi nan kyis
64b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas// phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg par
64b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so/ / pad+ma de drangs te g.yos pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'o ri khor yug dang / ri'i khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi/
64b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas khang dang / lam dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi
64b5(rgyud 'bum): bu tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ / rgyu med rkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag
64b6(rgyud 'bum): gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis
64b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na/ 'di sras legs par brgyan cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo// de nas rang gi yul na gnas
65a1(rgyud 'bum): p a'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khod bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu
65a2(rgyud 'bum): lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems
65a3(rgyud 'bum): can gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas sems can gcig kyang ngo mi shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan
65a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par mthong ngo / / de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / da ltar
65a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag jo bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa gar dong ba'ang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/ / de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas
65a6(rgyud 'bum): par/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
65a7(rgyud 'bum): btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / rab tu rnam par dang sems kyis// bcom ldan padag ni skyabs su mchi// bdag khrol 'di nas myur du 'chi// chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi// bcom
65b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang // ngas ni su yang bzlog pa med// gal te lam ni rab shes na// gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos// bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol
65b2(rgyud 'bum): to/ / rang gi spyod yul gar dga' bar// gang che bdag ni 'chi 'tshal tshe// bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis// bcings par mthong ngo go'u ta ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni rtog
65b3(rgyud 'bum): pa kun spangs te/ / grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa// ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings pa thar par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas
65b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang /
65b5(rgyud 'bum): the tsom thams cad rab spongs la// skad cig ci yang ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams ni nga nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon// dad cing mos pa
65b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa dang / / byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon// 'jig rten mgon po'i mngon sum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon// gang du bzod pa sten byed pa// de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'// gang du
65b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten sdig pa yi/ / rtog pa thams cad rab thong ba// stong pa nyid ni sgom pa dang // sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon// ji ltar ngas sngon spyad pa yi// byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'// de las
66a1(rgyud 'bum): tog tsam mchod 'di/ / khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa// sred pa'i bcings las rnam grol zhing // mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi// lam
66a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi mchog ni bstan par bya/ / dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la// ston pas gsung ba 'dir nyon cig/ chu bo rnams ni pha rol rgol// rgya mo can gyi sreng ba spongs// rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing //
66a3(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa gsum la yang dag nos// khams gsum gyi ni nyon mongs gang // de dag ma lus rnam par chom// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang // chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams//
66a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi// byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems// bye brag tu ni rab spongs la// khams gsum pa las grol ba yi//
66a5(rgyud 'bum): zhi byed bzod pa thob par byos// phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis// so so'i skye bo bslang pa rnams// dngos po med la rtog byed pa// de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin// mig ni gzugs la chags pa
66a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / lus dang ngag dang sems bsgribs nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams// 'khor ba shin tu rten par gyur// 'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal// bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams//
66a7(rgyud 'bum): de dag phyin ci log bzhi las// de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams// chu bo bzhi las thar par byed// 'chi 'a po skye bar rab shes pa// nges pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro//
66b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag/ sems can srid pas bcings pa rnams// yang dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa las
66b2(rgyud 'bum): grol zag pa med/ / yang dang yang du mi skye ste// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed// sdig pa dag ni myur du shogs// sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la// 'jigs pa
66b3(rgyud 'bum): med par pha rol song / / srid par yang dang yang skyes pa// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni// 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po rab
66b4(rgyud 'bum): spangs te/ / sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig/ btung ba'i dam pa btung bar byos// stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig/ dam
66b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don la dngos po med/ / rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med// 'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste// byed pa po ni 'di la med// de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang // dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med// tshor
66b6(rgyud 'bum): ba drug dang sred pa drug/ reg pa drug las byung ba yin// de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong pa yin par shes par byos// rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par// dngos po nyid la brtag par byos//
66b7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// 'di na rdzas kyang med pa ltos// gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste// dus gsum du yang dngos med par// shes pa de dag nang med de// de ni bla na med pa'i lam/
67a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la// sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // tshu rol pha rol rnam grol ba// de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
67a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs
67a3(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i mod la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa snyigs ma lnga can gang+gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag
67a4(rgyud 'bum): grags par gyur nas/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang dad pa rnyed de/ bla na med pa yang
67a5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs par pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med
67a6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di dag thos nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ theg pa gsum po dag gis
67a7(rgyud 'bum): nges par 'byung bathob par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar me la dga' bas bad+ma'i zil 'jog par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi rngu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po masna bdun gyi thams
67b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi// 'dam du bying ba'i
67b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten thams cad la/ / rab tu gzugs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas kyi// 'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam po thogs// thal mo sbyar ba sems can rgya chen rgyas// rab tu bltams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas
67b3(rgyud 'bum): su/ / chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol// rang gi mthu rtsal rnam par bstan du gsol// mtshungs pa med pa pad+ma mngon 'dzegs te// mgon po shes rab can gyi thabs rnams kyis// spos
67b4(rgyud 'bum): chu'i sprin gyi char pa rab pho ba la/ / nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi dbang du de dag kun
67b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs kyis/ / thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par mdzod// chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas// sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod
67b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ / bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol// chu bo bzhi dbus 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// mi yi seng ges de ring bsgral du gsol// khyod kyi chos rnams shin tu thugs su chung // srid gsum mtsho
67b7(rgyud 'bum): las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol/ / shin tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la// 'gro ba gzung mdzod mtshungs med chos kyang ston// 'jig rten nyes pa'i
68a1(rgyud 'bum): dri ma bsal du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bur sprul pa'i tham skas de las pad+ma'i khril mngon par 'dzegs te pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
68a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas/ bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas/ sems can grangs med
68a3(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtse ba rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar par 'gyur/ chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur
68a4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi/ khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can
68a5(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang / ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su
68a6(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa 'di smras so/ / ci ste sdig med khyod la tha ba zhe sdang rgyags med na// ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston// de ste khyod la tha brgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni// thub dbang khyod
68a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi thar pa ci 'dra ba dag la 'dir shod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni ma la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcu gnas pa// de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la gsang bar rab tu
68b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / de tshe nga la khon dang za ba cung zad tsam yang med// nga ni bzod dang ldan te thab ma lus med pa yin// nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas// nga gsad phyir
68b2(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas/ / de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur bskams byas// khyod kyis nga la gnod pa du ma ci ma byas// nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med
68b3(rgyud 'bum): khrid de 'ongs/ / nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zas kyang bcad par byas// khyod kyis de tshe nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu btab// nga ni byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par
68b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun tu bskor// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song ste rdzi char drag po phab// sa ni 'domado 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas// zhi ba'i gnas na gnas
68b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung / / nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni// 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang // nga ni gsang bar bya byir khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang // de che
68b6(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis nga yi zas la drag po'i dug kyang btab/ / nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba yi// rdo rje dang ni gnam lugs spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab// 'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la
68b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par gnas pa na/ / khyod kyis ngur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bsdus// de na yang ni ngagan khyod kyis bu mo rnams pa kye ste// nga gsang dbyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi/
69a1(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas chung bad med// ngas ni khyod btul nas ni byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob// 'on kyang ngo mtshar bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang
69a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra'am/ / sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srungs mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te// khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang // snying rje bor te 'dir 'ongs nga la rgol zhing sgyu byed dam/
69a3(rgyud 'bum): nga ni zan ma thos pa'i tshe yang khyod kyis su// nga gsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang // sa steng nga la lhas byin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs pa dang // kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta
69a4(rgyud 'bum): chas zos pa dang / / phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang // me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang // kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbar ba yi// de la
69a5(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin/ / khyod nyid dbang bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su// nga gsad phyir ni mnga' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs// 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga
69a6(rgyud 'bum): yi spu gcig ma g.yos na/ / ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas 'di nang dung 'dug/ ci ste bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du yang btsud kyang // sems can khrag khrig dag ni 'di ru yang dag lhags nas su//
69a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te// nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya// nga ni snying rjes gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa// khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la
69b1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bgegs byed de/ / thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin gyis// da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya// rnam thar sems kyi sem can rnams kyi don yang spyad par bya//
69b2(rgyud 'bum): smras par gyur pa'ang bzod pa yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o// nga la phrag dog thab rab tu khro ba'i yid med de// khyod ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson// nga la gsol dang khyod nyid zhi phyir
69b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum dag tu/ / mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par bya// de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyis// 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du
69b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bar byos/ / khyod ni rtag tu 'di ni gnod par bya ba rab sems kyang // khyod dgrol phyir ning snying rtag tu byams pas rab tu dang // sdig pa'i blo gros 'or la dang bcas yid la byes shig dang /
69b5(rgyud 'bum): ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la khros te 'khrugs shing rngams nas/ de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba
69b6(rgyud 'bum): lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das dgrong ba'i phyir/ rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang / bcom
69b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'chol gzhes te
70a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub
70a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/
70a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
70a4(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
70a5(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de de ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul
70a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthon por byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma ring du gnas par byed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin
70a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par byed pa/ ngo mi mtshar dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mu ge
70b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par tsha zhing grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang
70b2(rgyud 'bum): nad dang / sgra mi snyan pa de thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs
70b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang por rab tu ston pa/ khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs
70b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang zla ba gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang
70b5(rgyud 'bum): dus dang / lo thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman thams cad grub par byed pa/ bzo dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyi
70b6(rgyud 'bum): rlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu ni par byed pa/ rig pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang
70b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis
71a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po rnams dbugs 'byin pa/ phyir mi ldog
71a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / byang chub la
71a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa la
71a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa mtha'
71a5(rgyud 'bum): ngag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar bar byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje
71a6(rgyud 'bum): lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
71a7(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba
71b1(rgyud 'bum): la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/ / byin gyis brlabs so// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes so// gang dag ltar phyogs bcun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
71b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhes la/ chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rang
71b3(rgyud 'bum): tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/ / byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ de bzhin
71b4(rgyud 'bum): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag
71b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/
71b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis/ so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa chos mnyam
71b7(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa nas// 'di ltar yon tan bsam
72a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyi ba nas/ zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos
72a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa// phung po'i
72a3(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo
72a4(rgyud 'bum): phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems
72a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
72a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo / / de ltar phyogs cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag
72a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang / / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
72b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan par spyod pa'i las
72b2(rgyud 'bum): las bzlog pa dang / bzang po spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa
72b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
72b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten
72b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi
72b6(rgyud 'bum): snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu
72b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang / chos de'ang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang
73a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma thos mthong ba blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang / nged kyang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi
73a2(rgyud 'bum): mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'
73a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
73a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la'ang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang // chos nyan par rngo thogs pa lta na/ de bzhin du
73a5(rgyud 'bum): b dag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying
73a6(rgyud 'bum): bos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na/ sangs
73a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'chol gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o/ / de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o// der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa
73b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de'ang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas
73b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing so so na rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i
73b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tsom ma za zhig/ de ltar nem nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
73b4(rgyud 'bum): shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni mtha' yas so/ / rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so//
73b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu ngag yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ sems can gang la la sems gyi khams su bsdu ba bsdus pa khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du
73b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so// sems can re re zhing yang yul gyi gnas go/
73b7(rgyud 'bum): skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag phan tshun mig rgyang gis kyang mi slebs so// yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/
74a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i
74a2(rgyud 'bum): khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba 'am gang bar
74a3(rgyud 'bum): mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs
74a4(rgyud 'bum): pashAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la/ skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad chud kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang
74a5(rgyud 'bum): ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/ me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la/ me'i khams de
74a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o/ / rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin
74a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa sAkya thub pa des thu'i khung bu de gcig tu 'jug nus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad gru'i khung bu de gcig na gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang
74b1(rgyud 'bum): d e bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par
74b2(rgyud 'bum): nus te/ rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod pas kyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa'ang med la/
74b3(rgyud 'bum): rdul gcig gi rtse mo de'ang bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can
74b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa nye bar len pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang
74b5(rgyud 'bum): phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / gsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas gzungs te/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na
74b6(rgyud 'bum): srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'bo dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa
74b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / sems can thams kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang /
75a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
75a2(rgyud 'bum): thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'brel pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to//
75a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa dag
75a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta bu dang ldan no/ / mtshan nyid bshad ba 'di yang bstan pan phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs me dadapag tu med pa dag
75a5(rgyud 'bum): smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ / 'dud pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang de'i tshe shar byeg
75a6(rgyud 'bum): logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul
75a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi gabs kyis gshegs par rgyas nas/ / skad cig gcig cam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khangs su byen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha sa
75b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang
75b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas pad+ma'i stan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do/ / de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'cho la gzhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu
75b3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig phang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang chub
75b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
75b5(rgyud 'bum): thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to/ / byon nas kyang pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshes pa rin chen tog ces bya ba
75b6(rgyud 'bum): byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas// pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe
75b7(rgyud 'bum): nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba
76a1(rgyud 'bum): byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
76a2(rgyud 'bum): c hen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul snyed dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
76a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gshegs par chas pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
76a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod nams dang / rdzu 'phrul
76a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi pad+ma'i stan sprul pa rnams la 'khod / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i
76a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir la la dag gis ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo/ / gong du smos pa bzhin du sbyar te/ la kha ngag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskong ba byas so// la la dag ni chos nyan pas bskor nas/ sangs
76a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/ / la la ngag gis ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu
76b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// thub pa zla ba kun nas gshes
76b2(rgyud 'bum): sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i/ / dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas// zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste// zhing rnams
76b3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis phyag byas so/ / gang na sems can smad pa yi// zhing ni snyigs ma lnga can 'dir// thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng mi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan tshar gcad cing /
76b4(rgyud 'bum): nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang // spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// de yi don du kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab tu dang byos la// bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi// chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la//
76b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po'i spyod pa'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos// nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir// gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos// gang na
76b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams la ni bzhugs nas su/ / srung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir// de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu// 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig/ dam chos yun rang gnas bya'i phyir// sgrib pa thams cad
76b7(rgyud 'bum): zhi byed pa/ / chos rnams thams cad bsdus pa yis// gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa de skad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di
77a1(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad+ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te/ deng thugs chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgos pa/
77a2(rgyud 'bum): mi mthun pa rgyu kun pa bshad pa/ chos thams cad sdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu stsol ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan gleng
77a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/
77a4(rgyud 'bum): dgra thams cad srung ba/ bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi brjed pa gcod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa
77a5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu ston pa/ bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas
77a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la reg
77a7(rgyud 'bum): par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyi ba dang / lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin
77b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dran pa'i snod du gyur pa dang / spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'ding 'dir bdag cag la
77b2(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chab mi 'tshal ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang
77b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / tshul dang / pha rol dang / rtog pa dang
77b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gag pa dang
77b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis
77b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba
77b7(rgyud 'bum): khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon du gyur cig/ sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan pa byed par gyur cig/ sems can grangs med
78a1(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
78a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang / chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs
78a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs
78a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang
78a5(rgyud 'bum): lnga ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can
78a6(rgyud 'bum): so so nas 'di snyam du bdag cag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi/ 'di na gzhan ni su'ang med do// bdag cag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis
78a7(rgyud 'bum): dgongs te/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do// 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi
78b1(rgyud 'bum): yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad brten
78b2(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la bsha
78b3(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams
78b4(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
78b5(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag na rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs
78b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs
78b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra ba rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs
79a1(rgyud 'bum): ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa/ lam rab tu stor
79a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ thabs mkhas pa
79a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i
79a4(rgyud 'bum): slang du/ snying brtse ba dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ngal ba dang / chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
79a5(rgyud 'bum): rdardul dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa shin tu smad pa mi mthun pa'i zas
79a6(rgyud 'bum): za bar bgyi'o/ / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du smom pa/ rtsub pa/ reg na mi bde ba/ sha na dang / shing bal dang / gso ma'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ri dang / ri'i
79a7(rgyud 'bum): sul dang / nags stug po dang / grong stong pa dang / dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas/ rtsa'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma rtsub pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha sprang bar
79b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas/ sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ rgyal rigs rnams la ni rgyal srid dang
79b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o/ / bram ze rnams la ni rig byed dang skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang / sman pa rnams la ni khams dang / sman dang / sgrub
79b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni nyo tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang / bud med rnams la ni kha dog dang // rgyan dang / bu dang / phyug pa dang //
79b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang / dge sbyong rnams la ni bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ma thob pa thob par
79b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba dang / mngon sum du ma bgyis po mngon du bgyi bar gzung ngo // ma thar pa rnams thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par
79b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag la gshe'o// mi snyan pa zer ro// phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa
79b7(rgyud 'bum): 'debs so/ / kha gsag dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud med kyi tshig dag gis skur pa 'debs so// bdag la sas 'thor ro// bdag gsang
80a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir mtshon dang / dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rdo dang / mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so//
80a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gsang ba'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyad kyi dang / phag rgod dang / chen po che rnams kyang 'gyed do// bdag gi gnas dang / gnas khang
80a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang dri nga bas 'gengs so// bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du zhugs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa
80a4(rgyud 'bum): byed du btsud do/ / thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no// bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba dang / chos kyi
80a5(rgyud 'bum): gru gzhig pa dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no// nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/
80a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi
80a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang
80b1(rgyud 'bum): dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / phas kyi dmag tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa
80b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char dang / rlung dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa dang / lta ba yang ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang /
80b3(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang // grong rdal dang / yul khor thams cad srung ba dang / g.yo ba dang /
80b4(rgyud 'bum): dug dang / byang dang / rmongs byed dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar
80b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba sbyong ba la gzung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu skyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la
80b6(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa
80b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
81a1(rgyud 'bum): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang
81a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs so/ / gcig la gcig dgyes pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na
81a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs shing gzhes pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di srung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyam pa
81a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
81a5(rgyud 'bum): yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad
81a6(rgyud 'bum): du/ bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
81a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyid pa'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ byin
81b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlab tu gsol/ bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi
81b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la lag skyong bgyi ste/ chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro
81b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi ba'i slang du byin gyis brlab cing / chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
81b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis/ gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ aM ga ra/ aM ga ra/ b+haM ga ra/ pra b+haM ga ra/ b+ha ya ma hA
81b5(rgyud 'bum): mi traM b+ha se/ a khe/ a kha/ aM ba re/ do me/ do man+te/ ke bat+te/ ke yU re/ sa ma bA hA ne/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ d+harme d+harbe/ d+ha ma ke dza pA le/ mi tra nu pa le/ bA la b+ha dre/ ga Ne ga Na/ wa ran+te/ hi li hi li/
81b6(rgyud 'bum): hi li ti li ke/ dzaM b+ha ba te/ Ta ka se/ Ta ka Na Te/ Ta ka ba ran+te/ ga Na ba ran+te/ hi rin+te/ shi rin+ti/ bin+d+ha pa te/ go ba he/ dzu re mi tra dzu re/ dzu she/ a gre/ a ba me/ sa s+ya ta thA dA na/ hu lu hi li/ tsan+ne/ sa ma d+ha me/
81b7(rgyud 'bum): d+ha me/ ku tsu ru/ mu tsu ru/ a tsi ta/ tsi li tsi li/ li tsa bA ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mi tra bA ha/ ku lu ku lu/ sa ra sa ra/ ku t+ya ku t+ya/ ma hA sa ra sa ra/ tu Tu tu Tu/ ma hA sa t+ya/ hri da ya/ puSh+pa she su puSh+pa she/ du ma
82a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ri ha re/ a b+ha ye/ ru tsi ni ka rak+She/ a ya mab+hu pi bA ha/ ti ti le/ ma ma le/ pA sha ka/ shi shi ra shi shi ra/ lo ka bi nA ya ka/ badz+re badz+ra d+ha de/ badz+ra bA te/ badz+ra ma de/ badz+ra dad+d+hA/
82a2(rgyud 'bum): tsakra badz+ra ye/ tsakre tsa ba te/ d+hA re d+ha re/ b+ha re b+ha ra/ pu re ta re/ hu hu ra/ b+haM ga bi pa re/ shwa ra/ sha tsi li/ tsu ru/ pu re/ man+ta Ne/ man+ta Ni/ ga ga ra Ni/ mu dra Ne/ sa ra pa mo ha na/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ni
82a3(rgyud 'bum): mu khe shwa ra la ya ni/ ri shiny+dza ni d+ha pa bi tsa/ tsan+na la sa me/ sarba sa t+ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+ThI te sid d+h+yan tu ma hA na ma mi ni/ bA le ra ti/ o dze gr-i/ bi tsi ni/ bA na ha ra/ bu bu re/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru
82a4(rgyud 'bum): mu ru/ hi li hi li/ ha ra ha ra/ ka ka nA da pa ha/ hi hi tAM/ A yur ha na/ kan+ta/ dz+wa lA ba sA ga ra dA ne/ a d+ha ha ni/ marga a b+hi ro ha ni/ pA la sa t+ye/ a ro Sha ba ti/ hi li hi li/ ya thA ba dza sA gra ya
82a5(rgyud 'bum): thA/ pa rany+dza hri da yA ba sa d+ya/ ba ri ba re/ mArga a b+hi ro ha Ne/ a tsa la bud d+hi/ dA da pra tsa tsa pa ya/ bi d+ya hri da ya/ tsan+na tsa ra/ a tsa le/ sho d+ha ni/ pra kr-i ti mA ra ge/ i li i li le/ pra bi sa ra
82a6(rgyud 'bum): pra de/ sarbat+ta ta thA tA sa t+ya nu ga te/ a na ba ra ba te/ a kha ta/ aM gu re/ sha mi ni brah+ma yo hi/ a hi ta/ a b+ha hi/ ni ra ba ya ba/ i tsi ra mArba// la na la gu sA re/ tri rat+na/
82a7(rgyud 'bum): bai she/ d+harma kA ya/ dz+wa le tsan+ne/ sa mu dra ba ti/ ma hA b+hu ta b+hA ya/ sa mu dra be gA ba d+hA ra Ni mu dre Na/ mu khi mu dra/ su ra pra ti sa bi d+ha/ su mu tra a brta ni saM brta ni/ sa ma mo ha skar/ bi b+hu ta
82b1(rgyud 'bum): ra sa na k+Shi ti nu dri to si/ ya ke tsi ta pra ti bI bA ha/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ kri tA/ ka ba tA/ shi la pra tri t+ya hri da ye na mu dr-i tI dA ra ni na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dA ni dA lA/ dan+di la/ shU kra sarba hri d+ha ya/ mu dr-i ta
