82b2(rgyud 'bum): dza du dza ba ta/ dza kha ba ta/ su ma ti pa ti/ ma hA da b+hu ta mu dri ta/ ye ke tsi ta sha da ta na ni shI ta pu ta/ i ni mi te/ sa tsa ne/ go sha sa tsa ni/ bu dri tA/ tsAR+ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na bA ka nga/ thA nA n+ya thA ma hA
82b3(rgyud 'bum): pu N+ya sa muts+tsha ya/ a ba tA ra/ ma hA ka ru Na ya mu dri ta sarba sa myaka ka pra ti pa ta tsi rA rA ta na dz+wa la du d+harma ne tri sarbe mu ni bri Sha b+ha/ ma hA ka ru Na sa mA dI/ dz+nyA na lab+d+ha ba le na me tri t+yag/ a b+hi bIr+ya ba le
82b4(rgyud 'bum): na/ a d+hin+ti te sarba b+hU to be tsa yA ya swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
82b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum smras nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// kye ma thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar
82b6(rgyud 'bum): che'o/ / kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos
82b7(rgyud 'bum): lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
83a1(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ chos kyi
83a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / 'byung ba chen
83a3(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drug yongs su spang bar bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ da lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
83a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
83a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar
83a6(rgyud 'bum): te kun tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zla ba rnams
83a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor/ / 'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pas// /
83b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang // mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas
83b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin gyis brlabs/ / sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// bzod dang nges pa rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong // 'di na ngan byas zlog/
83b3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub lam yang rab ston pa// pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed
83b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed pa// gzungs ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa// byang chub las las mi g.yo ba//
83b5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i// gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas lhag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no// /
83b6(rgyud 'bum): chos smra rnams ni srung ba dang // nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs// bdag gis nga yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang // sems can rnams
83b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi phan 'phel phyir/ / byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su dag 'di la dad pa 'bul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye
84a1(rgyud 'bum): ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo// byin gyis brlab bo// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong
84a2(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos la/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ ro bro ba
84a3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ras dang / rgyan dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan bsgrengs pas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge'i
84a4(rgyud 'bum): khri reg na 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na/ su'ang de'o sems 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yid 'khrug par mi byed do// de'i lus la'ang dbugs
84a5(rgyud 'bum): mi gtong ngo / / klad pa na bar byed mi nus so// mig na ba dang / lcen pa dang / son pa dang / rus pa na ba dang / mgul pa na ba dang / dpung ba na ba dang / rgyaban pa dang / rgyu ma na ba dang / lto na pa dang / chu so na ba dang / brlan
84a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / byin pa na bar byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de ni gnas med do// de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa 'am skad 'gag par gyur na'ang / des
84a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar byed par 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas bde bar 'gyur ro// chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la'ang su'ang khams 'khrug pa 'am
84b1(rgyud 'bum): skad 'gags par byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang
84b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad
84b3(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ shAn+te/ a sa ma ro pe/ mai tri sau ma ba te/ e hi/ na ba kuny+dza
84b4(rgyud 'bum): be na ba kuny+dzA be/ mu la sho d+ha ne/ ba ha kha ba ha kha/ mA ra ba ta tha tA/ pa ri ts+tshe da/ ba ha sa/ ba ha sa/ a mU la/ a tsa la/ tsa tsa le/ pra tsa lA d+hi d+hi le/ e ka na ya pa raM ts+tshe da tsan+ti na/ ba ra se/ ba ra sa tr-i ne/ kha
84b5(rgyud 'bum): ga su/ ra tri ne sta ba su ra tri ne b+hU ta ko Ti pa rits+tshe da dz+wa la kha dz+wa la kha ba ye dz+wa la kha na ma k+Sha khA/ ka ka kha/ ha hA ha hA/ hu hu hu hu/ swaR+sha be da na/ pa rits+tsha da na/ a ma ma n+ya/ ma ma khya/ me ma sa mu dra/ mu dra ba kha/ saM swArA
84b6(rgyud 'bum): ma pa rits+tshi / bo d+hi sA k+Sha te bi mi/ ma hA bi ma/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ A kA shA sha sa pa rits+tshe swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
84b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
85a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di
85a2(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba/ drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang / nang dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad yongs su thar par
85a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes chen po bsags pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do zhes bka' stsal to// yang de'i
85a4(rgyud 'bum): tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /

85a6(rgyud 'bum): tsheche dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'o dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol te// sangs rgyas bcom
85a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyis la/ der bdag la bgegs cung zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa
85b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du/ 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig srung
85b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bshad par bgyi ste/ ci nas spang ma'i dus na bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor ta ma/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor tam/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/

85b4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/ tha na chos
85b5(rgyud 'bum): smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang 'tshe 'am/ gnod par bgyid dam/ 'jigs par bgyid dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po gtong
85b6(rgyud 'bum): ngam tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta na/ bdag gis bdud nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang / chad pas gcad pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang /
85b7(rgyud 'bum): rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par bgyi/ bro 'tshal bar bgyi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi ba'i
86a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung
86a2(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do/ / de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go// de nas brgya byin
86a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug pud 'dzin gyis/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug cig/ che zhe 'dir bag med par
86a4(rgyud 'bum): ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tshe zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnam ni spos la dga'// de bzhin gshegs pa spos mo mnga'o// de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas
86a5(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang ston pa mdzad/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang / yi ge dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/ che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/
86a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas/ de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/ nam mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig lta'i mtshan nyid sgrog btags pa med do// ji ltar
86a7(rgyud 'bum): 'du byed rnams la nam mkha'i mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spros par mi mdzad/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ mi gnas mngon par mi zhen te
86b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du srog la ma yin/ skye ba po la ma yin// gso ba po la ma yin/ skyes bu la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la'ang spro bar mi mdzad/ mngon par
86b2(rgyud 'bum): mi zhen na/ che zhe khyod kyis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rtog ste smros shig/ khyod la des mi sdug pa'i
86b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bur gyur ta re/ skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyes pa'o// skyes bu dam pa 'di ni de
86b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/ 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma rjod cig/ de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin
86b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs rje bar dgongs te bzod par gsol/ 'di skad ces smras pas bdag la 'bras bu mi
86b6(rgyud 'bum): sdug pa thob par ma gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam
86b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te des slar ma bshags su zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad ba bud med kyi dngos
87a1(rgyud 'bum): po yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dpyad kyi dkyil 'khor
87a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod kyis stobs par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te phyogs bcur rnam

87a6(rgyud 'bum): bar gyis de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dad pa stsal du gsol/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang / mna' bsgrag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung
87a7(rgyud 'bum): nas sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so/ / yang de'i tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa

88b7(rgyud 'bum): yul gang bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ba der bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// der chos 'dod pa'i
89a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ / snang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bslad par bgyi'o// yul de na 'thab pa dang /

89a6(rgyud 'bum): srung dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de dag kun gyis bkur ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa/
89a7(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa gnyis na yid
89b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la mig mi 'dzum par bltas te/ gzhan ma
89b2(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa cir yang ma yin par bltas so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye khyod kyi
89b3(rgyud 'bum): mig mi 'dzums par ci'ang ma yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / ci'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos gang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
89b4(rgyud 'bum): gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas/ 'gog pa'i bar du
89b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mchis pas na/ de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na/ srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po
89b6(rgyud 'bum): dedag gang las skye bar 'gyur/ ci nam mkha' las skyes zhes bgyi na/ nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi
89b7(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ / ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin// rtog pa ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa ma yin/ rnam par rig pa
90a1(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ / grub pa ma yin/ brjod pa ma yin te/ ci'ang ma yin pa/ cha shas med pa/ dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid
90a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su bcad pa'o// bri ba med pa 'am gang ba med pa'iphyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o//
90a3(rgyud 'bum): cha shas med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o// mi g.yo zhing rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid thams
90a4(rgyud 'bum): cad med pa'o/ / tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so//
90a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i phyir/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi
90a6(rgyud 'bum): chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs dang / pha rol gnod pas khyod ji ltar bdag la 'tshe/ bdag gi
90a7(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi yul 'joms/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/ 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyi bslab
90b1(rgyud 'bum): pa la slob na/ de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba spyod pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems
90b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul cha
90b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di gang
90b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyis/ snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nad mi bzad pas btab ste/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing lus kyang rul kha dri nga bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam
90b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang
90b6(rgyud 'bum): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu klad pa na bar gyur te/ lus kyang rul cing dri nga bar gyur nas/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
90b7(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byos shig dang / nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis nga gsad pa'i phyir dpag tshad brgyad cu tshun
91a1(rgyud 'bum): chad kyis dang nam mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/ da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te/ nga gsad pa'i bar du bkye bas/ de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang /
91a2(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de bzhin du bdud rnams nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / 'ong
91a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang 'gro ba med pa ci'i'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i bar du mya ngan las
91a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsogs kyi/
91a5(rgyud 'bum): sdig can khyod deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de ltar na khyod klang ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tshor ba 'di las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ mthar gyis sangs
91a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/ bdud kyi yul las ches khyad du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor
91a7(rgyud 'bum): grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ lus srul po ldang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
91b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na/ ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di'ang thob
91b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha' ma'i bar du klad pa na bar gyur kyang / bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chub tu sems mi bskyed do// de nas
91b3(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o// sangs
91b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzud par bgyi ste/ da yang shAkya thub pa nyi ma nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstan pa 'di la chos kyi
91b5(rgyud 'bum): tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o/ / yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o// gang du byung ba der ni shin tu lhag par byung bar
91b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog
91b7(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o// gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi rnam grangs 'di ni tha na bris nas 'chang ba rnams dang / gang na chos smra ba seng ge'i khri la mchis te/
92a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bya'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag
92a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas par phyogs der mchis nas/ chos smra ba de dag dang nyan pa de dag bsrung ba dang sba bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba ne/ a ba me/ aM ba re/ aM ba re/
92a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ri kuny+dzA/ nA da nA da/ puSh+ka rA ba ha/ dza lu ka/ ma kha ya/ i li/ mi li/ ki li/ mi li/ kIrta tsa ra mu dre mu dra mu khe swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi
92a4(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/ bdag gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yongs su dag pas thos te/ der ma mchis na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus
92a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing / bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la/ chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bos
92a6(rgyud 'bum): blang bar bgyi'o/ / chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos smra ba dang chos nyan pa de dag gi nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa dang / bya ba ngan pa dang /
92a7(rgyud 'bum): the tsom thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa der/ bdag 'khor dang bcas te mchis na
92b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ltas ngan pa dang
92b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// den bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang
92b3(rgyud 'bum): sdang ba dang / brlang ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / dring ba dang / reg na mi bde ba'i dug de thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// der tsha ba dang mu
92b4(rgyud 'bum): ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/ / glang po che dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa'i
92b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya'o/ / der sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa'i slad du/ nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro dang / zas dang /
92b6(rgyud 'bum): skom dang / gos dang / gos mal cha sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang
92b7(rgyud 'bum): bder bdag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ / sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod ba'i slad du/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad
93a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / sems can de dag kyang chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa la gzud par bgyi ste/ 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar
93a2(rgyud 'bum): smon lam btab pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
93a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis bdag la yid bzhin du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas de'i mod la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis
93a4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dir gang gi phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams
93a5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'gyur gyis/
93a6(rgyud 'bum): nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa
93a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ tsa muN+De/ muN+Da/ pa ri ts+tsha da/ ha mU ha/ ha mU ha/ saM ra ska ba la kri/ sha mi kha/ pa ri bA ha/ tsa mA ra ya thA tsa/ su bi kha/ a mA la/ pa ri de sarba
93b1(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang /
93b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dgug cing 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su
93b3(rgyud 'bum): gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod 'dis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus par 'gyur ro// dbyangs dang ldan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bud med kyi cha byad 'di
93b4(rgyud 'bum): lta bus chos kyi tshul bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / bud med rnams kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig bu 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam
93b5(rgyud 'bum): klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// yang bud med gang 'di lta bus sems yongs su skyo bar gyur te/ chos kyi
93b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di 'chang zhing klog pa nas/ nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na/ de 'dod pa la spyod kyang mngal du mi chags so// yang bud med gang brnyas shing smad par gyur pa longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang
93b7(rgyud 'bum): bral ba des chos kyi rnam grangs de bklags na/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / sems can gyi bsam
94a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la 'bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
94a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ srung ba dang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // yang de'i tshe
94a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
94a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa nor bu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ brgya byin gyi gzugs dang /
94a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang
94a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang
94a7(rgyud 'bum): dmangs rigs dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo // skad cig gis bya dang / shing dang / ri dang / 'bras bu dang /
94b1(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / mal cha dang / snam bu dang / snod dang / phyang phrul dang / rgyan dang / sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i gzugs dang / yud tsam gyis dge slong dang dge slong ma'i gzugs dang / skad
94b2(rgyud 'bum): cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ngo / / skad cig gis kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir snang ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de
94b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
94b4(rgyud 'bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di mthu rab tu che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi
94b5(rgyud 'bum): yul gang la gnas nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa grangs med
94b6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dag na bsam pa dang / sems ji lta bu dang / spyod pa ji lta bu dang / ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang / gang la skyabs su song ba'i sems can ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
94b7(rgyud 'bum): bar zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems can
95a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ yo byad dang longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag gi
95a2(rgyud 'bum): chags pa spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin
95a3(rgyud 'bum): tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyin gcig la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas te/ theg pa gsum la phyir mi ldog par 'god pa'i dam
95a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin/ bgrod pa ma yin no// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin
95a5(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu chen po brtsams nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang dag gi pha rol tu bla na med pa yang
95a6(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa
95a7(rgyud 'bum): gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so/ / gang pos gsol pa/ 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa
95b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po
95b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skye dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems
95b3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha'
95b4(rgyud 'bum): yas pa'i 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ / des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po dag la sems can rnams yongs
95b5(rgyud 'bum): su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu
95b6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa 'dis sngon sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su chad pa med de/ des smon lam 'di skad
95b7(rgyud 'bum): du nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/ bdag
96a1(rgyud 'bum): gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / pha rol tu
96a2(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa
96a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o/ / ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
96a4(rgyud 'bum): rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / gzhan dag na'ang sems can gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang / the tsom can nas/ mi bde ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de
96a5(rgyud 'bum): ngag nas shi 'phos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byas te/ phyir mi ldog pa la so sor bkod nas/ de nas
96a6(rgyud 'bum): gdong bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun du bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ / de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
96a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams ston pa 'di lta bu dag kyang mnyes par bgyis/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
96b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu'ang mthong / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po lus 'jom
96b2(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin gyis brlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di'ang chos mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par
96b3(rgyud 'bum): rnyed do/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas//
96b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
96b5(rgyud 'bum): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa la 'dir lhags pa thams cad ngas spro bar
96b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa 'di dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
96b7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta bu ni dkon no// de bas na khyed kyis 'di mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di dang / chos kyi
97a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed so so nA rang rang gi smon
97a2(rgyud 'bum): lam thob cig/ yang de'i tshe bdud dge sbyong me tog ces bya bas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi bre ngo byur bur bkang ste/ bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po
97a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas/ bud med kyi gos dang rgyan mchog gis brgyan te 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa
97a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / gang gzhan yongasu dag 'dir 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang /
97a5(rgyud 'bum): myu gu thams cad kyis byung bur yongs su gtam zhing rgyas pa'i bre bo 'di 'bul na/ sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi bre
97a6(rgyud 'bum): zo me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su gtams pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ 'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud
97a7(rgyud 'bum): med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang / skom dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dag kyang yongs su smin par bgyi/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa
97b1(rgyud 'bum): des bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad
97b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis mi brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi na/ bdag gi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces
97b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems mngon par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so legs so//
97b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi bre bo me tog dang 'bras bus yongs su gang ba 'di'ang bzhes so// khyod kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / lo tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa dang / gang gi phyir
97b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa rnyed par gyur cig/ khyod kyi re ba yid kyi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub pa gyur cig/ 'byor pa'ang phun sum tshogs
97b6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur cig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis yang gsol pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brag gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang
97b7(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ ston tam/ 'chad dam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te bsti stang bgyid pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brag de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de dang de dag tu
98a1(rgyud 'bum): shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang 'bras bu nas/ 'bru dang me tog gi bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de dag thams cad na me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshin
98a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bas na tshe bas pa ma gtogs par/ gal te de na sems can me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du 'gum
98a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyis/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag
98a4(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang sems can rnams me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal ba de ni bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
98a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyur 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de na me tog dang 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / snying rje'i sems su gyur pa de ni bdag gi
98a6(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de ni bdag gi brtson
98a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ / gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
98b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ / gang me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang ri dgas kyang chos 'tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur
98b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du 'byung ba der sems can gyi 'bras dang / gro dang / nas dang / til dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u dang / rgya sran dang / sran chung dang / sran ma dgas
98b3(rgyud 'bum): dag la tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o/ / 'bru dang lo tog mang po de dag gis kyang mdzod dang bang ba rnams thams cad yongs su gtam par bgyi'o// de na sems can tha na
98b4(rgyud 'bum): bya dang ri dgas dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na/ de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// der bdag gis bu ram shing dang / rgun 'brum dang / bal po'i
98b5(rgyud 'bum): se'u'i khu shugs shin tu mang po bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bya sgyogs rnams yongs su gtam par bgyi'o// gang de na tha na bya dang ri dgas la
98b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas 'tshal na'ang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ / de ltar bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang
98b7(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag gis byang chub sems
99a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs
99a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po byed nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba brtul ba de lta bus
99a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis shig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de las dbugs 'byin pa de thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas
99a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs su gsol/ / gang la la zhig na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi/ gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas te/ sa phyogs de na
99a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa'i slad du/ rab tu snum bag can dang / shin tu che ba dang / shin tu mang ba dang / shin tu ro
99a6(rgyud 'bum): bda' ba dang / shin tu kha dog dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi/ sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung bas tshim por bgyi/ sems can rnams kyi mdzod dang / bang ba dang / bum pa dang / rdza ma dang / bya sgyogs
99a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams shin tu yongs su gang bar bgyi/ than gang bya dang ri dgas kyis de la 'tshal kyang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzir
99b1(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa stong thams cad du sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'di lta bu dag gis tshim par bgyi/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa grangs ma
99b2(rgyud 'bum): mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su bskal pa stong re re la'ang skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu bgyi zhing / de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par

99b4(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ tsa me kha/ tsa me kha/ bri bri ta ha ste/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ sma ra asma kan/ sarti bi ba ba sa be/ sa ra sa ren+te/ sa ra ma hen+te/ sa ra badz+ren+te/ ta ra pa ya asma kan/ hu hu/ hu hu/
99b5(rgyud 'bum): hu hu/ a saM ga dza be/ ta kha ta kha ta kha/ bA yu bA he/ u pa nA ya/ san ta ra pA ya/ bi dza pA/ push+ma sha/ o sha d+hi/ d+ha na d+ha n+ye ne/ tsan+na/ ak+Sha ye dza la b+ha ha ne/ sma ra asmA kan/ sa mya ka pra ti pan
99b6(rgyud 'bum): napa ya ma/ sa ta ta kA li/ ya ma me/ ma mi ma mi da dza ba ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag smin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gang dang gang na
99b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad pa de dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o/ / de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de
100a1(rgyud 'bum): la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / bdud 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
100a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang /

100a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa legaso legs so// kho bo cag gi bsod nams dang / brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon
100a5(rgyud 'bum): pas skyes bu'i mthu de lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba can su
100a6(rgyud 'bum): spro/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i grogs bgyi'o//
100a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu dam pa khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig
100b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud dge sbyong me tog gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag de bzhin du gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de'ang bdag cag
100b2(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid
100b3(rgyud 'bum): pa lags te/ 'di nyid du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das padag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol
100b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ bdud dge sbyong me
100b5(rgyud 'bum): tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pad+mo'i gdong longs shig/ khyod kyis de ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab// rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkres pa'i
100b6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal gyis/ / gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin dri meng dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // stong zhing mtshan ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul las
100b7(rgyud 'bum): rab grol bar/ / rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring po mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i// sangs rgyas dgra thul blo gros shin tu brtan pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga' zhing yid de
101a1(rgyud 'bum): ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las 'dra
101a2(rgyud 'bum): te thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
101a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bskal pa bzang po byung nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/ sems
101a4(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin blangs te/ rtswa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// sems can rnams kyi longs
101a5(rgyud 'bum): spyong du bgyi ba dang / nang rab tu zhi ba'i slad du sman bcud kyis len brgya rtsa bzhir sbyar te/ rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / mar la sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bru mar la
101a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang / bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / sma na nad med ces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhi nas/ ska ba'i phye ma dang / ril bu dang / snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rtsa bzhi bstan to// sems can
101a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / nad zhi ba bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa la kun
101b1(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ der bdag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis/ bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma 'ongs
101b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus ni skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya
101b3(rgyud 'bum): ba 'byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/ der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
101b4(rgyud 'bum): tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i 'og tu 'od srungs kyis kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas//
101b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nang pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sman chen po bcud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cing / der yang bdag gis
101b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi sbyang ba dang nang rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcung rgya chen po blangs nas rtswa dang / rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lo tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to//
101b7(rgyud 'bum): de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'tshal nas/ sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par so sor
102a1(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa gang 'jug pa de'ang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes bu'i mthu chen po bgyid
102a2(rgyud 'bum): pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyi spro ba chen po dang /
102a3(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa 'di lta bu dang / sems can nad pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / bsnyed bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
102a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ / da ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do// skal pa
102a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'di'o grogs su'ang gyur cig/ bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par
102a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bud med rnams rab tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang / rgan po rnams kyi nang rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i srad du/ sa'i bcud las byin blangs
102a7(rgyud 'bum): pa zas dang / skom dang / kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa sbyar ba bgyis te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i gyur gyur cig/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
102b1(rgyud 'bum): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la legs so zhes bgyi ba sngal du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag
102b2(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces
102b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / khyod ni 'jig rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa// pad+ma ldan pa zhing gtsang dam pa der// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang
102b4(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis smon lam btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal
102b5(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni ri dang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste/ / khyod ni re ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur// rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par ni// ye shes dbang phyug ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub
102b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyis 'dir ni
102b7(rgyud 'bum): thabs dang shes rab kyis/ / me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas// zhing mchog rnam par dag bsgo ldan du// nyi ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba
103a1(rgyud 'bum): ston ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
103a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni// skye bo byang chub yongs su smin byas nas// skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par// me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par
103a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la g.yo 'di rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spong pas sems can yongs su smin
103a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces stsal to// g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te// khyod na nyon mongs rab tu ni byed cing // rnam dag zhing
103a5(rgyud 'bum): dumanyam nyid don mthong ba/ / zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i blon ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam ma mas
103a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sngon lam btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe de la'ang 'di nad ces bka' stsal to// mi gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan med// yang dag byang
103a7(rgyud 'bum): chub lam mchog don sgrub/ / sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med bzhin du// ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mchog smra ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pas//
103b1(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
103b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la ni// me tog spos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu// kun nas spos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur//
103b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa tshon sna tshogs la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon
103b4(rgyud 'bum): lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud nas su// dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas// sngon por snang ba
103b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu/ / rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du sa bon dang / nags tshal dang / 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong drug cu
103b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bud med yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
103b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang / de dag tshigs su bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pho mtshan gyur te mo mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par sla la/ mo mtshan gyur te pho
104a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas klu dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang tshigs su bcad
104a2(rgyud 'bum): pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo/ / de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / lha dang mi'i bu mo mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu dang / bdud dang
104a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas/ mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa
104a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / bud meng dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa nas/ tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor khung
104a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa thob bo/ / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang
104a6(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas dang / sha za bgrang ba khas 'das pa sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i
104a7(rgyud 'bum): sa la gnas par gyur to/ / sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las
104b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob nas/ 'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems bskyed nas
104b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsam
104b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ / gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang yi ger 'dri ba nas/ 'chang bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rigs pas yongs su
104b4(rgyud 'bum): bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
104b5(rgyud 'bum): pas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang /
104b6(rgyud 'bum): zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
104b7(rgyud 'bum): su smin par bgyi ba dang / ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems bskyed ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang / gang gi slad du 'tshal ba dang / ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang /
105a1(rgyud 'bum): zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams sprul pa 'am/ bshams pa 'byor par 'gyur ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di
105a2(rgyud 'bum): ngag skyes bu chen po'i mthu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams la longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
105a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid la mdzad pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyi
105a4(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa dang yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i
105a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbyin no/ / 'di lta ste/ dz+yo ti ba ba/ d+hi to ba ba/ mu ni ba ba/ sad t+ya ba pa/ bu rgya a lang kA ra ba ba/ d+hAn ra sa pa ba/ ma hA kA ru Na ba pa/ ma hA pra ti ba ra/
105a6(rgyud 'bum): a mo ha ba pa/ ru ti ba ba/ k+Shi ti ba ba/ sA li la ba ga/ kha ga ba ba/ bA yu ba ba/ brta ba pa/ a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/ a ma ba ba/ a ha naM ba ba/ ta tha thA ba ba/ b+hu ta ko Ti be ba/ niri bri ti ba ba
105a7(rgyud 'bum): tri kug la ba la/ tri yan pa'i/ kridwa thug pa pa/ tri li mo ldab pa/ tri shu kra ba pa/ ma.a a d+hin+d+ha na pa pa/ babab pa ba ba sa mahA/ oM n+ya sa ma hA/ tata taT Tam man+ta/ sarbag la
105b1(rgyud 'bum): mu ya a d+hiSh+ThA na ya swA hA/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag sems can rnams kyi longs
105b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa dang / kun spyod par bya ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zung zhig/ yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang / dpal gyi lha mo dang
105b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang / lha mo sa 'dzin la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun sbyong ba dang / yongs
105b4(rgyud 'bum): su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom
105b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs pas na/ byin gyis brlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so// bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes
105b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par nus so/ / bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson 'grus drag pos spro bar bgyi'o// yang
105b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o// lha 'am klu nas/ mi'i bar gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs
106a1(rgyud 'bum): pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis bar bgyid dam/ zhig par bgyid dam/ rnam par ma rung bar bgyid la/ bdag cag gi dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas
106a2(rgyud 'bum): papar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gal te ma bzlog gam nan tan ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag
106a3(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ kye grogs po dag lha nas/ mi'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la 'tshe
106a4(rgyud 'bum): la/ gal te bdag cag gis de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
106a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub don du gnyer
106a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang / chab dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / byad dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pas
106a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / nad dang /
106b1(rgyud 'bum): bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
106b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/ bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum
106b3(rgyud 'bum): du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas tham cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de'i tshe gang
106b4(rgyud 'bum): ngag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so legs
106b5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / khyed kyis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la
106b6(rgyud 'bum): ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de/ / de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byos// sdig can khyod ni rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyis// thub pa la ni
106b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis sngo zhing brnyogs par byed pa btang bar byos/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol ba/ khyod kyi tshig gis byang chub dri med dad pa'i sems gcig bdag mi bskyed// thub pa ma gsungs
107a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis/ / de dag lhan cig bdag cag gi yul nas dpung dang bzhon par bcas par gnas par bgyi// phun sum tshogs 'dzin
107a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang mi mchis/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me
107a3(rgyud 'bum): tog man nga ra ba'i dri mos kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji ltar 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te/ nyon mongs pa can
107a4(rgyud 'bum): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlabs/ bdud bye ba ni pham par mdzad/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can
107a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la ni gzigs/ sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tu thar bar mdzad/ shes rab kyi sgron ma ni 'bar bar mdzad// zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom
107a6(rgyud 'bum): pab zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bshad/ nag po'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa de bzhin du/
107a7(rgyud 'bum): da ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / sems can la thugs brtse ba'i srad du nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
107b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de/ chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du ni mdzad na/ shAkya thub pa nyi ma khyod nub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di su zhig
107b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'dra bar bgyid par 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang
107b3(rgyud 'bum): bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyid/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mnang
107b4(rgyud 'bum): ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnam sam/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang
107b5(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ gang su'ang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa
107b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu
107b7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par mdzad cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs
108a1(rgyud 'bum): pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig/
108a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skad cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa
108a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di'ang shin tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bla na med pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
108a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad 'dus te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas/
108a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so// chu'i khams thams cad dang
108a6(rgyud 'bum): me'i khams thams cad dang / rlung gi khams thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ gang dag sangs rgyas
108a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
108b1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / gang dag yang gzi brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams
108b2(rgyud 'bum): cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byon gyis brlabs te/ khyed kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyis/ ci nas
108b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig/ 'bar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag
108b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ yi ger bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dam pa'i chos
108b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rigs par khyed kyi lag tu gtad kyis/ chos smra ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / bsam gtan la mngon par
108b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
108b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
109a1(rgyud 'bum): du 'dus nas/ chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang / mi nub par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
109a2(rgyud 'bum): bar gyi phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad ngo // de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams
109a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang / nyon mongs pa can snyogs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis 'dus te/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/ chos
109a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshul 'di'ang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtong par 'gyur ro//
109a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du nged kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang / gling bzhi pa na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
109a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyis/ ci nas myur du mi
109a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig cing nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig/ rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/ srung bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa gang dag dang dam bcas
109b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ tha na glegs pam la bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang /
109b2(rgyud 'bum): chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi
109b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas nas/ dmangs kyi
109b4(rgyud 'bum): khyim gyi bar du gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod de 'chad dam/ lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par bgyi ngam/ tha na glegs ba ma la bris te 'chang na/ chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang sems can dmangs
109b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ khyed des mdangs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ khyed kyi g.yog 'khor dang gzhal med khang 'phel bar 'gyur/ mi'i rgyal
109b6(rgyud 'bum): po rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang chos kyi bcud des tshim
109b7(rgyud 'bum): nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la'ang mngon par yid ches par 'gyur/ dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/ ser sna med pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i
110a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos po'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems nas/ yang dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// so so bdag bdag gi yul la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i
110a2(rgyud 'bum): gling 'di'i nga skye bo rags pas gang bar 'gyur/ shin tu lo legs par 'gyur/ shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang / shin tu
110a3(rgyud 'bum): zhim pa dang / lo ma'i sman dang / me tog gi sman dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams shin tu 'byor pa dang / nad med pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa skyed par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang /
110a4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dug dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma le ba dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin bu ma rungs pa dang / ri dgas dang // bya dang / spyang ki dang / dus ma yin pa'i
110a5(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang / char pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar ma dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyang phal
110a6(rgyud 'bum): cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyong bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag
110a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te/ grags pa
110b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// mdor na tshe 'di la
110b2(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur ba 'phangs pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par/ gang gzhan lus dang /
110b3(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang / yid kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na'ang / 'dus pa chen po sangs
110b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa
110b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel
110b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa dang / zhi zhing phra ba'i lam thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grang
110b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs 'di shin tu snum par 'gyur// 'bras bu mngangs dang ldan pa dang /
111a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / ro med pa spong bar 'gyur/ me tog dang 'bras bu shin tu 'byor pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang khang pa dang / mdzod dang /
111a2(rgyud 'bum): rdza phra dang / bya sgyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams shin tu 'byor par 'gyur te/ de na sems can gang dag zas dang skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag
