111a3(rgyud 'bum): ni shin tu nad med pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba
111a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis khyed kyi g.yog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyis
111a5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye ba'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shig/ sems can rnams kyi chos kyi don la tshud cig/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
111a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / srung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
111a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya
111b1(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi dbang po nas/ tshangs pa'i dbang po dang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal cher gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas
111b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bkas spro ba mdzad do/ / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun
111b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du
111b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing gus pa chen pos gzung bar bgyi'o// snying rjes sems can yongs su smin
111b5(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bgyi ba nas/ bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang /
111b6(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa'i gnas su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos yun du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
111b7(rgyud 'bum): gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs
112a1(rgyud 'bum): pa nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang / gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dug pa sems can gzi brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
112a2(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas/
112a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o// chos 'tshal ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o//
112a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang /
112a5(rgyud 'bum): mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / gdug pa dang / rtsub pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / sra ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu
112a6(rgyud 'bum): ni bar bgyi'o/ / bde ba dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'dum par bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyi'o// chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag
112a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang shin tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba
112b1(rgyud 'bum): byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ bdag dang ga gzhan dang / gnyis ka'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
112b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir
112b3(rgyud 'bum): brtson na/ khyed ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
112b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i dbang po nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang / gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dug ste 'di
112b5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas
112b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rigs pas blang bar bgyi ba nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang /
112b7(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag yang chos sgrub pas gnas pa 'am/ chos smra
113a1(rgyud 'bum): ba 'am/ chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glegs bam
113a2(rgyud 'bum): la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gos dang / gdugs
113a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / byug pa nas/ sman dang yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis bsti stang du bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa 'am/ ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi
113a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par shes nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan gyis bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad
113a5(rgyud 'bum): du zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus
113a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan/ ye shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing / tshogs dang mthu thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag gis yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang / rtsod
113a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /
113b1(rgyud 'bum): ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / rtsub pa dang / brlang ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shin tu bde ba dang / lo legs pa
113b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / nyams dga' ba dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / 'dum pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams dus dus su 'byung bar bgyi'o// mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba
113b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o// gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o// 'bab chu dang / chu mig
113b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka'ang shin tu gtam par bgyi'o// gang du sems can rnams chu'i klung gis gnod par 'gyur ba de'ang bdag cag gis bsal bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
113b5(rgyud 'bum): ljongs de dag tu'ang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang / yal ga dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / lo tog rnams
113b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu snum pa dang / bda' ba dang / kha dog dang / ro che zhing mang ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can rnams la nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par
113b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang / sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang / dpal dang / bsod nams 'byung bas tshe ring po 'grub par bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
114a1(rgyud 'bum): rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor gang dag na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang dam
114a2(rgyud 'bum): tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ngam/ mchod pa dang / bsti stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang
114a3(rgyud 'bum): bapar bgyi/ de dag la gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/ phan pa bsgrub par bgyi/ ltad mo dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / byed pa ngan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs ngan pa dang / smon lam ngan
114a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phrag dog dang / khro ba dang / ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i
114a5(rgyud 'bum): lta ba'i lam drang po dang / dad pa dang / dul ba dang / kun sdom pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gzung bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang
114a6(rgyud 'bum): blon po dang / rtsis pa chen po dang / grong rdal dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / rigs bzhi rnams dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing
114a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i bar la gzung bar bgyi'o// tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang
114b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba nas/ glegs bam la bris te gzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na/ sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / brtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul
114b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du/ bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
114b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bzang dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi nub par nan tan byas na/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du
114b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de
114b5(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa/
114b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bzang dag pa sems can la snying rje ba'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
114b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas te/ sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang / g.yon can gyis gces pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni pham par byas/
115a1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgrengs/ sems can tshad med pa dag ni sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi char ni phab/ ngas bdud bye ba ni pham par byas so//
115a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bzang dag gang gi phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med
115a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang / sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya/
115a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos chos
115a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shig/ gang
115a6(rgyud 'bum): nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / dran pa dang / brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang /
115a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang bsam gtan dang po sgom pa nas/ 'du shes
115b1(rgyud 'bum): dang tsher ba 'gog pa sgom pa'i bar dang / gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs dang / gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi
115b2(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta na byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de thams
115b3(rgyud 'bum): cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/ / gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// ma 'ongs
115b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grong ngam
115b5(rgyud 'bum): dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na chos slu shin tu khrus byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs
115b6(rgyud 'bum): bting ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chang dam/ tha na glegasAl bris te klog pa der/ gal te khyed chos mnyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa
115b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams yongs su bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang / gzhan dang / gnyis ka'i mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir ma dong na/ de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang / lam bskyed pa la rmongs pa byas
116a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus nangs pa'i chos kyi tshul
116a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di rab tu nub par gyur pa na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam
116a3(rgyud 'bum): bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
116a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos gsar pa 'tshal te/ me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs
116a5(rgyud 'bum): bting ba/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i sang ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang dam/ bris te klog pa der chos nyan pa 'am/
116a6(rgyud 'bum): chos smra ba de bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa de dag dang / bdag dang / gzhan dang / gnyis ka'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su byang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul chen
116a7(rgyud 'bum): po yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug pa'i slad du/ bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te der ma mchis sam/ grong nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag
116b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyang ba dang / sems can de dag gi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po rab tu gang ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i
116b2(rgyud 'bum): bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ aM gu ha/ aM gu ha/ aM gu ha/ d+haM ga pu ra ha/ na yA mi kha/ kha kha kha ba kha ba/ kli na na kha ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag
116b3(rgyud 'bum): chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung ba nas/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po rnam par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so//
116b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs
116b5(rgyud 'bum): so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no/ / de nas ko'u shi kas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ grong ngam grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
116b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / 'di lta ste/ kha ba mr-i kha/ a ba mA~M kha/ na la g+ha/ a mud dz+nyA/ a mU baH
116b7(rgyud 'bum): a khat+ta/ a kha/ a sha kha/ dzi na pra khe swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas/ mi dang mi ma
117a1(rgyud 'bum): yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o/ / de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus
117a2(rgyud 'bum): na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ u kha na
117a3(rgyud 'bum): ba na ba sa ba na/ sa mU drA saM bid dz+nyA ta thA ts+tsha ta/ ba ru Na ba ba rA dza swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas mig mi
117a4(rgyud 'bum): bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni
117a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ dza lo g+ha/ a to ga/ a ma ma/ mo g+ha/ a ma sA rA dzA na tsa la
117a6(rgyud 'bum): mu dza swA hA/ de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin to// de nas yang yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar
117a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/
117b1(rgyud 'bum): bin+du dza kha/ kha ba dza ba ra mu kha/ k+Sha swa ra/ pu ka ba ha/ A mArma ba Ta swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di
117b2(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom
117b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i bar gyi dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ k+Shu dre/ k+Shu k+Shu k+Shud+de/ kha stu dre/ sA tIk+Sh+Na dre/ a nA ya na k+Sha dre/ hrid k+Shu dre/ sA ga ra hr-i dak+Shu dre/ saM gu
117b4(rgyud 'bum): suny+tsa dwe/ d+ha ma k+Sha ya mu dre swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gnas pa'i gnod
117b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po stong nyis brgya dang / gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
117b6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar
117b7(rgyud 'bum): du nub par gyur pa de'i tshe/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri bregs sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi
118a1(rgyud 'bum): khyim mam/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i
118a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas/ gos gsar pa bgos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ spos sna tshogs
118a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis gtam brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam
118a4(rgyud 'bum): la bris te klog phar gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba bsrung ba dang / rang gi 'khor bsrung ba dang / sems can gzhan yang bsrung
118a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong ngam grong rdal nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongs su ma bskyangs sam/
118a6(rgyud 'bum): der sems can rnams kyi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po rab tu ma gtam mam/ der ma mchis sam/ der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi
118a7(rgyud 'bum): dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i cher dang / rlung dang / shin tu grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na/ bdag cag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
118b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das thams cad la bslus pa dang / 'khus pa dang / ma mnyes par bgyis par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang / lta ba yongs su nyams pa dang / lus rul bar 'gyur ro// bdag
118b2(rgyud 'bum): cag g.yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o//
118b3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ yongs su smin par bgyi'o// ngan par bgyis pa'i
118b4(rgyud 'bum): las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba de dag gi nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod dang /
118b5(rgyud 'bum): kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ mi dang mi ma
118b6(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
118b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ci lags/ gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems
119a1(rgyud 'bum): dpar lhad mo can gyis gsol pa/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ rigs kyi bu 'din
119a2(rgyud 'bum): ma yin no/ / bdud sdig can g.yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste/ 'khrug cing yid ma dga' nas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di glags lta zhing skabs
119a3(rgyud 'bum): tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang / g.yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya po de dag kyang
119a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas 'di dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du/ 'di dag nga'i
119a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa dang /
119a6(rgyud 'bum): mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang / smon lam btab pa'i phyir sems mtshams mi sbyor/ dad par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/
119a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gtong bar mi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang / gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa
119b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags
119b2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na'ang de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gyur 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes
119b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dkon gachog gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa
119b4(rgyud 'bum): thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las langs nas kun tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
119b5(rgyud 'bum): stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
119b6(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / bdud g.yog
119b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma can thams cad rnam par spyod pa/ yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs
120a1(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
120a2(rgyud 'bum): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ngan par spong ba dang ldan pa'i sems
120a3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang / theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang /
120a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / dkon gacho ga gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyis/ de la khyed kyis kyang ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
120a5(rgyud 'bum): tshul 'di'ang rnam par mi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang / bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
120a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' la'ang che ba 'am/ rnam par 'jog pa 'am/ nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang / chos la nan tan
120a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo las
120b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum la mngon par brtson pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga' ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la
120b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur pa de dag la'ang bdud dam/ bdud kyi bu 'am/ bdud kyi bu mo 'am/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ bdud kyi
120b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mo 'am/ bdud kyi pho nyas gtses pa'i bsam pas glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas
120b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol lo/ / bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang /
120b5(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/ gang
120b6(rgyud 'bum): su da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag la
120b7(rgyud 'bum): thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/ bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig/ bdag gis bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor de nan thur gyis tshar gcad pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / lus la gnod pa dang /
121a1(rgyud 'bum): lus sra bkong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshad par bgyi ste/ de nas bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi 'khor mo dang
121a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi pho nyas gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam/ dge slong la 'tshe 'am/ tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sems 'khrugs par bgyid pa nas/ dge ba'i
121a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs yongs su 'bri bar bgyi ba'i bar du nan tan bgyid pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang // ri brags de rnams ma rung bar bgyid par sems
121a4(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag tu phan skad cig gcig tsam yang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus
121a5(rgyud 'bum): ma legs pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / chu bo dang / sa g.yo ba dang / sa 'gas pa dang / skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang
121a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bru dang / sman dang / ro skye bar mi bgyid dam/ ma rung bar bgyid par 'tshal na bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud nas/ bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis tsha bar 'gyur/ lus
121a7(rgyud 'bum): lci ba dang / rdul ba dang / rul ba dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / las su mi rung ba dang / ldang mi nus par 'gyur/ bcing ba lngas bdag bcings par mthong ba nas/ de'i yan lag thams
121b1(rgyud 'bum): cad 'khum pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing slar brkyang mi nus pa dang / de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas/ nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang / de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrugs par 'gyur/
121b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i dbang po drug kyang spyod yul du 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ a ha ma ma le/ a dza ba ba/ a dza ba ba/ mU ra sa le bya kha sa le/ dza ma sa le/ ha ha ha ha ha ha
121b3(rgyud 'bum): g+ho ra sat+ta/ dza na kha ga/ dz+nyA ya kha ga bi dzI ba sa kha ga/ a mu'u kA ra/ k+Sha k+Sha/ k+Sha k+Sha k+Shak+Sha/ mU la ba ha/ kha ga sa/ kha dz+nyA sa/ pa ri bat+tA/ mU ra/ a dzA/ bA yuHdz+nyA/ tsan+d+ra sud+yo dz+nyA na
121b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ha nya dz+nyA/ khur khA nya dzA/ ba bai nya da nya/ b+hu ta ko Ti ti thA tA nya dz+nyA/ sarba dzA b+hi/ a d+hiSh+NI ti nya dz+nyA/ pa rA kra ma tri ga Na ta k+Sha ba/ kA ma makA ma dz+nyA/ kI pre ta mA ra bi shA ya sAMh+na/ thams cad mkhyen pa rnams
121b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas te 'bras bu med par gyur to/ / gang su'ang rung gnod pa 'dod pa de dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
121b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas de'i tshe
121b7(rgyud 'bum): sa ni g.yos/ sprin ni 'khrugs/ ri'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yos te/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud
122a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrugs so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo glos la smras pa/ rigs
122a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu bdud ri byi 'di'i stobs ga las 'ongs/ mthu ga las 'ongs na/ gang snying rje med pa 'dis rang gi phyogs thams cad dang / nga'i stobs kyi yul dang / pha rol gnod pa thams cad ma lus par
122a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ste/ nag po'i rtsa lag ni pham par byas/ mi mthun par chad par smra ba dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas/ bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang / rul ba dang /
122a4(rgyud 'bum): las su mi rung bar gyur/ bdag gi phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te snang zhing mthong ba med par byas/ yongs su gdung ba chen pos bdag gdungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros
122a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis smras pa/ sdig can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis stobs bskyed pas/ bdud ri byos bdud kyi stobs kyi yul dang
122a6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gnon pa 'di thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / de gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyis/ sdig can khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dang bar gyis shig/
122a7(rgyud 'bum): ci nas khyod lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems skyed cig/ bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/
122b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med pa 'di bas kyang chos sdig pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la sgo'i// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni bdag sems mi bskyed
122b2(rgyud 'bum): do/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas ni gnod
122b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin 'jigs 'dzags lta'i gzugs su yang dag shes ni ri dgas kyi gzugs su/ shes pa'i sgron ma ni spre'u'i gzugs su/ sred spong ni ra'i gzugs su/ rgyun bcad ni glang po che'i gzugs su//
122b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can chen po lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ko'u di n+ya 'od 'phro'i spyan sngar 'khod nas// de dag gi lus thams cad las rnam par dag
122b5(rgyud 'bum): cing dri zhim pa'i 'od phyung ngo / / de nas sems can chen po lnga po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nor bu rin po che chen po me'i 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thogs so// de nas byang chub
122b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis de dag gi bsam pa tshul bzhin rnam par dag pa la bltas te/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o snyam nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
122b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis dbang gang mthong na khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par
123a1(rgyud 'bum): byed/ 'brog gnas kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
123a2(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ngo / / de'i tshe bdag cag spun lnga drung du gyur te/ de na bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/
123a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byas so// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin
123a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar du de na'ang bdag cag sngon smon lam gyis spun drung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag cag gis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang
123a5(rgyud 'bum): po byas so/ / de nas yang der sems can chen po dge bsnyen yang dag shes bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bas der 'di 'dra ba'i smon lam btab ste/ bdag bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di la gnod
123a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi rje dpon chen por gyur la/ de na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa ma rungs pa/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa/ byang gzugs tha dad pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas
123a7(rgyud 'bum): lus srul po'i bar du de dag la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar dad pa thob par byas nas bslab pa 'dzin du btsud la/ zhi ba'i lam la dgod pa nas/ de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas
123b1(rgyud 'bum): su song ba'i ri dgas dang / spyang ki dang / dgo ba dang / phag pa la sogs pa la'ang chos bshad pa nas/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song
123b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i bar la chos bshad pas yongs su smin par byas nas/ theg pa gsum po dag la so sor ba kod de/ de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
123b3(rgyud 'bum): tu lung bstan pa thob par shog cig ces byas so/ / de bzhin du gnod sbyin shes pa'i sgron ma spre'u'i gzugs kyis spre'u yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// sred spong ra'i gzugs
123b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis mi khom pas nyam nga bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/ / rgyun bcad glang po che'i gzugs kyis glang po che yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon
123b5(rgyud 'bum): lam btab ste/ de bzhin du gnod sprin rdzu 'phrul chen po gling bzhi pa na gnas pa khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
123b6(rgyud 'bum): smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs btab par gyur nas/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'dzag de'i spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing / bskal pa bzang po 'di
123b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo/ / 'di na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/ snying rje med pa/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ yang ba spyod pa/ sdig pa 'dod pa/ snying
124a1(rgyud 'bum): rje dang mi ldan pa nas/ lus srul po sems can la 'tshe ba/ mdangs 'phrog pa/ sems 'khrugs par byed pa/ mi dge ba'i sems su byed pa/ srog gcod pa nas/ log pa la
124a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i bar dag dang ldan pa/ rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag sems 'khrugs pa dang / yul 'khor dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang /
124a3(rgyud 'bum): grong rdal dang / ljongs 'khrugs par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / dus dang / lo 'khrugs par byed pa/
124a4(rgyud 'bum): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / rab tu grang ba dang / tsha bar byed pa/ sa bon dang / sman dang /
124a5(rgyud 'bum): lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa/ sems can gyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / 'dum pa dang / dge ba'i chos la mos pa dang / sa'i bcud
124a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / mdangs dang / don dang / chos kyi ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro nub par byed pa rnams bslab pa 'dzin du btsud de phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas/ gang tshun chad bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
124a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de tshun chad bdag rtag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi nang du skyes te/ gnod sbyin sdig can nas/ lus srul po'i bar theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin
124b1(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing de tshun chad sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma mthong yang brnyas par mi dran gyi/ sems can ci 'dra ba mthong ba de nyid kyi tshul gyis de dag la smras/
124b2(rgyud 'bum): / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas// sdig pa las bzlog/ byams pa dang snying rje'i sems la bzhag ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag
124b3(rgyud 'bum): la phyir mi ldog par so sor bkod do/ / bdag gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gang dang gang du phyin pa der de dag gnod sbyin 'brog gnas bde bar 'ongs sam zhes tshig tu 'bod do// de bas na bdag
124b4(rgyud 'bum): ming 'brog gnas shes bya bar gyur to/ / gang dag da ltar chos snying po dang bral zhing sdom pa la mi gnas te/ gcig tu las nag po spyod pa'i mi de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum
124b5(rgyud 'bum): du skyes te/ mi'i nang du nyung zad cig skye'o// gang dag las 'dren mar spyod cing dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob pa de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas phal cher gnod sbyin sdig can dang / gnod
124b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin lus srul po'i nang du skye'o/ / de bas na da ltar 'jig rten na gnod sbyin sdig can nas/ gnod sbyin lus srul po'i bar du shin tu phal che bar rnam par 'phel te/ de dag thams cad dkar po'i
124b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa sha stag go/ / de bas na da ltar shin tu dus ngan pa la bab pas bdag gis 'jam pos ni dus thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul po ma rungs pa'i
125a1(rgyud 'bum): bar dag chos dkar po la dgod par mi nus/ bdag gis rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / dge sbyong dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
125a2(rgyud 'bum): khye'u dang / bu mo 'khrugs pa rnams kyang slar zhi bar bya mi nus/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar bya mi nus// bdag
125a3(rgyud 'bum): gagis 'byung po rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'ang phyir zhing rnam par thar pa'i ro la dgod par yang mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu gnod sbyin dang lus srul po thams cad kyi snying la sbyor ba mi drang ba'i shes
125a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis shes so/ / rigs kyi bu 'byung po rnams kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba rig pa'i gsang sngag kyi gzung kyi tshig drag po mi bzad pa
125a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po yod de/ gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis btab na/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/
125a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srin po dang / srin mo nas/ klu dang / klu mo dang / grul bum dang / thul bum mo dang / brjed byed dang / brjed byed mo'i bar dang / nyin gcig
125a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgan po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul gyi bu 'am/ lus srul gyi bu mo 'am/ lus srul gyi 'khor po 'am
125b1(rgyud 'bum): lus skul gyi 'khor mo'i bar dag gis phyi phyir zhing rgyal rigs dkrug pa nas/ ljongs kyi bar du dkrug par byed mi nus so// rigs kyi bu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du
125b2(rgyud 'bum): gang na rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po drag po mi bzad pa chen po rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyur pa der gnod sprin dang / lus srul po ma rungs
125b3(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag gis sngon khon du bzung zhing mi dge ba'i las byed pa de dag thams cad btang nas/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / sems 'jam pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa dang / phan pa'i sems
125b4(rgyud 'bum): su 'gyur ro/ / yul 'khor dang // dmangs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srus po'i 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / char pa dang / dug dang /
125b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshon dang / byad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / lus kyi rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i rims dang / mdze
125b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / sbom po dang / g.yan pa dang / lud pa dang / 'brus bu dang / lton pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dang / 'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed do// de na mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / ri dgas dang /
125b7(rgyud 'bum): bya la sogs pa las dkar po'i mtha' la mngon par brtson pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas nyin mtshan 'das par byed pa dang / dge ba dang /
126a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / lus dang sems mi ngal bar byang chub kyi lam tshol ba la brtson par byed do// yang 'di skad ces
126a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang smras te/ rigs kyi bu ci ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di stsal cing byin gyis brlabs par mdzad de/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na/ bdag gis
126a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa/ mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad zlog par bgyid la/ dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po thams
126a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol
126a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i yi ge dang sgras gang bar bgyis la/ de bzhin du ci nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil
126a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ges tshim par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas la bos
126a7(rgyud 'bum): te'adi skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu nag po'i phyogs skrag par bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod kyi rdo rje nam mkha'
126b1(rgyud 'bum): rtogs 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis spro bar gyis la 'khrugs
126b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi
126b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig de dag smros shig/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas
126b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing gsang sngags kyi rlig 'di dag smras so/ / 'di lta ste/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ ni la ni la/ ni la ni la/ ku Ta Ne ku Ta Ne/ me hA ku
126b5(rgyud 'bum): Ne/ ta ta ta to/ ma hA ta ta/ a ba b+ha sa/ a b+hi a b+hI/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ma hA ri Ni ra Ni/ mi ri mi ri mi r-i/ dA ri me/ ri she ma hA ri shai/ shu lu shU lu/ ma hA shu lu/ shu lu shu lud+ha/ many+dzash+tsa
126b6(rgyud 'bum): lu shu lu/ u gu ma/ gum gum na/ ri mi ri mi/ hi ri hi/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri/ tiri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hir-i/ hi ri hi ri/ mi ni min/ hi ni tsi ni/ mu ni mu naM/ but+ta li pra ba ra/ srin+ta 'o/
126b7(rgyud 'bum): tsAr+ya/ dza~M ni dzi ni/ dzi na ri Sha b+he/ dzi na dzi na/ dzi na riSha b+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ldongs nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gangan 'byung
127a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas/ lus srul po ma rungs
127a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bar du gang dag sems ma dad pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su mi len pa dang / sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems nye bar mi 'jig pa de dag gi don
127a3(rgyud 'bum): / du bdag gis yang shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshog 'di bshad do// 'di lta ste/ ats+tsha ats+tsha/ mu ne mu ne/ ag+ni/ hU hU mu na mu na/ ma hA ri Sha b+ha/ hu hu/ a grA dA na te/ a ta a ta/
127a4(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi ru ta/ hi ni ho ni/ hi ni hi ni/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ tri ku ma/ gu ma gu ma/ gu ma/ hi lau hi li/ ni li ni li/ ma hA ni li/ sa mu dra maM kha/ ha ta/
127a5(rgyud 'bum): ha ta ha ta/ d+ha ra na me/ kha khA ba kha khA ba kha pr-i thi bi ap+te dze bA yu/ A kA sha/ tha tha tha/ g+hum+b+he b+ha g+hun+te/ ak+Shi gum+b+he/ dzi hA gum+b+he/ satwAM ga g+hun+te/ rA dza g+hum+b+he/ sa maM ta g+hum+b+he swA hA/ gnod sbyin
127a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams cad 'khrugr-i te skrag nas/
127a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa mtha' dag 'dar ro// de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ lan gsum
127b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis shin tu mi bzad pa 'byung
127b2(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad kyi snying po gnod pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras so zhes brjod do/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ 'brog gnas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
127b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bzhengs pa'i brda dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda bstan to// de nas de'i mod la thams cad
127b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / sa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu 'dar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di'ang g.yos/ nam mkha' la'ang me tog gi char dang
127b5(rgyud 'bum): bar snang las kyang sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ 'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar te
127b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khod do/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen po la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
127b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar bgyid
128a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs par
128a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen pos/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa ci nas bdud
128a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyogs tshar gcad pa dang / 'thab pa'i rnyog pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / lam rnam
128a4(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khams drug byin gyis brlabs so/ / de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems
128a5(rgyud 'bum): can de dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos bcus byin gyis brlabs so/ / bcu gang zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
128a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis rngalha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / grul bum de dag la khyed kyis sems can
128a7(rgyud 'bum): de dag rtag tu srungs shig/ gnod pa las zlog cig/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las dge ba la tshud cig/ zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang / nad med pa la mkhas pas
128b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi srog dang yang bsngos la/ sems can de dag gzung bar gyis shig ces rigs pas gtad nas/ de dag gi dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa skyon med par 'gyur
128b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te/ de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag sems dang mtshungs shing zab mo bzod pa dang ldan
128b3(rgyud 'bum): la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la'ang brtson par 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems can gyi 'khor gyi lus las snying po blangs te/ dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa nyams
128b4(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par dpyod pa'i shes pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i
128b5(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi tshe'ang sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston cing bzhug
128b6(rgyud 'bum): pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las tshig dang / don dang / yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad las
128b7(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas/ las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba de dag thams cad rnam par shes pa la chos dang ldan pas mgo mnyam du 'gag par 'gyur ro//
129a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dga'atsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te/ theg pa chen po'i gtam
129a2(rgyud 'bum): 'ba' zhig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems can nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can de dag dang mtshungs par
129a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grogs par 'gyur te/ ring por mi thogs par yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par phyin chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
129a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di
129a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar byed cing / gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po dag gis
129a6(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i byang chub
129a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsas pa/ kye grogs po
129b1(rgyud 'bum): dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag phyogs bcu nas 'dir byin pa de dag thams cad kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam par sbyar ba dang / sems
129b2(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstan pa
129b3(rgyud 'bum): dang dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / lta ba
129b4(rgyud 'bum): ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang / byang chub kyi lam la gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir ngo/
129b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba/ sngon ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab mo rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bshad de/ des chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang / ye shes
129b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzung pa dang / tshul gcig pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul srung ba nas/ gling bzhi srung ba dang
129b7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa srung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams srung ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i bar dag
130a1(rgyud 'bum): srung bar 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po re re'ang snying rje chen po la 'jug
130a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa rnam pa bcus byin gyis brlabs so/ / grogs po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
130a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di yongs su spyad do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa/ bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyis bkur
130a4(rgyud 'bum): ba phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par yongs su byang
130a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur te/ grogs po dag de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o// /
130a6(rgyud 'bum): grogs po dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsti stang du byas te/ dam pa'i chos 'di gzung bar bya/ bsrung bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu
130a7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba dang / chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o// de ltar na khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mtshan gyis de'i tshe chos
130b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gang gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas ni/ skyob pa mgon po dag la mchod par phul
130b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bas/ / gang dag dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin byed na// 'jigs med des ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di
130b3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / brgya tshad pa yi gser rnams las// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni// mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi 'thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs
130b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khebs byas te// gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu yid kyis sangs rgyas rnams la
130b5(rgyud 'bum): phul ba bas/ / gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na// de yi bsod nams tshang dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
130b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / thub pa'i spyan sngar mar me'i snying po dri zhim til gyi byugs pa ri rab tsam// mar ma bus pa 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa
130b7(rgyud 'bum): bye bar bzung ba bas/ / gang gzhan la la bsod nams 'dod pa sgrib pa slab par smon pa de dag gis// zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam byas de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// de nas de
131a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / blo gros 'chang ba gang gis bzod pa sgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom// rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam gan/
131a2(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi shes rab spel ba bas// zad pa'i dus ngan chen gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'di 'dzin pa// de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
131a3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang // gzhan dag 'dzin bcug gus par
131a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu klog pa dang / / bdug pa me tog 'phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyis mchod// bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag
131a5(rgyud 'bum): gis mdo'i bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag las
131a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam
131a7(rgyud 'bum): grangs 'di zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
131b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// 'phags
131b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len+d+ra bo d+ha dang / dz+nyAn mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hI dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba pan+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing cu
131b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA rI ts+yai nA ma d+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes
131b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
131b5(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
131b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ste/ de bltar med/ gzung du med/ bcing du med/ dgag tu med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par
131b7(rgyud 'bum): byar med/ chad pas gcad du med/ mgo breg tu med// gzhur med/ tshig par byar med// dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro'o// dge slong dag gang gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can de'i ming shes pa de'ang bltar med/ gzung du med/ bcing
132a1(rgyud 'bum): du med/ dgag tu med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par byar med/ chad pas gcad du med/ mgo breg tu med/ gzhur med/ chog par byar med/ de dgra'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gis kyang
132a2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo 'od zer can gyi ming shes kyis/ bdag kyang bltar med par gyur cig/ gzung du med par gyur cig/ bcing du med par gyur cig/ dgag tu med par gyur cig/ brgal du med par gyur cig/ rmongs par byar med
132a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur cig/ chad pas gcad du med par gyur cig/ mgo breg tu med par gyur cig/ gzhur med par gyur cig/ tshig par byar med par gyur cig/ dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro bar gyur cig/ de la gsang sngags
132a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no/ / tad+ya thA/ oM pa dA kra ma si/ ba rA kra ma si/ u da ya ma si nai ra ma si/ ar+k+ka ma si/ mar+k+ka ma si/ urma ma si/ ba na ma si/ gul+la ma si/ tsI ba rA ma si/ ma hA nI ba ra ma si/ aM ta ra
132a5(rgyud 'bum): d+hA na ma si swA hA/ oM lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig/ bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig/ bdag skye bo'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag glang po
132a6(rgyud 'bum): che'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag stag gi 'jigs
132a7(rgyud 'bum): pa las skyobs shig/ bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag cha'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag dug gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/
132b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad las skyobs shig/ 'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / nyams pa dang / ma nyams pa thams cad du'ang bdag seng ge las srungs shig/ bdag stag las
132b2(rgyud 'bum): srungs shig/ bdag klu las srungs shig/ bdag sbrul las srungs shig swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs
132b3(rgyud 'bum): shig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM A lo/ tA lo/ kA lo/ sats+tsha lo/ sa ma pa mUr+d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad las srungs
132b4(rgyud 'bum): shig swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo 'od zer can gyi snying po brjod par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta/ pra duSh+TA naM/ tsak+Sha ra mu khaM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha
132b5(rgyud 'bum): ban d+ha mu khaM/ dza b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ oM ba rA li/ ba dA li/ bat+tA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ tsak+Sha ra mu khaM baM d+ha baM d+ha sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skas ces
132b6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
132b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsod do/ / 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / paN+Dita a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / lo tsang dge slong ba ri rin chen
133a1(rgyud 'bum): grags pas bsgyur ba'o/ / / de nas lha mo 'od zer can 'di'i gzungs kyi rtog pa yin te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su bzung ba'o//
133a2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nam/ nyi ma'i steng du 'od zer can rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i 'od zer las yongs su grub pa'i khab dang skud pa dang bcas pas gdug pa can rnams kyi mig dang kha drubs bzhin
133a3(rgyud 'bum): par mdun du rnam par bsam par bya'o/ / phyi rol mthong ba'i spyod yul du mtshams bcing ba byas la/ zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis dag gi 'od zer las yongs su rdzogs bzhin pa'i lha mo 'od zer can ma
133a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyan yod na bzhugs te zhes bya ba nas bzung ste/ lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba ni rgyal bas bka' stsal pa'o// de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ba'ang lha'i tshogs mang pos kyang mthong bar
133a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe bdag kyang bltar med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dang / de'ang dgu phrag gsum yin no// sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ oM pa tA kra ma si/ pa rA kra ma si/ ut+ta ya ma si/ u dA ma si
133a6(rgyud 'bum): nair ma si/ an+tar+d+ha na ma si/ ming nyid rab tu sbyar te/ lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig/ bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig/ rgyal po dang / me dang / dgra dang / seng ge'i 'jigs pa
133a7(rgyud 'bum): las skyobs shig/ bdag dus thams cad du phun sum tshogs par grub par gyis shig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM A lo/ kA lo/ tA lo/ sar+b+ba lo/ sab mu rti/ rak+Sha rak+Sha nA~M/ sarba b+ha ye Sha
133b1(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/ oM ba rA li/ btA li/ bat+tA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+TA na mu kha~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ dus thams cad du legs par srung bar 'gyur ro// bskul
133b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi ni/ / rgya mtsho gsum ni mtshon brjod pa'i// oM dang bcas pa'i snying po dang // nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa dang / yi ge drug pa ni 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed do//
133b3(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i sngags 'di 'dzin na blo rno bar byed do// gleng gzhi dang bcas pa sngags 'di bzlas pa byas na/ nor dang / 'bru dang / g.yog 'khor 'phel bar byed pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do// don de
133b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par 'dod pas thang ka 'am/ shing leb la bris sku bya ba ni mya ngan med pa'i shing gi sdong po'i rtsar pad+ma la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ljang khu dang / ang ga rag sngon po dang / stong
133b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs sngon po dang / mgo bo na mchod rten yod pa/ gzhon nu ma g.yon pa'i phyogs su gzigs pa'i spyan can// mya ngan med pa'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas
133b6(rgyud 'bum): thang sku 'di mdun du blta zhing mchog tu sgrub pa'i snying po bzlas pa stong bya'o/ / oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// mchog gi snying po 'di nges par mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad med
133b7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / nad thams dang med par byed do// bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg gis kyang 'od zer can gyis nor 'phel ba skyed par byed do// zho dang dur ba gnyis kyi sbyin sreg gis ni nges par nad med par byed do//
134a1(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po rnams dbang du byed do// zho dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin mo 'grub par byed do// tsha ba'i mar dang nim pa'i yal
134a2(rgyud 'bum): ga stong gi sbyin sreg gis ni rims med par byed do/ / rang gi khrag dang / rus pa dang / dug dang / ske tshe stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas pas dgra bo 'chi'o// 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhi bar 'gyur ro//
134a3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bzlas na dug 'joms par byed cing 'bad pa med par mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms so// nyi ma ra re brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'dzin blo rno bar 'gyur ro// oM pa rA li/ ba dA li/ ba dA li/
134a4(rgyud 'bum): ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA naM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mu khaM swA hA/ 'od zer can gyi snying po'o// oM ma rI ts+yai swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can gyi gsang ba'i snying po yi ge drug pa'o// snying po'i phyag rgya ni
134a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di yin te/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par byas la thal mo rnam par sbyar bar byas pa 'am kha phye ba'ang rung ste/ mtheb chen cung zad bkug ste gung mo gnyis phan tshun reg la zlum po'i rnam pa mtshan mar byas
134a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ skyil mo krung du gnas pas lte ba'i phyogs su gtugs par bya'o// phyag rgya 'di mchog gtso bo ste// las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya'i// pha ma dang ni 'bring la yang // mchog rnams
134a7(rgyud 'bum): la yang 'di bstan no/ / myur du 'di yis don byed cing // kun tu 'grub cing mchod par 'gyur// dag byed bsod nams chen po ste// bkra shis sdig pa nyams byed cing // bsod nams
134b1(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa kun zad pa/ / dngos grub rgyu ni phyag rgya yin// bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ma'i mtshan brgyad brjod na srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ arka ma si/ marka ma si/
134b2(rgyud 'bum): u ra ma ma si/ ba ra ma si/ tsI ba ra ma si/ ma hA tsI ba ra ma si/ i tar+d+ha na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ga mu khi sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nA/ mu khaM ban d+ha ban d+ha swA hA/ rig pa 'dzin
134b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sde snod las phyung ba'i rtog pa ni 'di yin no/ / de nas sbyor ba gzhan ni 'di yin te/ gser mdog can gyi phag pa bsgoms la/ de'i steng du 'od zer can gos dkar po'i sham thabs can bsgom par bya'o//
134b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i spyi bor mchod rten dang / g.yon pa'i phyag gis mya ngan med pa'i yal ga me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag can no// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus su'ang bdag nyid phag pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar bsgom
134b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / snying khar chos gos kyi sne'u bzung ste/ lan bdun du bsngags la mdud pa bdun byas na lam du rkun ma la sogs pas choms par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mdud pa yongs su bkrol bar bya'o/
134b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can gyi rtog pa rdzogs so// / rang gi snying khar zla ba la la rnam par bsams la/ de nyid yid kyis brjod pas chos thams cad bdag med
134b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ / de nas yang nam mkha'i phyogs su bsam pa ni/ bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs pad+ma'i lte bar seng ldeng gi khri la rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ gser
135a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mdog can byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ ral pa'i das rgyan 'chang zhing zhi ba yi ge nA nyid kyis brjod pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de nas
135a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i 'od zer can ma/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya bas gser gyi mdog can gyi skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'i phyag gis
135a3(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa can gyi kha dang mig yang dag par drubs pa mdun du rnam par bsam par bya'o/ / bu mos bkal ba'i skung ba nyi shu rtsa gcig la rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rig pa lan cig yongs su bzlas pa na/ de nas
135a4(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mA rI tsi da ba tA yai/ hri da ya A brta ye Shu/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ti/ ti khai/ pa ta ti li/ pra ta ti li/ bA ra li/ ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Tan+taM/ tsak+Sha ra mu khaM/ ban d+ha mi hAH
135a5(rgyud 'bum): / zhes bya ba dang / yang khan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di bzlas te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mA rI ts+yai de ba tA ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA le/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ gr-i thi bi d+d+hi ma
135a6(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ zhes bya ba brjod do// de skud pa la rang nyid bsrung ba'i ched du mdud pa bdun bya'o// g.yog po'i ched du bya ste/ ming yongs su gzung ba'i sbyor bas mdud pa gcig bya'o// 'gro ba dang 'ong
135a7(rgyud 'bum): bas skud pa de rked pa la bcings te/ gleng gzhi dang bcas pa'i 'od zer can gyi rig pa bklag ste mdun du 'gro bar bya'o// de ltar byas na rang bzhin gyis srung bar 'gyur ro// nub mo bdun du zla ba la/
135b1(rgyud 'bum): ma na n+ti mA'i dkrol 'khor la sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du rang gi gnas ts+tsha// de'i rdu sa ji la dgungangs pa ran pa lan bdun du brjod pa sgyu/ nam sa r+b+ba phun pa d+hA/
135b2(rgyud 'bum): oM A lo/ kA lo/ tA lo/ sadz+wA lo/ sarba mUd+d+hi/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba b+ha ye Shu ye swAhA/ dkon mchog gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o// tad+ya thA/ oM mA rI r+yA bat+ta ta ma?/
135b3(rgyud 'bum): ba rA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mu khaM swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM btA li/ ba dA li/ baR+Sha ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na pra duSh+TA nA~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha nu khaM swAhA
135b4(rgyud 'bum): oM mA rI ts+yai sahA/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i mchog nges par 'di yin no// oM mA rI ts+yai pa dA kra ma si/ ba rA kra ma si/ ud yaM ma si/ nau rlom mo/ arkas sa/
135b5(rgyud 'bum): marka ma si/ urma ma si/ ban+da ma si/ gum+ma ma si/ tsI ba ra ma si/ ma hA tsI ba ra ma si/ aM tar+N+Na na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/
135b6(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba d+haSh+Ta prad+yASh+Ta nA~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mu khaM swAk+Sh+ma/ oM mA rI ts+yai swAH/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i mchog ni nges par 'di yin no// oM mA dI ts+yai padA gram si/ pA ra wam si/ ud yam
135b7(rgyud 'bum): siHnai ra ma si arka ma si marka ma si/ urma ma si/ baM d+ha ma si/ guSh+ma ma si/ tsi ba rA ma si/ ma hA tsi ba rA ma si/ aM tar+d+ha na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+ta li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/
136a1(rgyud 'bum): ba rA ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sAhA/ oM bat+ta li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ tsak+Sha mu khaM ban d+hA mi swahA/ zhes bya'o// oM bat+tA li/
136a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ gaM d+haM baM d+hi ma swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// rang nyid srung ba'i don du sngags 'di bya ste/ oM arka ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang
136a3(rgyud 'bum): oM marka ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM aM tar+d+ha na me si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM te dzo ma si swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM u da ya ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM gul+la ma si
136a4(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM ba na ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM tsi ba ra ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM ba dA kra ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM pa ra kra ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba
136a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / oM urma ma si swA hA/ zhes bya'o// de nas las gzhan yin te/ mchog tu gyur pa'i sngags ni/ oM mA rI ts+yai swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di'i las ni zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang
136a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa'o// bdag gi don du snying khar tI dang spel ba'i snying po oM dang spel ba byas la/ mgal me'i 'khor lo la gnas pa lugs kyu dang zhags pas dgug
136a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya yin du zin kyang lha rdzas kyi bud med 'gugs par byed do/ / de nas sbyor ba gzhan yin te/ nyi ma 'char ka'i tshe bya ste/ gzhon nu ma la sngags brgya bzlas te ba'i
136b1(rgyud 'bum): bas dkyil 'khor byas la gzhag par bya ste/ tsan dan dkar pos yan lag byugs la/ me tog dang legs par khrus byas shing gos dkar po bskon la gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin te mthe bong la rgya
136b2(rgyud 'bum): skyegs dang ma ra nag gis bskus pa la sngags brgyad brgya bzlas te dbang bskur ba bstan par bya'o/ / lha la sogs pa thams cad sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul te/ oM tsi ri tsi ri mu
136b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni sngags so// oM mAH/ sngags 'dis mar me la brgyad brgya mngon par bsngags nas gzhon nu ma la bstan par byas na sngon bzhin du mngon par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad
136b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang thos pa ni/ oM ba tA li ye muH/ sngags 'di khri tshe gcig bzlas te bstan par bya'o// yang na dgra bo rims kyis gzung bar 'dod na mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba
136b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / chu bo'i ngogs gnyis kyi sa dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul dang bcas pa la gzugs bsnyen byas te/ dug dang / me dang / ske tshe dang / nyin phyed dang / 'o ma dang ldan pa dur khrod kyi ras la sngags dang spel
136b6(rgyud 'bum): ba bris bzhin pa byas te/ oM mA rI ts+yai che ge mo rims kyis zung zhig zung zhig hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dgra bo'i khang par sbas na rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang na thod pa la
136b7(rgyud 'bum): sngon du bstan pa'i rdzas nyid kyis ming bris te yi ge a bzhi nang du bcug nas me'i nang du'ang ma gyis yongs su bskor la/ khros pas seng ldeng gi me la bdug par bya'o// steng nas skye ba bcings pa'i thod pa
137a1(rgyud 'bum): dgra bo'i khang par sbas na 'phral du rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / yang na dur khrod du bya'o// de nas dgra bo gsad par 'dod na dug dang / tsha dang / ske tshe dang / khrag gis mi
137a2(rgyud 'bum): rus pa'i sbu gus thod pa la ming mngon par bris te hUM dang phaT gnyis kyi nang du bcug na gsod par 'gyur ro/ / sngags kyis yongs su bskor bar bya ste/ oM mA rI ts+yai hUM che ge mo sod cig hUM/ zhes bya
137a3(rgyud 'bum): ba stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du bris na ni zhag gsum nyams par 'gyur ro// yang na skrod par 'dod na/ oM mA rI ts+yai tsa la tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ shI g+h+raM ga mi no che ge mo
