197b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu
197b2(rgyud 'bum): med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems
197b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi
197b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher
197b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par ston pa ni tshe ring ba slab par byed pa'i ched du'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan
197b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas
197b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
198a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lokya pra ti bi shin+d+rA ya bud+d+hA ya te na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hU b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+hA ya/ bi sho d+ha
198a2(rgyud 'bum): ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya ba ri shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa rbu maM/ sar+b+be ta thA ga tAH/ su ga ta pa ra ba tsa na tsi/ a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/ ma hA
198a3(rgyud 'bum): mu dra man+t+ra pa deH/ A ha ra A ha ra/ ma me A yu/ san d+ha ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+hA ye/ bi sho d+ha ya thi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA bi shud+d+he/ suSh+NISha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sra rasmi sany+tso te/ sar+b+ba
198a4(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga tA a wa lo ki ni/ Shang+ga ra mi ta pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Tha te/ sarba ta pA ga tA hri da ya a dISh+ThA nA a d+hISh+NIta/ mu dre mu dr-i/ ma hA mu rbe/ badz+ra kA ya sa ha ta nA/ pa ri shud+d+ha
198a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ pra ti ni brta ya/ ma ma A yur bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a b+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti maH
198a6(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ma tI/ mnA tI/ su ma ti/ tabA tA/ b+hUta koH/ pa ri shrid+h+we/ bisnguH/ u0f7fhe/ dza yang ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ swa rasma ra/ swar swar/ skA ra ya sUr ya/
198a7(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha a d+hit+ta na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+ra/ su badz+ra/ badz+re gar+b+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa lA gar+b+he/ badz+ra ud b+ha be/ badz+ra saM b+ha be/ badz+ra badz+re Ni
198b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+ram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma sha rI ra/ sar+b+ba satwa nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shur+N+Na ba tu/ sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa ma shA sa yan+tu/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ sid+h+ya sid+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya
198b2(rgyud 'bum): bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+hA ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa mA nA na mo tse ya mai tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hri da ya
198b3(rgyud 'bum): ad+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA nu dre ma hA nu drA man+t+ra pa daM swAhA/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni che bdag chen po'i dbyug
198b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa ste/ dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga 'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la/ rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na
198b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i chen lo bdun thub bo// lo bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun cu thub bo// de ltar mchog gi tshe 'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang
198b6(rgyud 'bum): nad med pa dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro// gos sam shing shun la gi'u wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas
198b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs bris te/ tsan dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te/ rang gi khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba stong gi mchod pas mchod cing zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i
199a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i chog byas na nang las grol zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ / med na 'das pa'i rang bzhin la'ang bya'o// yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten
199a2(rgyud 'bum): bris la rdo rje 'phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi 'u wang gis bris la kham po rab sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol la/ rang gi khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen
199a3(rgyud 'bum): bopos mchod pa byas na rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang cho ga ni sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkra ma ste mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi pa zhig la/ a ka
199a4(rgyud 'bum): ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa byas la/ de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos brgyan te/ gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten na ma sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/ de la g.yon
199a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lag pas reg ste/ g.yas pa'i lag pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pas/ nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la/ de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang /
199a6(rgyud 'bum): tshe ring ba dang / dgra yongs su nyams pa dang / 'dzin blo rno ba dang / ngag btsun par 'gyur ro// skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de'i chus khang pa 'am/ phyugs kyi ra ba 'am/ rta'i
199a7(rgyud 'bum): ra ba 'am/ rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na rkun mo dang / sbrul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro// mgo la gtor na
199b1(rgyud 'bum): de nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon chen po'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
199b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te 'chos na nad med pa dang / blo rno ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lon nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na nad thams cad las yongs su
199b3(rgyud 'bum): grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di
199b4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi/ sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bgyi/ 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan
199b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba legs par smras pa ni// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir// 'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das
199b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ oM a mi
199b7(rgyud 'bum): / a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta bi kAn+te/ a mi ta gA tre/ a mi ta gA mi ni/ a sr-i ta A yudza te/ ga ga na kI ti/ ka re sar+b+ba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka rI ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten
200a1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya'o// 'di'i cho ga ni// mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa
200a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ / gser dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rag la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa
200a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po
200a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin lag na gdugs thogs pa dang / g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga ya ba dkar po phyag na ba snams pa bya'o// de lta bu'i cho gas
200a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la/ de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can
200a6(rgyud 'bum): du byas la dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chu gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gi mchod pa stong phrag gcig gi mchod pa chen po byas te/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing /
200a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na
200b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu byas na tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur ro//
200b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la/ dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o// stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga 'am gcig gi bar du'o// nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du
200b3(rgyud 'bum): gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o// nyi ma re re
200b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing tshe dang blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te/ sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o// sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o// zla ba
200b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan re re kha mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o/ / cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro// blo rno ba dang / nad med pa dang
200b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brdzes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te/ mdzes pa'i lus
200b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / yang de ni dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i bu gar dmyal
201a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgra'ang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par ltag la 'gyur/ 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i
201a2(rgyud 'bum): thabs bka' stsal pa/ gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang / nyam nganga'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la tshad dang ldan pa'i mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas
201a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzugs tshon snam lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o// tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi 'phreng ba can
201a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdas pa bzhugs pa/ / ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa'i sa pa'i pa gser
201a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ / g.yon pa ni mche bsam mchu mnan pa mi bzad pa ut+pal sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o// dbus pa ni sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar ba'o// g.yas pa'i byas
201a6(rgyud 'bum): gis snyib par sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ / de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin pa'o// g.yon sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / de bzhin du
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / bum pa'o// yang mgo bor mchod rten la gnas pa'i oM dang / mgrin par A dang / snyi par skye'o// dpral bar tri // lte ba'i phyogs su dri'o// rkang pa
201b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la aM a/ yi ge 'di rnams bkod la rak+Sha swA hA dang bcas pa/ 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang spel ba'o// de'i logs gnyis su pad+ma dang rdo rje 'cha' gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa
201b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so// logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang // stobs
201b3(rgyud 'bum): bo che zhes bya ba ste/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyug pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub ched du byed pa'o// de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs
201b4(rgyud 'bum): par byas la/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la spung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o// de nas dkar po'i
201b5(rgyud 'bum): khyophyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste/ ji srid bco lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas par bya'o// de nas smra bar nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// de
201b6(rgyud 'bum): nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro/ / yang na ni thang ka de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/
201b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyi ma re re zhing brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya'o// yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa byas shing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na tsho dpag tu med pa dang / stobs dpag tu med pas gzhan gnon pa dang
202a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nad chen po med par byed do// sems can thams cad kyis nyi ma re re zhing tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur
202a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na// de yis rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog
202a3(rgyud 'bum): gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing / nyi ma re re la dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na blo rno ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang /
202a4(rgyud 'bum): skyid pa dang / lo brgya 'tsho ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// yang na rang gi sa ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang blo rno bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga
202a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya ste/ khru bang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje 'phreng pos brgyan pa/ tsan dan dkar po 'ams dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po
202a6(rgyud 'bum): bkram ste/ logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bani bzhag la 'dug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar po g.yogs la yal
202a7(rgyud 'bum): gas kha brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ / 'o ma can gyi yam shing la me sbar la me lha bkug la/ dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol lo// de nas tshe dpag tu
202b1(rgyud 'bum): med pa gsal por tha ba khung gi dbus su bsams la/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dngul lo// yang na/ oM a mr-i ta A yuH de swA hA/ zhes bya bas tshe dang blo rno ba dang
202b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa sa brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang / blo rno ba dang / skyid pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro// yang na zla ba re re'i
202b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na mchog gi tshe ring ba dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed do// sems can rnams la
202b4(rgyud 'bum): smad par mi bya'o/ / cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing lo brgya lnga bcu 'tsho ba dang / dgra las rnam par rgyal ba dang / blo rno bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro//
202b5(rgyud 'bum): gal te rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po che dang blo rno ba dang bcas pas 'bum phrag gcig
202b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas te/ dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la/ yang 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na tshe lo'i bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro// bye ba byas na bye ba thub bo// de ltar 'di'i
202b7(rgyud 'bum): tshiga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / dpa' ba dang / dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpal 'dod na 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po tho
203a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro// bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro//
203a2(rgyud 'bum): yang na ral gri la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du thang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas la/ yang na khrugs lnga'i rang
203a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyi ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/ lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang / sems can
203a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum la sogs pa'ang bsgrub par bya'o//
203a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las grub par byed do// gang yang de bzhin
203a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la/ gzhan
203a7(rgyud 'bum): la'ang rgya cher gsal bar byas na de skyid pa 'thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / lo brgya thub pa dang / dri rno ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe
203b1(rgyud 'bum): sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgran bug tu'ang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par lta'ang ga la 'gyur//
203b2(rgyud 'bum): glang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
203b3(rgyud 'bum): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
203b4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sar+b+ba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni uSh+NI ra bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ngan
203b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha'i bu shin tu brnyan
203b6(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba ni gsum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang chos bzang lha'i bdun san gnas te/ lha'i gzhal yas khang chen po na lha'i longs spyod chen po dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs chen pos
203b7(rgyud 'bum): bskor nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod de/ de lha'i longs spyod myong ba las mtshan mo sgra zhig thos pa/ lha'i bu shin tu brtan bzhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ de 'chi ba'i dus
204a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes te/ der yang 'gro ba bdun po myong bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba bdun po myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// brgya la
204a2(rgyud 'bum): nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na'ang der dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur ro zhes des thos so/ / de nas lha'i bu des sgra de thos nas 'jigs skrag sngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/
204a3(rgyud 'bum): de rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la phyag byas te/ brtabs par smra zhing de kyi hud kyi hud ces smre sngags 'don bzhin
204a4(rgyud 'bum): dulha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol/ lha'i dbang po bdag deng lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ lha'i longs spyod kyi dga' bas rtse zhing bde ba myong
204a5(rgyud 'bum): ba las sgra zhig thos pa/ lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang de 'gro ba bdun myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar
204a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na'ang der de dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du'ang 'gyur ro zhes thos na// lha'i dbang po de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas lha'i dbang
204a7(rgyud 'bum): po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i tshig de thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te/ lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdun po gang dag myong bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing skad cig cang mi smra bar 'dug
204b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'gro ba bdun ni phag gi skye gnas dang / khyi dang / tha dang / spre'u dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / bya rgod dang / bya ba ste/ 'gro ba bdun po de dag shin tu mi gtsang ba za ba myong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
204b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du/ e ma lha'i bu 'di sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
204b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ma gtogs par de'i skyabs dang / rten dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su yod snyam du bsams so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nub mo de'i srod la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa sna
204b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs la sogs pa khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas
204b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa chen po byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba bdun po dgra bcom ldan 'das la zhib tu gsol to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag
204b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kun nas snang bar byas te slar log nas bcom
204b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba
205a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ sgrib pa dang sdug bsngal bar skye ba thams cad 'jig par byed
205a2(rgyud 'bum): pa sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ bde 'gro'i lam du 'jog pa yod de/ lha'i dbang po de lta bas na gtsug tor
205a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba thos ma thag tu sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs tshe brje ba shin tu mang po dag 'jig par byed do/ /
205a4(rgyud 'bum): skye ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyur ro// tsher rabs thams cad du'ang tsher bas dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten
205a5(rgyud 'bum): nas lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po de brjod ma thag tu tshe zad pa'i mi'ang tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ba'i las
205a6(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa// yongs su bsags pa bde bar reg pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
205a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang de la gzigs so/ / de dag kyang de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbab mdzad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la sems par
205b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ brjod pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad skems par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par
205b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ rnam par 'thor bar 'gyur/ rnam par sel bar 'gyur/ stongs par 'gyur ro// de ltar de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / byang chub sems
205b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo rnams phye bar 'gyur ro/ / de gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
205b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gzungs de bka' stsal du gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi srog la sman gdags par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol
205b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ba ta ba pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / oM na mo b+ha ga ba te sar+b+ba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Tha ya bud+d+hA ya te na maHtad+ya thA/ au b+hU b+h+yAMb+h+yAM/ sho d+ha ya shod+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sam sa
205b6(rgyud 'bum): man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha/ a b+hi shiny+tsan+tu maM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tAHsu ga ta ba ra ba tse na/ a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/ mo hA mu dra/ man+t+ra ba daiHA ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yu/ san
205b7(rgyud 'bum): d+ha riNi/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ka ga nas b+hA ba bi shud+d+he uk+Sh+mI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha swa rasmi sa tsa di te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma ba lo ki ni/ Shan+na mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+baH
206a1(rgyud 'bum): thA ga ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya a d+hiShA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ murbe mu dre/ ma hA mud+de/ badz+ra kA ya saM ha ta nA/ pa ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+heH
206a2(rgyud 'bum): pra ti ni brta ya/ ma ma A yur bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Ta Na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ni mu ne/ ma phA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma tisu ma ti/
206a3(rgyud 'bum): ta thA tA/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ pa ri shud+d+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ bud+d+he shud+d+he/ he he/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra smar/ s+pha rasma ra/ s+phu ra s+phA ra ya/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he
206a4(rgyud 'bum): / bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+ri/ su bidz+ri/ badz+ra gar+b+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gan+d+he/ badz+ra dz+wa lA gan+d+he/ badz+ra mud b+ha be/ badz+ra sa b+ha bo/ bidz+re badz+rI ni/ badz+ram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma shi ri raM sarba satwa nAH
206a5(rgyud 'bum): kA ya pa ri shud+d+hi ra b+ha ba tu/ sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud d+hish+tsa/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tAsh+tsa maM sa ma sA sa yan+ta/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+yaHsi d+h+ya si d+h+yaH/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bi d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi ma
206a6(rgyud 'bum): tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man tIn/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa r-i shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ba tA hr-id ya ma d+hiSh+ThA na ma d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre ru dre/ ma hA mu
206a7(rgyud 'bum): dredri ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa taiHswA hA/ lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ sdig pa dang / lis dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
206b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyong ba/ / bde 'gro'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye
206b2(rgyud 'bum): ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde
206b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang / ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams
206b4(rgyud 'bum): cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal
206b5(rgyud 'bum): ba chung ba smad pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi skye bar ltung ba rnams dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag go//
206b6(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung la lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig/ bsgrags nas kyang gdon pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / dran par bya ba
206b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / mchod pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba la de sbyor bar gyis shig dang / de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dzam du gling ba'i sems
207a1(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'di dag khyod la gtad do// de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o//
207a2(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// skye bar skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
207a3(rgyud 'bum): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po
207a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / brjed byed dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / grog sbur la sogs pa'i srog chags
207a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rigs su phyis mi skye bar shes par bya'o/ / gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba ni ma gtogs so// de rigs chen po 'di lta ste/
207a6(rgyud 'bum): bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am// rgyal rigs shing sAl chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA lu chun po lta
207a7(rgyud 'bum): bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o/ / lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu
207b1(rgyud 'bum): che ste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ mthu stobs che ba/ dge zhing shes pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal
207b2(rgyud 'bum): pab zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer
207b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go/ / lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de'ang gos pa med par shes par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser ni shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs
207b4(rgyud 'bum): su dag pa/ shin tu nye ba/ shin tu bsnyen pa/ shin tu sdug pa'o// lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de'ang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du'ang de bzhin du skye bar
207b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang /
207b6(rgyud 'bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba der 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzungs
207b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya/ ri mthon po 'am/ khang pa mthon po'am/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du gzhag par bya'o// lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/ dge slong
208a1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'am/ / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor banag par mthong ngam/ de dang nye bar gnas
208a2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na/ tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/ de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na'ang lha'i dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
208a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gsheg
208a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// lha'i dbang po mchod pa dang rim gro byed cing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
208a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan rnams kyis kyang brgyan par byed pa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te gzungs 'di
208a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa la thal mo sbyor ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ skor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/ lha'i dbang po sems can de ni sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras
208a7(rgyud 'bum): su rig par bya'o/ / chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo de'i nam langs nas/ bcom ldan
208b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang bsti stang byas nas/ des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas
208b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun
208b3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'chad par sems can de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o// sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom
208b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gzo bar bgyid cing / byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
208b5(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang / bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka'
208b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o// sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la khrus byas te/
208b7(rgyud 'bum): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ des sems can tshe zad pa de'i tshe phyir nur nas nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can
209a1(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du'ang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags
209a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ des na de'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa thams cad bye brag phye ba de yang de ltar na de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// de'i ngan
209a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gror skye ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ / shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par rig par bya'o// de gang dang gang
209a4(rgyud 'bum): du skye ba de dang der pad+ma'i snying po kho na las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs thams cad du'ang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don du bzung
209a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di yungs kar dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de/ de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/
209a6(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas sam/ de las gzhan pa ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar par 'gyur ro// de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur
209a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa re re yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu spro ba dang ldan
209b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gro bar 'gyur
209b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston
209b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhi 'thams cad du'ang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po thabs 'dis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba
209b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / de dag gi ngan 'gro thams cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po song la lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes
209b5(rgyud 'bum): su ston la sgrogs shig/ lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdun na lnga'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro// stobs che bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang
209b6(rgyud 'bum): po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/ de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no// de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin
209b7(rgyud 'bum): drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta ste/ ngar 'gro las ni yongs su thar/ bde 'gro'o lam la yang dag gnas
210a1(rgyud 'bum): tsha ri bar yang gyur nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la chos/ a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du gyung ste/ des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar par
210a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su skyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi ma 'tsham
210a3(rgyud 'bum): dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba'an ng+ge ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta tha ga ta muSh+NI
210a4(rgyud 'bum): bi dza ya na ma d+hA ra Ni kAl+le hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
210a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba
210a6(rgyud 'bum): can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/
210a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis gzir ba tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
210b1(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni tshe ring bar sgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
210b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs
210b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs
210b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/
210b5(rgyud 'bum): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ sar+b+ba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Ta ya bud+d+ha ya te na maHtad+ya thA/ oM b+hU b+hU b+h+yAM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa swa ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ a d+hi
210b6(rgyud 'bum): Shiny+tsa nU maM/ sar+b+bA ta thA ga ta su ga ta ba ra ba tsa naM/ amr-i ta ma b+hi She kair/ ma hA puM min+na pa de/ A pA ra A par/ ma ma A yuH/ san d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+hA ya/ ga ga na sA d+hA
210b7(rgyud 'bum): ba bi shud+d+ha/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa pa ra smis co te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma wa mo ki ni/ Shadz+dzaR+Sha mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mA ti/ da shad+d+ha mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na ma d+hiSh+Ti

211a4(rgyud 'bum): dzam gar+b+he/ bi dza la kar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa lI gan+d+ha/ badz+ra su b+ha'o/ bedz+ra sa b+h+reShe/ badz+ra badz+ri Ni/ badz+ram+b+ha pa tum ma sha ra~M ras r+b+bas twAsar+thA kA ya pa ri shud d+hi d+hA tu/ se ma sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud
211a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thAg tA shUrmAs pa shA sa la nu Te t+yA prad+d+he/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ bo m+b+hal po b+h+ya/ bi bo ng+ku ma bi bo d+haHmo tsam mo tsam/ bi ma gyi ma'i me ches/ shaM b+h+ya ma b+h+ya/ wi sho d+ha ma 'i sho
211a6(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta t+ta mo tsi la ma~M rtsa ya/ si man+ta ra~M ShA pa ra~M shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hr-id ya ma d+hiSh+ThAn ma d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu trem hA mu drAm drA pa deHswAhA/ 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
211a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / / lha'i dba'i lo gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di na ma 'gro thams cad yongs su myong ba/ sdig pa'i las kyi sbreb
211b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ bde 'gro'o lam du 'gro ba ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis
211b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro
211b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba dang / ngan 'gror lhung ba rnaMs bzlog pa dang / sems can dmyal 'dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad
211b4(rgyud 'bum): dusdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// de bzhin du sems can tshe thung
211b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing skal ba chung ba smad pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bar lhung ba rnams dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling
211b6(rgyud 'bum): du sems can rnams la gzungs 'di dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags yongs su gtad pa yin no// de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o// lha'i dbang po gzung /
211b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di lan cig thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// skye bar skye ba sna tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
212a1(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang
212a2(rgyud 'bum): lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / khyi dang / rus sbrul dang / sbrul dang / ga can gzan khro bo dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / gro ga sbur la sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs
212a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams su phyis mi skye bar rig par bya'o/ / gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba dang / rigs chen por skye ba ste/ de la rigs chen po ni 'di lta ste/
212a4(rgyud 'bum): bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes
212a5(rgyud 'bum): nga smra'o/ / lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po'i mthur thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/
212a6(rgyud 'bum): muthu stobs che ba/ dge ba shis pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su spong ba 'di bzhag go// 'di lta
212a7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can
212b1(rgyud 'bum): de'ang gos pa med par shes par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shin tu sdug pa'o// lha'i dbang po de bzhin
212b2(rgyud 'bum): du sems can chen po de'ang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du'ang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag tu ni yi ge
212b3(rgyud 'bum): 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba de 'gro ba thams cad yongs
212b4(rgyud 'bum): su dag par 'gyur ro/ / sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya/ ri mthon po 'am/ khang pa mthon
212b5(rgyud 'bum): po'am/ mchod rten gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o// lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
212b6(rgyud 'bum): gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/ de dang nye bar gnas par gyur na/ tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/ de'i rdul rlung gis btab pa phog na'ang lha'i dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams
212b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs
213a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du mi skye bar rig par bya'o/ / lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
213a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog par rig par bya na/ lha'i dbang po shing bzo byed pa la'ang phan yon chen por 'gyur na/ mchod pa dang rim gror byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang /
213a3(rgyud 'bum): byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas la gzungs 'di bzhag la/ thal mo sbyar ba 'am/
213a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ skor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/ lha'i dbang po sem can 'di ni sem can chen po yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o// chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o// de bzhin
213a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o/ / de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje de'i nung mo de na ma nangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang / gos dang / rgyan
213a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas mchod pa dang bsti stang du byas nas/ des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
213a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing / dus kun tu bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gnas
213b1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gzo bar bgyid kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis
213b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang / bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad/
213b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o// sems can tshe thung ba'i don
213b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba'i nyal khrus byas te gos gtsang mgon nas smyung ba byas te/ lan stong bzlas brjod byas na de sems can tshe zad pa de'ang phyir nur ro// nad dang
213b5(rgyud 'bum): bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sbring pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
213b6(rgyud 'bum): song ba'i srog chags bya'i rnalam du'ang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya ste/ de nas de'i ngan 'gro ba de nyid tha ma yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig nad chen pos btab skye sman pa rnams kyis
213b7(rgyud 'bum): bye brag phye ste bor ba'ang de ltar nang de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / de ni ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
214a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par shes par bya'o// de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma'i snying po kho na las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
214a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dubang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don du gzungs 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod pa de dag gi rus
214a3(rgyud 'bum): gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ yi dgas sam/ de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur
214a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro ro dag las thar par 'gyur ro// de dag las thar nas kyang lhur skye bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan ni shu rtsa gcig yongs
214a5(rgyud 'bum): su brjod pa de 'jig rten pa chen po rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// nad med par 'gyur ro// bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang mya
214a6(rgyud 'bum): ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'de ban+dan du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// der
214a7(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par
214b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang 'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcing ba ni sor mo bcu'i thal mo la sdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar la/ de
214b2(rgyud 'bum): nas gzungs 'di dran par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sna tshogs bkram la/ sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdug cing / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ de bzhin gshegs
214b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs la phyag bya zhing / de nas gzungs brgyad brgya bklags par bya'o// de ltar lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi
214b4(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ri mor byas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par
214b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de kun gyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par 'gyur ro// sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'i sras su rig par bya'o// sgrib pa
214b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de la gzungs sgrub pa'i cho ga'i thabs 'dis ni lha'i dbang po 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems
214b7(rgyud 'bum): can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po song la lha'i
215a1(rgyud 'bum): bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig/ lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing
215a2(rgyud 'bum): tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ / stobs che bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/ de'i gnas su phyin nas rtswa'i bu shin tu brtan pa
215a3(rgyud 'bum): la gzungs 'di byin no/ / de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas nas/ de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs te/ 'di lta ste/ ngan
215a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro las ni yongs su thar/ / bde ba'i lam la yang dag gnas// tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la chos/ a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten dubyung ste/ nges
215a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya rkyen dang / rtsa'i bu shin tu brtan pa 'khor che ba rnams kyis me tog drang
215a6(rgyud 'bum): dri dang / bdug pa dang / 'greng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / gos kyi rgyan bzang po'i za dang / rtswa'i tshogs kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te zang
215a7(rgyud 'bum): duphyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyan la sogs pa nye bar ma lo ba'i mchod pa brgya stong phul te 'askor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste
215b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ched du brjod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa dbugs
215b2(rgyud 'bum): phyung nas chos ston par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bar du lung ston to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni 'chi ba chen po'i dbyug pa
215b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa ste/ dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la/ rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag
215b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya byas na mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun thub bo// lo bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun cu thub bo// de ltar mchog gi tshe
215b5(rgyud 'bum): thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang / nad mod pa dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro// gos sam shing
215b6(rgyud 'bum): shun la gi'u wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas par gzungs bris te/ tsa nA dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te/ rang gi khyim du bzha ga la rgya che ba'i stong gis mchod
215b7(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod de/ zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyi bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nad las grol zhing lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro// med na 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la'ang bya'o//
216a1(rgyud 'bum): yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten bris la rdo rje 'phreng ba'i bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi'u wang
216a2(rgyud 'bum): gis bris la/ kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol te/ rang gi khyim du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po sa mchod pa byas na rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang cho ga ni sa la ma lhung
216a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/ a ka ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa byos la/ de bzhin du dri chus gang ba'i snod ma
216a4(rgyud 'bum): tog dkar pos brgyan te/ gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/ de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste/ g.yas pa'i lag pa 'phreng ba 'dzin pas
216a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma re re zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas ya/ de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra yongs su nyams pa dang / 'dzin blo rno ba dang /
216a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag btsun par 'gyur ro// skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de'i chus khang pa'am/ phyugs kyi ra ba'am/ rta'i ra ba 'am/ rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na/ rkun ma dang
216a7(rgyud 'bum): sbrul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro// mgo la gtor na de nang de las grol bar 'gyur ro// de ltar
216b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon che ba'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na de dang de bu ni ba chen por 'gyur ro/ / so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su 'azlas te 'chos na nad med pa
216b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dro rno ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na nang thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun
216b3(rgyud 'bum): ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba
216b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bya/ sku gzugs la sogs pa bsgrub pa ji ltar bya/ 'dir sbyin sreg
216b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba legs par smras pa ni// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir// 'dir ni rtse gcig/
216b6(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis nyon// de ras bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa
216b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ oM a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha wa/ a mi ta bi kAn+ta/ a mi ta gA dre/ a mi ta gA mi ni/ a mi ta a yurda de/ ga ga na kIrti ka re/
217a1(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba kle sha kA ya ka ri ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pas 'jim pa brang ba dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji snyed rdzogs par bya'o//
217a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i cho ga ni mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa// de nus yang dag bshad bya ba// gser dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rA ga la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa'i sor bcu
217a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / drilag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i
217a4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs bsnams pa dang / g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag
217a5(rgyud 'bum): nanabasnams pa gnyis bya'o/ / de lta bu'i tshogs mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes
217a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs bris la de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas la/ dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus gtor zhing bri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod la/ stong phrag gcig gis mchod ma byas te
217a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos brgyad kyi na lags spung bar gnas shing / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i thos tshe dang / bro ste ra ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas pargya'o//
217b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byas na tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa
217b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la dri
217b3(rgyud 'bum): zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o/ / stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga 'am gcig gi bar du'o// nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang
217b4(rgyud 'bum): dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang
217b5(rgyud 'bum): blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te/ sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba byin par bya'o// sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang
217b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / zla bya gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o// cho ga 'dis na dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par
217b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / blo rno ba dang / nad med pa dang / tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes
218a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te/ mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang de nyid dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang /
218a2(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i bug gar dmyal ba'i sgra'ang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/ 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med
218a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang / nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed
218a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o/ / de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzugs tshon snam lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul
218a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ / tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi 'phreng ba can/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
218a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o// g.yon pa ni mche bas ma mchu mnan pa mi bzad pa ut+pal sngon
218a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/ / dbus ma ni sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar po'o// g.yas pa'i phyag gis snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje'o// de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu
218b1(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin pa'o// g.yon du sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / de bzhin du gzhu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / bum pa'o// yang mgo bor mchod
218b2(rgyud 'bum): rten la gnas pa'i oM dang / mgrin par AHdang / snying par hUM ngo // dpral bar tr-ingo // lte ba'i phyogs su hrIH'o// rkang pa gnyis la aM a/ yi ge 'di rnams bkod la rat+sA swA hA dang bcas
218b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang spel ba'o/ / de'i logs gnyis su pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa'o// steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas
218b4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so/ / logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po can dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang /
218b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyug pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa ni gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub ched du byed pa'o// de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
218b6(rgyud 'bum): rten de la sbyang bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste ji srid
218b7(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas snga bar nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mazhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro// yang na ni thang
219a1(rgyud 'bum): ka de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing ci ma re re zhing brgyad brgya bzlas
219a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bya'o/ / yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa bya zhing sdong stong gi bzlas pa byas na tshe dpag tu med pa dang / stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nad chen po
219a3(rgyud 'bum): med par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyis nyi ma re re tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro// yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na de yis rang gi
219a4(rgyud 'bum): khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing / nyi ma re re dus gsum
219a5(rgyud 'bum): du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na blo rno ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skyid pa dang / lo brgya 'tshe ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// yang
219a6(rgyud 'bum): na rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang blo rno bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya
219a7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ tsan dan dkar po'ams dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar
219b1(rgyud 'bum): me bzhi bzhag la/ bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la// phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar pos g.yogs pa yal gas kha brgyad
219b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dgod par bya'o/ / 'o ma can gyi yam shing la me sbar la deng me lha bkug ste dgang thugs gsum byas na bsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol lo// de nas tshe dpag tu med pags
219b3(rgyud 'bum): por thab khung gi dbus su bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ / yang na/ oM a mr-i ta A yun de swA hA/ zhes bya bas tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas
219b4(rgyud 'bum): pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang / blo rno ba dang / skyid pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro// yang na
219b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba re re'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na mchog gi tshe ring ba dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed do// sems
219b6(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la smad par mi bya'o/ / cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyur ro// lo brgya lnga bcur 'tsho ba dang / dgra las rgyal ba dang / blo rno bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs
219b7(rgyud 'bum): snyan par 'gyur ro/ / gal te rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po che dang tho
220a1(rgyud 'bum): rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas te/ dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la/ yang 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na tshe lo 'bum
220a2(rgyud 'bum): phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro/ / bye ba byas na bye ba thub bo// de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / dpa' ba dang / dgra las rgyal
220a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dpal 'dod na dpal 'bras 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po
220a4(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro// yang na ral gri la sogs par grub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du thang sku bkram la stong gi
220a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/ yang lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ral gril bzlas pa 'bum byas te lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs
220a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de ltar rdo rje dang
220a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o// de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed
220b1(rgyud 'bum): par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las 'grub par byed do/ / gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re re la dus gsum
220b2(rgyud 'bum): du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher gsal bar byas na/ de skyid pa 'thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang /
220b3(rgyud 'bum): loyobargya thub pa dang / blo rno ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar
220b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu'ang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par lta 'ang ga la 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
220b5(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
220b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bstod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta chos kyi sde pa
220b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / khams pa lo tsab dge slong ba ris bgyur cing lus te gtan la phab pa// 6/ rgyag shad du/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga y
221a1(rgyud 'bum): A nA ma d+hA ra Ni kalpa/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la
221a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
221a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug chen po'i khang bzang gi tshal bde ba la nye bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
221a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu sems can sdug bsngal dang nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir cing tshe thung ba dag yod de/ de rnams kyi don du tshe ring
221a5(rgyud 'bum): banye bar bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gzung bar bya/ gzhan rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o//
221a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
221a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
221b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/ kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
221b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal to/ / oM na mo d+hag sa te sar+b+ba trai makya pra ti bi shrISh+Thaya/ bum+b+has te na maHtad+yA dz+nyA many+dzu d+hUn+tu/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ham/ bi sho d+ha
221b3(rgyud 'bum): bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta sa bad+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shin+da n+tu maM/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ su ga ta ba ra ba tsan+ta mr-i tA b+hi She kerma hA mu dr-i min+d+ra pa de/ A ha ra A hA ra/ ma mas
221b4(rgyud 'bum): yuHsan+d+ha ra Ni sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+h+ya ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga ne swa b+hA ba be shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sa rasmi sa tso di taM/ sarba ta tha ga ta a ba lo ki ni/ Shan+na ra mi tA pa ri pU ra
221b5(rgyud 'bum): Ni/ sarbe ta thA ga ta mA te/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+ThI tAM/ sarba ta thA ga to prad yA d+hiSh+ThA nad+d+hiSh+NI te/ oM mu dre mu dre/ mag+na mu dre badz+ra kA ya saM ha ta na pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba karma A wA ra Na bi shud+d+he/ me pra ti ni bar+N+Na yA
221b6(rgyud 'bum): yurbi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA d+hiSh+ThA na d+hiSh+NI tAM/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mr-i ni/ bi mu ni/ bi mu nI/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ta~M/ ma ma ti/ ma hA ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ su ma ti/
221b7(rgyud 'bum): ma hA su ma ti/ ta thA teb+hU ta Te bi ri shud+d+he/ bi dUT bud+d+hi shud+d+he/ mo ha he dza ma dzas/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ swa ra s+pha ra/ Ar swa ra/ sA ra ya s+phA ra ya/ sarba bad+hA d+hi rA N+Dits+tshite/ oM mr-id+hi TaH/
222a1(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re ma hA badz+re su badz+re badz+re gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa lA gan+d+he dz+red+ha She/ badz+ra sa b+ha be badz+re badz+ri Ni badz+ra swA ba tu me sha ri ra sarba satwAd+haSh+Ta/ kA
222a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ri shud+d+hid+b+ha ba tu me sa dA/ sarba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hi sh+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga tAsh+tsa mAM sa mA shA sa yan+tu/ oM bud+d+ha buN+ye b+h+yo d+h+ye bo d+ha ba bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya
222a3(rgyud 'bum): sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man+ta tsa ya mo tsa ya sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud+d+ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da yA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+NI te/ oM mu dre mu dre ma hA mu dre ma hA mu dra man+ta pa daiHsA hA/ rigs

222a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bklag par bya'o/ / sa phyogs yangs pa kha cig tu sa dang ba byung gis nye bar byugs la/ dri bzang gi chab kyis chag chag gdab par bya'o//

222a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i gtsug tor ro/ / de ltar rim pa ji lta bar shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nam mkha' ltar 'dus pa'i bza' ston 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / sa'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor
222b1(rgyud 'bum): dang nor bu'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / ro bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / snying po dpag med 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /

222b3(rgyud 'bum): par bri bar bya'o/ / 'dab ma so so re rer rim pa ji lta bar thig le bcu drug las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo// nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor

223a2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de'i phyed kyi steng du khri btsugs te chu'i snod du rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i mchod rten gzhug par bya'o// shog pu'am lo ma la sngags kyi yi ge sgrub pa po'i ming can yang gzhug par bya'o// bum pa
223a3(rgyud 'bum): chus bkang ba'ang gzhag par bya'o/ / pad+ma'i phyi rol phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi 'ang gzhag par bya'o// dar gyi lda ldi dang / gdugs dang / ba dan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas nas/ yang shar du bgegs
223a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / lhor 'chi ba rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal
223a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lha mo dang / byang du phung po'i nad rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / mer rdo rje 'phreng ba tshe sbyin ma dang / bden bral du sgyu ma chen mo dang / rlung du gser 'od ma dang /

223a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'phreng ba dang po la sbal sogs pa med pa'i 'jim pa rlon pa la byas pa'i sats+tsha stong phrag gcig bsgrig par bya'o// ma grub na brgya nges par gzhug par bya'o// phyogs bzhir bkur sti dang

223b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas par bya'o/ / stong phrag gcig tu klog pas dbus kyi mchod rten gyi dbur lag pa bskyod cing mchod par bya'o// me tog dang / 'dug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / lba bshos

223b6(rgyud 'bum): tu byed pa dang po'o/ / // rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du//
223b7(rgyud 'bum): mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba gnas brtan dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bza' pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o//

227b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
227b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

227b4(rgyud 'bum): la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes

227b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad thar par byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad rnam par chag par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa 'di

233b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bdag dang sems can thams cad la bsal du gsol// bdag
233b6(rgyud 'bum): dang sems can thams cad kyi gzhogs byed na ba dang / yig 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nang dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /

234b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o// mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// sa bcing bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu bcing bar bgyi'o// nam mkha'

234b3(rgyud 'bum): me shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ badz+ra d+hA ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badz+ra pA Ni phaT/ mai hUM Sh+To phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badz+ra pA she na sarba duSh+Ta big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM druM ban+d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha

234b7(rgyud 'bum): mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ gyad kyis mi chags/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams
235a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi yid du'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag

236a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//

236a4(rgyud 'bum): rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA sh+tsa swA hA/ oM hUSh+To ban d+ha ban d+ha/ sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri pU rA s+ya satwAMsh+tsa badz+ra pA NI hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba tra thA ga toSh+NI/ Sha A ba lo kaM te nur+Na ni

236b1(rgyud 'bum): / bcom ldan 'das kyis shud cesdu ka' phrul nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dpal mangs ldam yin dang / nam mtha' rji dang /

238b7(rgyud 'bum): hrIdz+dza/ mo ga na ka ri hU d+ha hrIHSh+To/ sa~Mb+hak+Sha na ka ri hU~M d+ha hrI dz+dza/ ban d+ha na ka ri ts+tshadz+dza hrI Sh+T+r-i/ par gi daHk+Sha Naka hrI ts+yai d+hats+tshib+h+yo/ sarba rbatra wa prathA na s+yam b+han ka ri gung+ga d+hISh+T+r-i/ sarbasak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra h+na
239a1(rgyud 'bum): r+N+Na bi dz+nyA sa na ka rI hU d+hA d+hIHSh+To/ sarba pa ra bid+ha ts+tshed na ka rI hU d+hu hrI ts+tshe/ matu rA shi tI nA gra ha sa ha srAN+Da bi d+hA sa na ka ri rbA drAhrIts+tsha/ ar+g+ha bi sha tI nAM nak+Sha trAr+Na pras
