239a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun nas srung bar mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ga na pra shAsta sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM druM/ dza ma d+ha
239a7(rgyud 'bum): na ka ri ts+tshi dz+raM/ stam b+ha na ka ri hU~M trUM/ ma hA bid+d+ha sa b+hak+Sha N+Da ka ri tsud+d+ha/ pa ra bid+da sa~M b+hak+Sha Na ka ri hU~M d+hu/ sarba duSh+TA nA stam b+ha na ka ri tsu n+da/ sarba sa k+Sha rak+Sha sa kre bAr+N+Na bid+d+ha sa ra ka re tsU ng+ku
239b1(rgyud 'bum): tsaturA shi tI nA gra hA sa pa srAr+tha bi ts+tsha sa na ka ri hUn+da/ An+ta bi shad+d+hi nanAk+Sha/ N+DA pra sA da na ka rI tsU d+hu/ yaSh+TA nA ma hA gra sAr+N+Na bidz+nyA sa na ka ri pU tsur k+Sha ra k+Sha ma/ bcom ldan 'das mde bzhin gshegs pa

264a2(rgyud 'bum): yi rang ba'o/ / gzungs sngags mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis sdig dang / sgrib pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par gror

264a4(rgyud 'bum): gis thal ba myur du ded/ / de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la// bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad sreg/ dper na char pabab ba 'gyur te// ril 'bab chubabs pa yis// sa yi steng gi

264a6(rgyud 'bum): bcad rung bar sti bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis// lus sbyong 'gyur te the tsom med// dper na nyi ma shar gyur na// 'od zer kun tu rab tu 'byung // de bzhin
264a7(rgyud 'bum): su zhig gzungs 'chang ba/ / de yi lus kyang rnam par mdzes// dper na skam po renya 'gro ldog/ chu dang bral bas 'chi sgor 'gro// la las slar yang chur bor bas// de na gnas
264b1(rgyud 'bum): shing yang ce'o/ / de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang // mi rnams tshe ni zlog par byed// lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tAnA/ oM ma hA tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la
264b2(rgyud 'bum): na/ swa ba ra ban+ti ra/ A karA ya Sh+TA k+SharAH/ A un+d+hapa.A s+'un+d+har/ san+na san+d+hur/ kar+Nak+ShaN/ tik+Shi/ 6b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tam hA sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA d+ha na
264b3(rgyud 'bum): spa ga re/ saM shaM d+ha ya/ mAM sar+b+ba satwAsh+tsa/ b+ha ga pa ti sar+b+ba pA paM bi ma le dzam dza ya/ dza ya la b+he/ sUH suH/ swon ya s+pho Ta ya/ big ta A ba ra/ d+ha ya ha ra Ni/ d+hu hU~M hUM/

264b5(rgyud 'bum): yab+ha ra b+hA ra/ saM b+hA ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya/ bi sho d+ha ni/ b+hU Shi ta d+hu dza/ ma hA mu drA bi lau ka taM/ dza ya dza ya/ sin+d+hu sid+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ sa bo d+ha ni sa bo d+ha ni/
264b6(rgyud 'bum): sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni saM sho d+hA ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ma sar+b+ba prA pa/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku ra d+hA dzo/ sa ma ya tiSh+TaM/ pra sa raM tu ma ma puN+ye/ bi na
264b7(rgyud 'bum): pA paM sar+b+ba ki la bi Sha ha re/ ma Ni bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi ma le/ bi ka si ta pad+me/ ka ba tsi ta b+hu dze/ ShartA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+Ti Sha bi lo ki te swAh+ma/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga
265a1(rgyud 'bum): grar+b+hahrI/ na ma chi swA/ ar+tha u0f7fswAH/ prar+dz+dza u0f7fsat+su/ prAr+N+Na la ki s+'ut+ma/ sarnam pa gak+ShaswAH/ sa~M d+hu A/ sam s+yAH/ saman+ta/
265a2(rgyud 'bum): saha ra Ni swAd+na/ swa d+hA ra Ni sUhU~M/ san+d+hur NI s+'uh+Na/ pra ti swa ra NI s+'up+na/ mdzub ti s+t+raiH/ te dzi da ti swA hA/ dza ya ba ti swAts+tsha/ sarba ta thA ga ta mudrAd+hiSh+ThAn d+hits+tshi ti swAH/ s+thASh+Ti dang
265a3(rgyud 'bum): po gzungs stegs padi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su ston cig/ des ni khyod kyis lha'i bu de la yun ring por phan pa dang badre bar 'gyur ro// kun nas sbyor 'jug pa'i 'od zer
265a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor dri ma med pa ra snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go// mchod rten gas
265a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'am rnying dbang rung ste de'i nang du gzhug/ spos dang byug pa'ang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
265a6(rgyud 'bum): dran par bya'o/ / de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su bltas te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro// a ka ru dAng du ru ka'i bdug pas bdugs te/

265b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na/ gang+gA'i krung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug
265b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bri sa la gzhug go// oM na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA naM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he saM b+ha ra ma ma A
265b3(rgyud 'bum): yuHsaM sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya ma ma sar+b+ba pA paM/ sarba ta thA ta sa man+toSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he hUM hUM hUM hUM/ e baM saM dzaHswA hA/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dus gsum
265b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di la gus par byas te/ mchod rten gyi las byas na tshe zad pa las slar nur te tshe ring por sbyong bar byed do// gal te shi 'phos na'ang sbrul gyi pags
265b5(rgyud 'bum): pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad nam yang 'chi ba'i tshe rab mthong
265b6(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / phyin chad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad sems can dmyal ba'i sgran ma
265b7(rgyud 'bum): du'ang thags par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das las brdung nas
266a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam langs pa dang rang gnas su song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga go rims bzhin du mchod
266a2(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi las byas nas/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'ang byas pa dang / byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus rnam
266a3(rgyud 'bum): par dag nas pags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/ skra dang mig ni mthon mthing lta bur gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mngon du mthong / nam mkha'i dbyings nas de
266a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung ni phyung ngo / / de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lus su gyur pa mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzung ste rab tu dga' nas/ a la la

266b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi gnas su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
266b2(rgyud 'bum): sngar 'dug go/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs

266b6(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bsam pa can
266b7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems shing sgom la mang du byed de/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do// de nas grong khyer de nyid ma khyim dang ga
267a1(rgyud 'bum): / rang snang zhes bya ba drug pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/ khyim bdag de ni deng dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu stegs la dud
267a2(rgyud 'bum): do/ / bram ze de ni khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas pa sgrob kyang / khyim bdag de ni de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed par/ de 'di snyam du sems te
267a3(rgyud 'bum): ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum bur gtubs la nya dang rus sbal sreg pa bzhin du bor te khar ngan skyugs kyis dgang ngo snyam mo/ / de nas 'di snyam du bsam ma thab tu khyim bdag de la sha barba
267a4(rgyud 'bum): dang mdze'i nad kyis btang ngo / / de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi kar sdug bsngal gyi tshe rang chen po myong ste/ shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te/ der bskal
267a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo / / de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang / phag dang / rus sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong ngo // de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems

267a7(rgyud 'bum): du gyur nas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang / gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang / de la dge slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/ des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par byas

267b7(rgyud 'bum): long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrog pa'i dge slong de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di
268a1(rgyud 'bum): thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' ba thob par gyur te/ ca co dang gzha'i sgra chen po byung nas/ a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu
268a2(rgyud 'bum): niyid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i du mo bye ba 'bum phrag 'brum ni
268a3(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol

268a6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di'i phan yon dang sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/

269b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu brgyud de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa'ang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs

269b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa' par ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rnam par dag pazong par
270a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
270a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su'ang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa de dang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor
270a3(rgyud 'bum): nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so// ches brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/
270a4(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byas na/ bzlas brjod
270a5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa tsam gyis 'phral du mchod rten las sgra 'byung ste legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / 'phral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang /
270a6(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/
270a7(rgyud 'bum): khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na'ang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams
270b1(rgyud 'bum): cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras nabang bya'i tshogs yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zan khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / byi la

277a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ de ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas 'biba'i byed pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM badz+re A mu She swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis
277a2(rgyud 'bum): brlabs na/ 'bi ba nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phros shing khyab ste/ 'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// 'od
277a3(rgyud 'bum): zer gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'di'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel gong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas
277a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bi 'bi'i nang du bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/ gro ga'am/ ra sa sam/ shog bu'am/ shing shun la sngags bris pa dang / de'i nang du rigs lngas
277a5(rgyud 'bum): so'i snying po/ oM hUM tra hri AHde rnams phrugs su sbyar te mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa 'am/ yi ger bris pa'am/ gang yang rung ste nang du sbrul na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye
277a6(rgyud 'bum): shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gar+b+he swAhA/ zhes bya ba bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes
277a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas tsai t+ye'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/ til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen ma 'di brjod
277b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / oM Ar dze bi ra dze swAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro//

277b3(rgyud 'bum): rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ / de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings dang
277b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten 'byam klas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mchod rten par bu'i nang nas dbyang ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la
277b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyung ngo / / oM d+harma d+hA tu ye swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te/ mchod rten phyung na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa 'brel ba las mchod rten chos kyi
277b6(rgyud 'bum): sku 'byam klas pa 'byung ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so//
277b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas mchod rten snod nas phyung ba las 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM pra ma Na ye swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na rin po che'i
278a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rin po che'i tog drung / rin po che'i rtsal mtshan dang / rin po che'i shar bu dang / dAr gyi lcu rtsub la sogs pa rnams kyis can/ n+ya ngan
278a2(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rten na bza' gsol ba'i
278a3(rgyud 'bum): tshe rig pa chen mo di bzlas la gsol to/ / oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he d+harma te swA hA/ zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur
278a4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten ltar btab na dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang ljar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/
278a5(rgyud 'bum): stong ngam/ gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong chad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsig pa ni sa 'am/ rdo lob bam/ shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor
278a6(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhir bgyis te/ 'og gi khri'ang seng ge'i khri 'am/ rin po che'i khrib ma/ pad+ma'i khri stegs bu byas la/ de'i steng du 'go ma yeng dang spos chus chag chag batra ba ste// dbus
278a7(rgyud 'bum): dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun tu gur kum pang tsan dan gyi chus zlum por bskus la/ srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'ang
278b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du mchod rten gyi zangs brgya'am stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong tshad kyi dkyil
278b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa gcad par bya'o/ / mchod rkyen gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o// de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs
278b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha stu pe swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
278b4(rgyud 'bum): par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni/ dang po dbus su dgod de nas shar du dgod// de nas lhor dgod/ de nas nub tu dgod/ de nas byang
278b5(rgyud 'bum): gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ / dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra pad+ma sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du bzlas rdo rje dang pad+ma
278b6(rgyud 'bum): gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas la sa gzhi dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rgya mtsho'i 'jing thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so// gzhan
278b7(rgyud 'bum): yang mchod rten ri re btab nas thal byang dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/ thos dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/ mchod rten gyi ngo
279a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa bsku ba ni zhi ba'i dkar po/ rgyas pa'i ser po dang dbang dmar po/ srung ba ljang khur dmigs te na bza' yang de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin
279a2(rgyud 'bum): du dmigs so/ / de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi geraraM dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/
279a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM raM swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes kyi me dpung chen por rab tu'abar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las
279a4(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga 'am/ brgyab ma/ stong ngam/ gang bris pa'i dbus rnams
279a5(rgyud 'bum): su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / oM a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hUM phaT/ ces grangs ji tsam ran par bzlas na mchod rten gyi gA dan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
279a6(rgyud 'bum): re rer 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen
279a7(rgyud 'bum): bor ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/ snying bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/ sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas
279b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byam klas par 'phros shing / sems can gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs
279b2(rgyud 'bum): shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur tu/ de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la
279b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+rA d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis
279b4(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi nang na rin po che'i sa gzhi dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gi dan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par
279b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste bzhag nas de la mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas ni/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /
279b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras chan dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang / 'dra zhing dgod pa dang / bla re dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / mar

280a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ pas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis
280a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang dmigs so/ / mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po che re res mchod cing yon du da ru chung dang / 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang / gdugs bu chung yang rung ste re re dngul lo//
280a3(rgyud 'bum): de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab lags na/ dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang / rgyan dang /

280a5(rgyud 'bum): ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs kyi snying po dang / rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re ba kha dog gser bco ma bzhin du dang zhing 'tsher ba gcig tu dmigs la/
280a6(rgyud 'bum): de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam klas par rigs lnga phyogs bcur 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings
280a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'di mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus nas
280b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug dang thugs kar phog/ 'phrin las kyis sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dgra ste/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/ dung phor gyi na
280b2(rgyud 'bum): duspros cha ba dang dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i argas gsol to/ / arga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung por bzhag la/ spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur
280b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od zer gyi spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/ mchod pa dbul ba'i rig pa chen po 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mr-i te ar+g+ha me pra tIts+tsha
280b4(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du gdugs shing sbreng te phul bas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro// tshig tu'ang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par
280b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/ / de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste/ ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar
280b6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs so/ / de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog cing lan ci mang du brjod par byas/ bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par btab par bya'o// cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par
280b7(rgyud 'bum): byang mi bde'ang rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi skur bsgyur ba las dgongs pa mnyams par bya ste/ mchod rten dang mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi
281a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs te/ mchod rten btab na'ang cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste 'gal ba med do// de bzhin du ma gyur na bang bi ma la u
281a2(rgyud 'bum): Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyid 'di yin te/ mchod rten de de bzhin gshegs pa'i
281a3(rgyud 'bum): skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ / bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na mchod rten la mchod pa phul zhing mnga' gsol yang
281a4(rgyud 'bum): mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo // rig sngags gas sngags thams cad kyi// sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing // dgongs
281a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ting 'dzin mi gsal bas/ / mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams// btab kyang rdzogs par yong mi 'gyur// zhes 'byung ngo // gang zhig gsang sngags dang
281a6(rgyud 'bum): dgongs par ldan pas/ mchod rten dang sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni ji skad du/ mchod rten cho ga dam pa 'di// bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni// gzungs
281a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis/ / gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra// yun rings dus nas 'khor ba yi// mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams// ji snyed yod pa
281b1(rgyud 'bum): ma lus 'byang / / tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan du skyes nas kyang // rigs mchog dam par skyes pa na// longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing //
281b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skyes// tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur// dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du// dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing // dgegs
281b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnod pas dri mi bskyod/ / bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur// mthar ni mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// bI ma la uSh+NISha'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
281b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten gcig yan chad/ bye ba man chad gdab pa'i sngags dang bsam pa'i rgyud ni kun kyang 'dra'o// de la mchod rten gcig bta bi na dI ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang cho ga ni
281b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brnyas par bya'o/ / na ma s+yA ya rti kA nA na/ dzi nA nAn/ da nad+ha rat+na tA yan shud+han/ an+do d+h+yA a mi tA ngan
281b6(rgyud 'bum): ban de/ a haM a lo ki taM/ na mas+t+yar+d+ha nu ga tA nA na/ sarba tra thA ga tA nAn/ suk+Sh+ma suk+Sh+me/ nA ka dr-i/ shan+te/ dAn+te/ shI ba ni rA ku le/ ya she ya sho ba ti/ te rdza
281b7(rgyud 'bum): Ne dzo ba ti/ sarba bud d+ha ad+hiSh+Thi te swA hA~M/ mu dri bde babs pa'i 'ji ba'am sngags bri ba'i tshe lan bdun gdon pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta/ shAs
282a1(rgyud 'bum): nAn+ta na/ oM badz+ra swA yuSh+pe swA hA/ 'bi 'a bi'i sngags la/ mo badz+rod d+ha bA ya swAH/ tse ti'i phor bu'i nang dang / sa tsha'i nang du phyi ma btab pa 'am
282a2(rgyud 'bum): zlum gyis byugs pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra a ra dzo bai ra dze swA hA/ phyag rgya ba ma sngags gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM d+harmad+hA tru gar+b+he swAhA/ tse ti'i phor du ra 'a bi wa bi gzhug pa'i sngags
282a3(rgyud 'bum): la oM badz+ra d+hA tu gAr+b+he swA hA/ tho brdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra mud ga ra Na ko TA ya ts+tsha/ tse ti'i por bu nus phyir dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oMHrmA ra te sUhA/ 'khor lo
282a4(rgyud 'bum): dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM d+ha ma ta na ye swA hA/ tse ti'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ cho ga de ltar bAs na tse ti gcig btab pas bya ba
282a5(rgyud 'bum): snyed btab par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'ji ba can gyis ga rA nA bar bskus nA/ nad mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa
282a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / nA gar skad du/ sAr+ya rasmi bi ma la bi shrur+d+he pra b+ha NA nA man+dA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
282a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
282b1(rgyud 'bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po sor skya'i gnas kyi pho brang 'khor gyi khyams chen por dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po
282b2(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
282b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / shes rab 'od dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa rnams dang / lho dang / klu dang
282b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'uphye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas bcom

282b6(rgyud 'bum): ser sku'i zla ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yid mi ches shing / log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig gi tshe gzhan zhig gis rmi ltas su rmis te bstan pa/
282b7(rgyud 'bum): bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba thos nas/ bram ze de shin tu'ang mi dga' ste 'jigs skrag nas yid la bsams pa/ da bdag gis srog
283a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ gi skyabs su la btsal bar bya/ yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no zhes zag na/ bdag de'i gan du song ste/ de thams
283a2(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag na de 'jigs pas nyam thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs mdzad pa'i phyir chos ston gor ma chag go snyam bsams nas/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du sang ba dang / rgyang ring/
283a3(rgyud 'bum): po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spobs te sems shing 'dug pa la/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs
283a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bas bram ze'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgongs te bka' stsal pa/ bram
283a5(rgyud 'bum): ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 'gro ma nur med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu
283a6(rgyud 'bum): kha brgyud de skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan shan pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas shi phos nas kyang phag gi lus su skye bar 'gyur te// rtag tu na skyugs
283a7(rgyud 'bum): migatsang ba za zhing 'dam rdzab kyi nang du'ang yun ring du gnas te/ rgyun du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas gal te mi'i lus thob na'ang shin tu dbul ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang
283b1(rgyud 'bum): dring ba dang / mdog mi sdug cing gnag pa dang / lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang / mdze nad can du 'gyur te/ skye bo yongs la mi sdug cing rtag tu bkres pas nyam thag pa/ skye bo yongs
283b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis smad pa/ rtag par rtog bcog bya zhing shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de thos nas/ bram ze de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid gdungs pas ngus nas/ bcom
283b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa lags na
283b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags te/ deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid na/ bdug ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las
283b5(rgyud 'bum): skyabs mdzad par gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod song la grong khyer ser skya'i lam gyi sum mngon mchod rten ring
283b6(rgyud 'bum): bsrel can rnying pa ral ba zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi rtse mor srog shing btsugs la/ gsang sngags yi ger bris pa de'i nang du bcug ste mchod pa byas nas gsang
283b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan bdun bton na khyod kyi tshe'ang phyir nur te 'phel bar 'gyur la/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas longs spyod che ba rnams su skye ste/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i
284a1(rgyud 'bum): bar du bde ba'i longs spyod kyang phyir 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ de nus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar
284a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar bde bachen po myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang shi phos nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang bskal pa
284a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun tu'ang yid gzhungs shing tshe'i bar chad med pa dang / las kyi
284a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad zad nas nam du'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang phrad cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad
284a5(rgyud 'bum): do/ / bram ze chen po gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen num/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la 'tsho thung ba 'am
284a6(rgyud 'bum): nAnd myang ba zhi ga yod na des mchod rten rnying pa bcos sam/ gsar du brtsigs kyang rung ste/ gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du gzhug nas dkyil 'khor byi dror byas te mchod na// de dag
284a7(rgyud 'bum): gi yon tan ni tshe zad nga'ang tshe slar nur zhing ring ba dang / nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba'ang nad do cog las thar pa dang / nam du'ang ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba dang /
284b1(rgyud 'bum): byo song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi sgra rna lam du'ang grag par mi 'gyur nA/ de dag tu skye blta ci smos/ de nas bram ze des de skad thos nas
284b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu yi rangs te/ mchod rten zhig pa bcos par bsams nas de 'khor de nas langs te song ngo // de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad
284b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba zhig stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di ji lta bu rab gyis
284b4(rgyud 'bum): nA yon tan dang / legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grasang sngags chen po rnams
284b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi'ang mchog bdag nyid che ba dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'di dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bzhin byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can
284b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ / lal zhig gis gsang sngags 'di thos na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa'ang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang
284b7(rgyud 'bum): brnab sems dang / phrag dog la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ tshe zad pa las kyang tshe ring du nur ba dang / bkra shis dang / legs
285a1(rgyud 'bum): pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
285a2(rgyud 'bum): sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i
285a3(rgyud 'bum): slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gyi
285a4(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po byung nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang mkhyen par mdzad
285a5(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od zer de dag slar 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing byA ka la bing ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsang sngags bka' stsal
285a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ nA ma sad+d+hA nAn/ samyak+saM bud d+ha koT+Ta nAn/ pa ri shud d+he ma na sI/ a d+h+yartsi ta duSh+Ti tA nAn/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a mi tA A yuHs+ya/ tA thA ga taH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shud d+hA
285a7(rgyud 'bum): A yu ra bi sho d+ha ni/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta bir+ya ba la na pra ti sang ha ra/ swa yuHswa ra sA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bud+d+ha bo d+h+ya/ do d+ha ya do d+ha ya
285b1(rgyud 'bum): ma ma sarba pA paM A da ra Ni bi shud d+he/ bi ga ta ma lam/ tsha ra su bud d+ha drad d+he/ hu ru hu ru swAhA/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/ gang la la 'di'i tshi ga byed par 'dod na tshes brgyad dang / bcu
285b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga rnams gang yang rung ba la mchod rten ring bsrel can la len bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/
285b3(rgyud 'bum): khrus byas la dkyil 'khor byas nas gsang sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun bris te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags 'don pa dang yi ger 'dri ba'ang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ lus spos
285b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis byugs nas kha zas gtsang ma zos la/ me tog dang bdug pa su mchod de/ de la rin po che sna bdun yang yon du phul lam/ yang na bdag gi nyams kyis ci 'byor par phul yang rung ste/
285b5(rgyud 'bum): sems mgu bar bya'o// chos btsun par bya ba'i phyir bsti stang dang ri mo cher bya'o// gsang sngags kyi yi ge la'ang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du shes bzhag ste/ mchod rten che chung ji tsam nus
285b6(rgyud 'bum): ba bdun cu rtsa bdun gdab par bya zhing / dwe re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na/ tshe zad pa las tshe slar nu ra te tshe ring bar 'gyur ro//
285b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi las kyi sgrib pa tshe rabs grangs med pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang nas nam du'ang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas thams can du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
286a1(rgyud 'bum): gang du skyes pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ de bzhin
286a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig nad tshabs po ches btab ste/
286a3(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dus byed pa la thug na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la/ de'i steng du tshor sna lngas ri mor zis te/ dbus kyi char ni 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang
286a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yung drung ris dang / pad+mo rnams bri'o// grwa bzhir yang pad+mo re ra bris te/ de'i steng du spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re re grwa bzhir gzhag go// bdug spos kyis snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs
286a5(rgyud 'bum): 'thul ba'ang gzhag go/ / kha dog sna lnga'i snod du kha zas sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang / 'bras chan du sbyar ba gzhag/ yang dri'i chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras sam
286a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bru'i snod bkang ba phor bu re re blugs pa dang / yung khu zas sna tshogs sbyar bu'i gtor ma spos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag go// gtor ma de dang 'azas kyi drung du
286a7(rgyud 'bum): bar tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bo'i steng du mar me gzhag go/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su nad pa bzhag la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bstan pa'i nad pa'i
286b1(rgyud 'bum): mdun du'ang mchod pa'i bshos bzhag ste 'bul du gzhug go/ / de nas sngags mkhan gtsang sbra cher byas te/ nad pa de la gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab ste/ cho ga 'di ltar byas
286b2(rgyud 'bum): nad pa tshe zad de 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye ba zhag bdun nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul par 'gyur ba'ang mo skAr nur zhing tshe ring por 'gyur ro/ / rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro//
286b3(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig gis gtsang sbra cher byas te/ nyin gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bton na/ de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang bde ba mi zad pa'i
286b4(rgyud 'bum): glaganas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran par yang 'gyur ro// dus ma
286b5(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i 'chi ba dang sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / yang gang la la zhig gis mi shi ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems thag pa nas gsang sngags lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod
286b6(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ shi ba dengan song gi gnas su lhung na'ang de'i mod la las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mtho ris kyi lha'i gnas su skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags
286b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ger bris pa gzhan gyi ming nas smos te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug la/ nan tan du mchod pa byas na shi ba gang yin pa de ngan song gi gnas nas thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang dga'
287a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ngan song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
287a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten de la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ mchod pa phul yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par
287a3(rgyud 'bum): yang 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// tha na bya dang ri dgas la sogs gang dag la mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang nam yang dud
287a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang la la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa'ang mchod rten de la reg gAm/ de'i grib mas phog kyang rung
287a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhing zad par 'gyur ro// mchod rten de'i gnas na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas drang / sha za la sogs pa
287a6(rgyud 'bum): lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / thog 'bab pa dang / sdig sbrul kha gdug pa dang / d+hur dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing med par
287a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / ser ba dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /
287b1(rgyud 'bum): bal mi shis pa dang / zug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na'ang mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od zer chen po rtsung
287b2(rgyud 'bum): bas/ ltas ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag dang chom rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/ dgra rgol ba zhig byung na'ang
287b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me lce kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang nas dmag gi dpung dang / mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan
287b4(rgyud 'bum): pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa bya ste/ phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs
287b5(rgyud 'bum): pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'thab cing rtsod pa mi 'byung / chos ma yin par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro// 'di la gsang sngags
287b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis gcad pa dang mnan par mi nus te/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro// yang mchod rten de'i srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA bi pu
287b7(rgyud 'bum): la aSh+Ti/ ma Ni ka na rA dza ta/ bi pu shi ta yaSh+Ti d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+te bi lo ki te/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ma sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha Ni/ saM bo d+ha Ni/ pra ba ra yaSh+Ti/ pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ta hu ru tsi ra ma la
288a1(rgyud 'bum): bi shud d+d+he hUM hUM swA hA/ rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang gsang sngags 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi ngos bzhir gzhug go
288a2(rgyud 'bum): de'ang cho ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang bris te srog shing gi nang du gzhug go/ / cho ga de ltar byas na mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra'o// de'i gong du'ang mchod rten ring bsrel
288a3(rgyud 'bum): can dgu khri dgu stong bzhengs pa dang 'dra'o/ / de'i yang gong du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong
288a4(rgyud 'bum): brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o/ / yang gang la la zhig gis 'jim pa las mchod rten chung ngu zhig byas te/ de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong
288a5(rgyud 'bum): brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o/ / yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ thal mo sba ra ra ma/ me tog phul lam/ byug pa dang bdug spos phul lam// dril
288a6(rgyud 'bum): bu dang / ba dan dang / gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su
288a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i dpal dang mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / tha na bya dang sbrang ma la sogs pa mchod rten de'i grib mas phog na'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing rjes su dgongs par
288b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta bu rmi lam du rmis sam/
288b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyang nas mthong ngam/ dril bu'i sgra thos sam/ mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/ rtag tu de bzhin
288b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams kyis srung ba dang rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di ni mchod rten
288b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi srog shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o/ / yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po 'di yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma la bi sho d+ha
288b5(rgyud 'bum): ni[:]ru da d+ha ba le pra ti sang skar/ ta thA ga tA d+hA tu d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ san d+ha ra san d+hA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
288b6(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma'am/ gang la la zhig gis mchod rten bdag nyid kyis byas sam/ gzhan byed du bcug gram/ mchod rten rnying pa bcos legs byas kyang rung / sa 'jim las mchod rten
288b7(rgyud 'bum): chung ngu byas sam/ so phag gam/ rdo ba las byas kyang rung ste/ dang por gsang sngags kyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad tshad du bzlas brjod byas te/ de'i 'og tu mchod rten sen mo gang tsam
289a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi sa la byas sam/ khru gang gi tshad du byas sam/ dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na'ang rung ste/ gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / sems rtse gcig tu byas pa'i
289a2(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyis mchod rten de la'ang spos kyi ngad ldang ste/ tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i dri bro'am/ lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro//
289a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/
289a4(rgyud 'bum): yon tan dang legs pa phu na sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na'ang tshe nur zhing ring bar 'gyur/ nam 'chi ba'i dus byed na'ang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
289a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgongs te/ skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du
289a6(rgyud 'bum): lung ston par 'gyur/ der yang tshe le bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing pha rol
289a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi sems shes pa dang / 'chi 'bo ba dang / skye ba shes pa 'thob bo// lus las tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung zhing / kha nas ut+pa la'i dri bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/ bla na med
289b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/ gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rten
289b2(rgyud 'bum): bskus na'ang de dag gi yon tan dang legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro/ / yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge ba skyen ma gang la la zhig gis
289b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid gtsang bar byas te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang rin po cher 'du shes pas bzung na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/ gsang sngags rnams
289b4(rgyud 'bum): la gus pa bskyed nas yi ge bri bar bya ste/ gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste mchod rten byas na/ de dge ba'i
289b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang legs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyogs
289b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems
289b7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing / thams cad chos kyi dbyings la dkod nas bsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i byin gyi rlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni legs so legs so//
290a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu'ang legs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil
290a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de nyid na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na
290a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang / chu l+la dang / ku be ra dang /
290a4(rgyud 'bum): de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rang rang gi spyod yul la skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur te/ mthar gyis yon tan chen po thob par
290a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig bos te smras pa/ kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa'ang shin tu rnyed
290a6(rgyud 'bum): par dka' gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa thos pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes smras so//
290a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang cho ga'i yon tan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dang sa
290b1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/ tshe'ang phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas dga' mgu yi rangs te yid bde ba chen po thob
290b2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyang sems dang zhing rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de
290b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis smras pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan
290b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das la phul te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags dang /
290b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad
290b6(rgyud 'bum): dedage ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar par mdzad pa lags na/ da dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas
290b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal to// na mo
291a1(rgyud 'bum): b+ha gA ba te/ na ba na ba TI nI/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ko Di yu ta sha ta sa ha srA NA/ na maHsarba Ni ba ra Na bi skam bi nA bo d+hi sa ta ya/ oM tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha Ni/ sarba
291a2(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga ta A yu ra ba lA nI pu la ni ma le/ sarba sid+d+hi na ma ma s+thi tA/ ba ra ba ra/ sarba satwa a ba lo ki ni/ oM sarba ni bA ra Na bi ska ma bi ni/ ma ma sarba pAs bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swA hA/ bcom ldan
291a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das bdag gi gsang sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te/ gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu byas te/ skad cig gcig bton
291a4(rgyud 'bum): na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ge ra bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ra/ mchod rten dra la la
291a5(rgyud 'bum): la zhig gis phyag byas sam/ tshig snyan pas bstod dam/ spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / mar me 'bul na rigs kyi bu de de'i tshe 'di nyid la sdig pa thams cad byang zhing
291a6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing
291a7(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge
291b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsogs par 'gyur ro/ / yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga gang yang rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te/ gos gtsang ma gyon la
291b2(rgyud 'bum): zhag gcig sbyang ba 'am/ yang na zas dkar gsum zos te/ mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi
291b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
291b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad cing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
291b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi lnga la yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad bton na sgrib pa thams cad byang
291b6(rgyud 'bum): ste phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / yang gang gis bzhi brgya rtsa brgyad bton na rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po chen po dag kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te srung ba dang
291b7(rgyud 'bum): skyabs byed cing / shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed nas bsod nams thams cad nye bar bsgrub bo// gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bton na dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa
292a1(rgyud 'bum): 'thob bo/ / yang gang gis drug brgya rtsa brgyad bton na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang gang gis
292a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun brgya rtsa brgyad bton na legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / yang gang gis brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad bton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/ sems rnam par
292a3(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'gyur ro/ / yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na phung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis stong rdza brgyad du bton na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'azas bu 'thob bo//
292a4(rgyud 'bum): gang gis nyis stong tshang bar bton na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis sum stong tshang bar bton na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis bzhi stong tshang bar
292a5(rgyud 'bum): bton na dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ / gang gis lnga stong tshang bar bton na rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis drug stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i
292a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / yang gang gis bdun stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis brgyad stong tshang bar bton
292a7(rgyud 'bum): na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnon par 'gyur ro/ / yang gang gis dgu stong tshang bar bton na rig sngags dang gsang sngags rnams kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro//
292b1(rgyud 'bum): yang gang gis khri tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gnon par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur te/
292b2(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams kyi las bya bar 'dod na/ mchod rten rnying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la bcos
292b3(rgyud 'bum): legs byas te/ g.yas phyogs su skor ba byed cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du bskor ba byas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
292b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i grogs byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
292b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi cho ga tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin no/ / de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba pa'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
292b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po
292b7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad bsal nas/ de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro//
293a1(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la bka' sprul pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ni ma 'ongs
293a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no/ / ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po grub cing phan yon
293a3(rgyud 'bum): cher gnas par gyur na/ las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya
293a4(rgyud 'bum): stong bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom
293a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das las tshogs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyis na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ de'i phyir legs
293a6(rgyud 'bum): par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob par 'dod cing yon
293a7(rgyud 'bum): tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byas te/ dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas
293b1(rgyud 'bum): la ba'i lci ngas byugs te/ grwa bzhir dri'i chu dur bu bkang ba re re gzhag/ bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba'ang bzhag nas/ snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang / dri'i chu dang / 'bras
293b2(rgyud 'bum): skam po rnams blugs te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang / yang til nag po dang / sran ma ma Sha dang / 'bras rnams bsres te bcos pa'i 'bras thug kri sa ra zhes byang dang / zas
293b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar gsum dang / 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang / yang shing thog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me
293b4(rgyud 'bum): tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la/ gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
293b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ oM bi pu la bi bu la bi ma le pra ba rI dzi na pa res
293b6(rgyud 'bum): ra sa ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu garbe/ a d+hiSh+Thi te sA h+ma/ a ya ta to ba ni swA hA/ sarba de nga na/ ba ha ya bi shud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na sa ma ye sA h+ma/ bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi 'chang
293b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya zhing / gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang ba
294a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang rim
294a2(rgyud 'bum): gro byed/ srog shing brtan par byed do// de bas gong du'ang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te mchod rten de la mchod
294a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do// de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang / gzhan yang mchod rten de yid
294a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa brgya
294a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam/ mchod
294a6(rgyud 'bum): rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na'ang las kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
294a7(rgyud 'bum): du skye'o/ / gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa'ang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur/ than bya dang ri dgas la sogs pa sems can
294b1(rgyud 'bum): gang gis mthong ba de'ang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/ bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod
294b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi skyang nul gyis byugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod
294b3(rgyud 'bum): re re bzhag la/ sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu bdab cing gsang sngags
294b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams gcig kyang rer de'i nang du gzhug go/ / de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug ste/ mchod rten rnams dkyil
294b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ me tog dang byug pas mchod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di'ang gdon par bya'o// namaHna pa nA TInA/ ta thA ga ta gaM ga NA nA Di bA lu
294b6(rgyud 'bum): ko Ti yuk+tA sha ta sa ha srANA/ oM bi bo ri tsa ri Ni tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la ba ri swA hA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad do/

295a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/ / de'i gong du'ang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/ mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas de
295a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do//
295a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtse ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po ma nor
295a4(rgyud 'bum): bar yi ge ra bris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod pa'i las byas la lus la thogs na rig pa de nyid kyis srung ba dang sgrub pa mdzad de/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang / shar gnyer ba
295a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gang la
295a6(rgyud 'bum): la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa'ang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/ grib mas
295a7(rgyud 'bum): phog gam/ lus la reg kyang rung ste/ de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/
295b1(rgyud 'bum): mes mi tshugs/ chus 'khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed/ thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa mdzad cing sman
295b2(rgyud 'bum): ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do/ / lha thams cad dang / dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la stongs grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang / sbyor ba thams
295b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ge ra bris la lam gyi bzhi
295b4(rgyud 'bum): mdo'am/ sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la/ de'i nang du bcu pa na 'gro ba thams cad dang / bya dang / sbrang ma dang / tha na grog sbur yan chad
295b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / de la 'og pa'i sa dang / rdul dang / rlung dang / grib mas phog na'ang byol song dang / yi dgas dang / ngan song lag par
295b6(rgyud 'bum): ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing / 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi mang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgri
295b7(rgyud 'bum): po yongs su byang bas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
296a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang /
296a2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongs su
296a3(rgyud 'bum): gtad kyi/ rtag tu rim thor bya zhing yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du chug la gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/ nam du'ang rgyun ma bcad par sems can la
296a4(rgyud 'bum): ston cig/ mthong zhing thos par byas nas mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
296a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gsang dra pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha dang / klu dang /
296a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'thun par smras te
296a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga dang / mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa
296b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bgyi/ rtag par gzungs su gzung zhing mi baspyad par bgyi/ yi ger bri ba dang / daklag pa
296b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing khong du chud nas ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa
296b3(rgyud 'bum): dang sdig pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin spyi bos blang ba'i slad du gsang sngags

302a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa mdzes pa la/ / sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya// lho phyogs kyi na sgo phye la// lcug ma rnams ni gcad par bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa yi// dbus su bad+ma
302a6(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / pad+mo dang ni phyogs bzhi sgo// the tsom med par mnyam par bya// mdzes byed sgo yi phyed du bya// 'gram pa 'dab ma'i tshad dang mnyam// nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang //

302b1(rgyud 'bum): byang shar la sogs pa'i/ / zla yi nang ni de dag tu// mkhas pas be con phyag rgya bri// phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dgas gzhag/ gzhan yang yi dgas lnga pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du bsam
302b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de bzhin phyi sgo'i nang dag dang // phyogs rnams de dgra thams cad du// mi ro mgo med yi dgas rnams// dur khrod thal bas dang ra te bri// de phyir yi dgas phal chen
302b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / khru gang la sogs rim pa nus// khru brgyad pa yi bar du ste// de las lhag par yong mi bri// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni// khru gang ba ni bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni

302b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni lha yi rnams/ / dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams byed// khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun// sbyin sreg mchog tu shes par bya// de ltar ci rigs bris nas ni// de nas
302b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang mas nye reg bya/ / chu yi phyir ni chu yi snod// chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya// de bzhin me tog don du yang // me tog sdug gu dri zhim dang // me tog 'phreng bas snod mchog
303a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan/ / logs par dag shing mdzes paraH/ khri zhon du b+h+ya n+tu// can dan dkar po myur po byung // sa ka ru dang sku ba yi// gu phul bdug pa b
303a2(rgyud 'bum): zhin no/ / mar me mar gyi mar me dang // mkhas pas snying po 'jam pa'o// drag po yin las dag la// mi yi tshil gyis bya bar bshad// gtor man dang shal sogs/
303a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar dug la sogs lhag par dngul// de ltar der ni tshogs bsags nas// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas te// byang chub sems la
303a4(rgyud 'bum): dmigs nas ni/ / ri mo yi ni las rnams dag/ gal te 'dri bar mi nus na// yi dgas phal chen dbus dag tu// pad+ma sngar bris gang yin pa// de yi steng du yi dgas ni/
303a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par bya// yi dgas kyi ni sngags mchog gis// bsam pa dag ni byas nas kyang // gla yi be con bzhi po yang // sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya//
303a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'dri bar nus na ni// sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya// sgro yi yi dgas bzhi po yang // gal te bri bar ma nus na// de bzhin yi dgas 'dzin sngags kyis// byin
303a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis rlob par gsungs pa yin/ / de yi nang du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob par bya ba'i phyir// rkang lag mgo bo dpung pa dang // de bzhin gzhan yang dpung pa dang //
303b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang de bzhin lag pa'i 'phreng // zod pa keng rus mi lags rlon// ro yi 'phreng ba bsam par bya// de yi nang du rang thugs kyis// byin gyis rlob tu gzhug par bya// de
303b2(rgyud 'bum): ltar cho ga bzhin bsams nas/ / mjug tu khro bo gshin rje gshed// sngags brjod pas ni spyan drangs nas// rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol// khro bo 'khrugs pa
303b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs mdzad pa/ / sku ni ma lce 'a bar ba 'dra// gzi brjid 'phags pa bsam pa ni// sku mdog stang zil bcag 'phro 'dra// zhal drug sgra yang kham par 'dug/ smin mkham
303b4(rgyud 'bum): pa mig kyang ser/ / spyan gsum mig ni zlum pa ste// phyag ni bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs// de bzhin yi dgas steng na bzhugs// zhabs drug gis ni mdzes par byas//
303b5(rgyud 'bum): tri shU la ral gri dbyug dgra sta/ sbyin pa'i phyir ni phyag brkyang ba// lcags kyu yi ni mtshon cha dag/ g.yas pa'i phyag na de bzhin bsnams// de bzhin g.yon pa'i drug po yang /
303b6(rgyud 'bum): thod pa mdung zung mda' bo che// mdzub mos bsdigs dang zhags pa bsnams// phyag na dbyug to bsam par bya// mi mgo rlon dang skam po dang // yi dgas 'phreng bas
303b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol// sku yang che la gsum khyim che// zhal gyi dbyibs ni du ma ste// sma ni rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'ang // zhal gcig
304a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhad cing zhal gcig ni/ / zhal gcig 'jigs par bzad pa'i zhal// zhal gcig zhal ni gdangs pa ste// sngags kyang bskyod par mdzad pa dang /
304a2(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig kyang ni mche ba gtsigs// de ltar snying pos legs par ni// spyan drangs mchod yon dbul bar bya// de nas dri dang sbyar ba'i chus// mchod yon cho ga bzhin phul
304a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / yi dwags kyi ni spyi bor yang // me tog dmar po gzhag par bya// blo tshon gyis ni khro bo la// de nas tsan dan dmar po dbul// dri yi 'og tu me tog rnams//
304a4(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyi ni gtor ma dbul// me tog me tog gtor ma dbul// me tog me tog 'phreng ba rnams// me tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya// me tog sngags kyis rim bzhin du/
304a5(rgyud 'bum): me tog cho ga bzhin phul nas// rang gi snying po sngags kyis kyang // khro bo yi ni spyi bo dang // khro bo gtso bo'i snying kha ra ni// snying po rnam par dgod par bya// 'tshogs mar
304a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'tshogs ma dang / / de yi gtsug tu spyi gtsug gzhag/ de yi lus la go cha dang // mtshon cha'i tshogs la mtshon bzhag ste// 'di skad bstan pa 'di dag ni// me tog
304a7(rgyud 'bum): dag gis dgod par bya/ / de ltar ci rigs mchod nas kyang // bdug pa rang gi sngags kyis dbul// de nas mar me rab 'bar ba// phyogs brgyad du yang dgod par bya// 'byung
304b1(rgyud 'bum): ngopo'i gtor ma khro bo la/ / phul nas yi dgas phal chen gyi// phyi rol tu ni mkhas pa yis// sgeg tor rnams ni sbyin par bya// khro bo gcol de phyogs te// de nas yang ni bdug
304b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dngul/ / de yi phyi rol chu bcas snod// me tog gis ni bkang ste bzhag/ cho gas khrus kyi bsnyung ba yi// slob ma dag ni bos nas kyang // sngags kun gyis ni gzi bskyed
304b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / khro bo yi ni snying po yis// lag gnyis me tog byin nas ni// gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs par bya// dkon mchog gsum ni dran byas la// slob dpon gyis na
304b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya/ / rang gi snying pos me tog nyid// dkyil 'khor la ni gtor du gzhug/ de nas be con zhes pa yis// phyag rgya sngags pas de la bstan// dkon mchog gsum
304b5(rgyud 'bum): ni gsang ba yi/ / dam tshig de la sbyin par bya// de nas grub par bya ba'i phyir// sngags pas chu dang me tog gis// khro bo'i gtso bo'i gsang sngags dag/ dbang bskur nas
304b6(rgyud 'bum): nini la sbyin/ / de nas khro bo snying po mi// cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur nus// me tog bdug pa'i 'phreng ba yis// snying po de la sbyin par bya// khro bo yi ni snying po mchog
304b7(rgyud 'bum): des kyang de ltar mnos nas ni/ / de nas bla mar phyag byas nas// ci nus sbyin pas mchod par bya// sngags pas bla ma mchod byas nas// dngos grub thob 'gyur gzhan tu
305a1(rgyud 'bum): man/ / slob ma snying po byin nas kyang // 'phreng ba tsan dan la sogs pas// mchod nas de yi 'og tu ni// phyi rol tu ni sngur bzhagra pa'i// dri nu la sogs dkang
305a2(rgyud 'bum): pabapa'i snod/ / de blangs mchod yon phul nas ni// 'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa'i// mthu rnal drag po gshegs su gsol// bzhud nas kyang ni yon chu de// dkyil 'khor la yang
305a3(rgyud 'bum): dbul bar bya/ / rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi// rig sngags 'chang gis de ltar ni// mchod pa rtag tu legs par bya// de nas dngos grub
305a4(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ yi dgas phal po che'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// /
305a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHpre ta mu kha kha da kra swAhA/ dbus kyi yi dgas kyi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHA kro d+ha bi
305a6(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyA ya/ ag+ni ra dzA li ti dzi he pre ta shA ri hU~M phaT/ 'di ni kA yi be con bzhi'i sngags so// oM na maHsarba tathA gA te b+h+yaHoM pre ta thod lak+Sha ya hUM phaT/ shar gyi sgo'i yi dgus kyi'o//
305a7(rgyud 'bum): oM pre ta bi mar+tha ka hUM phaT/ lho sgo'i yi dgas kyi'o// oM pre ta dz+wA la hUM phaT/ nub kyi sgo'i yi dgas so// oM kI ma mo to ta ke Ta hUM phaT/ byang sgo'i yi dgas so// oM na maHsarbata
305b1(rgyud 'bum): b+hag+ha te rgya mye ta mA le bi grI / mre t+ta mA le bi bi te/ me tamA le bi ba~Mt+te/ ga kyai su yis ra rdzob hU~M/ yi dgas 'phreng ba'i'o// 'di ni yi dgas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags

305b3(rgyud 'bum): oM AHhUM/ i di pra ta/ A sa na Na/ pre tod ga ta na rak+ShA rak+Sha swAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ oM dz+nyA badzA li ta bi gra ha hUM phaT/ go cha'i'o//
305b4(rgyud 'bum): oM a kro d+he ka ya man+ta ka ha nA ma thA b+hany+tsa hUM phaT/ 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po gang gi rtog pa 'di yin pa de'i sngags yi go 'bru bcu bdun pa'o// oM AHhUM/ de nyid kyi snying po'o// oM kA
305b5(rgyud 'bum): la hUM phaT/ 'tshogs ma'i'o// oM ya man+ta ka e kA pI ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug gi'o// oM bai bas sA tA na ta ka hUM/ mtshonA cha'i 'o// 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed
305b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi yan lag lnga pa'o/ / oM e ka bI ra ya man+ta kA bi ra ra swAhA/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so// mo d+him+ban ta ka te dzo ba yin ni s+yAh+na/ lbu bshos kyi sngags so// oM bA ka
305b7(rgyud 'bum): sho ni tra ra tra/ saM gan d+ha bi gra ha swAt+ma/ dri'i sngags so// oM di bya sreg ma l+ya d+ha ri Ne sAH/ me tog gi sngags so// oM tsi tid+b+ha pa pre yA ya swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngags so//
306a1(rgyud 'bum): / oM dI byA dzA tiSh+Tik+She swAH/ mar me'i sngags so// oM sar+b+ba su mi she s+ya ba hA ri Ni s+'uH/ rbe ga tor thams cad kyi sngags so// sno di nAn myo dza ni/ sngar
306a2(rgyud 'bum): ha ri dri dri khA hi swA hA/ gtor ma thams cad dbul ba'i sngags so// oM lu u nI pre tot+ta ka te/ pre ta mA li li ni/ nur+b+ba kle d+ha pre pre ti shi phreM dr-i tri rdi tra khwa ni gri ha pA li swAhA/
306a3(rgyud 'bum): dgas mang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtor ma'i sngags so// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ yi dgas phal po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags rim par
306a4(rgyud 'bum): phye ba ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang 'jam dbyangs kyi// khro bo dpa' bo gcig pu ni// tshad med gzi brjid bdag nyid che// de yi phyag rgya bshad
306a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / thog mar dkon mchog gsum po yi// dam tshig mngon par bstan byas nas// lag pa g.yas pa cho ga bzhin// legs par rab tu bcing bar bya// rig 'dzin
306a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gis rtag par ni/ / lag pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis// mthe bong legs par sbas pa ni// rab tu bsdams pa bzang po bcing // cho ga shes pa'i be con rgya// snying po
306a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags sam logs shig tu/ / sngags pa phyag rgya sngags kyis bcings// gzhan du nam yang mi bcing ngo // oMn mo bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+he/ a sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dzA ya/ ag+ni
306b1(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la ti dzahA/ a sIr dzA li ta dziH/ pre ta shaMr s+phu phaT/ be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags so// phyag rgya gcig pur gyur pa 'di// khro bo'i snying po sngags 'bar byed// mtshon cham
306b2(rgyud 'bum): lus pa yi gtso/ / bdu rnams thams cad zhi bar byed// ji ltar dkyil 'khor du brib// de yi cho ga bshad par bya// be con dbyig pa lta bu'i tshul// 'di ni be con zhes par grags//
306b3(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du ni de yi rtser// yi dgas mgo bo mkhas pas bri// yi dgas mang po rtag tu bri// de las gzhan du rnams kyang min// rig 'dzin gyis ni cho ga bzhin// rgya 'di dur khrod
306b4(rgyud 'bum): thal bas bri/ / yang na 'di nyid logs shig tu// gang gi tshe na sgrub 'dod pa// sgrub pa dngos grub 'dod pa yi// rang gi dkyil 'khor dag tu bri// de nas phyag rgya sgrub pa yi//

306b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya dgu dang ldan pa yi/ / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya// de bzhin du ni lho yi sgo// phye ste de nas mchod pa bya// phyag rgya sngags ni ma lus pa// khro rgyal rang gi spel ma bya//
306b7(rgyud 'bum): de yis 'dir ni mchod gyur la// rim gyis gsang ba'i mchod byas 'gyur// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+he d+h+yaH/ oM A sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya// ag+nir dzA li hA pre ta shi ra hUM phaT/
307a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i gong du bcug pa'i be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags so// 'dis las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas dngos grub kun gyi mchog/
307a2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i gtso bo de khon// gsang ba'i mchod dang ldan pa yi// be con sgrub pa bshad par bya// snying po ze ba mdzes pa yi// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad byas la// 'dab ma rtse mo'i phyogs
307a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad du/ / be con khro bo'i bar bcug bri// dbus su dgu pa bzhag nas ni// gzhan rnams shar phyogs nas brtsams te// bskor ba'i tshul du go rims bzhin// me tog
307a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gis gzhag par bya/ / be con kun gyi sa bon hUM// yi dgas spyi bor gzhag par bya// thog mar o dang ldan byas te// oM dang na ma mchod par 'gyur// a 'di khro bo rnam
307a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal gyi/ / sa bon dam tshig yin par bshad// oM swAHhUM/ oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harmA saM b+hai N+yaH/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod// be con rnams ni thams cad kyang //
