307a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / rang ring rtags kyis bskur na ni// de ma thag tu las byed 'gyur// aH'di khro bo rnam rgyal gyis// khro bo'i lta bas bltas pa'o// rang gi dam tshig dang ldan pa// sku
307b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa bskul ba bzhin/ / zhi brgyas pa dbang dang dgug/ dbye ba dang ni bsdad pa rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis mdor ni bshad par bya// de mi thog
307b2(rgyud 'bum): mar yi ge oM/ / de las gzhan pa sngags 'phel byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig nyid// gsum pa yin par yongs su bsgrags// bzhi pa dngos grub ster bya'i phyir//
307b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni sngags la bskul ba'i tshig/ oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga da hUM swA g+hA/ zhes brjod pa sngags kyi bdag nyid do// mjug gi hUM ni khro bo yi// sngags ni 'phel bar byed
307b4(rgyud 'bum): par bshad/ / de las gzhan ni khyad par du// rang gis bskul ba'i tshig gis byed// dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ni// rang gi ngo bo smos par bya// lha dbang dbang du byos shig
307b5(rgyud 'bum): ces/ / brjod nas tha mar swA hA sbyar// zhi ba'i phyir ni bskul ba nyid// mjug tu bau ShaT brtag par bya// de bzhin gshegs rigs las byung ba'i// dpal ni mtshungs
307b6(rgyud 'bum): med 'dod pa yi/ / bskul ba'i tshig gi mjug tu yang // nA ma swA hA rtag tu sbyar// ces pa'i phyir ni sngon bzhin du// bskul dus po ShaTasbyar bar bya// rgyas phyir bskul
307b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i thog ma dang / / tha mar khro bo'i hUM yang sbyar// gsad pa la ni phaT ces pa/ 'bar ba 'di la lhag pa yin// rigs rnams brlag par bya ba la// hUM dbus khro dang ldan pa'i phaT/
308a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bskrad dang bskul ba yi// mgo dang mjug tu hUM gzhug go// yang dga' bar ba'i phaT kyang gzhag/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho gar grags// de ltar
308a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i rim pa der/ / be con dgu ni byas par 'gyur// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'dug pa me tog de bzhin dri// de bzhin gtor ma mar me dang // bzlas pa med kyang
308a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / dbang du bya dang dbye ba dang // bskrad dang gsad la sogs pa ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul dag dang // de ltar sbyor ba dri 'dra las// tshes grangs dag dang skar ma dang //
308a4(rgyud 'bum): smyung ba dag kyang bya mi dgos// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga shes// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor legs byas la// khrus byas khrus ni ma byas rung // ji ltar 'dod pa rang dgar spyod// ci
308a5(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ba'i gtor ma dang / / lo ma me tog 'bras bus kyang // gang dag gshin rje gshed po yi// snying po phyag rgya mchod byed la// byang chub sems dang ldan 'gyur zhing // rab tu gus
308a6(rgyud 'bum): nargyu drug gis/ / de ni ci 'dod dgos pa rnyed// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las kyang byed// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las// be con gyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsang

308b1(rgyud 'bum): dgas zhes bya ba/ / sgrub pas mtshan mo dur khrod du// dur khrod dag gi thal pa yis// gru bzhi pa la sngo bzhi bri// mi ro'i ro smad dag dang ldan// rba re rnga yab me long dril// me tog 'phreng
308b2(rgyud 'bum): bas mdzes par bya/ / lha rdzas yi dgas mang po dngar// thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par smras// phyis ni be con phyag rgya yang // mgo med ro yi steng du bri// dkyil na yi dgas zhes bya ba'i//
308b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grub byed dkyil 'khor 'di// khro bo'i gtso bo'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa bya// sme gtor thams cad byin nas ni// gtsang mgo cha bgos nas kyang // 'bum
308b4(rgyud 'bum): phrag gcig ni sngar bsten pa/ / byas nas 'di ni brtsam par bya// phyugs chen dag gi khrag gis kyang // shis pa'i thod pa bkang nas kyang // de bzhin mi las byung ba'i sha// phyag rgyal
308b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dbul bar bya/ / phyugs chen gyi ni tshil bu las// mar me 'bar ba byas pa dag/ de yi phyi rol phyogs brgyad du// sngags bsrung de la dngul bar bya// cho ga shes pas de lta bur//
308b6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas mjug la bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan gos ni dmar po gyon// tsanA dan dmar pos bskus nas ni// cung zad dag kyang mi byed par// mar gyi brgyad la gcig pus
308b7(rgyud 'bum): byas/ / dpa' la sems drag mthu ldan pa'i// grogs ni gsum dang lhan cig tu// sgrub pa blo ldan sems stobs can// dbang po legs par bsdams pa yi// yi dag
309a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ / sgrub pa la ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas mtshan mo rgya bcings te// brtan par 'dug la legs par bzlas// bgegs
309a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams sna tshogs mtshan gcig tu/ / 'byung ste de las rgyal bar bya// de ltar srin po'i tshogs chen las// rgyal nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur// mi 'grub pa yi las rnams kyang //
309a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas thogs pa med par byed// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo yis// bskul nas 'dir ni dogs pa med// ha ni bi s+phoT bany+dza bany+dza zhes// bskul ba'i tha mar hUM brjod cing // g.yon
309a4(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba yi tshul gnas nas/ / khros pas ri rtse bzod dka' dang // ra ba yang thog sgo khang dang // pu shu khang pa dang ra ba dag/ skad cig gis ni snyil bar byed// da ra bi s+pho Ta b+ha dza zhes/
309a5(rgyud 'bum): bskul ba'i mjug tu hUM brjod na// ri bo dag ni mang po dang // de bzhin lha min sgo dag dang // de bzhin sa dang gzhan dgu dang // ji ltar 'dod pa 'gas par byed// pa tsadri d+ha na sang she
309a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes/ / bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod na// phyag rgya 'di yis chu rnams ni// thogs pa med par sems par byed// mtsho chen dang ni chu bo dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang skams par byed//
309a7(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ya zhes lan gnyis brjod// tha mar chu dang de bzhin mu// de nas de yi mjug tu hUM// sen staM b+ha zhes sbyar na// pa tsa bi d+han sa ya sho lam sho Sha yang hU~M phaT// ri mo la ni gnas pa bzhin
309b1(rgyud 'bum): nges par myur du gnon par 'gyur/ / tha mar hUM bzhag de nas dring // k+Sho ba ya zhes lan gnyis brjod// de yi tha mar yi ge ma// mkhas pa dag gis sbyor ba ni// dpung rnams 'khrug
309b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba la/ / khros na ngo mtshar ci zhig che// tha mar hUM dang ga bzhag la// de nas tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha gzhag/ sngags pas gal te sbyar na ni// cho ga 'di ni glang po gnon// ha na bi d+hA na sa
309b3(rgyud 'bum): mA ra ya/ / bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod cing // de bzhin tha mar phaT brjod na// dpung dag rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur// kha kha khA hi khA hi zhes// bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod na// dpung rnams
309b4(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun 'khrug par ni/ / thogs pa med par rab tu 'gyur// tha mar hUM dang de bzhin phaT// dr-i dri dza dza dri dri dag/ nges pa dag tu sbyar na ni// sngags pa khro dang ldan pa yis// khrag gi char
309b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bab byed par gsungs/ / tha mar hUM brjod ha ha hA hA bai tA le huM phaT/ ces bdag gis bya/ sngags pa dpa' dang ldan pa yis// bskul nas myur du rmongs par 'gyur// tha mar hUM brjod
309b6(rgyud 'bum): ha ha ha/ / de bzhin an+ta ya dang phaT// bskul ba 'di dag dang ldan na// 'gro ba dag ni mdongs par byed// tha mar hUM brjod de nas hUM// de bzhin dr-i dri dza dza bzhag/ tha ma ra dri dang phaT ldan
309b7(rgyud 'bum): na/ / 'gro ba de ma thag tu 'bebs// khro bo chen po 'di yi ni// phyag rgya de ltar grub gyur na// de tshe las rnams thams cad ni// yid kyis bskul ba tsam gyis byed// byang chub sems dpa'
310a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / dam tshig rab tu skong ba yin// sgrub pa gang dang gang 'dod pa// de ni thogs pa med par byed// gal te der ni ma grub na// 'di yi sngon du bsnyen
310a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / cho ga bzhin du 'bum byas la// de nas blo ldan sgrub la 'jug/ de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yi// snga ma'i dam tshig bskul ba bzhin// de nas slar yang sngags rnams la//
310a3(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa med par de bzhin sbyar// phyag 'tshal ba dang kun tu ldan// de yi thog mar oM bzhag la// oM zhes bya ba gzhan yang gzhag/ a zhes bya ba gnyis pa'o// de yi tshig gi mjug
310a4(rgyud 'bum): tu hUM/ bzhag ste de nas tshig rnams kun// de ltar kro d+ha bi dza ya// ag nir dz+wa li dziny+dza tra shrI// tshig rnams gzhan ni brjod par bya// de nas de yi tha mar hUM// de bzhin tshig gi tha mar
310a5(rgyud 'bum): oM/ / mtha' mar A bzhag de yi mthar// hUM dang si Ti lag gnyis bsgom// mA bu ta zhes lag gnyis bsgom// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// bka' lung gis ni phyag rgya de/
310a6(rgyud 'bum): gzir nas rang gis bzlas brjod bya// de ltar bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas// khro bo chen po de yis ni// kun la ci rigs bskul nas su// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//
310a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bo gtso bo de yi ni// bka' bzhin byed de gzhan du min// gang gis sngon du bsnyen byas pa// de yis bskul ba'i cho ga ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams la// ma grub na ni nges
310b1(rgyud 'bum): par sbyar/ / gzhan du sngags ni gzir byas na// bdag nyid nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// khyad par du ni dpa' bo yis// khro bo'i gtso bo'i snying po ni// phyag rgya 'dis ni gzir byas na/
310b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba ma lus 'khrug par 'gyur// sngags 'di gang du bzlas pa dang // 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa// de dag kun gyi lus rnams ni// dogs pa med par 'jig par 'gyur//
310b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di yis gzir gyur na// dpag tshad bdun gyi dkyil 'khor na// gzhan gyi sngags rnams gang yod dag/ dgra rnams dregs pa med par byed// 'byung po skrag par byed pa
310b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin lha rnams 'gugs par byed// khro bo rab tu dga' bar byed// gshin rje gshed po'i mthu yang skyed// yi dgas ro langs ri dgas ni// de bzhin rab tu 'jigs
310b5(rgyud 'bum): par gsungs/ / byad dang gnod pa skrag pa yang // rab tu bskul na 'jigs par byed// bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed// 'chi ba thams cad med par byed//
310b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phongs pa thams cad med byed la// be con phyag rgya drag por bsgrags// dgra dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang // skye bo dag la 'di bcings bstan// gshin rje gshed po sbyar na ni//
310b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi mod la srog kyang 'phrog/ mdor na snying po phyag rgya yi// cho ga rang gi dam tshig can// khro bo'i zhal nas gsungs pa 'di// gsang bar rab tu bstan pa yin// sngags pas khro bo'i
311a1(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo ni/ / gshin rje gshed po gcig dpa' ba'i// snying po phyag rgya be con dang // snying po dag gis sbyar bar bya// 'jam dpal gyi tsA ba'i cho ga zhe ba
311a2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ be con gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yi ge bcu bdun pa'i// rtsa ba'i sngags ni gang yin pa// de yi phyag
311a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gzhan dag kyang / / ro langs zhes ni bya ba yod// gshin rje gshed po drag brtson pa'i// snying ni dga' byed gsang ba'o// sngags pa dag gis gang dag tu// bcings pa der ni byin
311a4(rgyud 'bum): rlob pa/ / ro langs zhes bya'i phyag rgya 'di// khro bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dur khrod dag gi thams cad ni// gang la rtag tu rag lus pa'o// de nas lag pa gnyis ka yi// sor
311a5(rgyud 'bum): mo phan tshun bsnol byas te/ / sor mo gung mo gshibs te bsgreng // mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis// mthe bong gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis// legs par bzung nas
311a6(rgyud 'bum): dgug par bya/ / mthe'u chung gnyis kyang nang du dgug/ de bzhin du ni mthe bong gnyis// phan tshun bsnol te brkyang bar bya// shes rab can gyis ro langs 'di// rtag tu tshul bzhin
311a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bos bstan/ / khro bo gtso bo'i gsang sngags gang // yi ge bcu bdun legs gsungs pa// de nyid 'di dang sbyar bar bya// ro langs phyag rgya ldan pa ste// bdag nyid 'dod pa thams
311b1(rgyud 'bum): cad de/ / hA har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya// ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo 'bar byed bshad par bya// tshig bzhin du ni skyur bar bya// yi
311b2(rgyud 'bum): dgas phal chen bshad pa bzhin/ / 'di yang gru bzhi lham par bya// khyad par dag tu phyogs kun tu// mkhas pas me ni sbar bar bya// khru brgyad lhag chad med par ni// cho ga bzhin
311b3(rgyud 'bum): du bri bar bya/ / sgo sgo dag tu gsal shing gis// phug pa'i yi dgus khrag can gzhag/ dbus su mgo dang bral ba yi// mi re ro smad gsal bar gzhag/ yi dgas phal chen dkyil
311b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzhin/ / tha mar yi dgas 'phreng ba dgod// khro bo yi ni gtso bo'i sngags// 'tshogs ma spyi gtsug la sogs med// yi ge bcu bdun blo ldan gyis// mgo med ro yi steng du
311b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ zhal drug pa la zhams kyang drug/ de bzhin phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// rab tu 'bar ba drag po'i gzugs// snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya// yi dwags mang po sbyar ba ni//
311b6(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas kyang // me tog bdug pa 'phreng la sogs// sngags des de la mchod par bya// 'dir ni gtor ma sha chen du// gsungs pas gzhan gyis mi bya'o// khrag gi
311b7(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma'i cho ga dang / / de bzhin bdug pa kun sme ba'i// de nas dpal ldan rig 'dzin gyis// ro langs phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gtor ma me tog dbul la sogs// rnam pa kun tu
312a1(rgyud 'bum): khro bos bya/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni khor yug gi/ phyogs brgyad dag tu mar me dgod// dur khrod dag gi mgal dum mam// yang na gsal shing dag gis bud//
312a2(rgyud 'bum): seng ldeng dag gi gzar bu yis// tshil chenu dag la ldan bdun du// lho phyogs me la bsregs nas ni// de nas khro bo bsgrub par bya// de la sngon du bsnyen pa dang // bzlas pa dang ni
312a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa'ang med/ / rig 'dzin nyid kyi sems stobs nyid// 'di yi rgyu ni shes par bya// lho phyogs skor ni nan tan du// rma med pa yi ro bzhag ste// snying bapar ro langs
312a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya bzhag la/ / de la rab tu bskor bar bya// de nas khro bo chen po yis// shin tu bkrus shing legs par brgyan// dri dang me tog dmar sngon gyis// legs padag tu mchod
312a5(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / mkhas pas ro langs phyag rgya yis// thog mar bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// ga shin rje gshed byed yan lag lnga// de bzhin lus la sbyar bar bya// dpa' bo mthu chen
312a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kyis/ / ral gri lag par blangs nas ni// dpa' bo'i rkang pa g.yon pa yis// de yi snying khar mnan nas ni// khro bo yi ni gtso bo yi// yi ge bcu bdun sngags bzlas so// /
312a7(rgyud 'bum): oM ma kro d+ha ka ya man+ta ka/ ha na ma thA b+hany+tsa hUM phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge 'bru bcu bdun pa'o// de sngags drag pos bskul ba dang // yi dgas de ni g.yo bar 'gyur//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): har gyur pa 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin ha ha'i sgra yang 'byin// de nas bdag gis langs pa las// mtshon cha rnon po 'bar ba yis// bcad pa'i sha dang khrag bcas pa'i// mchod
312b2(rgyud 'bum): yon de la dbul bar bya/ / rig pa 'dzin pa de yi ni// sems kyi drod ni des shes nas// mchod yon blangs te dkyil 'khor ni// ha har gyur pa 'jigs par byed// de nas bdag
312b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid chen po de'i/ / 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs mthong nas// gshin rje gshed po dpa' bo yi// ro langs phyag rgya bstan par bya// de nas gshin rje gshed po ni// yi dgas
312b4(rgyud 'bum): lus la gnas pa des/ / ro langs nyid kyi rgya mthong nas// rig pa 'dzin pa de yi ni// sems drod rig nas 'dod pa'i mchog/ sbyin par byed pa gdon mi za// khro bo rgyal po slar
312b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs nas/ / mi ros la 'gyel bar 'gyur// de yi lus ni de nyid kyang // gser du 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de tshe grogs po rnams dang yang // sems can rnams la ci bder sbyin//
312b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po dpa' bo yi// sgrub pa bshad pa 'di yin te// sems ni rab tu dpa' bas bya'i// ngan song gzhan gyis yong mi bya// sems zhan pa yi sgrub pa pos// khro bo'i rgyal po de
312b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs na/ / de ni langs nas myur bar ni// grogs dang bcas pa gsod par 'gyur// ro langs phyag rgya mi shes na// des ni ji ltar drag gyur kyang / khro bo'i rgyal po de yis ni//
313a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po ni gusad par 'gyur// rig 'dzin mchog gis gang dag tu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gis// bcan cing khro bo bskul ba yis/
313a2(rgyud 'bum): langs phyag rgya bcings pa der// gdon mi za bar khro bo na// legs par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// myur du mchog kyang stsol bar mdzad// 'go bar gyur pa gdon mi za// yin
313a3(rgyud 'bum): nudud+d+ha d+harma saM g+he b+h+yaHa go d+hA kA ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+dza guM be tha pi rak+Sha rak+Sha man+ta ta thA ga to A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bkas brgyan pa/ ro langs kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya'i sngags
313a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// ro langs phyag rgya rang sngags dang // ldan na myur du khro bo ni// nges par byin gyis rlob par mdzad// dpa' bo dag gis sbyor bar ni// sngar
313a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyen la sogs byed na yang / / sgrub pa po ni 'dod pa bzhin// khro bo nges par myur du 'grub// yang na ro langs phyag rgya 'di// skyes bu sems ni mi dpa' bas// ba har gyur pa'i dkyi
313a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du/ / bdag nyid kyis ni dum tshig gis// mkhas pas bzung nas bzlas par bya// 'di nyid kyis kyang dbang bskur nas// ji ltar nus pas gang du'ang rung // khro bo mchog
313a7(rgyud 'bum): gi ri mo'am/ / dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin byas pa'am// de bzhin mu gzugs gzhan yang rung // yid dang dbang po bsdams byas te// thog mar tshig 'bum bzlas par bya/
313b1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa na// ji ltar 'dod par byas nas gdod// phyi nas sbyang ba byas nas de// ro langs phyag rgya sgrub la 'jug/ hA hAr gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// cho ga bzhin
313b2(rgyud 'bum): du dur khrod bri/ / yang na sems ni mi dpa' bas// dur khrod thal bas khyim du bri// khyim de stong pa yin yang rung // gal te khyim de mi stong na// ha har gyur pa mthong ba dang //
313b3(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun lon ma thag tu 'jig/ de nas yi dgas mang po las// gsungs pa'i mchod pa ci rigs byas// de nas lho phyogs sgor 'dug ste// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas la//
313b4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dam tshig las gsungs pa'i// ro langs phyag rgya bcings te bzlas// zla ba mar gyi tshes brgyad la// blo ldan cho ga shes pa yis// mtshan ma bstan cing 'dug nas ni// nyi
313b5(rgyud 'bum): mAm shar gyi bar du bzlas/ / de nas khro bos dgongs pa yis// ro langs lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo lha yi sngags dag dang // bskul ba'i tshig ni mchog rnams kyis/
313b6(rgyud 'bum): ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams ni// thams cad de nas byed par 'gyur// be con zhes bya phyag rgya la'ang // de dag nyid la myur du sbyar// sbyar na dogs pa med par yang // 'di ni
313b7(rgyud 'bum): dag byed par 'gyur/ / ro langs phyag rgya sgrub pa bri// sngags pa rnams la 'dir gsungs so// de ni zhan pa'i sems rnams kyis// sgrub pa dag ni gsum pa 'byung // cho ga bzhin
314a1(rgyud 'bum): du sngar bshad pa'i/ / yi dgas mang po de tshe bri// gang yang rung bar ni rigs par// sngags de rnams kyis sbyar bar bya// de nas yi dgas mang po yis/
314a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor blta na sdug pa 'di// khyim mam yang na gzhan yang rung // der ni dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// de dbus yi dgas spyi bol// ro langs ma ni 'dir gzhag go// khro
314a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gzi bskyed pa/ / zhi zhing kun tu dga' byed pa// ro langs snying po'i phyag rgya ni// bcings nas de ru sbyar bar bya// de nas ro langs phyag rgya yis// gsang ba'i yi ge bcu
314a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / zhi ba gzhan yang shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod par bzlas nas ni// oM AHhUM bai tA lau rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swA g+ha/ ro spangs phyag rgya'i snying po 'dri// gang yang rung ba
314a5(rgyud 'bum): ci 'dod par/ / bcur bsgyur ba yi grangs rnams su// cho ga ji bzhin bzlas nas ni// rmad du byung ba'i lus rnams kyang // yi dgras bsams pas byed par 'gyur// gsang
314a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rig sngags dam pa 'di/ / las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// de nas da ni 'di yi las// khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis kyang // cho gzhi ba las gang gsungs pa// de dag mdor ni
314a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / thugs dang gnad dang rmongs pa dang // de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga dang // dbang du bya dang byed pa dang // gsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dang // phan tshun 'thab cing gsod
314b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / de bzhin gzhan yang mig 'phrul dang // zhi dang rgyas par sbyor ba dang // de bzhin dga' bar byed pa dang // dgug par byed pa'i cho ga yang // mdor bsdus nas ni bshad
314b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ro langs phyag rgya las sgrub phyir// cho ga bzhin du sngar bsnyen byas// so so'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// cho ga 'di ni rnam par brtsam// rma bya'i mjug ma'i sgo dag
314b3(rgyud 'bum): gi/ mdongs brgya bam por sbams nas kyang // seng ldeng yu ba 'phan med pa// bzang po khru gang tshad la ni// bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa yis// mkhas pa dag gis bcing bar bya//
314b4(rgyud 'bum): yu ba de yi rtsa ba lnga'ang // mchod rten bzang po legs par bya// gro ga la ni gi'u lang gis// dro bos mthar byas ro langs bri// mkhas pas mchod rten 'og tu gzhag/ de nas zla ba
314b5(rgyud 'bum): gzas zin pa'i/ / nub mo yi dgas dral chen gyi// dkyil 'khor mtsho 'gram bris nas bzlas// de nas grub phyir sngags pa yis// mjug ma de la yid gtad nas// lag pa g.yon
314b6(rgyud 'bum): pas bzung nas ni/ / zla ba de la blta zhing bzlas// sems ni bdud kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i// sems dpa' chen po kha cig la// drod dang dud 'thul 'bar ba dag/ mjug ma de las
314b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ / dro bar gyur pa mthong na ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba yis// sems can rnams ni thams cad la// des ni phan 'dogs gnod pa nus// mjug ma
315a1(rgyud 'bum): bzang po de las ni/ / du ba 'byung ba mthong na yang // myur du mi snang bar yang 'gyur// 'dod pa'i gzugs can yid mgyogs bzhin// rga ba dang ni 'chi
315a2(rgyud 'bum): med/ / gnod sbyin rnams ni yongs su bskor// sems can chen po de yi gzis// gal te de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// nam mkha' la ni myur
315a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro/ / bde bo kun dang ldan pa yis// rig 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// gal te zla ba gzas btang la// de tshe grub par ma gyur na'ang // mjug ma lan cig bskor
315a4(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / dpung rnams gnon pa'i dngos grub dang // gang yang rung ba zhig kyang gnon// myos pas dregs pa'i glang po dang // stag dang seng ge wa rnams dang // rta dang shing rta/
315a5(rgyud 'bum): bya rnams dang // gru dang gru chen bzhon pa rnams// bskor na thams cad gnon par byed// mnan pa dag las thar par yang // mjug ma 'dis ni gdon mi za// de nas gzhan yang
315a6(rgyud 'bum): ro langs kyis/ / rmugs par bya ba gsang bar bshad// de nas tshil chen blangs nas ni// de yang thod pa'i nang du gzhag/ a shA ma ra dmar po yis// shing bal 'jam po'i snying
315a7(rgyud 'bum): po bya/ / gdol pa'i me yis 'bar byas nas// nyi ma rba ba gzas zin tshe// thod pa'i dud pa blangs nas ni// zla ba'am yang ni nyi ma dag/ btang ba'i bar du bzlas par bya// yang na
315b1(rgyud 'bum): ana'i shing ngal la/ / de yi 'og tu lcags thur gyis// mig gnyis dag ni bsku bar bya// de ltar mig gnyis bslus pa yis// gang dag bltas pa de dag ni// rmugs par 'gyur bar
315b2(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za/ / de nas gdong bkrus bltas na ni// slar yang de las thar par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rmongs pa ni// rmongs par byed pa mchog bshad do// arga gcig gi rtsa
315b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / gan ka yi rtsa ba dang // a shA ma ra ru r+N+Na dang // mo ha ra yi rtsa ba dang // ma hA na la'i rtsa ba dang // sha ra pu kar ldan byas shing // yi dgas me tog rnying par ldan// mdun
315b4(rgyud 'bum): so dag dang ldan byas te/ / skyes pa dag gam bud med kyi// gsang ba'i pags pa dang ldan pa// bu mo 'dod pa ma spyad pas// mar gyi brgyad la legs par btag/ phyis ni bud mer khrag
315b5(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / / bong bu'i khu bas slu bar bya// dur khrod thal ba dang sbyar te// de nas mar gyi tshes brgyad la// thog mar yi dgas mang bris nas// rig pa 'dzin pas mtshan mo bzlas// stong
315b6(rgyud 'bum): rdza brgyad ni legs bzlas na/ / de nas rdzas ni grub par 'gyur// rmongs par byed pa'i phye ma 'dri// sems can kun la sbyar na ni// de nas rmongs par byed par 'gyur// 'di la the tsom ma
315b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'thab mo dang ni rtsod pa dang // rgyal po g.yul ngo chen po la// bdag gi phyogs ni srung ba'i phyir// sbyor ba shes pas 'di bskul ba'i// ba dan dag kyang bsgrengs na ni//
316a1(rgyud 'bum): dgra rnams kun ni rmongs par 'gyur// phye ma 'di yis re gan ni// de ma thag tu mi rnams rmongs// chur zhugs na ni zer bar 'gyur// nges par gzhan du ma yin no//
316a2(rgyud 'bum): nas gzhan yang dbab pa yi// cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par bya// ci nas 'byung po thams cad ni// mod la 'bab par 'gyur ba'o// stag gi pags pa dang ldan par// sbrul gyi shun pa btags na ni/
316a3(rgyud 'bum): dug dang yung ba'i rtsa ba dang // mo phan dang ma la ti// ra yi gcin las btags nas ni// de nas de dag ril bur bya// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad la// bdun nam brgyad dam dgu 'am yang // gzhan yang ri
316a4(rgyud 'bum): bong khrag dag dang / / gur kum las su btags nas su// bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag tu// ril bu snga ma bzhin du bya// de nas snga ma'i ril bul// sngags pas thod pa'i snod du gzhag/
316a5(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi tshes brkyang mtshan mo ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// gur kum can ni a ri sta'i// snod ni gtsang mar gzhag par bya// de bzhin stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te// rtse mor rab tu sbyar
316a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sngar ni legs pa sbyar byas pa'i// ril du tha mal bdug pa la// btab na myur du 'bab pa ni// ring por mi thogs gzhan du min// bsams nas myur du btang ba ni// de nas gur
316a7(rgyud 'bum): ku ma ril bur bya/ / de nas gzhan yang grub pa la// dbang du byed pa gang gi mchog/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i yid las 'byung // las kyis nges 'gyur bshad par bya// rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa//
316b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba rak+Sha mu li ka/ der blangs sha ra pu ka nang // mi las byung ba'i mdun so dang // tshub mas btsugs pa'i shing lo ni// lding zhing lhag dang bcas pa dag/ gzhon nu mas ni mtshan mo btag
316b2(rgyud 'bum): phye ma mchog de lan bdun du/ / bdag gi khu bas slu bar bya// de nas bdag gis sbyar ba de// pad+mo snying po la bzhag pa// gtsang mas mar gyi tshes brgyad la// blo ldan lag pas bzung nas
316b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / sngags kyis stong du gdab par bya// phye ma'i rgyal po dbang byed pa// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bza' ba'am btung ba dag la sbyin// yang na phye ma gdab par bya//
316b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na rlung gi phyogs su btang // yang na gos la lan cig gdab// yang na byug pa'am so yi rtsi// gang yang rung bar sbyar na ni// de la 'dis ni lan cig gis// myos shing dregs pa'i
316b5(rgyud 'bum): draza dag ni/ / rgyang nas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// dran bzhin du ni legs par byed// phye ma 'di yis reg pa ni// shi nA'ang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// gal te kyang ni ring po nas//
316b6(rgyud 'bum): bye mas reg par mi 'gyur na// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// phye ma 'di yis gdab par bya// zhag bdun gyis ni rig 'dzin gyi// ming ni de yis thos nas kyang // bdag
316b7(rgyud 'bum): rang dang ni nor bcas pa/ / gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur// de nas sbyor ba 'ba' zhig gis// 'on pa'i las ngag bshad par bya// rma bya'i mdongs ni bzang po dang // de bzhin
317a1(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyi shun pa dang / / rta dang ma he'i spu dag dang // ka kan ka'i sa bon dang // a shA ma ra'i me togA dang // de bzhin glang po'i byi phyi ling // 'di rnams thams
317a2(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyam byas te/ / byi ba byi la'i khrag las btags// bdag gis ril bu mnyam par bya// byas nas chog shes pa yis// mtshan mo sbyong rtsa brgyad du bzlas// byi ba dang ni byil
317a3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / spu yi bdug pas bdug par bya// de nas sbyor ba shes pa yis// de la ril su gcig blangs nas// gang dag dbye bar bya ba ni// de dag gcig gi spyi bo la// ril bu'am yang
317a4(rgyud 'bum): na phye ma dag/ dbye bar bya ba'i phyir gdab bo// dbye bar byed pa'i mchog 'di ni// khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// de nas 'di ni gsad bya ba// sbyor ba'i tshul bzhin legs sbyar na//
317a5(rgyud 'bum): dogogs pa med par 'grub 'gyur ba// gsod byed mchog ni bshad par bya// mi dbang rnam panu ma yis// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa// de la sbyor ba 'di sbyar gyi// ngan song gzhan
317a6(rgyud 'bum): lam yin no/ / 'di ni byang chub sems ldan sa// grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'di// dngos grub thams cad ster bstan// cho ga gzhan du legs
317a7(rgyud 'bum): par bsrung / / gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dngos grub kun// 'dod na srog chags pan 'dod pas// 'og dang 'phur ba'i dngos grub kyang // bshom
317b1(rgyud 'bum): ba med par bsgrub par bya/ / khro dang gtum pa'i spyod pa can// 'dod phyir gsod par 'dod de la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dag/ rmi lam du yang ga la 'byung // snying brtse bzod
317b2(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin byams/ / rang bzhin gyis ni snying rje can// ji skad bstan pa'i sngags pa ni// byang chub sems nyid sems byed la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kun// gdon
317b3(rgyud 'bum): mi za bar de la 'grub/ / gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu gsungs// dkon mchog gsum la cher gnod la// bya bar bshad kyis gzhan du min// sems
317b4(rgyud 'bum): gdug bsgrub par bya ba yi/ / rkang pa'i rjes kyis blangs la// de nas gtsang ma'i ma he yi// gcin gyis de ni sbrus nas kyang // de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// dur khrod thal bas bsku
317b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sol ba tsher ma rnon po dang // de bzhin rus pa phub ma dag/ de yi snying khar gdab par bya// de bzhin gzhan yang lto ba dang // rna ba sna dang mig dang kha// rab tu bkang nas g.yang
317b6(rgyud 'bum): sar gzhag/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan par bya// de nas ro langs zhi ba'i sngags// phyin ci log tu bzlog ste bzlas// bsgrub par bya ba'i ming smos nas// sgrub pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
317b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / bzlog pa'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis// phaT gnyis dag gi bar du gzhug/ las 'di byas pas nges par ni// bsgrub par bya ba spos gyur nas// nges par 'chi bdag dbang du 'gyur//
318a1(rgyud 'bum): blo dang ldan pas bsgrub bya yi// dregs pas de ltar bsal byas na// nab kun gyis btab pa de// de nas slar yang thar par bya// gzhan du byas na mod la ni// nges
318a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'ching dag mdun du 'gro/ / dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung ba'i phyir// gnod par byed pa thams cad la// nad la sogs pa sbyar na yang // 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'di bshar do// dam tshig
318a3(rgyud 'bum): shes la mi bya ste/ / gal te byas na bdag nyid 'chi// bskrad par bya ba'i cho ga yang // 'jam dbyangs rab tu dpa' bo yang // khro bo nyid kyis ji skad du// gsungs pa da ni bshad par bya//
318a4(rgyud 'bum): seng ldeng las byas phur bu ni// sor brgyad tsam du byas pa la// yungs mar tsha bas byugs nas ni// dur khrod thal bas gdab par bya// de nas khA ni rang shi ba'i// de yi pags
318a5(rgyud 'bum): pas dkri bar bya/ / sgrub pas nub mo phur bu de// skud pa dmar pos bcings nas ni// de nas ro langs phyag rgya ni// skrod cig pa yi tshig ldan pas// bsgrub par bya yi ming smos te//
318a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa// de nas skrod par 'dod pa yis// bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo bar ni// phur bu de ni gdab par bya// 'di ni skrod pa'i mchog tu gsungs// 'on trang
318a7(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin stobs ldan pa'i/ / bsgrub par bya ba'ang bskrad par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang gcig la gcig/ 'thab dang rtsod pa bshad par bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod
318b1(rgyud 'bum): byed par/ / rig nas ji ltar 'dod pa ni// de dag rang gi phyogs 'khrugs par// sngags pas ji skad gsungs bzhin bya// bar hri dang ni ru tsir// pa tra dang ni ke shi ni// dwe/

318b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ba la ka ta dang / / go snod nag po ldong ros dag/ 'di dag btags te phye mar bya// mi yi tshil gyis sbrus nas su// ro langs stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas// nam langs pa ru gyur pa
318b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gdug pa 'khrug par byed ces bya// gang gis bsnams te de dag ni// rang gi phyogs rnams phan tshun 'khrug/ gcig la gcig kyang 'thub par 'gyur// yul 'khor
318b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni grong khyer dang / / dpung la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir// phan tshun gsod par bya ba la// bdug pa 'di ni skur bar bya// phan tshun 'thab cing gsod pa dag/ ci rigs bstan pa
318b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di yin no/ / de nas gzhan yang mig 'phrul gyi// cho ga tshul bzhin bshad par bya// dur khrod dag gi thal ba yis// mig 'phrul dngos po 'grub par 'gyur// mi thod bzang por

319a1(rgyud 'bum): der yang lho phyogs sgo dag tu// zhugs thab tu ni me bus te// de nas thal ba de la ni// mar gyis bdugs te sbyin sreg bya// de nas thal ba de la yang // stong rtsa
319a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad du bzlas byas te/ / stong rtsa brgyad po de nyid kyis// nam langs par ni nges par yang // mkhas pas mig 'phrul rtsed mo rnams// thal ba des ni byed par 'gyur// me tog dkar
319a3(rgyud 'bum): la thal ba des/ / lan re dag tu bskus nas ni// nam mapar gtor nu nges par yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par 'gyur// thal ba de yis snga ma bzhin// me tog ser po la

319a6(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas mkha' 'gro rdul bum dang // yang na gang dang gang 'dod pa'o// chu las lan bdun bzlas pa ni// gyen du gtor nas nges par yang // mig 'phrul slar yang bsdu bar bya// yang
319a7(rgyud 'bum): namu tshur bcangs pas so/ / khwa yi sgo bdun mi rus kyi// yub dag la bcings nas su// de la thal ba de bskus te// mig 'phrul bsams la ci 'dod par// tshogs kyi nang du bskor nas ni//
319b1(rgyud 'bum): mtsho dang rgya mtsho rgal ba dang // de bzhin khang pa li ba dang // g.yul dang 'khrug cing 'chi ba dang // ltad mo chen po mchog rnams ni// rab tu sbyar ba ston par 'gyur// khu tshur bcangs pas de bzhin
319b2(rgyud 'bum): sdud/ / sa yi 'og kyang ston pa dang // 'gro ba mang po 'dus pa dang // gyen du 'gro dang de bzhin 'khrug/ rang gi dpung dang rgya mtsho'ang 'khrug/ mjug ma de dang thal ba yis// gzhan yang gang dang
319b3(rgyud 'bum): gang 'dod pa/ / de dag nges par byed par 'gyur// khu tshur bcangs pas de bzhin sdud// de ltar mig 'phrul mdor bsdus pa// ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bya// ro langs de yi ngo bo nyid//

319b7(rgyud 'bum): mi za/ / de nas rgyas pa'i las rnams kyang // tshul bzhin du ni bshad par bya// mchod rten la mchod sna tshogs pa// byas nas de yi mdun 'dug ste// ro langs phyag rgya chen po ni//
320a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa bzlas// gal te mchod rten ring bsrel can// yin na de ma thag tu 'gyur// bsgrub bya'i ming smos bzlas na ni// skyes pa bud med
320a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par 'gyur/ / dam chos mchod rten mdun du ni// cho ga bzhin du khri bzlas na// ji srid rgyas par gyur gyi bar// de srid rgyas phyir rim gyis bzlas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
320a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dag/ mkhas pas mchod rten kun la bya// ring bsrel can la cho ga bzhin// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// thog mar mchod rten drung du ni// mkhas pa dag gis dkyil 'khor bya//
320a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas der ni me tog dang // shin tu yid 'ong dgram par bya// me mar rab tu 'bar ba brgyad// ma ngas pas de la dbul bar bya// shin tu yid 'ong chu dang bcas// sna tshogs pa yi bshos
320a5(rgyud 'bum): phul nas/ / gu gul bdug pa phul nas ni// byang chub sems dang ldan pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// zhe sar bcas pas phyag byas nas// mchod rten la ni mngon
320a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs te/ / zhi dang rgyas phyir bzlas par bya// dam pa'i chos kyang bklag pa dang // dus dus su yang mchod rten bya// de ltar nyin mtshan phyed byas na// zhi ba dag dang rgyas par 'gyur//
320a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i las ni bshad zin to// gzhan yang sgrub pa po la ni// 'jig rten thams cad nges par yang // dga' bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya// ji ltar ma la du sdug pa// de 'di rangade bzhin
320b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du min/ / mkhas pa yis ni gi'u wang dag/ nges par bdag gi khrag dang sbyar// lan grangs mang du sbyar nas kyang // mkhas pas de ni thod par gzhag/ de nas zla ba gza zin tshe//
320b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba la ni mig bltas shing // btang gi bar du legs par bzlas// nang par bdag gi dpral ba la// thig le gcig ni byas nas kyang // de nas rgyal po'i 'khor du 'gro// 'gro ba dbang
320b3(rgyud 'bum): byed sbyor ba 'dri/ / mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten dag/ mthong ba yis ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kun// dga' bar byed pa bsnun

320b5(rgyud 'bum): skra las/ / mar gyi brgyad la nan tan du// zhags pa legs par bkal byas te// de nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ de nas zla ba gzas zin par// 'gyur ba'i bar du nyin re bzlas//
320b6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gzas zin gyur pa dang // chu 'gram gtsang ma dag tu yang // der ni yi dgas phal chen gyi// dkyil 'khor de bris mchod pa bya// khro bo'i gtso bos gsungs pa yi// ro langs khro bo

321a2(rgyud 'bum): pa de yis drangs nas ni/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni// yid kyis bsams sam tshig gis kyang // gang dang gang 'dod legs par byed// brgya byin la sogs lha rnams kyang // de yi bka'

321a5(rgyud 'bum): na dman pa dag/ 'dod pa'i gdungs par gyur pa ni// de tshe zhags pa de nyid kyis// spu yi ngo bo bkug nas ni// dogs pa med par bsten par bya// 'dod pas gdungs kyang bud med min//
321a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' dang mya ngan gyis gdungs na// nad dang gtso bos sngan phab pa// gcin dang rdul dang dri ma can// mi yi bud med rtag tu spangs// gal te 'dod pas gdungs gyur na// lha yi bud med
321a7(rgyud 'bum): bsten par bya/ / 'on te sems dpa' chen po de// de tshe brtse ldan ma yin na// lha yi dbang phyug dge ba dang // gnod sbyin gdug pa dag gis bskor// rang gi gzhal yas khang

322a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug pa ro langs sam/ / khro bo rnam rgyal chog 'dir// zhags pas grub pa'i las rnams dang // ma grub grub pa gang yin de'i// lha dang lha min gnyis ka dag/

322a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de bzhin ri rtser 'bum bzlas na// grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// phyis ni mkhas pas ci 'dod par// sgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya// de nas khro bo rnam rgyal gyi// sngon du
322b1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen la sogs pa'i rim/ / sgrub pa po la ngan pa'i phyir// cho ga 'dir ni bshad par bya// gcig tu dpa' ba'i khro bo nyid// bdud rnams thams cad tshar gcod pa// dngos grub
322b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab stsol cing / / 'tshe ba thams cad 'jig mdzad pa// thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po yis// khrus kyi cho ga nyin re bya// de nas khro bos bskul ba yis// bsrung ba rang gi lus
322b3(rgyud 'bum): la bya/ / bruM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i// yid kyis pad+ma'i stan la 'dug/ bdag nyid de yi steng du yang // sa bon hUM las gyur pa'i sku// bsgom par byas te bsgoms nas kyang // bdag
322b4(rgyud 'bum): gi spyi bor yi ge mo/ / mig gnyis su ni yi ge AH// bsrung bar bya ste de nas yang // sngags ni yi ge bcu bdun po// zlos shing de bzhin gshegs dran nas// rang gi lus la sngar bkod
322b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / snying po snying khar gzhag par bya// de nas khro bo'i 'tshogs ma yi// bdag gi 'tshogs mar reg par bya// khro bo'i gtso bo'i spyi gtsug kyang // phyis ni gtsug tu gzhag par
322b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas lus la go cha yang // lag pas cho ga bzhin du bya// de nas bdag gi lag gnyis la// blo dang ldan pas mtshon cha dgod// rang gi dam tshig ldan pa'i rgya// mkhas pas cho ga
322b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bcings nas/ / khro bo'i gtso yi ro langs ma// bdag gi snying khar gzhag par bya// de bzhin be con phyag rgya yang // shin tu drag po'i mtshon cha'i gnas// lag pa g.yas pas
323a1(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas ni/ / khro ba'i mchod la 'jug par bya// zo mchod pa shad pa bzhin byas pas/ 'dod mthams cad stsol par mdzad// yi dgas ngal chen dkyis
323a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / / gzhan yang rtag par sku gzugs dang // ji srid bstan pa'i ri mo la// yid kyis mchod pa bya bar bsgrags// lha yi me tog dri zhim dang // bil ba'i lo ma bzang po dang /

323a4(rgyud 'bum): sku gzugs byed du gzhug/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung // de bzhin 'khar ba'am zangs la bya// ra gan in+d+ra ni la dang // mching bu shel dang rin chen te// rgyal srid 'dod
323a5(rgyud 'bum): pas gser la bya/ / longs spyod 'dod pas dngul la bya// nad rnams 'jig phyir 'khar bas bya// zangs ni 'dod pa rab tu ster// dgra rnams bshig phyir ra gan te// rang gi
323a6(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'phel ba'i phyir/ / in+d+ra ni la dag las bya// mchog dang 'dod pa thams cad ster// mching bu rnam pa sna tshogs pas// nor ster bar na yongs su bsgrags// dri med
323a7(rgyud 'bum): shel las byas na ni/ / zhi nang rgyas pa'i mchog rnams te// rin chen las byas ral gri dang // sa 'og rgya yi dngos grub ster// thams cad grub par bya ba'i gror// ngan tshed rnams
323b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / gser las sor brgyad tsam byas te// mchod na rgyal srid dpal yang 'thob// longs spyod rtag par 'dod pa yis// dngul las sor bcu'i tshad du bya// 'khar ba de
323b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nad sel ba/ / sor grangs bcu drug tshad du bya// sor ni nyi shu tshad dag tu// zangs las byas te mchod par bya// ra gun gyi yang zangs bzhin du// sor grangs nyi shu gnyis
323b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshad/ / in+d+ra ni las byas pa yang // sor zangs bcu drug tshad du bya// mching bu la ni sor brgyad shis// shel las sor zangs bcu gnyis so// rin chen sor ni brgyad
323b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ltar ji skad gsungs pa yi// sku gzugs 'dod pa kun ston pa'i// dngos grub 'dod pas legs par mchod// yan lag ma nyams gsal la bzang // rtag par
323b5(rgyud 'bum): bzo bo mkhas pas bya/ / mtshan nyid snga ma rnams dang 'dra// mtshon cha bzang pos rgyas par byas// yi dgas la bcibs zhal yang drug/ spyan gsum 'jigs par gzigs
323b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul/ / gzi can phyag bzang bcu gnyis pa// zhabs ni gsal bar drug dang ldan// mi mgo yi dgas 'phreng ba rnams// se ral kha yi thabs su thogs// g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul
323b7(rgyud 'bum): du bzhugs/ / na bzar stag lpags gsol bar dgyes// de lta bu yi sku gzugs dag/ snga ma bzhin du yongs rdzogs par// ji skad gsungs pa'i khro bo 'di// sngags pas bzo bo
324a1(rgyud 'bum): byed du gzhug/ yang na shing gi snying po las// khro bo gtso bo'i sku gzugs dag/ ji skad gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid bzhin// byas nas rtag tu mchod par bya// de nas
324a2(rgyud 'bum): shing las byas pa yi/ / sku gzugs tshul bzhin bshad par bya// gtsang ma 'dod pa kun ster ba// de yang de bzhin zlar bar bya// reg 'dzin kun gyi mchog 'dod na// tsan dan shing las
324a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa yi/ / sku gzugs sor grangs nyi shu'i tshad// sngags pa dag gis byed du gzhug/ tsan dan dmar po'i shing dag las// sor ni bcu drug tshad dag tu// 'dod pa thams cad
324a4(rgyud 'bum): kun ster ba'i/ / sku gzugs legs par byed du gzhug/ ra tsa arga'i rtsa ba las// byas pa 'dod pa'i don rnams te// sor grangs bcu bzhi'i tshad du shis// bde dang phun sum tshogs
324a5(rgyud 'bum): kun 'byung / / a sho ka yi snying po las// bzo bo mkhas pas legs par byas// gsar pa sor lnga'i tshad du gsungs// 'di ni dbang du byed par bshad// de bzhin ta la'i shing dag
324a6(rgyud 'bum): las/ / sor drug par ni byas na yang // lha dang lha mi nu bdag po dang // de bzhin klu rnams 'gugs par bya// nug ge sar shing dag las// de bzhin sor bdun tshad du bya// nad
324a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'jig par bya ba dang / / dgra rnams rmongs pa'i phyir bshad pa'o// mi thod dag las byas pa ni// rtag tu sor grangs bcu gnyis shis// ring por mi thogs mchog ster cing // /
324b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster// mi thod las ni byas pa dag/ sngar bsnyen la sogs ma byas par// mchod pa 'ba' zhig byas pas kyang // dgos pa'idon rnam sgrub par byed// sku
324b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bzang po'i mtshan nyid dag/ rgyas par bshad pa 'di yin no// khro bos ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// ri mo'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// mi ro'i gos bzang bkrus pa ni/
324b3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas khru tshad gang dag la// mi ro nyid kyi sgra dag gi/ pir gyis legs par bri bar bya// tshon gyi kha dog kun med par// ri bor khrag gis bri bar bya// yang na de yi sku gzugs
324b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / snga ma bzhin du btsag gis dri// khros shing 'bar bas 'jigs 'jigs ltar// g.yon brkyang bskum pa'i tshul du gnas// zhal drug dbu yang gyen du brdzes// smin ma ser
324b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing spyan yang ser/ / spyan ni zlum po gsum dang ldan// bcu gnyis phyag dang ldan pa'i sku// de bzhin yi dgas steng na bzhugs// zhabs ni drug gis mdzes par byas// g.yas
324b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag na mchog sbyin cing / / rtse gsum ral gri dgra sta dang // be con dang ni lcags kyu bsnams// khros pa'i phyag g.yon sdigs par byed// phyag na sha ka ti tho mar// g.yon pa'i
324b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na dbyug to bsnams/ / phyag na thod pa zhags pa bsnams// gshin rje gshed po bri bar bya// na bzar stag gi pags pa gsol// 'jigs pas pha rol gnon pa'i zhal//
325a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi mche ba gtsigs par ni// mkhas pas ri mo bri bar bya// de nas blo gnyis dag tu yang // phyag rgya'i gzugs dag bri ba ni// g.yas su skyes pa khro bo'i gzugs//
325a2(rgyud 'bum): kha gdangs pa ni 'jigs 'jigs lta// gyen du smra brdzes rab tu ser// be con phyag rgya mtshon char thogs// g.yas brkyang bskum pa'i tshul du gnas// bsdigs shing zhal ni khro gnyer
325a3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / zhal dang spyan yang khros pa'i tshul// g.yon du ro langs mo bri ba// 'bar ba'i kha lag gzi yang che// mig gsum gdong gi khro gnyer can// rab tu 'jigs pa'i kha yang gdangs//
325a4(rgyud 'bum): gyen du smra brdzes gsus po che// gtum po dug phrul gos gyon pa// de bzhin lag nA tri shU la thogs// gzi chen rab tu sdigs par byed// lus ni mai lce 'bar ba la// gdong dang mig ni
325a5(rgyud 'bum): thos pa'i tshul/ / bde gshegs sras kyi bka' nod pa// gsang ba'i phyag rgya ri mo 'di// dben pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// cho ga shes pas be con rgya// sku gzugs 'di la bzlas
325a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / yang na ro langs phyag rgya ni// bzlas na phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob// dben zhing 'du 'dzi med par ni// bzhag nas nyin re mchod par bya// yang na phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du//
325a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ri mo 'di bkram ste// mnyam bzhag dngos grub 'dod pa yis// mchod pa dang ni bzlas pa bya// bdag gi phyag rgya sgrub pa la// ri mo tshul bzhin bshad pa'o// de nas gshin rje
325b1(rgyud 'bum): gshed po yi/ / ri mo gzhan yang bshad par bya// sngar bsnyen byas pa'i 'og tu ni// mi ro'i gos bzang bkrus pa ni// khru grang ched du byas pa la// tshon gyi sbyin med bzang po yis//
325b2(rgyud 'bum): sprin ni nag po 'dra ba yi// khro bo dpa' ro gcig pu ni// snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya// sngar bsnyen byas pa'i 'og tu ni// ji ltar rigs par bris nas kyang // rab tu dben par bzhag
325b3(rgyud 'bum): nus su/ / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bzhin// nyin re rtag tu mchon nas ni// rab tu dben par bzhag nas kyang // de yi 'og tu bzlas pa brtsam// de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi//
325b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bshad// ri mo bkram nus mchod byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchod nas// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bar//
325b5(rgyud 'bum): ri mo gcig pu la bltas shing // mgo ni rma bya bzhin bkug ste// ru rag sha yi 'phreng ba yis// ji srid yid ni mi skyo bar// rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas bya ste// skyon bzlas pa
325b6(rgyud 'bum): gtang bar bya/ / de ltar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas nas// bsnyen pa byas pa'i 'og tu ni// de nas ri bar gnas bcas te// rlung za zhing ni bzlas brjod bya// dngos grub mchog
325b7(rgyud 'bum): dag 'dod pa yis/ / de nas de yi brtul zhugs spyad// cho ga las gsum mi 'dod na// sngar gsungs pa yi bzlas pa yis// 'bring dang tha ma'i dngos grub dang // brtul zhugs
326a1(rgyud 'bum): med par legs par ni/ / bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// brtul zhugs des ni mchog kyang 'grub// de nas gzhan yang 'di ru ni// dpa' bo
326a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya brtul zhugs 'byung / / lam mi gzur dang mi smra ba// slong mo za zhing dbang po bsdams// seng ldeng dbyug pa 'dom gang ba// sra ba bzang po thogs nas su// gshin
326a3(rgyud 'bum): rje mthar byed bzo byed cing / / bgrod dka' ba yi lam nas 'gro// khro bo dpa' bo brtul zhugs dag/ dpa' bo gzugs ni zla drug tu// sgrub pa gang gis yang dag spyod// de nas dngos
326a4(rgyud 'bum): grub mchog kyang 'thob/ / dpal ldan brtul zhugs spyad nas ni// de nas sgrub pa la zhugs nas// gdon mi za bar dam pa nyid// de ltar de nyid myur du 'grub// mi bzad brtul
326a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs bzung ba'o/ / sgrub pa la ni bdud kyi rigs// lha mo 'dod pa'i gzugs dag dang // de bzhin gzhan gyi lus su ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag gis// dbang po bsdams
326a6(rgyud 'bum): la 'tsho bar byed/ / de dang lhan cig smra mi bya// cung zad kyang ni chags mi bya// byang chub sems dang mnyam ldan pa// khro bo la gzhol zlos byed pa// gal te de ltar 'gro ngan// ming zad
326a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi gzugs dag gam/ / gzhan yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba// bde gshegs bsams pas mthong na ni// de dag gis ni 'jigs mi bya// gnon dang sdang bar byed na ni// bde
326b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs kyi ni bka' gcog pa/ / zo bdag nyid ni rnam par 'jigs// bde gshegs bsams pa bsgoms pa yi// rtul phod pa yi dpa' bo yis// brtul zhugs 'di ni bsten
326b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / dpa' bos bya yi gzhan du min// sgrub pa mchog rnams 'dod pa yis// lha yis brtul zhugs gsungs pa 'di// ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin du// nan tan gyis ni
326b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya/ / 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ khro bo'i brtul zhugs rim par phye ba bdun pa'o// / ji skad gsungs pa'i
326b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rnams la/ / me tog ji skad bshad pa bzhin// rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed ni// dge ba'i brtul zhugs 'di dag dang // de bzhin sngon du bsnyen pa yang // dran pa tsam ni 'ba'
326b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig gis/ / nges par 'dod de de dag nyid// mchod pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal srid sbyin pa'i gzugs la ni// can dan gur ku ma a ka ru// ci rigs par ni byugs
326b6(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / ut+pal puN+Da ri ka mdzes// tsam pa ka dang ma li ka/ ke sa ra ni dri zhim pas// mchod nas bdug pa mar bcas pa'i// gu gul mkhas pas dbul bar bya// de ltar byas
326b7(rgyud 'bum): na khyim pas kyang / / de la bsam zhing brgyad brjod de// ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa'i bshos// de yi spyan sngar dbul bar bya// sngar bsnyen la sogs med kyang bla// de ltar
327a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas zla drug gis/ / rkun mo dang ni dgra med cing // the tsom med par rgyal srid 'thob// ma bsgrubs na yang nyin gcig bzhin// mchod pa byas pas yul rnyed
327a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / las 'di gdon mi za bar ni// de na 'bum ni rnyed par 'gyur// longs spyod sbyin pa'i gzugs la ni// tsa na dan gur kum a ka rus// bdag gis legs par bskus nas
327a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / me tog 'phreng bas rab tu mchod// me tog dkar po'i 'phreng ba yis// nyin gcig bzhin du mchod byas nas// mar dang ldan pa'i gu gul lam// kun tu ru yi bdug pa'ang
327a4(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / me tog a ti muk+ta ka/ re re cho ga bzhin bzlas nas// mjug tu 'bum ni dbul bar bya// des na longs spyod chen po rnams// de yi mjug tu 'byung 'gyur te// 'di
327a5(rgyud 'bum): la spyad pa dogs pa med/ / nad sel ba yi gzugs la ni// tsan dan dmar pos bskus nas kyang // sha ta shing gi bdag po dag/ phul nas me tog gtsang ma yis// mchod pa'i
327a6(rgyud 'bum): bshos ni dbul bar bya/ / mjug tu nad sul dang bcas pa// khro bo'i sngags ni de bzlas nas// bdag gam pha rol po dag gam// su yang rung ba'i gcong can yang // de ni zam
327a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis 'joms/ / sngar bsnyen la sogs med kyang bla// 'dod dgur sbyin pa'i gzugs la ni// de ltar yang ni mchod byas na// zhi brgyas pa dbang dang dgug/ dbye dang
327b1(rgyud 'bum): bslad dang gsad pa dang / / 'dod pas mjug tu khyad par du// bskul ba'i tshig bcug bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang gang dag 'dod pa yis// yid dang 'thun pa'i 'dod pa'i don// de
327b2(rgyud 'bum): yang de ltar yang dag sgrub/ / sku gzugs rab tu mchod byas nas// gang du ci 'dra de lta bur// gus pas zla ba drug bzlas te// sku gzugs nyin gcig bzhin du ni// de ltar kun
327b3(rgyud 'bum): tu rab mchod nas/ / rtag tu de yi bzlas pas ni// blo dang ldan pas kun byas nas// grub pa nyid ni ma thob kyang // dngos grub phra mo thob par 'gyur// yang na khro bo'am phyag rgya'ang rung //
327b4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe sgrub par nus na ni// de yi ro mo gsungs pa dang // lha yi brtul zhugs des kyang 'grub// de nas gzhan yang brtul zhugs kyi// mchog gi dngos grub gang yin pa// cho ga
327b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ / rgyas par bdag gis bshad par bya// de nas khro bo gtso bo yis// rtse gsum shin tu gsal bsgrubs na// ur mo'i lcags las byas pa yi// rje gsum
327b6(rgyud 'bum): sor ni sum cu pa/ / rnol bzang zhing rab legs pa// thog mchog bzhin byas nas// ri yI rtse mor 'dug nas su// ri mo bzang por bris nas// yi dgas mang po zhes pa yi//
327b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thal bas tshul bzhin bri// de nas mchod pa rgya chen dang // nya dang sha rnams sna tshogs kyis// phyogs kyi gtor ma kun tu bya// chos grangs nyi shu gsum gyi nagongs
328a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum dkyil 'khor me tog la/ / bzhag nas me tog dag gis mchod// tsan dan dmar pos kun bkrus shing // me tog dag gis thams cad brgyan//
328a2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du lag gis bzung // ri mo la ni mngon phyogs 'dug/ khro bo mchog gi sngags dag gis// rtse gsum pa la mkhas pas bzlas// de yi nyes pa sbyang ba'i phyir//
328a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// khro bo mchog gi sngags dag gis// der ni mi yang rab sbar nas// cho ga bzhin du rtse gsum la// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong byas nas/
328a4(rgyud 'bum): lag pas bsgreng ste bzung nas su// dpa' zhing brtan pa'i tshul du gnas// ji srid me ltar 'bar gyur pa// de srid blo dang ldan pas bzlas// rtse gsum 'bar ba nyid kyis na//
328a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas chen du 'phar bar 'gyur// sngags kyi mthu yis mig gsum las// 'on kyang nyi ma bzhin du 'byung // rig 'dzin gzhan rnams thams cad kyang // de la mchod
328a6(rgyud 'bum): cing dga' bar byed/ / dbang phyug kun dang rab tu ldan// 'dod pa'i gzugs can yid bzhin 'gyur// de ste rtse gsum du 'byung ba// de na lus ni mi snang 'gyur// 'on te de ni
328a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe gyur na/ / dpung dang lha ma yin gyi gnas// g.yul ngo chen po la sogs par// 'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par byed// de ltar dang po sgrub pa'i mchog/ 'di ni rab tu
328b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa yin/ / da ni ral gri bzang po yang // 'dir ni sgrub par rab tu bshad// ur mo'i ljags las byas pa yi// ral gri sor ni sum cu gnyis// legs par byas
328b2(rgyud 'bum): shing phan byed la/ / glang ba'i sol dang byas la// ri yI tse mor 'dug nas su// mchod pa la sogs sngon bzhin bya// 'dug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su// ral gri lag par
328b3(rgyud 'bum): bzung ste bathas/ / sngags pa'i chang bas bzung nas ni// rab tu snang ba 'ab rab 'byin// 'bar ba de ni mthong nas su// rig 'dzin mchog tu de 'gyur ro// de ste de las
328b4(rgyud 'bum): dub 'byung / / de nas de ni mi snang 'gyur// tsha bar gyur na de bzhin du// stobs chen rkang pa mgyogs par 'gyur// lo brgya rab tu tshang bar 'tsho// 'di la rnam par spyar myi
328b5(rgyud 'bum): glos/ / gal te 'dis ma brten nas// grub pa thob par ma gyur na// ram gri brjon 'grus mchog ldan pas// gsul ngor phyin nas thams can nu// myur zhing snying mo tshon
328b6(rgyud 'bum): mi spongs/ / pham pa med par stong yang thug/ ral gri sgrub pa bshud zin to// dani ba con sgrub bya bshad// ko bi dwe ra'i ba tson nam// yang na song ldeng dag las ni// @
328b7(rgyud 'bum): rje'i bai con lta bu bzang / / sor ni bzhi bcu gnyis pa bya// de nas tho ldan dur khrod du// gtor mchog rgya chen bya// be con mchog la ji bzhin du// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/
329a1(rgyud 'bum): gos dmar bgos shing thal ba dang // me tog dmar pos brgyan nas su// sreg gzhi der 'dug be con las// ji srid ha ha zhes pa dang // lag na be con 'gul
329a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bar de srid cho ga bzhin du bzlas/ / de nas dang po khro bo'i bdag/ dbang phyug kun dang rab ldan pa// de yi bcibs pa ma he la// zhon na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// sma ni ljang lo
329a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil bsdug/ snum zhing mthing kha lta mur 'gyur// dus mtha'i sprin gyi kha dog 'dra// de yi lus mchog stobs kyang che// gal te khro bo de 'dod na// be con gyis ni lha rnams gsod//

329a5(rgyud 'bum): sta bzang po byas pa yang / yu ba sor ni bcu drug pa// dgra sta da ni sor drug pa// cho ga snga ma bzhin sgrub na// dngos grub de dag de yis 'thob// de nas gzhan yang lcags kyu'i mchog/

329a7(rgyud 'bum): nub mo mchod pa gtor ma byas// ri yi rtse la 'dug nas su// lcags kyu cho ga bsgrub par bya// ser skya las byung mar dag gis// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su// ji srid smon
329b1(rgyud 'bum): ma bzhin 'bar ba/ / de srid lag pas bzung ste bzlas// de nas de ni thogs pa yis// the tshom med par nam langs na// 'od ni me bzhin kun tu snang // gyen du 'bar zhing 'gro bar
329b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams ni// bran g.yog bzhin du dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mchog bzhin// bka' yang rab tu nyan par 'gyur// 'on te de yi
329b3(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu'i mchog/ du ba 'byung bar gyur na ni// de tshe du ba byung ba yis// stobs chen grib ma'ang mi snang 'gyur// sngags pa bye ba gsum du gson// gnod sbyin rig 'dzin
329b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mchod/ / bde ba kun dang rab tu ldan// 'dod pas 'byor zhing stobs kyang che// khro bo sngags kyis mthu stangs nas// gal te de ni cha gyur na// nang du bkra shis byas nas
329b5(rgyud 'bum): su/ / lcags kyu bzang po de thogs nas// bzlas na brgya byin la sogs pa'i// lha rnams 'gugs par gdon mi za// gnod sbyin rig 'dzin rnams dag dang // de bzhin lto 'phye mi 'am
329b6(rgyud 'bum): ci/ / lA ma yin gyi bu mo dang // de bzhin dri za'i bu mo dang // yi dgas ro langs rnams dag dang // de bzhin gzhan yang myos dregs rnams// bkug nas bdag gis las rnams ni//
329b7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dod pa byed du gzhug/ gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len// grub pa yi ni rdzas rnams dang // gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa// de dag thams cad de la ni// lha dang
330a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin tshogs la sogs/ / ji snyed pa dag 'bul bar byed// de yi bka' ni thams cad kyang // 'jigs pas nges par nyan par 'gyur// ngo mtshar
330a2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ / rang gi bzhon pas yongs bskor cing // gnas dang skyed mos tshal mang po// ngo mtshur kun dang rab ldan pa// khyim dang zad kyi gnas rnams dang // 'jig rten
330a3(rgyud 'bum): ma lus ston par byed/ / rdzu 'phrul yon tan longs spyod kyis// sgrub pa po ni dga' bar byed// ji srid lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mi// de yi bka' yis nges pa ru// gnod sbyin
330a4(rgyud 'bum): mo dag rang rang gi/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod nye bar sbyor// de ste las kyi skyon dag gis// tsha ba tsam du ma gyur na// lcags kyu de nyid 'dir bzung ste// nang par dben par 'dug nas
330a5(rgyud 'bum): su/ / bu mo gang gi ming bcug ste// ji srid 'dod pa bzlas nas ni// dpag tshad brgya brgyan gnas pa// de nas myur du 'ong bar 'gyur// bu mo'am yang na khye'u yang rung // ji ltar
330a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dug pa myur du 'grub/ / me tog 'bras bu de bzhin grub// shing rta dang ni ljon shing dag/ ma grub na yang rtag pa ru// de ni nges par khugs par 'gyur// de ltar lcags kyu dam pa
330a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / sgrub pa rab tu bshad pa yin// thod pa'i dngos grub gang yin pa// de yang 'dir ni bshad par bya// rtse gsum ral gri be con dang // de bzhin dgra sta lcags kyu yi// sgrub pa
330b1(rgyud 'bum): gang dag bshad pa yi/ / lag pa g.yas pas brdung bar bya// thod pa la sogs gzhan rnams ni// lag pa g.yon pas bzung bsgrubs na// de nas de dag bshad pa bzhin// dngos
330b2(rgyud 'bum): grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ / shing las legs par byas pa yi// thod pa sor ni nyi shu pa// mnyam par rab tu legs byas la// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// ri yi rtse
330b3(rgyud 'bum): mor 'dug nas su/ / mchod dang gtor ma'i rim pas byas// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su// sngags kyang srung ba mthu bskyed de// thod pa lag pa g.yon pas bzang // lag pa
330b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pas bsten nas ni/ / de yi ba yang dgab par bya// ji srid de la 'bar ba dang // du ba'am tshab byung gi bar// de srid sngags ni bzlas par bya// 'bar nas nam mkhar 'gro bar
330b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bshad// dub 'byung bar gyur na yang // de bzhin nges par mi snang 'gyur// 'on te tsha bar de gyur na// de yi tshe na gang bsams pa/
330b6(rgyud 'bum): thod pa de las 'byung bar 'gyur// de la rnam par dpyad mi dgos// 'on te de ni ma grub na// de nas sa la mi gzhag par// de yi thod pa blangs nas su// shing gi khri la gzhag par
330b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / ras kyis g.yogs te bzhag nas su// yid la ci 'dod bsam pa yis// zan dang bza' dang rgyan rnams// gang yang rung ba de dag nyid// ras g.yogs lag gis bzung nas su//
331a1(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na// grub pa la ni nyin re zhing // de nas gang yang rung ba'i zas// byan bcas pas nges pa ru// thod pa de nang gang bar 'gyur/
331a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni gang la yang // bdud rtsi zas ni sbyin par bya// tshul bzhin pa yi 'og tu ni// gtsang sbra byas te tshul bzhin bza'// thod bsgrub pa bshad pa 'di// lag pa g.yon
331a3(rgyud 'bum): pas gzung bar bya/ / mdung zung rnon po legs byas pa// bshol ba med par bsgrub par bya// ur mo lcags las byas pa mchog/ bkra shis sor ni sum cu gnyis// de nas rno
331a4(rgyud 'bum): ga snga ma bzhin/ / chu 'gram gtsang ma dag tu ni// sngon bzhin mtshan mo bsgrub par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu gsum du bshad// mda' bo che yang mkhas pas bsgrub// ur mo lhags
331a5(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa'i mchog/ rab tu rno bsngam bzhin// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su// tsan dan dmar pos gdab par bya// sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bzhin// ri'i rtse mor 'du gnas ni//
331a6(rgyud 'bum): ma bzhin du mtshan mo bsgrub// grub na 'bras bu snga ma bzhin// log pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni// lag pa g.yas pas g.yogs nas su// cho ga snga ma bzhin byas nas// zla ba gza' yis
331a7(rgyud 'bum): zin pa'i tshe/ / stan gcig pa la legs 'dug nas// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas nas// de nas mdzub mo de las ni// gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur// sangan du ba rang 'byung
331b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ / de ni tshe bar 'gyur yang srid// de ni nges par 'bar gyur na// rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur// du babyung bar gyur pa las// de bzhin mi snang 'gyur bar bshad//
331b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe rab tu cher gyur na// rkang pa mgyogs pa rab tu 'thob// de ste lag pa g.yod pa yi// mdzub mo grub par ma gyur te// dngos grub nyams kyang nges par ni// las rnams sna tshogs byed
331b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / khros nas de yis bsdigs na ni// mi de ji ltar 'dod pa ru// de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 'gyur// sngags mkhan dag gis bsad nas kyang // de nas shi bar gyur pa de// de nas
331b4(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pa yis/ / ji srid 'dod par slong bar byed// rab tu 'khrugs pa'i dpung chen yang // de nas de yis bsdigs par nus// glang po dang ni rta rnams dang // ljon shing dang ni nags/
331b5(rgyud 'bum): tshal rnams// ring po rim thogs 'jig par byed// ri rnams kun gyi rtse mo dag/ rab tu bzang zhing mtho ba yang // de nas de yi mdzub mo des// ring por mi thogs snyil bar byed//
331b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo dngos grub kun sbyin pa'i// grub pa'i mchog ni bshad pa yin// de nas gzhan yang zhags pa yi// sgrub pa'ang 'dir ni bshad par bya// shi ba'i sbal zhags pa ni// sdom zhing
331b7(rgyud 'bum): yid du 'ong ba bya/ / cho ga snga ma bzhin bsgrubs na// de yis dngos grub de nyid 'thob// shing ni rab tu bzang po las// dbyug to sor ni bcu drug bya// legs par bzhogs dang
332a1(rgyud 'bum): legs bris pa/ / bzang po yid du 'ong byas na// de yi mgo bo nag la yang // rab tu bzang po'i gser gyis dge// de yi ce la nor bu ni// pad+ma rA gas sbas par
332a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas tshul bzhin ri rtse la// cho ga sngon du bshud pa bzhin// sngon du bdug pa'i sbyin sreg bya// sgrub pa po yis nub mo sgrub// 'bar ba de ni grangs nas s+ya// nam mkhar 'phags pa
332a3(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za/ / snga ma bzhin du grub rnams kyi// gtso bor gyur cing 'dod gzugs can// du ba tsha la sogs pas kyang // de yi 'bras bu ji bzhin 'thob// mtshon cha mchog rnams sgrub
332a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / de ltar mdor bsdus bshad pa yin// de nas cho ga las byung ba'i// dngos grub gzhan yang bshad bya ste// ji ltar khro bo mchog gis ni// nyid kyis mdor bsdus bshad pa'o//
332a5(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas mang po zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor thog mar bris nas su// rma med pa yi ro blangs na// mkhas pas khrus byas legs par brgyan// me tog spos kyis mchod nas su// sha dang
332a6(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ / las ni dur khrod dag tu bya// 'di ni gzhan du yong mi bya// me tog bkram pa'i gnas mal du// nub phyogs sgo phyogs mgo bstan gzhag/ thod pa bzang po
332a7(rgyud 'bum): zas mchog gis/ / rab tu bkang ba blangs nas su// zas mchog dag gi nang du yang // tshal chen dag gis blugs par bya// mkhas pa de dag de yi tshe// khro bo sngags kyis btab pa yi//
332b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin thugs brda ni tshang tshang du// gamar bus mi yi lur thugs na// de yi lce yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas mtshon gyis gcad par bya// lce ni rtsa bar bcad pa las// khro bo mthu yis myur ba
332b2(rgyud 'bum): ru/ / de nas de nyid ral gri'i gzugs// bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur// de nas ral gri blangs nas su// grogs rnams la ni re re sbyin// sgrub pa po yis blangs nas ni// de ma thag
332b3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'grub par 'gyur/ / rig 'dzin de dag thams cad kyis// kun tu bkur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// grogs po de rnams dang bcas par// bskal pa bdun du gnas par 'gyur//
332b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na mkhas pas dur khrod du// yi dgas mang po zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor de ni bris nas su// mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa bya// skyes pa bud med shi ba yi// rma med pa yi ro
332b5(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas/ / legs par khrus byas rgyan gyis bcan// dkyil 'khor de yi sgor bzhug ste// de yi snying bar de 'dug nas// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// khro bo mchog tu gyur
332b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags/ / yi ge bcu bdun stong rdza brgyad// re bzlas nas ni dngos grub thob// mi ro de ni ldang bar 'gyur// mchod yon legs par dbul bar bya// de yi mgo la lag g.yon gyis//
332b7(rgyud 'bum): de ma thag tu reg byas na// sdong ros ma yi mdog 'dra ba// de bas bdag nyid can de yi// kha nas myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po yis de zangs te// yan lag thams cad
333a1(rgyud 'bum): bskus nas ni/ / bco ma'i gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur// grogs rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin// de ma thag tu de dag kun// bcom gser gyi mdog tu
333a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can 'gyur// rig 'dzin rnams ni thams cad kyi// thog mar 'gro ba de dag 'gyur// rdzas rnams thams cad grub par ni// grub na
333a3(rgyud 'bum): de la de nas yang / / dkon mchog gsum la cha gcig dbul// de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid bkur// grogs po rnams ni thams cad la'ang // byin nas 'di nas nam mkhar 'phul//
333a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzas gcig grub par gyur pa la// cho ga gzhin yang spyad bya ste// rdzas gcig grub par gyur na ni// thog mar phyag kyang byas nas su// dkon mchog gsum la cho ga bzhin//
333a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rab tu dngul bar bya// de yi 'og tu rdzas de blang // grogs po rnams la rim bzhin du// rdzas de byin nas 'phur bar 'gyur// phyi nas cho ga 'di rnams spyad// de ltar ma byas
333a6(rgyud 'bum): grub na yang / / de yi rdzas ni 'phrog par 'gyur// de bas dngos grub mchog rnams la// kun tu ji srid bshad bzhin bya// de nas gzhan yang many+dzan// bza' bsgrub pa ji bzhin
333a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// dam pa 'di ni bshad par bya// zhag gsum sbyang bar 'dug nas su// dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri// de nas cho ga snga ma bzhin//
333b1(rgyud 'bum): der ni gtor ma'i las bya'o// de nas mi ro bsregs pa yi// thal bas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// de yis bdag nyid byugs nas su// grogs po'i mchog ldan dga' ba des// de yi
333b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid byugs nas su/ / any+dza na yi snying po de// gsal shing gis bsad mgo la gzhag/ shi ba'i gos kyis g.yogs nas su// lag pas bzung ste bzlas byas te//
333b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rnam gsum 'byung ba'i bar// blo can gyis ni de srid bzlas// tsha ba'am yang na du ba 'byung // yang na me bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur// de yis mig dag bskus na ni// 'bar
333b4(rgyud 'bum): bas nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ / du bas lus ni mi snang bar// gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar bshad// tsha bar gyur na bltas pa yis// 'gro ba dag ni gsod par 'gyur// slar yang
333b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par gso ni/ / ring por mi thogs gdon mi za// 'di la sgrub par ma gyur na'ang // mig dag legs par bskus na ni// bltas pas 'gro ba dbang du 'gyur// pus mo btsugs
333b6(rgyud 'bum): shing mgo bos 'dud/ / any+dza na yi cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas gi'u wang bsgrub par bya// dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin bstun// ma grub 'gro ba dbang du 'gyur// li khri dang ni ba zla dang /
333b7(rgyud 'bum): sdong ros dag kyang de bzhin te// any+dza na yi dpyad bzhin du// mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub par bya// shi ba'i gos kyang cho ga bzhin// sgrub pa gzhan dag de bzhin du// khro bo nyid kyis
334a1(rgyud 'bum): / gsungs pa'i sngags// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma bya// shi ba'i bos de bgos nas
334a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / cho ga shes pas mtshan mo bzlas// de nas gos de dang bcas par// mtshan mo rab tu 'bar 'gyur na// 'bar zhing 'bar bas yongs bskor nas// nam mkha' dag la legs par
334a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phar/ / gad mo rab tu dgod pa'i sgra// 'jig rten skrag par byed par 'byin// rtag tu 'dod pa'i gzugs dang ldan// khro bo bzhin du de spyon 'gyur// de bzhin du babyung na yang // gdon mi za
334a4(rgyud 'bum): bar mi snang ba'i/ / mchog tu 'gyur bar rab tu bshad// sgrub pa de yi gos de ni// de bzhin tsha bar gyur na yang // rkang pa mgyogs shing stobs cher 'gyur// sa stangs rnams su khyab
334a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gro/ / na du med lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur// de ste grub par ma gyur na'ang // 'gro ba ma lus dbang du 'gyur// gang rnams mthong zhing de bzhin te// mthong ba de dag bran bzhin 'gyur//
334a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'di dag gnod sbyin mo// mi yis sgrub par 'dod na ni// ba ti shing drung nyams dga' bar// de tshe dkyil 'khor bris nas su// skrab shig gos kyang med byas la// zas mchog
334a7(rgyud 'bum): legs par bcos pa yis/ / lhung bzed bzang po yongs bkang nas// mar gyi ngo yi mtshan mo sgrub// de nas chang bu bdun phyung ste// sngags kyis lan bdun btab nas su//
334b1(rgyud 'bum): yi bzang po 'dir zhes zhes// byas nas de yi rgyab tu dor// de nas gzhan yang chang bu bdun// sngags kyis btab ste bza' bar bya// lha yi bzang mo zhes bya ba// grub pa gnod sbyin kun
334b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi rje/ / 'khor rnams mang pos kun bskor nas// de nas de yi 'od 'bar 'gyur// de nas kha bkrus de la ni// smos dang me tog mchog ldan pa'i// mchod yon chu ni dbul bar bya//
334b3(rgyud 'bum): legs 'ongs me tog dag kyang dbul// de nas stan bzang nyams dga' bar// me tog ldan pa phul na ni// da ni khyod kyis bdag grub ste// bka' bzhin byed cing de bzhin du// gzhan
334b4(rgyud 'bum): du mi 'gyur bka' nyan gyis/ / bka' stsol cig ces de la smra// ma'am yang na sring mo 'am// mdza' mo'am yang na chung mar 'gyur// mar brjod pas ni nges par yang // de yis ldong
334b5(rgyud 'bum): ros la sogs pa/ / grub pa'i rdzas ni mang po dag/ gnon mi za bar de la ster// sring mos me tog 'bras bu dang // bdud rtsi mchog dang gser 'gyur rtsi// rtag tu sgrub pa po de la//
334b6(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za bar ster bar 'gyur// mdza' mor gyur cig ces spras nas// mtshan mo lding yang mchog rnams dang // yid du 'ong ba gzhan rnams kyang // bdag nyid dga' bar ston
334b7(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / myur du chung ma sdug pa dag/ dpag tshad brgya nas khrid de 'ong // gzhan yang sgrub pa po dol// des shing 'dod dang dga' bster// de ste de la chung mar spras// 'dod pa'i
335a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs thun num par mas/ / dang zlug yongs na rnams na // grub ni gru' par byed/ sa shrI spyod pa dpa // 'dum
335a2(rgyud 'bum): zhu 'jom dang / / dbang phyug longs spyod thams cad ni// sgrub pa ji srid 'dod pa spyod// gal te mngal nas skyes pa yis// sha za mo dag sgrub 'dod na// sgrub pa po la de yi las//
335a3(rgyud 'bum): dag 'drir ni bshad par bya// shre sh+ma kA ta'i shing drung ni// gtsang mar dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// mchod rten chen po byas nas su// gtor ma'i las kyang sngon bzhin bya// der ni dur
335a4(rgyud 'bum): khrod shing dag gis/ / sngags pas mi ni rab sbar nas// gos med skra yang hag byas te// de nas me yang 'bar ba la// der ni gzegs ma'i sbyin sreg rnams// sngags kyis stong rtsa
335a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bsregs na/ / de tshe gdon mi za bar yang // sha za mo ni 'bar ba'i gdong // 'ong bar 'gyur te de yi tshe// sems ni dpra' bar byas nas su// mi 'jigs mdun du mchod yon
335a6(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / de yi 'og tu de la ni// bdag nyid gzugs ni bzang por ston// de yi ming ni kang rang gi/ rang ming sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya// gang bsams pa yi nor de rnams// 'ongs
335a7(rgyud 'bum): nas ring por mi thogs par/ / gdon mi za bar rab tu dbul// kang rang gi ni zhes bya ba// sha za mo ni kun gyi mchog/ sgrub pa po ni sems dpa' zhing // gzi yang rab tu che ba la//
335b1(rgyud 'bum): don rnams thams cad rab tu sgrub// de ltar min na myur bar ni// sgrub mo yang ni gsod par byed// de ste klu yi bu mo dag/ de la rig 'dzin dpal ldan pas// sgrub pa dag tu 'dod pa
335b2(rgyud 'bum): la/ / de yi cho gar 'di bshad do// pad+mo dkar po'i mtsho 'gram du// song nas cho ga snga ma bzhin// yi dgas mang po zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor der ni bri bar bya// de nas
335b3(rgyud 'bum): der ni mkhas pa yis/ / gtor ma'i cho ga snga ma bzhin// u dumA ba ra'i yAm shing gis// thog mar me ni rab spa ra nas// nA ga ge sar phye ma dag/ mkhas pas stong rtsa brgyad du
335b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg/ sbyin sreg byed tshe myur bar ni// de nas klu yi bu mo dag/ 'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// gal te mtshan mo de sdig na// sgrub pa po ni gang 'dod pa// gdon mi za
335b5(rgyud 'bum): bar rab tu ster/ / de ste sngags pa lha min gyi// phug sgor song nas ci dga' bar// lha ma yin mo thams cad ni// las 'di dag ni thams cad sgrub// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris
335b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / gtor ma cho ga rgya cher bya// pri yang ku yi shing dag gis// zhugs thab tu ni mu swa ra nas// cho ga bzhin du sngags zlos shing // yungs kar dkar po gur kum la/
335b7(rgyud 'bum): bstegs nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la// de nas nges par bsreg par bya// de nas sbyin sreg byed pa'i tshe// lha min na chung 'byung bar byed// sgrub pa po ni gang 'dod pa// gdon mi
336a1(rgyud 'bum): za bar rab tu ster/ / lha ma yin gyi gnas dag tu// bde ba'i lam nas 'jug par byed// dbang phyug kun dang ldan par ni// de na de ni 'grub par byed//
336a2(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'dir ni sngags pa dag/ sha chen dag ni 'tshong 'dod na// dang por dur khrod 'dug nas su// dpa' ba'i sems kyis sha chan blang // blangs nas bsrung bar byas nas su// lag
336a3(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon pas chu gri thogs/ / g.yas par sha chen skyo med bzung // mtshan mo dur khrod du zhugs nas// sems pa dpa' bas gshin rje gshed// khro bo yid la zlos byed cing //
336a4(rgyud 'bum): sha 'tshong ba yi sgra bsgrags so// bdag nyid chen po de yi tshig/ srin po dam tshig med pa dang // sems can phra mo kha cig gis// thos na rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur// gang gzhan lhag
336a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems yod cing / / drag po'i nur khrod gnas skyong ba// sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che// de dag lus ni ston par byed// grub pa 'jigs par mi bya bar// de nas sems/
336a6(rgyud 'bum): ni drag po des// legs par 'ongs zhes smra bar bya// de nas gnas myong sgrub par phyir// de nas an+dan dag dang // rdzas ni gang rnams 'dod pa de// sha yis rab tu sbyin byes zhes//
336a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa pos kyang smra bar bya// sgrub pa pos kyang gzhan mi bya// sems ni dpa' bar shes nas su// sbyin pa byed kyis gzhan la min// de nas gzhan yang 'di yi las// dpung
336b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams gnan par bya ba gang / / khro bo mchog gis gdung ba ni// de dag 'dir ni bshad par bya// mi ro'i gos las byas pa yi// bA rgan shin tu bzang po bya// de ni mngon ka las kyu'o//
336b2(rgyud 'bum): sor bcu drug gi tshad du bya// smyug ma'i yub sdug gu dag/ khru gang tshad du byas pa la// btags te de nas bsgrengs nas su// dur khrod du ni mtshan mo bsgrub// dkyil 'khor rgya chen bris
336b3(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / der ni tsog pur gnas nas su// ba dan lag na thogs nas ni// mtshan mo thog thag bzlas par bya// de nas nAm ni nangs pa na// de yi lag na thogs pa yis// de tshe
336b4(rgyud 'bum): dgra yi dpung 'khrugs pa/ / the tsom med par gnas par 'gyur// lag na thogs pa gzhan dag kyang // sgrub pa pos ni mthong ba yis// de dag thams cad mthong ma thag/ mnan te ri /
336b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mi g.yor 'gyur// glang po rgyal po myos pa dang // shing rta rta dang glang por bcas// rkang zang 'khrugs pa mang bcas pa'i// dgra yi dpung rnams nges par ni// mthong ba tsam
336b6(rgyud 'bum): ni nyid kyis su/ / mnan pa bzhin du snang bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang dur khrod kyi// sbyor ba bkra shis dge ba dang // khro bo mchog gis gsungs pa de// de ni nges par bshad
336b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / des ni mi ro bsregs pa yi// mtshan mo me 'bar bltas nas su// sba ba shig gos kyang med byas la// bzlas pa dag kyang bskor zhing bya// de nas der ni sngags pa yis
337a1(rgyud 'bum): lan cig thal ba spar ba gang / / lag pa g.yon pas blangs nas su// mkhas pas khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur// yang na lha khang stong par 'gro// phyir yang sbyong
337a2(rgyud 'bum): par yong mi bya/ / de nas der yang thal bde// nam nangs bar du bzlas par bya// nam ni nangs par gyur pa na// thal ba de ni bsrungs nas su// gsar pa'i snod du gzhag bya zhing //
337a3(rgyud 'bum): sal gzhag par yong mi bya// dgra yi dpung dag mnan pa'i phyir// thal ba de ni gtor byas na// shing rta dang ni glang po dang // mtshon chu thams cad 'khrug pa dang // skye bo mang por
337a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i yul/ / thal ba de yis thams cad du// lan cig gtor ba tsam gyis kyang // lus rnams mi 'gul gdon mi za// 'di ni mtshon rnams gnon pa dang // dpung yang gnon/
337a5(rgyud 'bum): byed dge ba'o// de bzhin gnyid kyis log bya dang // myos par byed par sbyor ba yang // rlung phyogs dag tu song ba 'am// yang na bsnyen te byas na'ang rung // bgrod dka'i dgra ni mtshem
337a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs la/ / byas nas 'tho ba mi 'gul 'gyur// dur khrod dag gi sbyor ba yis// dpung mnan de ltar bshad zin to// 'gro ba dbang byed sbyor ba ni// rnam pa gzhan dag bshad
337a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri// mchod pa snga ma bzhin du bya// gtor ma rgya chen byas nas ni// mi yi tshil gyi snum dag laso// mar me 'bar ba byas nas su//
337b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas thod pa bzang po la// mkhas pa dag gis snag tsha sbyar// du ba'i snag tsha sbyar nas kyang // nam nangs bar du bslab par bya// de nas nang par nam nangs te// du ma'i snag
337b2(rgyud 'bum): chos mig bskus na/ / gang mthong de yi dbang du 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba dbang byed pa'i// sbyor ba de ni bsgrags pa yin// btsag gi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyang // dge ba dag
337b3(rgyud 'bum): ni da bshad de/ / yug snam btsag ni dge ba dang // mi ro khar ni bcu gnas su// de nas de phyed tshig nas ni// grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang // blangs nas lha yi khang stong du//
337b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa dag gis bzlas pa bya// bgegs kyang rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung // ji srid nam nangs bar du ni// de na 'dug cing de la bzlas// de nas nam nangs gyur pa dang // ras
337b5(rgyud 'bum): nIni dmar pos dkris nas ni/ / mchod cing bsrungs nas gzhag par bya// de nas gang yang rung ba'i ming // btsag gi yug snam de yis su// ci 'dod par ni bri bar bya// sgrub pa po
337b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ming nas kyang / / bskul nas dogs pa med par yang // bsgrub par bya ba myur du 'ong // btsag bsgrubs kha ru gsungs pa dag/ mdor bsdus bshad pa de yin no// da ni ji ltar
337b7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa ru/ / sor gdub bsgrub pa sbyor bar bcas// cho ga bzhin du gsungs pa dag/ mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya// mi yi ro khyer 'gro ba na// der song nas ni de yi khar//
338a1(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi sor gdub gzhag par bya// mkhas pas khro bo gcig pu'i sngags// zlos pa byed de 'dug pa na// me yis tshig par gyur pa ni// re yi kha na 'dug
338a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / sor gdub lag pa g.yon pas blang // nam langs bar du bzlas par bya// de nas sor gdub bzang po de// lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la// mkhas pa dag gis gzhag
338a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de yi lag pa g.yon pa yis// gang dang gang dag reg 'gyur ba// de kun de yis las byed 'gyur// phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar 'gyur// 'di la dpyod par yong mi
338a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas gzhan yang yungs kar dag/ shing tu ngo mtshar dang ldan pa// khro bo nyid kyis ji lta bar// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa bshad// si tA'i shing las ga pa rtse yang //
338a5(rgyud 'bum): bzang po sor ni brgyad par bya// de yi nang du yungs kar dgang // dngos grub mchog ni der blugs la// zla ba gzas ni zin bar du// nyin ma re re bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor
338a6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin bris nas/ / gtor ma rgya chen dag kyang bya// gab rtse nang gi yungs kar kun// sgra 'byung ba'amags kyi bar// de srid yungs kar bzlas par bya// de nas yungs
338a7(rgyud 'bum): kar grub 'gyur ba/ / blangs nas gang yang rung bar ni// cho ga bzhin du sbyar byas nas// de yis mi nus ci yang med// des ni sa yang 'gas par byed// chu klung dag kyang skams
338b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / rim tho rnam pa mang po dag/ phru ma dag tu rlog par byed// de bzhin ri yi rdzi mo yang / thur na rab tu skyil bar byed// khrag dang sol ba'i char dag kyang // 'bebs par
338b2(rgyud 'bum): byed de the tsom med/ / gnam lcags dang ni se ra ba dag/ glo bu ra dag tu 'bab par byed// sa g.yo ba dang sprin bsdu la// rig pa 'dzin pas sbyar byas na// glo bur du yang
338b3(rgyud 'bum): thogs med 'gyur/ / mtshe dang rgya mtsho g.yo ba dang // shing rnams rab tu ldegs pa dang // sa yi 'og kyang g.yo byed kyang // de bzhin klu rnams bsdigs pa dang // ma

339a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bshad pa rnams/ / brtul zhugs byed ni ma nus na// de ltar khro bo mchog 'di la// sngon bzhin mchod pa byed pa dang // ji skad bshad zin bzlas byas

343b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thob 'gyur/ / a ti mug ta'i me tog rnams// bzlas shing bzlas shing snga ma bzhin// gal te tshig 'bum phul na ni// tsho gas gsungs pa bzhin gnas pa'i// sngags pas nges
