344b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs/ / cho ga drug ni 'dir bshad zin// da ni yi ge 'bru gcig pa// sngags mchog dag ni gang gsungs pa// de yi las kyi cho ga bshad// dpa' bo brtul zhugs med par yang /
344b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo gang // ming ni gshin rje gshed ces bya// de yi snying po mchog de ni// hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gcig/ thog mar oM bzhag cho ga bzhin// ri mo'i spyan sngar 'dug
344b3(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / 'di ni 'bum phrag bcur bzlas na// de yi 'og tu sgrub la 'jug/ de nas de yi ri mo mchog/ don rnams thams cad sgrub pa gzhan// gang gis dngos grub rab thob pa// tshul
344b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ni rab tu bshad/ / ras ni gsar pa khru gang tsam// legs par bkrus shing dris bskus la// tshon rtsi bzang po sbyin med pas// khro bo gshin rje gshed dri bya// zhal ni bgrad cing
344b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / smin ma ser zhing spu yang ser// char sprin nag po'i kha dog 'dra// thod bdag gis rgyan du byas// spyan gsum dbu yang gyen du brdzes// zhal gcig pa la mdangs

344b7(rgyud 'bum): mnabs par dgyes/ / 'khrug cing 'jigs pa'i gsung yang 'byin// yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'od zer 'bar ba bcas pa'i sku// de nas de la mkhas pa yis//
345a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa yan lag mchog gis mchod// sngags pa brtul zhugs brtan pa ni// de yi 'og tu brag phug zhugs// ri mo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su// kha zas zab

351a1(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis 'grub/ / dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod// de ni rtag par bzlas na ni// dngos grub thams cad ster bar bshad/

351a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i sngags/ / shU la phyag rgya ldan pa ni// khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud 'di la// de ni grub par rab tu bsgrags// dur khrod gnas su cho ga bzhin// de yi sngon du bsnyen pa ni// thog ma nyid
351a5(rgyud 'bum): du tshig 'bum bya/ / de nas rtag pa'i cho gar spyad// rtag par spyod pa'i cho ga yis// de nas tshig 'bum bzlas nas kyang // de 'og ji skad gsungs pa yi// las rnams kyis ni sgrub la 'jug
351a6(rgyud 'bum): rdza ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga yis/ / de nas thams cad las grub par// zhal drug hUM zhes bya ba yi// cho ga 'dir ni mdor bshad pa// 'jam dpal las byung khro bo ni// hUM zhes bya ba'i zhal nyid
351a7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / gshin rje gshed ces bya bar grags// 'di la dka' ba'ang ci yang med// khro bo zhal nas mdo ru ni// cho ga bzang po ci gsungs pa'i// cho ga de bzhin bdag gis bshad//
351b1(rgyud 'bum): al drug hUM zhes bya ba 'dis// hUM zhes bya ba drug tu bsgrags// de bzhin gzhan yang rtog pa ru// hUM gi mtha' ni bskul bar bya// hUM traM shU la'i phyag rgyar ldan// ri rnams kun kyang 'gas
351b2(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / puM tri rab tu sbyar na ni// myur du ras kyang gas par 'gyur// hU~M tshig rig sngags thams cad dang // mtshon cha rnams ni gcod par bshad// shU la'i phyag rgya dang ldan par//
351b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM kha rtag par rab sbyar nas// sdang ba rnams ni za ba dang // dgra yi dpung dag rab tu 'jig/ hUM ga rab tu sbyar na ni// glang po gnon pa rab tu bsgrags// hUM tha mtshon cha kun 'phel
351b4(rgyud 'bum): che/ / lha dang lha min 'jigs par byed// hUM ha dpung rnams 'jigs pa dang // rmongs par byed pa yongs su bsgrags// hUM dgra rab tu sbyar na ni// phan tshun mtshon cha 'khrug par byed//
351b5(rgyud 'bum): hUM a rab tu sbyar na ni// slar yang thar pa byed pa yin// hUM ga glang po seng ge dang // rta dang mi dang bya rnams dang // gru dang shing rta'i bzhon pa dang // 'bab chu dag kyang myur bar 'dir/
351b6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag rgya ldan byas na// gnod par byed pa'i mchog yin no// hUM ba rab tu sbyar na ni// mnan pa rtag tu thar par byed// hUM d+ha rab tu sbyar na ni// lha dang lha min gzhan yang rung // dngos
351b7(rgyud 'bum): grub phra ma thams cad la/ / bskul na de yi 'bras bur 'gyur// hUM baM kun tu dbang byed pa// tha mar ra bzhag dbye bar byed// rta dang sbyar na sdang bar byed// ma dang sbyar ba gsod
352a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / ya dang sbyar na de bzhin gsod// la dang sbyar na mig 'phrul byed// zhi dang rgyas la 'ba' zhig go// de la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang // rtsa ba'i tsho gas
352a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / de nas ji skad gsungs pa yi// las rnams kyis ni sgrub par byed// de ltar gshin rje gshed 'di yi// dngos grub nges par 'thob par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo rnam rgyal gyi//

352b1(rgyud 'bum): byas gtsang ma yi/ / de nas sngags des thams cad ni// bdag gi lus la dgod par bya// khro mig dmar por gyur pa yis// de nas sa phyogs gtsang ma yi// phrag dar zang zing yongs
352b2(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa/ / bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags zlos shing blta bar bya// de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed// dpa' bo gcig pu'i sngags thos shing // dkyil 'khor

352b4(rgyud 'bum): con mang po yin/ / shU lan can gyi shU la mang // mdung thung rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// de bzhin mdung thung mang zhes bya// de bzhin thod pa mang po yin// mi ro dang ldan mi ro mang //

353a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'o/ / dur khrod mang po rab grags pa// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin da'o// de la pad+mo'i dbus su ni// 'jam pa'i dpal gyi khro bo'i mchog/ gshin rje
353a2(rgyud 'bum): gshed ces bya ba de/ / cho ga bzhin du bzhugs par bsam// in+d+ra nI la'i bcag 'phro mdog/ zhal drug spyan yang 'jigs par gzigs// khros shing zhal yang bgrad pa ste// 'jigs
353a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs lha la 'jigs par gnon/ / spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du brdzes// tshems kyis spros mnan 'jigs 'jigs lta// bco brgyad phyag ni dran par bya// zhabs kyang rab tu 'bar ba

357b7(rgyud 'bum): kro d+he ka ya man+ta ka hUM pU hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags gzhan no// oM AHhUM/ 'dibang gzhan no// yi ge bcu gcig rgyal po yi// de nyid bzlas pas grub
358a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// rtsa ba dang ni phyi ma dang // de bzhin phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di// rtog pa ma lus rgyas pa dag/ lha de rnams kyis legs thos nas//
358a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa kun// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas kyang // khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ni// gshin rje gshed la 'di skad smras// bcom ldan khyod kyi rtog pa 'di// sgrub pa rnams
358a3(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa'i phyir/ / rab tu ngo mtshar bshad lags te// bzlas dang skom dang mchod la sogs// khro bo chen po'i brtul zhugs dang // de bzhin dka' thub drag po dang // ji skad gsungs
358a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i smyung ba yis/ / khro bo kI li kI la la// sogs pa'ang dus la bab pa ni// sngags zlos pa la dngos grub ster// bcom ldan 'das kyi rtog pa dang // khyad par gyur pa ci zhig mchis//
358a5(rgyud 'bum): de bas bzlas dang sbyin sreg dang // smyung dang brtul zhugs dka' thub dang // med par rang dbang nyid du ni// dngos grub dam pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha mchog de dag thams cad kyis//
358a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal de skad smras pa dang // khro bo drag tu bzhad pa yis// rab tu drag pa'i tshig 'di gsungs// drag tu bzhad pa'i zhal 'dzum pas// lha yi tshogs rnams 'jigs rmongs la//
358a7(rgyud 'bum): ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes gsungs pa'i// phan pa'i tshig gis dbugs phyung nas// khyed rnams kyis ni gang spras pa// sgrub pa dag ni med par yang // sbyor ba shes pas 'grub
358b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / lha rnams kun gyis mnyan par gyis// bde gshegs dngos grub gcig pu las// gyes pa rnam pa tha dad 'gyur// de nas ting 'dzin tshul las ni// mtshan ma dang ni dngos grub
358b2(rgyud 'bum): de/ / thog mar byang chub rtsa la brten// shes rab de lta bu yang bsgom// sems kyang rnam par mi rtog pas// bde gshegs dngos grub de dag thob// de nga'i gzugs su gyur par byos// sa
358b3(rgyud 'bum): bon mtshon cha mang por ldan/ / khro bo de yi zha la drug bsgyur// dril bu gsil ba'i sgra yang 'byin// khro bo'i zhal ni bcas par ldan// de yi gzi dang mthu ldan byas// kun tu dga' ba'i snying
358b4(rgyud 'bum): por ldan/ / gang gi yid la gang bsgoms pa// de la nga yi thugs g.yos pas// ji lta ba 'am gang yang rung // mdun nam yang na rgyab nas kyang // las kun byed nus grub par 'gyur//
358b5(rgyud 'bum): gang du ga nga ni phyag lnga bcu// be con gdengs pas bsdigs par mdzad// tri shU la ral gri dgra sta kyu// thod pa sha ka ti thod dmar dbyug/ de dag las ni phyag gsum drug/ g.yas

359a1(rgyud 'bum): na ba par gsol bar dgyes/ / mtshon cha mtshon rnams 'bar zhing 'khrug/ spyan dang gtsug bud rtsa dmar ser// zhabs gnyis gdengs pa'i tsham jam mdzad// sa yi steng

359a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon du phyogs par 'gyur/ / ji ltar 'dod pa'i don rnams ni// gdon mi za bar grub par byed// rnam par gnon pa'i gzugs 'di ni// bdud las rgyal ba yin par bsgrags// thog mar

359a6(rgyud 'bum): sa bon mtshon cha bzang por ldan// nga yi zhal ni khro bor 'gyur// dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang ldan// khro bo'i zhal ni bsam par bya// nga yi gzi brjid mthur ldan byas// kun dga' yi ni

359b1(rgyud 'bum): na grong khyer du/ / rnam pa gzhan du bzhag gyur tam// gong du mchod pa ma byas na// myur du 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur// mi ro la ni gnas pa'i gzugs// de ltar rtag tu goms byas shing //

364b5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de la rkang pa ya gcig kyang // drag shul can du brkyang ste gzhag/ gzur te 'dug pa'i tshul du gnas// gdong yang yon por bsnyer bar bya// mdzub mo bsgreng ste gdengs
364b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / be con phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs// dgra dag baspyad par 'dod na ni// myur du bskrad par bya bar 'gyur// de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa mtho
364b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / dpa' dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad// zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur// phyed ni dma' bar bkug ste gnas// rkang pa g.yas pas tsham rngam byed// sngags tshul gnas
365a1(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgrims na ni/ / rgyas par 'dod na thob par 'gyur// slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba// bzlog ste bya ba gzhan du med// grub pa bdag nyid chen po yi// tsham
365a2(rgyud 'bum): rngam rim pa drug gsungs pa/ / dang po'i ming ni log par phyogs// de yi 'og ma rgyab kyis phyogs// de bzhin tsha mjam gsum pa ni// khro bo che zhes bsgrags pa yin// bzhi pa mdzub
365a3(rgyud 'bum): mo bsgreng ba yis/ / lnga pa la ni stobs zhes bya// drug pa stobs po che zhes bya// 'di rnams tsham rngam drug tu bsgrags// tsham rnga ma dngas pa byas pa yis// dgra yi 'khor rnams g.yen
365a4(rgyud 'bum): spyo ba/ / 'khor lo'i mchog la goms byed pas// grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen pos gsungs pa yis// rab gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di dkon// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba
365a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / de bas yang ni shin tu dkon// gsang ba'i rtog pa bzang po 'di// kun tu dngos grub kun sbyin par// gsang ba'i rtog pa de bas kyang // 'khor lo 'di ni shin tu dkon//
365a6(rgyud 'bum): hom dang ldan pa yong mi dgos// sngon du bsten pa bya mi dgos// khro bo'i rgyal po'i brtul zhugs dang // dka' thub drag po'ang bya mi dgos// bsam gtan sbyor ba'ang mi dgos te/
365a7(rgyud 'bum): gang la 'khor lo 'ba' zhig yod// gang gsungs pa yi dngos grub nas// de ma thag tu dngos grub thob// de bsang ni ni gsang byas nas// thams cad sgrub pa'i sgrub pa pos//
365b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi don mchog gang 'dod pa// shin tu legs par bsgrub par bya// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog pa gnyis pa'o// khro bo'i
365b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i dngos grub ni/ / sna tshogs thogs med tha dad pa// sngags pa 'dod na cho ga mchog/ dang por byas na dngos grub thob// rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni// re zhig 'di
365b3(rgyud 'bum): yi mtshan nyid ni/ / gzhan dag 'dir ni bshad par bya// de yi las ni gang gsungs pa// gang dag phyis kyang grub 'gyur ba// dpa' bo gcig pu 'ba' zhig gis// thams
365b4(rgyud 'bum): cad nyid de gang gsungs pa/ / thams cad de ni bshad par bya'o// sngags de sa las rnams kun byas pas// rgyud la dngos grub gang gsungs pa// dpa' bo gcig pu'i mthus
365b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'grub/ / oM ni de yi thog ma ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i dam tshig yin// thog ma dang ni gnyis pa yang // drag po'i rtseg gi phul ba'i lugs// klad kyi 'khor gyis
365b6(rgyud 'bum): mnan pa'i rigs/ / sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng bkod la// sngags rnams thams cad gsal byed pa// khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying ngo ni// gsum po de nas sbyar bar bya// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po
365b7(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / su ni de yi 'og tu bstan// sngags pas sngags rnams kun gyi mtshan// de dag rtag tu rig par bya// thogs pa med pa'i sngags rnams ni// bdag nyid chen po thams cad
366a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / bsrung la sogs pa'i las rnams sun// go rims bshad pa bzhin du bya// thams cad bdag nyin chen po 'dis// bsrung ba dag ni byas nas su// rngon
366a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshul bzhin rab dben pa/ / sku gzugs don mchog gzhan nas ni// cho ga ji skad sngar gsungs pa// cho ga bzhin du mchod pa bya// nyin re me tog 'phreng ba la/ lan bdun bzlas pa
366a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mchod/ / mchod nas ka ra l+lI ra yi// me tog dmar po kha bus pa'i// brgya ni rtsa brgyad grangs rnams kyis// bu dron la ni phog par dbul// cho ga 'di ni dus gsum du//
366a4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gcig tu byas nas ni// khro bo mngon sum nye gyur nas// rmi lam du ni dngos grub ster// cho gang di ltar sngar byas na// gang 'dod pa yi dgos pa dag/ de tshe gdon mi za bar 'grub//
366a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi cho ga mchog bshad pa// de ltar zla gcig bsnyen byas na// mi yi las rnams gang bya ba// de yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas// da ni legs par bshad par bya// de nas dang 'gro dang
366a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i/ / dug ni rnam pa gsum dag dang // gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye srin por bcas pa 'jig/ bdag gis byis pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags// sbyor ba lan
366a7(rgyud 'bum): cig bdag gis gsung / / yid la bsams pa tsam gyis kyang // gzhan dag gis kyang mchod par byed// bzhi pa'i rims la sogs de yang // thos pas myur du med par byed//
366b1(rgyud 'bum): ma dang byis pa'i gdon rnams dang // thal babam yang na sas kyang rung // bdag nyid dag par bsams nas ni// bdag dgar phab nas dgos pa'i don// gang dang gang dag 'dod par ni//
366b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pas de dang de dag byed// yid la bsams pas de dag thar// rdo la lan gsum bzlas pa yis// chu srin kum bi ra la sogs// mche ba can dag phyogs med par// chu bsal
366b3(rgyud 'bum): ba yi mchog tu 'byung / / 'gro tshe yid la bzlas na ni// lam na rkun po'i 'jigs pa med// seng ge stag dang dgra rnams dang // nad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// rgyal po'i drung
366b4(rgyud 'bum): du'agro na yang / / sngags kyis spyi gtsug bcings na ni// rgyal po khros pa myur rab tu// brkyang dus thal mo sbyor bar byed// gshegs 'gyed pa dang rgyan po dang // mtshon dang me yis
366b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa la/ / yid la dran zhing bzlas byas nas// mi bde kun las thar par 'gyur// 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bya'i phyir// mi bde nyam thag gyur pa la// sngags 'di myur dran
366b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas nas/ / sprin dag mnan par bya ba dang // 'dod bzhin myur du slar yang bzlog/ gnam lcags ser ba 'bab pa yang // dbyug pa'i phyag rgyas zhi bar byed// phyag rgyas
366b7(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa de nyid kyis/ / yid kyis sprin rnams dbab par bya// de ltar phyag rgyas bsdigs nas ni// smin mtshams dag kyang bsgyur bar bya// rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni// gnam
367a1(rgyud 'bum): lcags ser ba gcad par bya/ / sbyor ba mkhas pas ci 'dod pa// char pa dag kyang gcad par bya// gos ni sngon po bgos na ni// kho ra khor yug bsrung byas
367a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / mid pa nub par chur zhugs te// nyin gsum legs par bzlas byas nas// brgya byin gyis ni sprin bsdus nas// 'dod pa bzhin du char pa 'bebs// de nas sprin chen
367a3(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ / char pas sa stengs khyab par 'gyur// nyi ma la ni mngon phyogs nas// nyin re rtag tu bzlas byas na// bdag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyi// nad rnams de nas med par
367a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rgyal po dbang du bya yang rung // yungs kar dkar po bzang po las// gzugs brnyan legs par byas nas su// de yi gzugs kyi steng 'dug la// gang gi ming smos
367a5(rgyud 'bum): nyin bdun du/ / bzlas brjod legs par byas na ni// de ni myur du cho ga 'dis// bran bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur// zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa yis// dmangs rigs dag ni dbang
367a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / zhag gnyis sbyang ba de bzhin du/ bzlas na rje'u rigs 'dod pa bzhin// zhag gsum byas pas rgyal rigs te// zhag pa zhi dag gis bram ze dag/ bzlas pa'i cho ga
367a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin byas na/ / 'dod pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur// 'bru dang phub ma thams cad las// bu dang bu mo gang yang rung // de bzhin gzugs brnyan byas na ni// dmangs rigs la ni mtshan
367b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis/ / rab tu sdang ba bya bar 'gyur// rnge'u rigs la ni zhag gnyis kyis// de steng tsog pur 'dug nas ni// de bzhin mdza' dang bral bar byed// nyin zhag gsum dang
367b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dag gis/ / rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'o// ji ltar ji skad gsungs pa yi// las kyis bya yi gzhan gyis min// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// dur khrod sol bas
367b3(rgyud 'bum): legs pa ru/ / snga ma bzhin du legs par bri// de nas seng ldeng phur bu la// sngags kyis stong du bzlas byas nas// de yi 'og tu lus la gad // dgra bo de yi ming smos nas//
367b4(rgyud 'bum): de la khros par byas nas su// de nas de yi snying khar 'dug/ phur bu btab ste bzlas bya ba// de nyid lag pas bzung nas su// dus gsum nyi ma gsum byas na// dgra bo gang du
367b5(rgyud 'bum): btab pa der/ / gzer thabs drag pos btab nas su// 'gul mi phon pa ra sa la ltung // zhag bdun lon nas 'chi bar 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas su song nas su// lag pas
367b6(rgyud 'bum): be com phyag rgya bcing / / lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yis// bsdigs shing nyi ma nub nas su// khros shing dgra yi ming smos bzlas// de nas dgra bo mo gdon gyis// zin nas spyod
367b7(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs pas/ / 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag ni byed// de nas sgrub pos zhi ba yi// cho gas de la zhi bar bya// ma mo rnams kyi mdun 'dug nas// zhi ba'i cho ga mkhas pa yis//
368a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po bsdams shing yid bde bas// nyin zhag gsum du bzlas byas nas// de nas de la las de yi// zhi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// nyi ma la ni mngon phyogs
368a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / lag pas dgra bo'i mgo byug cing // dgra yi ming smos mnan nas su// nyi ma nub tu bzlas byas na// de yi klad pa na 'gyur ba// tshabs chen shi la thug par 'gyur// de nas
368a3(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar nas su/ / nyin par zlos shing zhi bar bya// sa stengs rkang pa gcig gis 'dug/ nyin par lag pa gyen du brkyang // ci dga' khros shing babras byas pa// dgra yi ming

368a5(rgyud 'bum): 'on te rgyas par bya 'dod na// gtsang sbra byas te gos dkar bgos// bde zhing brtan par ma g.yos par// mchod pa bzang po byas nas su// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal
368a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / 'o ma btung zhing bzlas byas pa// zhi bar 'gyur gyi bar du'o// de ltar 'di ni sna tshogs pa// sbyor bcas rgyas par bshad pa yin// rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du ni// ma gsungs

368b1(rgyud 'bum): bzang po 'di/ / he la'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni// de bas bzang po gzhan med pa// ji ltar rigs pa bshad par bya// dang por he zhes gang gsungs pa// bskul ba'i sa bon thams
368b2(rgyud 'bum): cad pa'o/ / de ni len dang 'dzin pa ste// las la myur du bskul ba'o// de bas thog mar bskul ba dang // don bzhin du ni bzung ba la// khro bo yi ni rgyal po yi// he la'i dkyil
368b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rim bzhin bstan/ / he he ha ha hi hi hi hi ha ha he he gnyis sbyar ba// khro chen tshig gi tho ga mar sbyar// zung zhig pa yi tshig gnyis pa'o// zung drug 'khor lo'i mtha' mar
368b4(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / mu ran rtsibs kyi mig rnams su// sngags las 'byung ba'i re re'o// don rnams thams cod sgrub par 'gyur// bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags// gnas su

368b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum po dang / / dbus kyi mu ran bzang por ldan// mtha' yi mu ran drug po dang // rtsibs kyi zur drug rab bzang ga/ rab dben 'du 'dzi med pa'i sar// cho ga bzhin du legs

369a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po mtshan ni brjod pa'i mchog/ bzhag nas de yi gnas dag la// sngags ni grub par byed pa gzhag/ mu ran gnyis la gnas nas su// khro bo'i snying po bzha

371b4(rgyud 'bum): tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang / / tsham rngam gsal ba dag la gnas// be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni// khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlas so// rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'di ni// mtsho dang
371b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzing chen krung chen rnams/ / khros pas myur du skems par byed// 'bab chu dag kyang gyen du 'bebs// khro bo mthu chen gnon ldan pa// sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya// rtsims
371b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams rim pras kunA mnan pa/ / gnyis po de las 'phos nas su// de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug/ mthu rnal ldan pas rim par mnan// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/
371b7(rgyud 'bum): klad par myos zhes tshig gnyis bskul// de ni snga ma bzhin bkod nas// de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// khro bo bdud rtsing khyil pa'i mthar// rab tu drag po'i shugs gzhag go
372a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yis/ / khro bo tshim rngam bsnyen par gnas// glang po myos pa'i shugs can dag/ mngon du 'ong bar gyur na yang // de ma thag tu skrag
372a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / myos pa'i shugs kyang rab tu dor// slad du log par phan tshun du// bskor zhing mi dga' bzhin du 'gro// glang po'i rgyal po de myos shing // bde ba ma thob babs par 'gyur//
372a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa khro bo sgom pa yi// cho ga'i tshul ni de bzhin no// he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i// bzhi pa'i gnas la 'dug nas kyang // khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// non cig ces pa'i tshig
372a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bskul/ / de nas cho ga sngar bshad pas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa de yi mthar// khro bo chen po stobs chen gzhag/ kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa yi//
372a5(rgyud 'bum): tsham rngam gyis ni mi g.yor mnan// dpung ngam yang na glang po'am// gru'am yang na shing rta'am// rta dang rnga mo lug la sogs// khro bo bsgoms pa'i tshul bzhin byas// sbyor ba de la gnas
372a6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / rab tu mnan pa byas par 'gyur// de nas he la zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo lnga pa la gnas nas// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig gnyis
372a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang // mtha' yi tshig gi gnas su gzhag/ khro bo rgya chen zhes bya ba// rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang /
372b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i// tsham rngam mchog gis myur du ni// dgra yi dpung rnams phan tshun du// rab tu rnam par dkrug sar bya// de nas hel ba 'khor lo yi// rim pa drug la gnas
372b2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// rmongs par gyur ces tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang // tshig gi tha mar kun tu gzhug/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa//
372b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga snga ma bzhin du bskul// rmongs par byed pa'i tsham rngam gyis// cho ga bzhin du rab bskul nas// ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin// 'gro ba myur du rmongs par 'gyur// de nas he
372b4(rgyud 'bum): la'i 'khor lo 'di/ / rim bdun pa la gnas nas su// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis gzhag/ khro bo 'dzin par byed pa yis// bdud rtsi
372b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil pa skul bar byed/ / 'jigs par gyur pa'i sgra sgrog pa// khro bo'i tsham rnga ma myur bar ni// dus min par yang sprin gyis khebs// de nas 'dod bzhin char pa 'bebs//
372b6(rgyud 'bum): denas he la'i 'khor lo yi// rtsibs kyi rim pa brgyan pa la// gnas nas 'dir ni snga ma bzhin// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// hi hi sa don gnyis parda gnas// de yi 'og
372b7(rgyud 'bum): tu bdud rtsi 'khyil/ / khro bo zur du de bzhin du// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i tha mar gzhag/ khro bo tsham rngam kha gdangs pa// mchog ces bya ba myur bar ni// rkang pa ya gcig gdangs
373a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i stabs/ / sad dang ser ba rlung la sogs// dus sam yang na dus min par// sgrub po khro bo bsgoms pa yis// khro bo'i sngags kyi tshul bzhin du// sa
373a2(rgyud 'bum): yi steng du 'bebs par byed/ / he la'i 'khor lo gnas brgyad po// sgrub pa yi ni sar bor nas// khro bo'i sa bon tshig gsal ba// dgu pa bzang po la gnas te// khro bo chen po tshig gi
373a3(rgyud 'bum): mthar/ / slongs shig pa yi tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// tha mar 'phongs pa sgrol ba gzhag/ khro bo bsgoms pas mdzes pa yi// tsham rngam gsal ba byas nas
373a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / khro bo gshin rje gshed po bzlas// khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsal// hUM zhes bya ba bzang po yis// khro bo dngos por bsgoms nas ni// shing gi rtsa dang yal ga dbug/ yang
373a5(rgyud 'bum): na shing chen rtsa nas 'byin/ / me tog 'bras bu klog pa'am// yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed// ljon shing chen po rnams kyang ni// ji ltar 'dod par mi g.yor 'gyur// he la'i
373a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'i 'khor lo yi/ / rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// choms shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo chen po rab 'joms pa//
373a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bo bdun rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar// snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya/ 'jigs par byed pa'i tshem jam byed// ri chen dag gi rtse mo dang / oM dang lcags sgrog rnams kyi ni/ khro
373b1(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du/ / bsgoms na rab mchog grub byed pa// he la yi ni 'khor lo yi// rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// skyil cig/
373b2(rgyud 'bum): ces pa'i tshig gis bskul// khro bo kI li kI la yang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bye ba// tshig gi tha mar gnas pa ste// cho ga bzhin du bshud pa bzhin// kI li kI la zhes bya ba/
373b3(rgyud 'bum): tsham rngam mchog la de bzhin gnas// be con gyi ni phyag rgya bcings// gshin rje gshed po bsgoms pa ni// rin chen rtsa ba brtan pa yang // rtse mo nas kyang snyil bar byed// yang na ri kar
373b4(rgyud 'bum): skye ba yi/ / brtan pa'i shing rnams 'gyel bar byed// de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi// bcu gnyis pa yi rtsibs la gnas// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// zhugs shig ces
373b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshig gis bskul/ / bskul nus de yi tha mar ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya// khro che nA kI li kI la yang // de yi tha mar gzhag par bya// kI li kI la chen po zhes
373b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i tshum rngam de bzhin bya/ / be con phyag rgya bcings nas su// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// yid la rab tu goms byas na// rtsig pa shing skam rdo la sogs// babs
373b7(rgyud 'bum): na phyung ste nam mkhar gnas/ / nam mkha' la ni byung nas kyang // 'dod pa bzhin du ltung bar byed// 'di ni rang byung ngo mtshar la// 'di ni dus gsum sngon du byung // spyod pa
374a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang snga ma bzhin/ / khro bo bsgoms pas byed par gsungs// he ba'i 'khor lo dgod pa ni// rab tu gsang ba yin par bshad// gsang dang
374a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas shing sbyor bcas pa/ / shes na dngos gru thob par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang ci rigs par// tsham rngam bcu gnyis sbyor ba dag/ mdo dang rgyas pa'i tshul dag
374a3(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / da ni rab tu bshad par bya// kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin// de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad// skrag par byed pa gsum pa ste// bzhi pa kun tu sdom par byed// rang
374a4(rgyud 'bum): tu'akhrug ces bya ba lnga/ / rmongs par byed pa de bzhin drug/ myur ba chum rngam de la gnas// kha gdangs pa ni brgyad par bshad// mdzes zhes bya ba dgu pa ste// 'jigs
374a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa bcu pa yin/ / kI li kI la zhes bya dang // kI li kI la chen po yi// khro bo chem rngam bcu gnyis so// 'di dag rim bzhin bshad pa yin// thog mar bsdigs
374a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa yis/ / be con phyag rgya ldan par bya// phyi nas rang gzugs ji bzhin du// sngags pa dag gis shes par bya// rang gi gzugs kyang rang gnas pa// bsdigs
374a7(rgyud 'bum): shing tsham rngam byed la sogs/ / skrag par byed pa'i kha ni zab// khro bo'i lta ba gdong 'gyur ba// rkang pa 'gyed par bzhag pa dag/ tsham rnga ma mtshan nyid bshad pa yin//
374b1(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa ya gcig myur du gzhag/ gdong dang nu mjid yon po byas// khro gnyer 'jigs par byed par bsgrer// g.yon pa mdzub mo gcig gis bsdigs// chem rngam byed
374b2(rgyud 'bum): cing be con gdengs/ / gdong dang brla dang rkang pa g.yon// kun tu g.yo zhes bya ba ste/ khro bo tshom rngam bsnyems dang bcas// kun tu g.yo ba'i rim gsungs la// rab tu g.yo
374b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni/ / cung zad du ni dbus dman pa'o// rab tu g.yo ba brtag par bya// de bzhin dpung pa brkyang ba dang // rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs pa dang // lag gnyis drag tu
374b4(rgyud 'bum): rdob pa ni/ / de bzhin skrag par byed par bshad// becon la ni lta bar gtad// rkang pa g.yos pa gsal bar phyar// de ni kun tu sdom par bshad// g.yon pa'i mdzub
374b5(rgyud 'bum): mos bsdigs par bya/ / dpung pa gdengs pa g.yon bzhin du// mig ni mdzub mo gcig la gtad// rkang pa g.yas pa phyar ba ni// kun tu 'khrug pa zhes bya'o// rkang pa
374b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa gdangs byas te/ / g.yon phyogs su ni phyar zhing bskor// dpung pa brkyang ba'i be con gdengs// bsdigs pa gcig tu rmongs par byed// myur du tsham rngam zhes bya
374b7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / de nyid dpung brdobs bsdigs pa'o// de nyid las ni kha gdangs pa// kha gdangs pa zhes bsgrags pa yin// sran dang bcas pa bzhi ni bskor// mthu rtsal che ba'i stabs
375a1(rgyud 'bum): su stsol/ / mchu yi mtha' ma so yis mnan// lag pa phyar te sdigs par byed// bsnyems dang bcas shing sgra yang 'byin// 'jigs par byed pa'i hUM bsgrags
375a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / tsham rnga ma legs par bshad pa ni// mdzes pa'i khro bos gnon pa'o// btsan thabs su ni bskor bar bya// rkang pa g.yas pa btsugs te mnan// lag pa gnyis ka drag
375a3(rgyud 'bum): rdob pa/ / byas nas 'jigs par bya ba ni// de bzhin bsnyems dang bcas bshad pa// tsham rngam bdag nyid chen po 'di// 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ste// rtag tu khre de sgom pa'o//
375a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa mnyam par bzhag ste 'dug/ g.yas pa cung zad mtho bar bya// dpal dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad// g.yon pa sor mo gcig ni bsdigs// dpung pa bteg ste be con 'phyar//
375a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa dang ni gdong bsgyur ba// rtag tu khro bo sgom pa ni// kI li kI la zhes bya'o// kI li kI la chen po ni// de nyid las ni rgyab tu blta// khro bo mig ni ya gcig btsums// myur du
375a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod stabs byed pa'o/ / 'di ni tshim rngam sbyor ba ste// he la'i 'khor lo rtsibs rim las// mdor ni ji ltar dgod pa dag/ legs par bshad pa 'di yin no// he la'i 'khor
375a7(rgyud 'bum): lo'i mthu sngags dang / / tsham rngam g.yas kyi mthu dka' yis// las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba// ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o// bsgrubs pa de dag gsang rgyud dang /
375b1(rgyud 'bum): te la'i 'khor lo 'di shes na// khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur pas// khro bo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur// rtog pa 'di ni gsang bar bcas// gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu bshad/
375b2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las// mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las// rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di// rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba// thos nas gsang
375b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don bsgoms pas/ / lha de thams cad yi rang nas// khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te// rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la
375b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / // khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
375b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra d+hi ra bad+hA ra Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
375b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma sel ba/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams
375b7(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag la 'thun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i rnam pa'i mchog rtsol bar gyur cig/ de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go// a ra ra/ a sa ma/ sa ma tA/ a nan+ta/ d+harmerbe/
376a1(rgyud 'bum): ra N+Da la N+Da/ ma hA bI re/ tsa le sa ma ma/ A sa ha/ ma hA ba le/ kaN kaN/ ma hA ba la ag zi he/ ha ha badz+ra badz+ra hA ye/ d+ha rad+ha rA/ hUM hUM maN+Da las
376a2(rgyud 'bum): ma pa ra ak+Sha bi kra me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarbaM thA/ sarba ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ a gri Na paT swAhA/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa
376a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro// las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa
376a4(rgyud 'bum): med par byed de/ dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no//
376a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas cho ga mi bzad pa// rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni// klu dang lha srin bcas pa yi/ sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa// de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i// brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar
376a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa// de ni srung bar byed pa'i mchog/ ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med// bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni//
376a7(rgyud 'bum): skye bo kun la srung gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra pra ka ra/ badz+ra pra ka ra/ badz+ra daMD+b+h+yAM/ b+ha yA pa hA/ tsu ru tsa ru/ pa ri tsu ma bi ke/ tsu lu te le/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badz+ra
376b1(rgyud 'bum): be ra bkya/ ma hA gaN pa tiH/ badz+ra shak+ti/ bA ra shu/ bA sha/ bas+thA ya/ badz+ra ka nA ka/ badz+ra dr-i T+Tar+ra/ a la li/ sha rI rA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni ra nu pa lA ya/ tab+h+ya// d+hAru d+hu rba/
376b2(rgyud 'bum): an yA/ a na yA/ ma hA ga Na pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/ e hi saM hi/ a kra ma a kra ma/ sha ri raM/ gri hri ta mA/ krI hI ta ma/ daMSh+Tham/ daMSh+Ta mA b+da/ at+ma be sha ku sha rA raM/ kim+b+hi rA ya
376b3(rgyud 'bum): si/ / bi d+hu na/ bar+d+ha na/ paT paT/ kAM pa kaM pa/ raM ga raM ga/ mod mo/ d+harma d+harma/ badz+ri bA badz+ri dA/ s+phu ru s+phu ra/ gur+Na guH/ a bi shA ma bi sha/ shIk+saM shI
376b4(rgyud 'bum): g+ha/ ma hA badz+ra b+he ra be/ ga Na pa ti rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad la rengs par bya ba dang / byad snyems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i sgrib la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas
376b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ sems khros pas mtshon la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byed stems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dam ga tshogs bzlog par 'dod
376b6(rgyud 'bum): pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas
376b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ / se rab bzlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing / spa'ang ba cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi
377a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ / chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro// nad zhi bar 'dod pa la
377a2(rgyud 'bum): ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman nam chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / las gang byed pa thams cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na
377a3(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pas gsungs
377a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang / / rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs// bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di// kun gyis thun mong ma yin rnam
377a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ / rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban d+he skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo //
377a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ sAr+ya ma hAdAr+N+Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
377a7(rgyud 'bum): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
377b1(rgyud 'bum): bdun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra ga can zin rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na/ bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go/
377b2(rgyud 'bum): der 'di lta ste/ lA'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sprin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i gdon
377b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon
377b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / bug pa rnams dang / thog sbur rnams dang / sdig
377b5(rgyud 'bum): sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la shin tu gtses so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i
377b6(rgyud 'bum): rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
377b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngus te mchi ma blags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i
378a1(rgyud 'bum): mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma zlog/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
378a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na/ bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis mchis na/ der lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon
378a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
378a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lnga'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang /
378a5(rgyud 'bum): grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / bug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
378a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyis bdag la shin tu gtses lags mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod kyis be con
378a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang

398a2(rgyud 'bum): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i

398a4(rgyud 'bum): be du be/ bya ba d+h+we/ An g+he/ sa mA d+he/ ma hA swa mA d+he/ nI le nI le/ nI la ke she ke shi ne/ ku le ku le/ ma hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ ma no hA re/ ar+the/ ban+de/ nan+te/

398b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ narme le/ maM ga le/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nI/ ka ma sh+tsi ni/ yu bi
398b2(rgyud 'bum): radze kuT ku Ta/ kaM ba le/ brah+ma/ brah+ma sa re/ brah+ma sid d+hi/ sid d+he ma/ nor thephu swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo

398b6(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+he/ su pud+d+he/ ba hu bun+d+he/ bi shiSh+Ta bud+d+he/ shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ ni shi grA mA ni/ dzaM ge le/ a la sa/ ti li mai/ ti li/ ti le laM/ mne shAn+ta shAn+ta gA nA ni pus+thA hA/ dra nas bcom
398b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes
399a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o//

399b1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba khyed kyis

400a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba hu putra pa ti sa ra nA nA ma d+hA ra Ne/ bod skad du/ 'phags
400a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
400a3(rgyud 'bum): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nA bzhugs te/ de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan pa das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan

400b1(rgyud 'bum): ka ro mi/ dzi hA ka ro mi/ ha nAM ka ro mi/ dzaM b+ha nAn/ sA d+ha nA na/ mo hA nAn/ pra mo hA nAn/ khyim bdag gang la la zhig pu mang po rton pa'i gzungs 'di skud pa dmar po la lan bdun bsngags
400b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings na de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang // nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag pos mi tshugs so// 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang /

401a1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur to/ / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed do// de dag gis grags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa
401a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rnyed nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go// reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad
401a3(rgyud 'bum): padrag pa/ / tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba/

401a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u Sha gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i

401a7(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra 'am/ de skad

402a1(rgyud 'bum): be ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to/ / ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go// steng du bltas nas 'gas

402a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis da dung du khyod kyi lus 'tshe ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das legs par bsal du gsol// phyir zlog tu gsol/ phyag rgyab cing du gsol// skud pas bcing
402a4(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ra/ ma hA ge re/ g+ha sa ra pa ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+ha ra Ni/ tsher tshe ra Ni/ ka ro ti ti/ ka to ta mA d+hi Ni/

403b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags gcod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan pa da sa legs so//

404a2(rgyud 'bum): ha ra NI/ ku tha ni ta De/ med tsha dang ti/ tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
404a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i
404a4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags gcad do/ / gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phyogs nas byas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phyogs
404a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshams nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ / steng nas byas pa dang 'og nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// lhas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// klus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
